name: South West Luxury 2 Bedrooms Close to Downtown
summary: Large & clean new apartment in the heart of trendy South West Montreal. Minutes away from Downtown (15mins walk will take you on the West end of Ste-Catherine St) perfectly located 2 mins away from Lionel-Groulx Metro going to Old Montreal & Downtown or a 5$ Uber ride.  Easy free street side parking + many restaurants and trendy bars, steps away from the famous Atwater Market. The perfect place to book for people looking for a mix between proximity to Downtown and a quiet area at night!
space: What you are getting:  The Whole Place for Yourself 2 Comfortable Bedrooms with Queen-sized beds and Queen-sized air mattresses 2 Luxurious Bathrooms Great Living Room with a Huge Floor to Ceiling Window 4 High End Appliances  Basic Cooking & Hygiene amenities Clean Linens and Towels

The perfect place to book for people looking for a mix between proximity to Downtown and a quiet area at night! St-Henri / South West Montreal is the new up and coming trendy neighborhood of Montreal. It's less than a mile away from Center of Downtown and have many upscale restaurants
neighborhood_overview: St-Henri / South West Montreal is the new up and coming trendy neighborhood of Montreal. It's less than a mile away from Center of Downtown and have many upscale restaurants and bars.  You will be located right besides the highway taking you to the Airport and Quebec City. A short walk will take you to the famous Atwater Market of Montreal, where you can find numerous local arts, products and street foods.
notes: Unfortunately, Montreal guests cannot Instant book and must inquire first, any unauthorized booking from local guest will be cancelled One visitor = one booked guest, even if they don't sleep at the apartment. Smoking fees 200$ Camera on site at the entrance lobby Easy street free parking available (be careful of tagged places)
transit: 2 Corners away from a Central Metro Station (Lionel-Groulx) of Montreal (Orange Line) Right besides N/S/E/W Highways
access: Full access, the apartment takes the whole floor.
house_rules: - Montreal Guest Cannot instant book and must inquire first - Every visitor have to be registered as a guest

reviews.comments: Clean and spacious in a great spot.
Great stay! Fantastic location.
Guys I would highly suggest this place if you are looking for accessible Neighbourhood, host is always there for you and she knows what she is doing.
Great apartment. Nice host. Would be happy to stay there again.
Great place very clean every channel u can think of

This was my first time staying at an airbnb and the place was amazing. Everything needed was in the house and had no trouble with anything. I would definitely come back and would highly recommend staying here for anyone looking for a place out in Montreal.

Beautiful split level apartment unit. Everything was very new and clean. Large, spacious, great shower pressure. Even the second bedroom sofa bed was very comfortable. Excellent location with lots of street parking and steps to the metro station and Atwater market. Loved it. Very responsive and helpful host.

Place was very new. However, because one host had given me a lower price than she should have on a month long stay, there was no attempt to provide the basic things I wanted as a guest like salt, pepper, sugar, coffee, tea, toaster, kettle, cutlery trays, hand soap, shower curtain, bath mat, facecloths, space for my folded clothes (it was all taken up by linens while the top shelves in cupboards, which I am too short to reach, were all empty) and most importantly, NOT ONE HANGER in the entire place. In fact, the other host said  that because the first host had misquoted the price, he would accept the mistake but that the place came as is. I spent over $150 on things that had already been provided in the many other Airbnb lodgings I've been in. Did I take it all with me when I left? You bet I did, it's my hard earned money. 

In addition, the first host told me that they would give me a good review even if the place looked like I'd had a "hangover party" when I left, in return expected a 5 review or they'd be kicked off Airbnb. Funny, I paid a cleaning fee and left the apartment pretty darn clean as I had washed all the towels and swept the floors (no vacuum) the day before I left. Yes, I asked to extend for another month rather than have to find another one and move but I was willing to pay the higher price rather than go through another move. They had other bookings , two that I saw in the month but I found a much better place for less so I lucked out big time! All in all, the three places at that location run by these two hosts are nicely decorated, good location but after dealing with these hosts, I won't rent from them again.

Un des plus beau airbnb j’ai visité jusqu’à maintenant, neuf et bien décoré. La Propreté des lieux est  irréprochable. Le seul point négatif est le bruit de pas des voisins du haut. Nous y avons eu droit une grande partie de la soirée et tôt le matin. 
Communication avec les hôtes rapides et claires. A proximité d’une station de métro et stationnement dans la rue facile.
This is a nice and clean place to stay. It’s a very good location and I highly recommend it!

luxueux et spacieux
en plein coeur de la petite bourgogne (super resto, canal Lachine, marché Atwater, etc.)
on met le pied dehors et on est dans l'action

Great place, with great access to the restaurant, theatres, and activities on Notre-dame. We will definitely be staying there again. Really comfortable beds, and the apartment was super clean. Communication and check in was a 10 out of 10.

The place is very stylish and modern, it’s a really nice place. However, because it’s very new, some things are missing (like shower curtains) and other small touches. The floors were also quite dusty in the basement, but upstairs was cleaner. Additionally, the AC was not working during our stay but the host was helpful in terms of offering solutions. The location is very nice and has plenty of restaurants and stores nearby, including the Atwater market.
Nice, very clean place with plenty of space & conveniently located to Metro station
Nice place and good location close to transit (2 subway stops to Bell Centre), Atwater Market, Lachine Canal, and venues along Notre Dame. A nice part of Montreal and would stay here again!
Clean spacious and comfy!
Nice place
The place is super clean and well organized. I definitely visit again if I have a chance to visit Montreal again.

Frederick's place is new and stylish. It's in the heart of almost everything, and there are many restaurants just around the corner. There are 2 levels, and the bedrooms are in the lower level. The shower is in the upper level whereas the bath tub is in the lower level. There was a heat wave during our stay, so the air conditioners were a bonus. I had a rental car and I was lucky enough to park it right outside on the street in front of the house. I enjoyed my stay at Frederick's and I'd recommend it to everyone.

Great place in an excellent neighborhood. Walking distance to many shops and restaurants along st. henri. Right behind lionel giroulx. The space was very clean and was plenty of space for our party of 4 (plus a baby).
Great place! I would recommend it!
Nice place, in a quiet location, but close enough to the action. I really liked that the door had a key code to enter instead of having to worry about keys!

Frederick’s listing is accurate in the photos and the space was modern and very clean.  It was helpful to have 2 bathrooms for a family of 5 and air mattresses in addition to the beds.  It is conveniently located near the metro (about a 5 minute walk) and there is a large grocery store nearby as well as the Marche Atwater.  We had a very positive experience!  Merci!
Amazing luxury apartment close to everything! What a stylish way to spend a long weekend in Montreal with friends! We loved it! Thank you for hosting us! We will be back!
Great location, spotless place.  Def recommend.

El Lugar de Frederick es muy bonito y espacioso. Queda en un lugar cercano con restaurantes, el Mercado Atwater para comprar comida y víveres, bares y fácil de moverte a múltiples lugares. Si te gusta caminar puedes llegar al viejo Montréal en 25 minutos. Bonito lugar y altamente recomendable.
Nice clean brand-new apartment.
The house is a good place to stay for short trip.
Good place to stay for short trip.
loved it

Optimal location! There are a ton of restaurants nearby, gas stations, pharmaprix, Atwater Market, SAQ (wine/beer store) and SuperC, all within a 2 minute walking distance. 

The amenities were superb, although we didn't cook, it is equipped with cookware/dinnerware - you would have to purchase your own condiments which is understandable (sharing these things are not entirely foodsafe). 

Street parking in Montreal is confusing - if you don't read French, ask the locals to decipher the signs, otherwise Fred and his team were quick to respond to our inquiries.

Keyless entry also meant we didn't need to fiddle around with key pick-ups or dropoffs.  Our group thoroughly enjoyed our stay and the convenient location.
Great location! Amazing space. Super classy and modern. It was close to everything. (5-10 minute Uber ride to downtown, old port, Westmount...) would stay here again and would recommend to friends :)

This place was great for our needs. We were in town for work and this location/ accommodation met all our needs. We were one couple and a friend. Communication with the host and co-hosts was very easy and as was the self-check-in. The apartment is located next to everything you could possibly desire,  my tip would be to go to Foiegwa and order the pasta or burger dish!
Very nice and cozy place. It’s very big, and the area is close to a lot of restaurants.
Frederick's place was very pleasant and the location near the metro was extremely convenient.
Place was up to our expectations. Will be staying here when I return to Quebec
Great space. Good location. Would definitely stay here again.
The apartment is very modern and clean, and the location allows for easy access to the Metro and several nearby restaurants.  Very nice place to stay!
Great place for a family of five!

Very well located. Modern. Spacious. New construction. So please as a guest be careful not to break anything. I've noticed that in apartment 101 where we were staying a few items were damaged which means that some people were rough on the equipment. Too bad.
Great apartment with decent price. The on street parking was hard to find if you don't know French, otherwise it is great place to stay.

I had a rough experience with my last Airbnb host and was skeptical on using Airbnb again but I am glad to say these host have restored my faith in Airbnb. The place was even better than we expected and we can't wait to come back as soon as we can ! This is by far the most perfect experience I've had with Airbnb !

This is a great apartment located in a central area. It was very clean and comfortable for the group of four we travelled with. Frederick and Kloe were both wonderful and responded to my questions right away. Overall we enjoyed our stay!

A wonderful place,extremely exceed our expectations. The decorations are special, full of French style. 
The landlord is very friendly and responds fast. 
Will definitely go there again!
Great apartment in fun part of Montreal.   The apartment is very clean - looks newly renovated to me.  Nice neighborhood with cafes, restaurants, and bars right around the corner.

Amazing apartment and great location. The location was perfect and walking distance to great/trendy restaurants and cafes. Prompt communication and clear instructions made it very easy to check in and out. Very clean apartment with comfy beds and available free street parking.
Beautiful space, very friendly host and quick to respond too and also in a great location!

It has a large window in the living room and a balcony facing Rua da Constituição, providing the apartment with lots of light.

It has a large window in the living room and a balcony facing Rua da Constituição, providing the apartment with lots of light.  The living area has a comfortable sofa and leads into a kitchenette area with a dining bar.  The bathroom has a shower enclosure.  MQ1 is equipped with Air Conditioning  and heating, as well as sound insulating double-glazing windows.  The Metro Marques is less than 7 min away. This is the perfect home for your Porto stay. house_rules: 1. Check-in schedule: standard at 15H or later. Check in before 15H by arrangement if no one departs from apartment that day. 30 euro surcharge between 22H and 08H 2. Check-out schedule: 11:00. 3. Dangerous breed dogs are not allowed.

host.host_about: Mature professional, passionate about customer service

reviews.comments:
O Sr Jose Luz e a sua Gerente de Apartamento, Sra Isabel Barros, sempre procuraram nos atender com rapidez e boa vontade.
A comunicação com eles, especialmente com a Sra Isabel, foi excelente. A Sra Isabel, com quem tivemos maior contato, é uma pessoa muito agradável, que nos tratou muito bem, sendo sempre muito solícita.
O apartamento é decorado com muito bom gosto e possui acessórios novos (máquina de lavar roupa, máquina de secar roupa, etc) necessários à estadia. É muito limpo, confortável e aconchegante e, portanto, recomendo a estadia nesse local.

Lovely flat, short walk from downtown.  All the amenities I’d have at home were made available.  Felt like a home away from home. 

Checkin with the apartment manager (Isabel) was quick and easy. Nice neighbourhood shops around the corner.
La casa es muy confortable y muy bien equipada. Isabel muy simpática y atenta. Por poner una pega, la hora de salida, las once. Es sólo una hora de diferencia con el común de los sitios pero se nota
Apartamento simples, porém muito bom. Meus 3 cães foram bem recebidos. O apartamento é muito bem equipado e próximo a diversos comércios, supermercados, padarias, bancos, etc. Recomendo!

name: Room available in Sheung Wan (SW9c)
summary: 5 mins walk to MTR 4 rooms sharing apartment with living room, kitchen and bathroom - Double Bed + Wardrobe  - Air-conditioning - Refrigerator, Microwave, Hot Plate, WIFI internet, etc. All you need is a suitcase to move in! The electricity is not included
description: 5 mins walk to MTR 4 rooms sharing apartment with living room, kitchen and bathroom - Double Bed + Wardrobe  - Air-conditioning - Refrigerator, Microwave, Hot Plate, WIFI internet, etc. All you need is a suitcase to move in! The electricity is not included * a flatshare agreement has to be signed * there is a 500 key deposit refundable when check out * there is a Hong Kong stamp duty tax about 80 * electricity is not included, it is pro-rata shared among all, is about 100-400 per month per person.
interaction: * a flatshare agreement has to be signed * there is a 500 key deposit refundable when check out * there is a Hong Kong stamp duty tax about 80 * electricity is not included, it is pro-rata shared among all, is about 100-400 per month per person.
house_rules: - -  IMPORTANT: All photos here are for REFERENCE ONLY. Please message me to confirm it the room is available or not. There is NO move in after 7 pm. There is a Flat share agreement to sign with us if you decide to confirm the booking with us, and a Hong Kong Government stamp duty to pay to the Hong Kong Government Tax which is usually less than HK$100 AND a key Deposit $500 which is refundable when you move out with us. It is mandated by Hong Kong law that a tenant and landlord / principal tenant have to sign a tenancy agreement to make the deal legal. Thank you for your understanding.

host.host_about:
Welcome to Hong Kong.
I am here to help and make sure you have a wonderful stay at my places.

name: Bright & Stylish  Best Location Soho / Sheung Wan
summary: This is a 1 bedroom apartment located on Tung / Tai Ping Shan Street in Sheung Wan next to Soho (5 minute walk) and Central, (10 minute walk)  a street with many art gallery, boutiques, cafes and shops. The place is very bright, stylish, clean, and comes with everything you need for your comfortable stay Only 8 min walk to Sheung Wan MTR station or 10 min walk to Central MTR station. Surrounded by cafe, trendy boutiques, restaurants, bars, shops and supermarket. The best place to be in HK!

host.host_about: Beachwear lover currently residing in Hong Kong

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Everything went smoothly from the booking to checking in and checking out. Anchalika was very responsive to questions. This part of HK is one of my favorites, so close to good restaurants and bars and the subway is not too far away. The flat itself was spacious, clean and had everything I needed, especially coffee!

After a climb of stairs, we're welconed with spacious, comfortable, well-decorated room. Really enjoy staying here since it's close to restaurants, cafe, and bars. Anchalica is very responsive and giving accurate information about her place. This place worths it.

Anchalika’s place is great and she is a wonderful host! She is very helpful and super quick with communication and she kept in touch throughout my stay to make sure everything was alright.  Her flat is clean, comfortable and in a perfect location, walk-able to many exciting sights and places, cafés, restaurants, MTR, tram, etc., in the lovely areas of Sheung Wan, Sai Ying Pun, Soho, Central and beyond.  I really appreciated Anchalika arranging to meet with me in advance of check-in with the keys, immediately offering an iron for my work shirts, and to leave my bag until the next guest arrived. I would recommend to all and have bookmarked for a future visit to HK. Many thanks! :) (24 March - 22 April 2018)
Amazing place totally in love with!
I would definitely stay at Anchalika's again. The flat is in a great location and photos are exactly right. Anchalika was really easy to get in touch with with any questions. Thoroughly recommend!

Clean, quiet apartment, exactly as pictured.  It has everything you need for a weekend or longer stay.  Location is amazing, public transport and several tourist sites nearby, and great coffee places only steps away.
Check-in was easy and friendly. Just a reminder, apartment is in the 3rd floor without elevator, but wasn’t an issue for us. We would definitely return!

Anchalika’s flat is in a great location - it’s walkable to lots of nice restaurants and cafes and close to public transport. The flat is exactly as pictured and is clean and quiet. We didn’t meet Anchalika but she gave us all the information we needed and kept in touch with us throughout our stay. We really enjoyed our time in HK and would definitely stay at Anchalika’s flat again!
Great location. Silence good to sleep. Good bed. Nice apartment clean and with all the basics we need. Close to nice spots, restaurants. I would definitely stay there again.
I highly recommend this flat. Cozy, well appointed, very clean and everything new. Could not ask for a better neighborhood location in HK. I will stay again.
super clean, very light, extremely well renovated  and absolutely stunning location apt. Worth every penny
Quick response and anchalika is very nice and helpful. Lots of travel information.
Excellent modern apartment in a great location. Anchalika was very responsive and helpful. Great place overall.
Great location! Perfect amount of space for two people. Great shower. Would definitely stay again.
Anchalika’s place was incredible. Great location. It’s perfect for a couple or a single person traveling alone. Will definitely come back!

The location of Anchalika’s flat is perfect, less than 5 mn walk from the vibrant area of Soho, and the MTR station of Sheung Wan is less than 10mn walk. 
The flat is cosy, bright and quiet, you will feel like at home ! But you’ll have to walk up 3 floors, not so easy with a big luggage ...
Anchalika was very responsive and flexible for the check out.
I highly recommend Anchalika’s flat !
Perfect location, clean and nice apartment. Communication with Anchalika was very easy and helpful despite my being late for the appointment. I recommend this apartment! Thank you Anchalika!
Fantastic apartment in a great location with a very responsive host, would stay again.
Great location, flat has all you need for a short stay, very bright and airy, definitely recommend.
房子很干净也很舒服,地段不错周围有很多漂亮的小店可以逛

the  apetment  is lovely and well decorated, and the location is perfect. but please be noted there is no lift in the building and the lighting is quite bad in the stairs, so sometimes it will be a bit hard to walk up the stairs especially at night since it it quite dark

Anchalika’s flat was really stylish, cozy and very clean. Location is ideal and there are tons of restaurants around. Any issues I had were dealt with very quickly, and I would definitely stay here again! The only minor downside was the stairway outside, as it was very dusty and some areas were completely dark. However, it is understandable that this may be out of the control of the host and is rather the fault of the building’s management. Overall, my stay was very pleasant and I would not hesitate to book Anchalika’s place again :)
A chic and well furnish apartment, awesome amostsphere in the apartment and the neigborhood
附近有超多步行可至的地方,元创芳,大馆,九记牛腩,莲香楼……当然首先要接受可以爬楼梯,这也是上环的特色!
Great place to stay! Very stylish

Anchalika's apartment is in a great location, handy for Hollywood Road shops bars and restaurants. it's also within 10 minutes walk of MTR, buses and trams. attractively furnished, well equipped very clean. communication was quick and Anchalika was always helpful. Although she does say there are a lot of stairs, be aware that there are 67 of them. if you have heavy bags and/or are less fit and able, you might struggle. overall a very enjoyable stay.

We stayed at Anchalika's apartment for 4 nights and it was an excellent choice. The location is fantastic. It is a short walk to the MTR station and the ferry terminal for Macau.  The apartment was super clean and had everything we needed. Check in and out was easy too with Anchalika responding to us really quickly. Restaurants that were great nearby - Little Bao, Mrs. Pound and Pici. Would definitely stay here again.

Great AirBnB - clean, stylish apartment located very centrally in Hong Kong near restaurants, bars and nightlife and very accessible from public transit. Host was very responsive leading up to and during our stay, great experience all around - would recommend booking to anyone looking for a great place to stay at a reasonable price relative to hotels on the island.

Great location at a wonderful neighbor.
The apartment has the essentials covered. Clean and tidy.

My boyfriend and I had a fantastic stay at this place, the location is absolutely perfect. 15 mins walk and you are in the heart of central so everything was very convenient. There are also a lot of cute cafes and shops near the flat, including some great breakfast places. Flat was clean and we also used the kitchen. Overall highly recommend.
Perfect location! Quick responses! Convenient check-in! We would stay here again!
Anchalika’s place was very clean and updated with great materials. Also the location is perfect with lots of local places to eat and checkout. Can’t wait to stay there again!
交通还是很方便的,离中环很近,逛街购物很方便,附近的小餐馆也很好吃~住处很干净,厨具一应俱全,还有咖啡机和烤箱~非常棒~

The house may not look best but the apartment definitely is (bed is very comfortable). 

Please prepare to walk the stairs (3 floors) but on the other hand you need to walk the stairs in Hong Kong as well ;)

Generally great location - you are really in the middle of Hong Kong in the walking distance to everything you might need (incl. some great restaurants different price range and public transportation). 

Would love to come back! :)

The Building is very old with no lift and there are no light on stair, also the stair always wet and slip. so there very dark and dangerous at night. About the house, the bed sheet isn't clean and there are a bit noisy. And the checkout time is a bit early at 10AM...
But interior is looks good , same as photo! And the location is nearly mtr.

The place is as described. Bring earplugs if you plan on napping in the afternoon due to  jetlag - there was seemingly perpetual construction going on nearby throughout the day (mostly just during daylight working hours). Some of the reviews mentioned concern about dark stairwells - there were lights that automatically went on when we passed them during our stay. The neighborhood feels safe. Recommend Classified nearby if you're craving a Western meal after a few days :)
This place was fantastic! It was clean and in a great location! Anchalika was very helpful and quick to respond to any questions. Overall, a great experience!

The property was clean and centeredly located on Hong Kong island with easy access to MTR and restaurants. However, because the location is located in a crowded space in busy Hong Kong, there was loud construction in the early mornings to late afternoon during my stay.
非常推荐的公寓!地理位置很好 房东很周到 装修风格现代 用品齐全 周边有很多小店 食肆 理想之选

I stayed at Anchalika's place in Sheung Wan for three weeks in January 2019 and enjoyed it thoroughly. The flat is immaculate (especially the bathroom) and quite spacious considering it's location on Hong Kong Island. Anchalika is very quick to respond to questions and always solution-oriented with any issues that develop. I highly recommend this property.

This is a lovely one bed apartment. Very good amenities inside, in a fabulous location, bars and cafes all around, and more traditional style Sheung Wan below, very close to MTR. There are only steps up to the third floor and also in the street below.
Very clean, great communication, comfortable and brilliant location.  We will be back.
nice place!

Really good location in a very old building, there’s no lift so you have to climb up the stairs for about three floors but it was not a problem for us. It’s about 5 minutes walk from mtr station and about 10-15 minutes to central. The place is really nice and cozy, the best thing I like about it is the toilet. It’s really clean and comfortable!
good

Angie’s house is in a great location for enjoying the best of Hong Kong food, shops and alleyway exploring.
It is clean and comfortable and perfectly set up for two people to relax

Unit as described on the inside and I enjoyed my stay. Very good location. For those that are not as familiar with HK do note that this unit is in a small and old building with no elevators. There was also construction next to to the building during early March which is fairly loud during work hours Monday to Saturday.

name: Nice little and cozy room!
summary: Nice and calm appartment close to the popular Lafontaine parc. Restaurants, grocery stores and bars near by. Perfect for one or two travelers. Few minutes from downtown in public transport. Contains a few roommates that will make you feel welcomed. Also contains a cat that will give you love if you want some.
description: Nice and calm appartment close to the popular Lafontaine parc. Restaurants, grocery stores and bars near by. Perfect for one or two travelers. Few minutes from downtown in public transport. Contains a few roommates that will make you feel welcomed. Also contains a cat that will give you love if you want some.
house_rules: - Logement de jeunes professionnels, le calme est respecté

reviews.comments: Walkable to many local shops in Montreal. The bed is super comfortable and the hosts are very welcoming.

Veronique’s Place was great for me and my friend who I went to Montreal with. Her roommates were two guys, very helpful and friendly. We were out and about most of the time and we had a car to get around but the apartment is close to a bus stop if you need to use it. The only thing that I’m not sure was advertised is that there is smoking in the apartment - as long as that doesn’t bug you, great place! Also not far from downtown and close to bars and shops in the neighborhood.

La petite chambre est charmante et le lit est confortable. Cependant l'appartement est sale et peut sentir mauvais, il n'y a pas de rideaux à la fenêtre et on entend tout ce qui se passe dans le salon. L'hôte est gentille et l'appartement a un sacré potentiel, un coup de ménage plus régulier et ce serait vraiment bien selon moi.

Room was nice. Comfy bed. Host was friendly but wasn’t there when we were checking in. No working sinks when we were there, but we didn’t spend a lot of time at the airBNB anyway. I don’t think that was information we we pre-warned about though. Very friendly little 3 legged kitty. Very convenient location if you wanna go to La Ronde for the day. Overall, not a bad time but definitely a few hiccups.

name: Barcelona Super Central Apartment
summary: Caracterizado por su luminosidad, las tonalidades cálidas que marcan su estilo y la conveniente distribución de sus espacios y muebles, este acogedor apartamento consigue que sus huéspedes se sientan como en su propia casa.
space: El apartamento es muy acogedor e impecable a la vez de soleado con todo el máximo confort necesario para una agradable estancia
description: Caracterizado por su luminosidad, las tonalidades cálidas que marcan su estilo y la conveniente distribución de sus espacios y muebles, este acogedor apartamento consigue que sus huéspedes se sientan como en su propia casa.
neighborhood_overview: Se ubica en una de las calles de mayor renombre de Barcelona, en el moderno Paseo de Gracia, a unos minutos de la céntrica plaza de Cataluña, cerca de la Casa Batlló de Gaudí y junto a una selecta variedad de restaurantes, tiendas y supermercados.
notes: El apartamento es muy limpio elegante y funcional  Estamos en pleno centro de bar Elina pues es extremadamente fácil moverse a cualquier sitio
transit: Estamos delante de la Parda de metro paseo de gracia y a un minuto caminando de plaza catalunya así que es extremadamente fácil moverse desde el apartamento
access: pueden acceder a todo el apartamento desde habiacion hasta salón cocina y baño completo
interaction: Antes de la llegada perfectamente organizaré todo  Durante la estancia estaré disponible para cualquier cosa que haga falta
house_rules: apartment is in a aperfect condition and 100% easy going  welcome

host.host_about:
I m dinamic artist love people and travel around 

A

name: Studio located in the best part of the city
summary: Studio located in the best part of the city. Right in Gothic area, few steps from Las Ramblas, Picasso Museum, The Cathedral of Barcelona. Area plenty of nice little restaurants, wine bars, tapas, trendy shops… great for shopping. Get lost and discover the city. Everything is walking distance.
space: Fully equipped kitchenette & bathroom.   Perfect for couples, friends, or even business trip. We provide towels & sheets. Located in a building with elevator with more studios in the same building. Please bear in mind any accommodation located right in the city centre which is exterior and has a balcony could be a affected by noise from the street.   In Barcelona there is a tourist tax of 2,48 € per adult and per night (+17 and maximum charge of 7 days) to be paid upon arrival.

host.host_about:
Hello! We would love to host you!
We are a big team composed by people from different places of the world, Barcelona lovers with the best advices so you can fully enjoy your stay!
Our company has many years of experience offering accommodation services in the City Centre.
We got many studios and apartments so we can offer you the one that better suit your needs.
Hope to be hosting you anytime soon!

.

Somos un gran equipo de personas de distintas partes del mundo amantes de Barcelona con los mejores consejos para que aproveches tu estancia al máximo!
Pertenecemos a una empresa con muchos años de experiencia en brindar servicios de alojamiento en el centro de la Ciudad.
Tenemos muchos estudios y apartamentos por lo que seguro encontraremos juntos el que se adapte mejor a tus necesidades.
Esperamos tener la oportunidad de hospedarte pronto!

name: Sweet Home@HK Queens RD Central 1 LADY GUEST ONLY
summary: 只接待1女生A brand new renovated well furnished open studio, actually my home office, everything is new at home and it's close to everything, located at the hub of Hong Kong in-between Sheungwan and Central. Bars, cafes, restaurants, historical sight-seeings, supermarkets, 7-11, Starbucks (just downstairs!), MTR, ferry terminal, airport express, public swimming pool and gym and etc, all are in walking distance! 24/7 security guard in the building/CC TV, ELEVATOR access, DIAMOND filtered water machine
space: Superb location at Queen's Road Central! (Hollywood road is just around the corner!) , brand new, ELEVATOR! No NEED TO WALK UP! High standard QUALITY facilities at home for your daily use!! Diamond 6 filtered water machine! Drink directly from the tap! Save you lots of $$$ from buying bottle water in HK!! as comfy as your own  home .. pls see the photos for details (or just message me for details!) ...which is also your guide book for getting around! Just stay easy and happy with me in my lovely sweet home!..cheers!..^&^

neighborhood_overview: Walking distance to all- my place is in Queen’s Road central ..the location tells! All the popular spots are just around the corner! MTR, historical sightseeings- western market, Man Mo Temple, Hollywood road , HK-Macao , HK -china Ferry terminals, central piers to other islands, airport express , public swimming pool and gym , cat street , Lan Kwai Fong, Soho, bars, cafe, restaurants, cooked food markets, you just name it!
notes: The spacious living room with a 42" Samsung curved cable TV basically is your bedroom during your stay, as I rarely stay there but at my work space at  the other side of the flat! Queen Size air bed could be provided should you concern about the comfortness of the couch! Table and chairs will be provided too for your daily use (they are just being hidden in my wardrobe daily actually LoL)...come stay with me for more pleasant surprises!
transit: Superb convenient location, all walking distance to all-MTR, Ferry terminals , central piers, buses, airport express
access: As I am also living here, so for solo lady guest only...basically you will stay me like a home stay and a flat mate, I love cooking, if i have time, I could cook and U be my guest! ;)
interaction: 24 hours standby!
house_rules: - Only Female solo traveler  - comfy wood floor, no shoes in the apartment - keep quiet in the building and home, no guest visit nor party at home - pls pick up your felt-off hair from the sewage after your hair washing and showers

host.host_about:
A happy goes lucky person, love travelling, meeting and making friends worldwide. I have been to 11 countries by myself so far around the world. Most of the time, I stayed in Airbnb, most of the hosts and hostess are very nice and friendly...now it’s my turn! 

The place I am renting out is my home office! A brand new renovated well-furnished open studio, the spacious brand-new living room is your bedroom and the brand new comfy VIMLE IKEA 3 seats couch (102 x 240) which is bigger than the single bed is your bed, and you will have your privacy after the curtain down. I am living here, so FEMALE SOLO TRAVELER ONLY to book my place!
I am a hard-working person, basically I stay-in to work most of the time, and I will be always at your service whenever you need me in the house. However, I won’t disturb you much as most of the time I am with my work at home. I am an easy-going person, but also have the house rules, kindly please stay quiet at home after your happy journey outside...please no shoes at home,  and pick up your felt-off hairs from the sewage after hair washing and showers (I came across many times in Europe Airbnb homes, the sewages were stuck!! I dont want this happen in my home, hope for your kind understandings and respect). For other rules, kindly please ask if you are not sure, I am always happy to be at your disposal! ;) ...

I could show you around if I am not that busy, even though, I am always more than happy to provide any information within my knowledge, even for jobs or business, just hoping to make your stay more pleasant! 

Actually, the album photos in my listing is the guide book for you where you could go around while you staying with me..;) Easy and close to everything!

Welcome to Hong Kong and hope to see you soon!

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Great host, cheerful and pretty lady. Very clean home. Easy communication. great location. Very much recommended to lady travelers!

Very nice and stylish place in great location. Angie is very nice and responds almost immidiatelly. Double check whether you will get keys to the apartment if you are staying for a few days only. Angie is most of the time there but every traveller likes independence. Keep in mind that Angie sleeps basically in the same room/living room. Entrance to the bathroom is next to Angie’s bed and there is a glass! wall. You can use shatters but it is always a bit of hustle.

name: Viva Deluxe Hotel
summary: LCD TV, AIRCONDITION, HAIRDRYER.
description: LCD TV, AIRCONDITION, HAIRDRYER.

name: Authentic one bedroom apartment , popular location
summary: The apartment is located in main center of Istanbul , Taksim area . Just 2 steps to the famous Istiklal Street , all city attractions , restaurants , shopping and public transport . The apartment has one bedroom and a living room with a kitchenette and a dining table . We provide all necessart equipment to cook and dine in . Cleaning is included in the rate .
description: The apartment is located in main center of Istanbul , Taksim area . Just 2 steps to the famous Istiklal Street , all city attractions , restaurants , shopping and public transport . The apartment has one bedroom and a living room with a kitchenette and a dining table . We provide all necessart equipment to cook and dine in . Cleaning is included in the rate .

reviews.comments: The house we originally paid for was switched last minute due to a appliance issue. I did not know that the house was switched to another apartment until arrival in the home itself. The house was clean but very small. For 5 people traveling it was extremely tight. The stay was manageable and we tried to make the best of the experience but the home was not what I had originally paid and planned for.
Nice flat :)

Mooi appartement in een leuke en drukke wijk van Istanbul. Communicatie ging heel goed en snel! Wel hadden wel hogere verwachtingen. Er was een zeer slechte wifi verbinding, de wc bril was kapot, er zat schimmel in in de douche en de ramen en deuren gingen moeilijk open en dicht. Wel  werkte de airco supergoed!

Квартира находится рядом с Истикляль - отсюда можно догодаться, что вся тусовка слышна. В здании напротив есть рок-бар(прямо на последнем этаже), чуть в стороне есть джаз-бар, почти в каждом подвале есть ночные клубы - вы найдете музыку на любой вкус) Если вы на машине обязательно заранее найдите способ запарковаться на соседних улицах, мы - наивные - по навигатору пытались поближе подъехать. 
Нас встретила женщина, которая присматривает за квартирой - русскоговорящая)
В квартире все есть из необходимых принадлежностей, но горячей воды не было.
Расположение очень удобное - близко до метро, близко до развлечений. Есть несколько маленьких магазинов рядом.

host.host_about: Very friendly.

reviews.comments: O check in era 12:00, recebo uma mensagem do Anfitrião às 11:22 dizendo que o apartamento estava sem luz devido a uma conta não paga, que lamentava muito e que eu poderia ficar no apt SEM LUZ ou cancelar minha reserva. Que era o MÁXIMO que poderia fazer! Surreal! Tivemos que ligar para o suporte para sermos redirecionados para outra reserva.
Excelente. Recomendo o espaço de Philippe e pretendo retornar várias vezes, sempre que tiver reuniões até tarde na cidade. Ótima localização, espaço super aconchegante e vizinhança tranquila.
Apartamento impecável tanto em estrutura e organização, quanto localização. Philippe é muito comunicativo e responde rápido
Espaço muito confortável, bem localizado, o Philippe é super solícito. Valeu a pena
Excelente local! Tudo maravilhoso. Boa localização, preço bom, anfitrião com fácil comunicação, limpo, ideal para um casal ou sozinho. Simples e direto.
Apartamento estiloso e agradável.
Excelente lugar,anfitrião muito atencioso,tudo bem limpo,lugar super estiloso,atendeu a todas as minhas necessidades,recomendo a todos
O espaço do Philippe é ótimo, ele é muito cuidadoso, o apartamento é muito limpo e muito organizado! Além de ter uma ótima localização.
Ótima localização, apartamento muito limpo, anfitrião responde rapido, adorei! voltarei mais vezes..

Passei um final de semana na acomodação do Phillipe, fomos muito bem recebidas. O mesmo foi super solicito, respondia às mensagem com muita rapidez, a casa é linda e foi tudo feito conforme acordado. Indico a acomodação e retornarei em breve!
Ótimo local, sem barulho que incomode, tudo organizado, tive uma ótima experiencia mais uma vez com o Airbnb!

Apto de acordo com anúncio, boa localização. Philippe responde rapidamente e atencioso! 
Hospedagem sem problemas.
Apê show de bola em uma ótima localização que te da fácil acesso a quase todos os pontos turísticos do Rio. Recomendo.
Excelente localização. Praia, farmácia, mercado e restaurantes perto. Recomendo!
Excelente! Muito prestativo Philippe. Obrigada! Voltarei .
Réactif et ponctuel, appartement comme sur les photos, très bien situé, top!
Apartamento muito bom para quem vai a casal ou só, nós gostamos muito! Muito aconchegante e bem arrumado!
Excelente apartamento. Silencioso e super bem localizado. Anfitrião super flexível com horários de check in/check out. Recomendo!

philippe es atento en cuanto a responder rápido los mensj. 
Al llegar al dpto lo encontramos  en malas condiciones de limpieza. Si bien se ofreció a darnos una solución , al regresar estaba mejor pero no en óptimas condiciones .
Muito bom o apartamento, com excelente localização
Apartamento superou as expectativas. Sem palavras para descrever a excelente hospitalidade do anfitrião. Nota 10. Recomendo.
Apartamento maravilhoso! Localização perto de Copacabana, Leme, Urca, centro... Tudo perto! Confortável, organizado, limpo! Super recomendo!

Philippe é excepcional no atendimento que é rápido e sempre solícito. 
Foi  flexível no check in e check out o que nos foi de grande valia.
O apartamento é muito bem localizado, o staff do edificio taméem todos atenciosos. Super recomendo se hospedar, bem como em meu retorno a Cidade Maravilhosa o farei.
Apartamento super aconchegante . Perto de tudo. Philippe sempre respondendo com rapidez cada dúvida. Super indico e voltaria novamente.

O apto do Philippe é F-A-N-T-Á-S-T-I-C-O! Extremamente limpo e elegante. Muito bem localizado, praticamente com o pé na areia e perto de tudo. Tivemos um feriado excelente, além da estrutura do local fomos bem atendidos.
Boa localização, anfitrião atencioso e responde rápido, excelente apartamento e limpeza impecável, ar condicionado, Wi-Fi e televisão funcionando bem.

Amazing apartment with great facilities! Great location and Philippe is a lovely warm-hearted person! It exceeded my expectations and I recommend this place to every person traveling in Rio! I’ll definitely come back and rent the same apartment.
atendimento excelente, respostas sempre rapidas. otima localização.

O apartamento é ótimo, limpo e muito bem localizado. É um ambiente agradável e bem estiloso, dá pra perceber o cuidado que o anfitrião teve pra deixar o espaço o melhor (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei mais vezes!
Excelente
Super facil a comunicação com o Philipe. Espaço agradável e super bem localizado.
Nossa estadia foi perfeita! Espaço super confortável, aconchegante e muito bem localizado. Perto da praia, mercados, fármacias, restaurantes, etc. Se tiver oportunidade, com certeza voltaremos.

A estadia nas acomodações do Phelippe realmente excederam as expectativas. Rapido nas respostas, limpeza impecável, decoração aconchegante. Isso sem contar suas otimas dicas de bares e (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, minha primeira escolha em toda viagem ao Rio. Recomendo!
Apartamento charmoso e o Philippe uma pessoa sensacional, super parceiro, atencioso e sempre preocupado com o nosso bem estar.  Super indico !  Abs e obrigado por tudo !

Ótimo espaço, boa localização e ótima comunicação com o Philippe também.
Tudo conforme o esperado! Certamente voltarei!
Excelente apartamento, excelente comodidade, perto de praticamente tudo.
Apartamento muito bom e muito bem localizado.
Excelente apto. Tudo novo, com boa internet, boas opções de canais de TV. mto bem localizado. ficaria novamente.
Excelente atenção, tudo muito prático, ótima localização!
Philipe é muito atencioso e está sempre disponível. O apartamento é ótimo, muito bem localizado, bem arrumado e limpo.

Hospede muito atencioso com respostas rápidas passou com precisão a localização e detalhes da hospedagem.
Excelente localização, varias locadoras de carro, comércio, mercado, tudo próximo.
Apartamento muito limpo, bem montado, excelente para (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei!!!
Very nice place
Excelente apartamento. Recomendo.
Ótimo apartamento, tudo bem arrumado e bem próximo à praia e supermercados, recomendo!
A localização do apartamento e o apartamento em si são bons, mas infelizmente o cheiro de cigarro dentro do apartamento é insuportável.

Philippe é um ótimo anfitrião, respondendo prontamente todas as dúvidas e questões para tornar a estadia a melhor possível. Apartamento confortável, simpático e aconchegante localizado em um ótimo ponto do Leme, próximo à praia, transporte público, restaurantes e mercados.

É importante notar que a rua, no entanto, pode ser um pouco barulhenta; de qualquer forma, no que diz respeito ao apartamento em si, certamente é bastante recomendado e equipado com todos os utensílios necessários.
Great apartment! Well located, tastefully decorated with modern touches, clean and organized. The check in was smooth and very good.

Adorei! O apê é lindo, confortável e localização ótima!! Recomendo! 
Philippe foi super gentil!

Philippe's place is awesome. Checkin was super easy and it's in a great location near Copacabana beach.  I love that he has a washing machine as I pack lite and always need to wash clothes before my trip is finished. I recommend stay here.
Excelente acomodação.
Ótimo apartamento, bem localizado. O philippe foi bem atencioso, resposta instantâneas. Recomendo!!
Apartamento fiel como nas fotos, ótima localidade e bem arrumado
Great host !

O apartamento é como nas fotos, aconchegante e muito bonito. Tivemos alguns problemas com a limpeza, areia da praia nos lençóis, acredito ser um ponto importante a ser observado e também um imprevisto com o ar condicionado, não estava funcionando o do quarto, o que atrapalhou um pouco por conta do calor.. Fora isso nada a reclamar, anfitrião prestativo, respondia rápido as mensagens e atencioso.
Philipe responde muito rápido e está pronto pra ajudar no que for preciso, apto limpo, perto de comércio e 10 minutos da praia. Minha família teve uma ótima experiência.
Nice , il manquer uniquement les draps pour le canapé

name: 2 habitaciones en piso bonito y bien situado
summary: Ofrezo dos habitaciones, una con cama doble y otra con dos camas individuales. Es un piso bonito y bien decorado. Está a 10 minutos en metro del centro y es una zona segura y tranquila. El precio es por noche e incluye las dos habitaciones para 4 personas.
description: Ofrezo dos habitaciones, una con cama doble y otra con dos camas individuales. Es un piso bonito y bien decorado. Está a 10 minutos en metro del centro y es una zona segura y tranquila. El precio es por noche e incluye las dos habitaciones para 4 personas. Se puede acceder al salón, al baño y a la cocina. El salón cuenta con una mesa para comer, sofa y un equipo de música. El barrio de Sant gervasi está situado en la zona alta de Barcelona. Está muy bien conectada con el centro de la ciudad, a sólo 4 paradas de metro. Es una zona bonita, muy segura y tranquila. El piso tiene tres habitaciones, dos se alquilan y la otra está ocupada por la propietaria, una mujer muy divertida y amable.
neighborhood_overview: El barrio de Sant gervasi está situado en la zona alta de Barcelona. Está muy bien conectada con el centro de la ciudad, a sólo 4 paradas de metro. Es una zona bonita, muy segura y tranquila.
notes: El piso tiene tres habitaciones, dos se alquilan y la otra está ocupada por la propietaria, una mujer muy divertida y amable.
access: Se puede acceder al salón, al baño y a la cocina. El salón cuenta con una mesa para comer, sofa y un equipo de música.

name: BARCELONA FIRA FAMILY
summary: Barcelona Fira Apartments Centrally located apartments in Barcelona’s Poble Sec Neighborhood, close to the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Center. This district is famous for its trendy bars, restaurants and small shops.
space: Barcelona Fira Apartments Centrally located apartments in Barcelona’s Poble Sec Neighborhood, close to the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Center. This district is famous for its trendy bars, restaurants and small shops. Additionally, the apartment lays in front of Ferran Adrià’s (Spain’s most famous Chef) “Tickets Restaurant”. Close by, you can find the Arenas Shopping Centre, with a big supermarket and rooftop restaurants offering panoramic views of the city (can be reached in 7 minutes by foot). Transportation facilities with the Poble Sec station (Line 3) at 300 meters and the Plaza España station (Lines 1, 3, 8 and local trains) at 500 meters. ·Fira Family This 70 square meter apartment has been recently renovated and tastefully decorated with lovely details to made of the entire apartment a super cozy space. There is a living room, kitchen, a bathroom and 4 bedrooms, one with a spacious and comfortable double bed. The other three bedrooms have one single bed each. The apartment prov

This district is famous for its trendy bars, restaurants and small shops. Additionally, the apartment lays in front of Ferran Adrià’s (Spain’s most famous Chef) “Tickets Restaurant”. Close by, you can find the Arenas Shopping Centre, with a big supermarket and rooftop restaurants offering panoramic views of the city (can be reached in 7 minutes by foot). name: 旺角 粉红粉红的一天《Romance of day 》连大露台
summary: 省!通過此連結創建您的帳戶獲取$ 250HKD優惠券作為您的第一次旅行住宿折扣卷  https://abnb.me/e/pZ7DBxULCM 宅主 Cathy 特別精心購置家具,為房間打造了少女風格,希望讓每一個客人留下美好的回憶和能在香港享受不一樣的體驗｡  部屋風格完全是以粉色為主題｡位於香港九龍旺角區,房間約為400呎,兩房一廳,一獨立廁所带廚房,外加300呎大露台供使用｡宅女Cathy為房間打造了可愛少女風,整個房間以粉紅與花布為主,感覺清新舒服､簡潔明亮,溫暖,有回到家的感覺｡宅主目的是提倡"回歸自然",打造簡朴高雅氛圍,讓旅客能渡過一個悠閒舒暢的旅程｡ 主題部屋非常適合一家大細使用,屋內有兩間睡房,一間為1.5*2.0的雙人床,另一間則是兩張0.9*2.0的子母床合起來是1.8*2.0的雙人床,可供4-5人使用｡屋內還有獨立廚房,非常適合喜歡親自下廚和長期租住的客人!此部屋著眼點就是外面的大露台,適合悠閒茶聚､開PARTY或是BBQ ,客人亦可以悠閒看看書發發呆,過一個悠閒的假期喔!這麼酷的房間就是很適合喜歡不一樣的你!我們就宅一起吧!
space: 旺角非常便利,鄰近眾多購物熱點和馳名食肆,如波鞋街､電腦城､電器街､女人街､購物商場､廟街夜市,戲院等等應有盡有,一落樓就可以行街shopping,而且交通便利,非常適合遊客入住｡ 住處周圍有各種24小時及年中無休的便利店和超市,所以非常方便而且肚餓的時候絕對不用擔心喔｡ 旺角作為一個交通樞紐,有不同地鐵線,以及眾多的公交線路途經｡因此,這意味著,你可以在1小時內到達香港任何地方喔｡

reviews.comments: 很特別的房子｡交通方便｡非常適合一家有小孩居住｡房東很好｡

喜欢的装修风格!对于寸土寸金的香港来说,空间也很足够!
带爸妈一起来住,全家都非常满意~
两个房间都很大,设备齐全,交通方便｡房东人很好,加了 (Hidden by Airbnb) 后回复都很及时,推荐｡
非常棒哦~还会再来
周边的商圈生活设施非常齐全,与地铁站的距离很近很方便,房间的风格超级粉嫩,很适合拍照留念,一个超级大的阳台视野开阔风景很好
位置超级好……楼下就是美妆品超市餐厅鞋店,出门就能买买买……性价比可以……香港房屋面积都是小小的,其他都不错,就是卫生间淋浴因为不单独隔离,洗澡整个卫生间都是水
房间布置温馨 设施齐全 两张0.9的单人床拼成的1.8m床和1.5的床各一张 住起来很舒适 一点不拥挤 楼下的安保员也非常热情 很开心的体验
非常推荐这一家｡地铁近,楼底下小吃,便利店,什么都有!很方便~ 而且有个超大阳台很加分…除了节假日价格也才800,很划算!我们五个人,房东帮我们加了一张床｡在香港能住到这个地方真的很好,感谢…
The host is very helpful and fast response. The house was located in the perfect area by shopping mall and transport. Love it
房间地理位置非常棒,门口的保安也很负责,感觉很安全,家里装修的很可爱,在旺角住的这几天家人都很满意｡

name: *THE NEW YORKER * Downtown-Centre Ville
summary: Super logement situé en plein cœur du centre ville.  5 min du métro à pieds. Plusieurs restaurants et dépanneurs à proximités. Quartier très animé et belle ambiance qui convient à tous. Beautiful apartment located in the heart of Montreal's downtown. It is a 5 minute walking distance from the train station. The area has a great nightlife and ambiant which is convenient for everyone.
space: Spacieux logement sous la thématique New Yorkaise. Il offre une incroyable vue sur la ville, et directement sur la rue Sainte-Catherine, qui est l'une des principales rues du centre ville de Montréal. The apartment has a New Yorker theme and offers an amazing view over the city, more specifically on the Sainte-Catherine's street, which is one of the main streets of Montreal's downtown.
description: Super logement situé en plein cœur du centre ville.  5 min du métro à pieds. Plusieurs restaurants et dépanneurs à proximités. Quartier très animé et belle ambiance qui convient à tous. Beautiful apartment located in the heart of Montreal's downtown. It is a 5 minute walking distance from the train station. The area has a great nightlife and ambiant which is convenient for everyone. Spacieux logement sous la thématique New Yorkaise. Il offre une incroyable vue sur la ville, et directement sur la rue Sainte-Catherine, qui est l'une des principales rues du centre ville de Montréal. The apartment has a New Yorker theme and offers an amazing view over the city, more specifically on the Sainte-Catherine's street, which is one of the main streets of Montreal's downtown. Le logement est équipé d'une cuisine complète ainsi que d'une salle à manger. On y retrouve également un coin bar , un salon muni d'une télé , un sofa lit(2places ), une chambre fermée et une salle de bain. Le logement compor
neighborhood_overview: Quartier très animé avec une très belle ambiance qui convient tant aux familles ,couples ou amis. Plusieurs choix des restaurants à proximité pour tous les goûts : asiatiques, mexicains, restaurants de pizzas etc. Centre d'achat Eaton à seulement quelques minutes de marche. Plusieurs autres commerces à proximité. Animated neighborhood with a nice ambiant which is convenient for families, couples or for a group of friends. There is a large variety of restaurants for every taste: asian, mexican, pizza, etc... The Eaton shopping center is within walking distance of the apartment. Many other marketplaces at proximity.
transit: Le métro le plus prés est Guy Concordia situé à 5 min à pied du logement. Il y a également plusieurs parcours d'autobus qui passent juste à coté. Stationnement non disponible sur place mais possibilité de stationner sur la même rue et sur les rues avoisinantes. Stationnements payants disponibles également à proximité.
access: Le logement est équipé d'une cuisine complète ainsi que d'une salle à manger. On y retrouve également un coin bar , un salon muni d'une télé , un sofa lit(2places ), une chambre fermée et une salle de bain. Le logement comporte aussi un balcon qui permettra aux voyageurs d'admirer la magnifique vue de la ville de Montréal. The place is equipted with complete kitchen supplies and a dining room. There is also a bar section, a living room with a television, sofa bed(2places)  , a closed bedroom,  and a bathroom. The apartment has a balcony which offers a breathtaking view over the beautiful city of Montreal, especially at night.
interaction: Cela me fera plaisir de répondre aux questions de voyageurs par texto au appel. I'll be happy to answer any questions from the travellers by text messages or calls.
house_rules: - pas de bruit après 23h -laisser le logement dans un état respectable serait grandement apprecié

host.host_about:
Bonjour, je m'appelle Carolina  et il me fera plaisir de vous accueillir dans mon  logement conçu pour les voyageurs qui recherchent à passer un bon moment dans la magnifique ville de Montréal. Cet appartement est situé juste à côté de la très populaire rue Sainte Catherine en plein cœur du centre ville  . Mon  but est de rendre votre séjour agréable et confortable . Bienvenu à tous !!

My name is Carolina and I'll be happy to welcome you into my apartment, which is exclusively conceived for travelers who are looking into having a good time in the beautiful city of Montreal. It is located right next to the famous Sainte-Catherine street, in the downtown center. My goal is to offer a pleasant and comfortable stay. Welcome to you!

reviews.comments:
Tres belle place tel que vue sur la photo! Les seconde lumières donne une superbe ambiance !

On est proche de plein de restauration et d’activité. Donc il y a pas de problème.

 pour La communication avec la hôte est excellente, toujours disponible et il y a toujours moyen de s’arranger avec elle. Merci beaucoup pour le sejour

Je suis très heureux d’avoir logé ici par cette hôte exceptionnelle! La place est identique à celle de la photo! La luminosité unique donne une ambiance de vie de nuit que j’ai beaucoup adoré

On est proche de plein de restaurants et activités. La communication est parfait, rien a dire sur sa!

Je le recommande a tous! A la prochaine et merci de votre générositée et votre hospitalité !
Great place, cool aesthetic and super close to everything!!!!!!
my stay was amazing, loved the view and the lights!!
Awesome space and great location.
Awesome apartment and location.

I recommend this place to everyone! What an amazing place just walking distance to downtown. The inside was very clean and the bar area was incredible. We had a great time and we will definitely be back in the future.
Amazing place

Carolina was very accommodating, friendly, and helpful. There was a mistake with the keys and she kindly brought the right set of keys when we asked even though it wasn't an essential need. She gave us helpful parking tips as well. The location was excellent, there were two metro stations very close and many restaurants and shops. 
There were a few issues with the amenities of the place. There wasn't enough toilet paper there so we had to buy our own. There wasn't dish towels or paper towels which should be considered part of kitchen amenities. There is a few kitchen supplies but don't expect to cook a full meal there. The biggest issue was that the window in the bedroom wouldn't close all the way and there was a small crack that let in all the cold air. 
Overall it was a pleasant stay and we had lovely in Montreal.
Carolina's place is great, was able to just put down my things and get the much needed rest in the absolute peace and comfort her place provides. Many thanks!

There was a very strong odour in the place.

The window in the room doesn’t close which made it cold and loud in the morning.
The host canceled this reservation 36 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The location was perfect ,right downtown montreal with a beautiful view of the skyline   Carolina's the perfect host and check-in was very smooth .

Appartement très bien placé  juste à  coté d'une rue  très  commerçante avec de nombreux restaurants à  proximité. Très belle vue dégagée sur Montréal dont l hyper centre (vieux Montréal) est accessible à pied pour les bons marcheurs...Nous avons passé un agréable séjour et merci à Carolina pour son écoute et sa réactivité en cas de besoin.

It was a good place. Great location. Well kept and clean with bed linens, clean dishes and everything. The only thing that was troublesome for 5 adults was the shower which had pressure only 20% of the time and rest of the time, it just dripped, so we had to use the tap.
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
awesome place!
Super de bel appartement en plein coeur de montréal , belle déco et ambiance et piscine au rez de chausser

Great stay in the city!! Hoping to come back in the future.

Hote tres reactive et disponible, emplacement ideal (angle de Ste Catherine),  peu d'equipement presents sur place mais souci vite résolu si averti :) condo tres chaleureux et agréable pour une soiree ou un week end
Carolina’s place is very convenient. The location is so close to almost everything. She’s a very great host, super responsive and friendly and the trip was everything I expected. I had a great time
Great Apartment and grwat Location! would go again!
The location is fab, Carolina was helpful and the place was super clean. Both the building and the flat are a little tired in some respects.

c’etait très bien la décoration etais parfait j’ai pas du tout été deçu a ce niveau , c’est plutôt l’air conditionné qui étais dérangeant car mes invités et moi avons eu de la misère a dormir il faisais terriblement froid , ce qui a rendu le séjour désagréable on aurait pu gravement tomber malade . Puis les lumières ne fonctionnaient pas ce qui m’as très deçu j’aurai juste voulu être informé a l’avance mais je crois qu’une fois qu’uil y aura des changements a cela , vous pourriez bien en profiter car l’apart est très beau et accueillant
La vue était superbe, bien située beaucoup de restaurants à proximité!!!

summary: Relaxed Beach side luxury awaits. Surf boards are available as well as use of the swimming pool, backyard, and BBQ. space: Pool and garden is good.Plenty of space.

host.host_about: Easy going person

reviews.comments: Richard is an extremely nice and cool dude who welcomed to his home. The pool was absolutely splendid and the house!. His house is just up the road from the beach which is very convenient and the neighbourhood is quiet.
Beautiful place in a beautiful part of the northern beaches. Richard went out of his way to assist with everything.
Great location and great house! Richard was a very relaxed host and made us feel at home. We had use of the pool which made our stay even more special. Would definitely recommend.

WOW! Where do I begin!? This was without a doubt the most amazing Airbnb experience I have ever had. Richard responded to my initial inquiry within minutes and answered every question I had right away. I proceeded with the booking. The key was waiting for me on arrival (early) and I opened the door to one of the most beautiful homes I have ever stepped foot in. Panoramic views of curl curl beach from the front of the house and an incredibly beautiful pool with waterfalls in the backyard. Gorgeous hardwood floors, brand new appliances, incredibly comfortable beds, washer and dryer, flat screen TV and a beautiful grass area to do some morning exercises after a fun surf. Clean linens and blankets awaited and a very comfortable living room couch for late night movies. That’s just where it begins. Richard went way above and beyond to make me feel welcome in to his home and ensure that I was having a great stay. We were fortunate enough to have a fun swell fill in overnight and Rich didn’t hesitate to let me use one of his brand new boards so I could go out the next morning. The weather got incredibly hot on Sunday and rich again went out of his way to bring me his own fan/cooler and even cooked me a gourmet burger! As if he wasn’t already kind enough, he continued to go out of his way with kindness and great vibes the whole stay. I have to say, I am forever grateful for this experience! I don’t write many reviews, but something has to be said about the kindness and professionalism. I felt like I was in my own home! The house is a 2 minute walk from the beautiful North Curl Curl white sand beach. If you are lucky enough to find this Airbnb available, do NOT hesitate to book immediately. You will be very thankful you did. 10 stars on every single category. I will be booking this place again as soon as I am back in the area. Richard, THANK YOU so much for making my stay as memorable as you did. You guys are some of the coolest, kindest and most genuine people out there. See you soon!


Cheers!
-Matt
Great spot in amazing house !

Great location in North Curl Curl. Very nice apartment. Communication with Richard was easy - super fast responses. Place was immaculate on arrival and really is just up the road from the beach. Great spot to jump in your wetsuit and walk down for a surf. Plenty of space in the apartment, facilities and kitchen are modern, great bathroom/shower, a garage to leave surfboards in out of the way and a big Smart TV and comfy sofa to enjoy Netflix on in the evening. Parking right outside. A superb place on the Northern Beaches to relax and a host who ensures you have a great stay with tips and help. Hopefully, I'll come back again in summer to enjoy the pool and BBQ! Thanks again, Richard. Alex

Richard is a gracious host and the place presented as 
pictured, but not as expected.

The queen size sofa bed referenced was not a sofa bed, was sub-standard and did not provide an adequate sleeping facilty. The additional bedding supplied for the sofa bed consisted of a sheet and quilt cover, without a quilt or blankets. The advert was misleading. There was only one, proper bed, not two queen size as stated.

What would've made our stay more positive, apart from adequate bedding, would be the inclusion of a few, simple additions, such as:
* a full dinner and cutlery set.
* an assortment and approriate number of glasses, including wine glasses.
*  the supply of basic condiments, eg salt, pepper, sugar, oil, milk (for upon arrival), an assortment of tea bags, glad wrap, foil etc.
* a few serving platters and utensils.
* a supply of toilet paper.
* a secured premises. It was concerning that we discovered on a regular occurance, the front door left unlocked, even though we  ensured we locked it. This gave us concern for our property security and personal safety. 

The outdoor entertainment area was lovely and enjoyable. We didn't get to use the pool due to inclimate weather, but it looked inviting.

Location was great and close to the beach and public transport.
We would stay again, providing the inclusion of a proper sofa bed and bedding, and improved security.

We had a great time in North Curl Curl and loved staying at Richards place. We had everything we needed. Coffee, tea and little treats when we arrived. Amazing. Communication was really quick and efficient. Not used to having a shared entry with the host, but that was not a problem at all. We had all the privacy we needed. The beach is really close and the view is amazing.
So nice to have a home to go to! We settled straight in. Thanks for having us Richard!

A beautiful house in a quiet upmarket location. Nice touches from Richard with some groceries and toothbrushes. We found it convenient for access to Manly and the ferry terminal. I recommend getting the App Ride plus who for $3.10 per person will pick you up from the door to any location in the catchment area. You can book a time slot in advance, Monday to Friday only up to 9.30 pm. Otherwise a frequent bus service just down the road number136. Parking in Manly car parks is free for 2 hours but expensive thereafter. So best to leave the car behind if going into Sydney CBD. North Curl Curl beach is just down the road. Distant views of Sydney from the front of the house.

The appartement is very beautiful and has a lot of space. We had a great time at Richards home. Our daughter enjoyed the pool  and we loved to have our breakfast outside. Thank you Richard for your hospitility!!
Richard was a great host and we had a great time staying at his place. The house is a quick walk to the beach and has an amazing viewpoint over the water!

We had a great stay, the location is amazing.
Watch the sunrise over the ocean just a short walk from the house. 
Very spacious living room, great to have the outside area too.

name: Hawaiian Escape
summary: This beautiful 2 bedroom 2 bath home is close to the ocean for those wanting to escape to a nice and quiet area on The Big Island.  This lovely home is suitable for all ages. Wonderful sights and near-by attractions for your Hawaiian get away. Nice private area under house with table/chairs, pull-out sofa bed, barbecue, and even a place to pitch a tent or hang a hammock to listen to the waves and coquis at night.
space: Very beautifully landscaped yard with a covered carport for those rainy days.
description: This beautiful 2 bedroom 2 bath home is close to the ocean for those wanting to escape to a nice and quiet area on The Big Island.  This lovely home is suitable for all ages. Wonderful sights and near-by attractions for your Hawaiian get away. Nice private area under house with table/chairs, pull-out sofa bed, barbecue, and even a place to pitch a tent or hang a hammock to listen to the waves and coquis at night. Very beautifully landscaped yard with a covered carport for those rainy days. Entire house and yard are available for you to enjoy the quiet of Hawaii. Very quiet and quaint area, the house is located deep in a neighborhood and at the end of the street so it is very private. Getting a rental car is the way to go and for the adventurous one get a 4x4 so you can drive out to South Point and even venture in to green sand beach, or head to the top of ManaKea or ManaLoa. Their are plenty of private tour guides through trip advisor also. Be careful as plenty DON'T carry insurance or
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet and quaint area, the house is located deep in a neighborhood and at the end of the street so it is very private.
transit: Getting a rental car is the way to go and for the adventurous one get a 4x4 so you can drive out to South Point and even venture in to green sand beach, or head to the top of ManaKea or ManaLoa. Their are plenty of private tour guides through trip advisor also. Be careful as plenty DON'T carry insurance or have proper credentials and licenses.
access: Entire house and yard are available for you to enjoy the quiet of Hawaii.
house_rules: - 7am-10 pm Quiet hours - Please remove your shoes

host.host_about: Aloha! I have lived in the Pahoa area for the past 8 years. I look forward to being able help you with any questions about the area and your trip to the Big Island.

reviews.comments: This is a beautiful spot. So quiet and lovely. Brittany was a great host. Lovely and clean. Great attention to detail.
The stay was perfect.   We spent a lot of time at the tide pools and the drive on beach road is spectacular.   The kitchen was fully stocked and wonderful for cooking. Would definitely return.

We, a couple and single person, stayed at Brittany’s for 4 days. The house is spacious with a well equipped kitchen and the garden is awesome. Beautiful plants and flowers. If you leave your window open at night you hear the frogs which we loved. The house is located outside of town however it’s perfectly located if you would like to go and see the volcano. Seeing the lava flow at the Kilauea volcano was so epic. We had a great time here.

We loved this place!! Feels very secluded and had everything we needed. You can hear the ocean and if you get a clear night the stars are incredible. Comfortable bed, excellent towels and linens. Would definitely stay again!!
Best sleep on vacation ever! No streetlights or sounds of neighbors. Comfortable bed and the house had everything we needed.

If you want to get an authentic feeling of living in a rainforest, this is the house for you. It has a beautiful set up and has a very warm and cozy feeling. We loved the soothing sounds of the rainforest through the night. The house can definitely use some minor improvements in terms of stocking some items (like sugar in the kitchen and soaps and shampoos in all bathrooms). But overall, well worth the price for the stay.
This house was great! It is secluded and private, but still only about 30 minutes from Hilo. It’s very cozy and has everything you will need for your stay. Would gladly stay again!

This was just what we needed - privacy, lush yard, no traffic noise. The covered parking and the laundry room were amenities that made the difference. Being on a second level made security and peace of mind easy. Lighting at night was great to pull in and walk up. Loved the cleanliness and the 2 full bathrooms. Very chill. Thanks!
Nice secluded location but close to amenities. Spacious for our family of five.

We were staying at another house, which was bigger and cheaper, but due to volcanic activity we were evacuated from that house. The Airbnb agent contacted us and helped find for us a place, but since it was already 7 pm, we didn't have much choice so he found us this place that was posted to be good for 8 people. I didn't know it was only a 2 bedroom house so I said ok we will take it. Contacted the host and she said the house was not ready, but for us she would try to clean it up fast, which we really appreciate it. When we came they were waiting for us while finishing drying the towels for us. The House is located in a beautiful dead end with jungle trees around it, but at night its all dark, not a single light on a street. The House has 2 bedrooms and a very small living room, when the sofa bed is folded out there is almost no room to pass. Would not recommend sleeping on the sofa, its old, uncomfortable and stinky. For this  reason I would only recommend groups up to 6 people to get this place, the dining table would maximum accommodate only for 6 people also. So this place would be great for up to 6 people, but for 8 people it was a nightmare... There were some bugs coming trough the door net, so do not keep the door open, the net doesn't shut tightly leaving  gaps for bugs. We accidently broke the glass from the top of a small coffee table, we were honest about it and told them about it and included 40$ that we left for the replacement of the glass which seems reasonable. Later I was contacted and said the replacement would cost around 120$,  they were very rude about it, called me names, and when I offered them to pay them their asking amount they were just continue being negative and ignored me. Would I go again to this place? not really after my experience with it, especially there are better choices around.

Nice private area. It is a rain forest and it is very humid with no AC. It was not unbareable and there were plenty of fans. Lovely sounds of the forest! My daughter loved the geckos in the house and around the yard. We we're very pleased with the beautiful surroundings. Much like a cabin, not so much like a hotel. We loved it.

This hidden gem sits quietly at the end of road of a Very quiet neighborhood. Highly recommend this place for an authentic hawaiin rainforest experience. Host is friendly and knowledgeable about the local surroundings.  Close proximity 2 hilo and volcanoes national park. Aloha & mahalo ✌❤

Doug's place is really a house in the jungle! Here you can live completely undisturbed by people,but mind the frogs that quack as long as it is dark outside. The place wasn't as clean as I expect, but other than this, it was good. Doug is easy to get hold of and answered all of our questions quick and easy. The beds are good (we did not check the sofa bed), there is a lot of room and even some board games.
If this sounds good to you, visit Doug's place

This location was exactly what we were looking for on the first half of our trip.  We wanted a more authentic local/native experience and this was it.  Totally private at the end of a dead-end street, and surrounded by thick, lush jungle.  The house had everything we needed, plus much more.  Lots of small appliances, tons of towels, pillows/bedding, and a fully appointed kitchen, plus house geckos that kept our son entertained.  We used the house as our home base for exploring the Hilo side of the island.  A rental car is a must, and the covered parking was an extra bonus, because it rains often on this side of the island.  Doug was super friendly, and a great resource for information and tips.  We would stay here again!
Very cozy and wonderful house! Doug is a very kind host and gave us so many useful advice. That made our trip more meaningful.

Doug communicated very quickly. The house was very clean and well stocked with cooking and eating supplies which my family really appreciated as we cooked most of our meals. The location is nice and secluded, but not isolated. The house accommodated my family of five very well for the week.
Beautiful lot. Privacy. Home away from home.
Doug's place was extremely comfortable and a great value!  Couldn't have asked for anything better.

Great place for a family! Kitchen is really well stocked with cooking supplies, utensils, food staples, etc. Made making meals quick and easy. Lots of towels and bedding, and two full bathrooms with tubs (if you have bath age kids like me this was a huge plus). Doug was super thoughtful and left a big basket of toys for my baby. Quiet, private place and was a great location to see both Hilo and Volcano area.

name: Stylish design 1 bed in the heart of Gracia
summary: Stunning design 1bed in Gracia perfect for a pleasant and comfortable stay in Barcelona. You are just a 5 minute walk away from Paseo de Gracia.
space: My stylish 1 bedroom apartment is the perfect base when visiting Barcelona Conveniently located in the exciting area of Gracia and with great transport links, you’ll be right in the hub of the city but able to escape the hustle and bustle! The living area is light and airy with a beautiful, modern design and lovely finishing touches. Relax on the sofa, hang out with your friends, make yourself at home! It’s a welcoming and inviting space where you can kick back. The sofa is also a sofa-bed for 2, so the place is up to 4 people. If cooking is your thing, you’re going to love spending time in the stylish kitchen. All the appliances are modern and easy to use - you’ll enjoy showing off your culinary skills here! There’s even a welcome pack stuffed full of coffee, tea and catalan delicacies. The master bedroom has a super comfortable double bed and, with fresh luxury linens, what more do you need for a good night’s sleep? You don’t have to live out of your suitcase; plenty of storage room
description: Stunning design 1bed in Gracia perfect for a pleasant and comfortable stay in Barcelona. You are just a 5 minute walk away from Paseo de Gracia. My stylish 1 bedroom apartment is the perfect base when visiting Barcelona Conveniently located in the exciting area of Gracia and with great transport links, you’ll be right in the hub of the city but able to escape the hustle and bustle! The living area is light and airy with a beautiful, modern design and lovely finishing touches. Relax on the sofa, hang out with your friends, make yourself at home!
