There’s even a welcome pack stuffed full of coffee, tea and catalan delicacies. The master bedroom has a super comfortable double bed an
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in Gràcia, which is a trendy neighbourhood in the center of Barcelona. You will be located in an charming area, with restaurant and cafés. You will be just 5/7 minutes away from Paseo de Gracia.
notes: Please keep in mind that according to the Law, you will be asked at the moment of the check-in for your IDs and to sign a contract for your stay. This is compulsory to stay at the apartment. Also, you will be required to present your ID/Passport upon arrival. In order to follow local regulations and to be able to register all our guests on the local police’s database, we will have to take pictures of ID documents for all guests. Hope this is not an inconvenience! Due to local regulations, I can only accept bookings with minimum length of 31 consecutive nights. Check in time is at 3pm or later. Check out time is 11am or earlier. Please no smoking inside of the flat No pets allowed Please respect the neighbours. No loud noises after 10pm. The flat´s capacity is of 4 people. No additional guests allowed. No parties or events allowed.
transit: Close to the apartment is the FONTANA subway station, part of the green line (L3) that will take you directly to the center as well as to the beach and many other touristic attractions.  From the airport you can take the Aerobus to Plaça Espanya and there change to the subway station, part of this green line.
access: You will have the whole place to yourself. The apartment has one bedroom, one bathroom, living room with sofa and a modern kitchen. There is also a washing machine in the apartment that you can use. We will provide you with the products needed for the washing machine. The whole place is available.
interaction: My friends at Hostmaker are looking after my home while I am away. They're an Airbnb management service team in Barcelona who are Airbnb hosts themselves. I trust them to give you a warm welcome! Hostmaker will look after you. If you have any questions about your stay, please get in touch through the Airbnb chat.

Located  just few meters from the Bogadell Beach and the Olimpic Marina, the area is rich in beach Clubs, nice restaurants, Cafeterias and trendy grocery shops with traditional food. The public transportation is at 50/100 mts and the main city square is at 10 minutes. Registration Number: HUTB-011447

It comes with all the facilities and amenities you might need, such as: Bed-linen, Towels, Free Wifi, AiCo, Fully equipped kitchen, Nespresso Coffee machine, TV LCD, Bath amenities, Parking, Welcome package and free access to the pool.  The property is composed by : 2x Double Bedroom  1x Bright living area with 2 single comfortable sofa beds 2x Bathroom, 1 with bathtub and 1 with shower 1x Kitchen all equipped. 1x Shared Terrace with Pool 1x Parking, on request: reservation needed (25 /day) - Optional Concierge Services on request: Airport Transfer, Grocery Shopping, Personal Chef, Bike rental, Tourist Guide, and much more. - Reception and office On-Site @ Calle Perelló 21 (same building).

The area is between the Old Town, the beaches and the marina.  The main square (Plaza de Catalunya) is at 5 minutes by taxi or 4 Metro's stops. Bus station is at 50 meters. Shopping Center are at walking distance (10 min.).  Perfect to enjoy Barcelona's sun! ...and a good option for your stay in Barcelona!
notes: IMPORTANT NOTES: - Barcelona City Tourist Tax, which is 2.48 EUR / Adult (+16 y.o.) / Night (max.7 nights), not included. - SECURITY DEPOSIT: Only taken by credit card pre-authorization at the Check-In as guarantee against damages. - Check-in extra charges:  30 euros (Check-in between 9pm and 11pm);  50 euros (Check-in between 11pm and 00:30am);  60 euros, after 00:30 only upon request.
access: Size: 80 m2.    Amenities: Bed Linen  Towels, Terrace, Kitchen, air conditioning, 2 x Reception, Laundry Service, Doctor on Call, Elevator, Heating, Paid parking with garage, Communal pool, Welcome amenities, 2 x Free Wireless Internet, High speed Internet access;  Bathroom: mirror, shower, Toiletries, Washing Machine, Hair Dryer;  Bathroom: Hair Dryer, Toiletries;  Bedroom: air conditioning, wardrobe, double bed, Bed Linen;  Bedroom: air conditioning, double bed, wardrobe;  Kitchen: dining table, air conditioning, Dishwasher, Crockery  Cutlery, 2 x Iron  Ironing Board, oven, electric kettle, microwave, toaster, plates, pans, gas/electric hob, 2 x Espresso-Machine;  Living room: satellite TV, air conditioning, TV;
interaction: RENTAL MODE. Self-Catering Apartment with reception: On-Site Check-In from 3pm to 9pm (included), Payment by cash/credit card, 24h Emergency Support, End of Stay Cleaning, Welcome Pack, Cleaning pack, Towels, Bed-Linen, Bath Amenities, Check-Out max at 10:30am, On-Site Office (Mon-Fri / 10am-7pm CET, official Holiday excluded) . Arrival between 23:00 and 00:30 are subject to 50.00EUR late arrival fee. OPTION 1:  SELF-VIRTUAL CHECK-IN       "Avoid extra charges & waiting time" To improve our Guest’s service, we have implemented and included in your reservation the use of SELF CHECK-IN. You will not need to wait anymore for keys’ handover at check-in, saving free time and money. Few days before your arrival, you will receive an email with a link with a downloadable STAY MY WAY APP. Please make sure to download it, do the SELF CHECK-IN, at latest 48 hours before your arrival; for you and people traveling with you (Important note: ALL guests have to be registered). Your smart phone will become the Key to access the apartment and get all needed information about the property. You will also find additional keys inside the apartment as well as a Guest Welcome Pack. Enjoy your stay, with a SELF CHE

name: Porto Feeling
summary: The apartment , is a charming loft studio, located in Santa Catarina Street for 2 + 2 persons on the fourth floor of a renewed 1894 building. Silent and comfortable, facing west, without buildings in front, lots of natural light. Modern and charming decor, but with quality, fully equipped kitchen.  Our lemma is Porto is not a place, ist´s a feeling!
description: The apartment , is a charming loft studio, located in Santa Catarina Street for 2 + 2 persons on the fourth floor of a renewed 1894 building. Silent and comfortable, facing west, without buildings in front, lots of natural light. Modern and charming decor, but with quality, fully equipped kitchen.  Our lemma is Porto is not a place, ist´s a feeling!

host.host_about:
Let me introduce myself. My name is Cristina
I was born and always lived in the Porto :The most beautiful city in the World!
I enjoy art, literature, to travel, gastronomy, other ways of being and living life.
In Porto I have an apartment where I hope you'll feel at home! :)
Marta and the Welcome Services team take care of everything for me, so they will welcome you and  help you out with tips and suggestions about Porto.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Excelente hospitalidade! Foram excepcionais e com um cuidado muito pormenorizado em satisfazer a estadia dos hóspedes. A casa é bastante agradável com todas a comodidades necessárias para serem passados uns belos dias no Porto! É super central. Vale muito a pena. Gostamos bastante, num futuro esperemos voltar!

L'apartament és molt bonic . Tot és  molt nou ,està molt ben equipat i molt net .
Ens hi hem trobat d'allò més bé . La decoració i el gust pels detalls fa que et trobis en un espai molt acollidor  . No li falta detall .
L'escala de l'edifici , és preciosa , tot i que,  és un 4t sense ascensor .
La persona que ens va atendre ,  va ser molt amable , propera i ens va facilitar molt les coses . 
Totalment Recomanable
Nice and cosy studio, super clean. We had great tips from the host and à pleasant trip. Thanks !
Todo perfecto. Tanto la casa como la amabilidad de las chicas.

Precioso apartamento, tal y como se ve en las fotos. Súper limpio y cuidado hasta el último detalle
Situado en pleno centro de Oporto, se puede visitar todo andando. Las anfitrionas son super amables, resolviendo todas las dudas y recomendando todos los puntos de interés de la bonita ciudad.
Sin duda, si volvemos a Oporto nos quedaremos de nuevo en el apartamento.
Sehr netter Kontakt. Wir hatten einen sehr schönen Aufenthalt. Herzlichen Dank ☺

Amazing flat, outstanding host and great location. We stayed in Sara’s flat 3 nights and we loved it. Despite our very late arrival, Sara greeted us with a smile, and gave us lots of local tips which were amazing. The flat was spotless clean, modern and romantic. Would recommend to anyone and hope to come and visit again! Adina & Calin June 2018
Great, cozy and stylish apartment with everything you need for enjoying the city. Central location, comfortable bedroom, fully equipped kitchen with nice resting area.
Los consejos de Sara sobre la ciudad fueron geniales. El apartamento como esperabamos, y la ubicación perfecta!

Appartement très bien placé, très beau, neuf, et très bien équipé. Nous avons eu un très bel accueil avec Sara, qui nous a tout expliqué pour le séjour. Elle nous a indique sur le plan tous les endroits à visiter, les bars, restaurants à faire. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié ce séjour à Porto. Nous recommandons à 100%! Il faut juste savoir, qu’il n’y a pas d’ascenseur, et que c’est au dernier étage. Mais sinon, tout est parfait!
Lovely and very stylish studio to stay! Very helpful hosts, highly recommended.

Net en schoon appartement dichtbij centrum. Het appartement is luxe ingericht, functionele keuken, nette badkamer en heerlijke bedden. Ligt dichtbij het centrum op loopafstand van alle voorzieningen. Ideaal voor een verblijf in Porto!

O apto é uma gracinha! Tudo muito bem decorado, limpo e arrumado! Tivemos uma excelente acolhida, com dicas ótimas sobre a cidade! A localização é perfeita!
O único problema são as escadas! Mas se você tem disposição para subir os 4 andares, vai encontrar um lugar muito aconchegante!
El piso es perfecto para una persona sola o una pareja. Parece un hotel. Además está muy cerca del centro y la chica que te recibe (Sara) es simplemente genial. Os lo recomiendo sin ninguna duda!

Perfecto.
La ubicación es increíble. Pero además, el apartamento es limpio, ordenado, luminoso, con personalidad, con numerosos utensilios para el día a día, con detalles muy útiles (como jabón y champú), fresco...
No me esperaba estar tan agusto como lo he estado, sin duda repetiré en el mismo lugar, y recomiendo al 100% alojarse en Porto Feeling.
We enjoyed our stay in Christinas appartement in every detail. Classy interior and very comfortable. Great location. All is in place for a perfect Porto-feeling.

Très bel appartement, bien situé. A notre arrivé, nous avons était très bien accueilli et bien conseillé sur les différents restaurants à essayés ainsi que sur les différentes choses que nous pouvions faire et visiter.
je recommande vivement.
L’appartamento è molto carino e ben arredato. Cucina fornita. Posizione centrale. Isabel ci ha accolto con indicazioni dettagliate sulle attrazioni di Porto. Consigliato. Grazie!

L’appartement était très beau et propre. L’hôtesse était disponible pour répondre à nos questions et nous a donné d’excellentes recommandations. La chambre sur mezzanine est un gros plus! L’appartement est proche de tout à distance de marche alors idéal pour les touristes. Le seul bémol serait les 80 (!!!) marches d’escalier à monter pour arriver à l’appartement... voyager léger!
Excelente estancia. La calidad, ubicación, la atención y los concejos al momento de la llegada fueron inmejorables. 100% recomendado y sin duda repetiré cuando pueda.

Alojamiento acogedor, muy limpio y en el centro de Porto. Respecto a la dueña, inmejorable. El recibimiento fue muy bueno y nos recomendó muchos sitios donde comer, así como nos dejo a nuestra disposición mapas y diccionarios para entender mejor el idioma.
Super appart et accueil excellent !!
Sehr schönes Apartment mit super Ausstattung. Wir wurden nett begrüßt und haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.
A great place, comfy and really pleasant. Cristina and Patricia will welcome you very warmly and be available for any question.
Good place to visit Porto. All was good
Appartement tout neuf, conforme aux photos. Sara est très sympa et nous a donné de très bons conseils pour profiter de Porto ! :) Je recommande vivement !

name: Large windows 1 bedroom apartment Ikebana 1
summary: Cozy one bedroom apartment with tall ceilings and wide windows
description: Cozy one bedroom apartment with tall ceilings and wide windows
house_rules: It is supposed to leave everything in good conditions...

host.host_about: Não poderia viver sem sol, boas amizades e dormir bem

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Perfect location - nice neighbourhood and can walk to tourist attractions in 10/15 mins. Comfy and stylish place- everything I had hoped for. Thank you!

My wife and I booked Ana’s place without really knowing where we were going to be in Porto. We quickly learned that we were in the perfect location! From the apartment you can walk anywhere in the city or even to the Port cellars across the river. When we arrived Ana’s son greeted us and showed us the apartment which was absolutely amazing! It is right on a cool little street that is filled with restaurants, shops and has a great view of the area. When we did have a question Ana’s son was very quick to respond. We couldn’t have picked a better place for our last few days in Portugal. This was definitely our favorite part of our trip and recommend staying here to anyone who is thinking of visiting Porto.

Perfect location. Hotspots in walking distance. Food places, markets, metro&buses and anything you need in walking distance. The apartment was super clean and nicely setup. Ana’s son organizes the apartment and is very kind and perfectly easy with communication. 100% recommended

name: Studio Copa
summary: Espetacular e moderno studio no coração de Copacabana,na área do baixo Copa,na rua principal,Ave. Nossa senhora de Copacabana,próximo a rua Xavier da Silveira a apenas 2 quadras da praia e  da estação de metrô Cantagalo! reviews.comments:
Ótimo apto, tudo muito limpo, localização excelente, próximo a bares, restaurantes e comércio! 
O anfitrião muito prestativo e foi compreensivo quanto o chek in, portaria amigável! O apto é um ótimo custo beneficio!
Excelente

Gostei muito do apto. Arnobio respondeu e explicou sempre de prontidão 
Recomendo
The apartment was very nice, also in a good location. Arnobio was very helpful making sure everything went well.

Fiquei com minha esposa nesse apartamento. A localização é excelente, próximos a bares, restaurantes, supermercados, bancos, etc. Está em duas quadras da praia de copacabana e perto do metrô. A estadia foi bem traquila, o Sr. Arnobio nos respondia rapidamente. É um bom lugar para quem quer aproveitar para conhecer o Rio de Janeiro e aproveitar as praias. Fica próximo a uma estação de bicicletas do Bike Itaú. Qualquer pessoa pode utilizar as bicicletas (basta cadastrar). Pedalamos em toda orla de Copacabana, Ipanema e Leblon.
Nice place, great location.
Apartamento atende conforme anúncio
Ótima localização. Apto bem distribuído, silencioso, conforme as fotos e o anúncio. Recomendo a hospedagem
Local excelente, respostas rápidas e apartamento muito limpo.

O apartamento é exatamente conforme as imagens! É uma acomodação simples, mas pra quem deseja um local apenas para dormir (nosso caso) atende totalmente as necessidades. A cozinha não é super equipada, mas permite cozinhar coisas básicas. Os criterios que priorizo de cama e banheiro limpos foram contemplados (O chuveiro é maravilhoso) A localização é excelente, muito próximo da praia e com recursos como bares e supermercado ao lado!

Lugar con buena ubicación la ducha es demasiado cómoda y el aire acondicionado también el problema es que restringe la electricidad y se debe tener cuidado con cuantos wats hay que gastar diariamente el wifi es demasiado lento pero es un buen llegar para llegar ya que se encuentra cerca de la playa y otros lugares como farmacias bares y restaurantes. Tudo conforme com as fotos e as descrições. Tudo fácil com o self-check-in.

A smell in the kitchen area. 
Location good. Hospitality with a couple of beers good, but airbnb is more than that.

name: Sydney City Elegance & Pool.
summary: If convenience, comfort and resort style amenities are what you are seeking, then look no further than this fantastic abode. Situated a few steps from Sydney’s Martin Place, you will be residing in the heart of the Sydney City. You will have access to the entire space suitable for 2 people with all your needs covered. Fully functional kitchen, bathroom, super comfy lounge room, private balcony and king-size bed. Enjoy the roof top pool and spa area, with plenty of space to cook a BBQ and relax.
space: This convenient and comfortable apartment has everything you need to relax while being in the heart of Sydney's busy CBD. Martin Place is a few steps away, providing easy access to public transport and all of Sydney's attractions - big and small.  The bright and spacious apartment is located on the 11th floor of this luxurious apartment complex. Boasting resort style amenities such as a roof top pool & spa, BBQ area, basic gym equipment, and plenty of day beds to soak up the sun and relax with the view from the 14th floor. The apartment has everything you need, with the following inclusions:  - large balconies with city views of Sydney. - Fully equipped kitchen with oven, microwave, toaster, kettle and gas stove.  - Internal laundry with washing machine and dryer. - King size bed. - Reverse air conditioning / heater. - Flat screen TV. - Unlimited high speed internet.

notes: Please take note that our cleaning fee includes professional cleaning after each guest along with the restocking of essentials such as toilet paper, soap, conditioner etc. The sheets and towels that we use are high quality hotel standard linens which is guaranteed to be clean, fresh and pressed. If you have any problems with the cleanliness of the house when you arrive please let us know AS SOON AS YOU ARRIVE so that we can send the cleaners back to complete the job.
transit: Getting around could not be any easier. Martin Place train station is literately 1min walk away, and will take you to all the major locations around Sydney. You are within walking distance to everything in the city. If you do need to travel outside of the CBD, I recommend downloading the App TripView. This will help you plan your travel.
access: Key collection has been made easy, as i use a lockbox system. This allows you to come and go on your own time. Once you have confirmed the booking ill send you through the details on how to find and operate the lockbox. And if you would prefer me to meet you at the property for check-in this can be arranged.
interaction: I live 10 min away in Newtown, so if anything comes up during your stay I am more then happy to help. Once the booking is confirmed I will send you through my mobile, and I am more then happy for you to call me any time during your stay.
house_rules: - No parties

host.host_about:
Hey
I'm Johannes, from Sydney.

I'm an easy going guy that works hard and play hard. Lived in Sydney most of my life, so I know the area pretty well. I enjoy meeting new people, and hearing their travel stories. In my free time I enjoy indoor rock climbing  or taking the bike out for a ride.
Looking forward to meeting you.

reviews.comments: Really nice position and Really clean
aprtment was great good size living and (Website hidden by Airbnb) was fantastic,right in the middle of the city

Johannes please use my note to you I thought that was the public review and my phone is about to go flat
Thx
Andy
Awesome location. Brilliant BIG BED. Spacious apartment

Great apartment in the CBD area. Location was great for us as we were doing local sightseeing, ferry's from circular key and buses from martinplace. Small IGA supermarket in Martin place as well. Some nice local eating places around as well. Everything was few mins walk for us maximum so perfect place to stay if you are doing local touring in Sydney area.
Key collection great instructions, no problems with getting in and apartment was clean and cool.
Johannes was a pleasure to communicate with. I booked on behalf of a colleague who had an excellent stay.

Good-sized apartment in the centre of the business district. Good communication for check-in and check-out. Rooftop pool & terrace is a nice touch but gym is tiny and desperately needs repairs. 10 mins to Rocks / Opera House / Darling Harbour / Barangaroo.
Clean and organized

Great location...that’s it...very noisy from external sources, bins emptied at 2am, and the nightly bottle smash around 3 am. Building work opposite starts at 6 am every day including Saturday. Appliances are dated, drier didn’t work for 4 weeks, oven very noisy, smoke alarm super sensitive, hot water scalding, shower head suitable for under 5 footers, shower grout mouldy, lights very dark, the vertical blinds don’t keep out much light at night from the offices opposite. Lifts clunky...got stuck in one on first day there.

Gym equipment is either broken and very rusty..pool surface paint is peeling, and the pool area gets sun for approx 15 minutes a day if you chase across the sun beds

Unless location is the ultimate for you, I would look elsewhere for a more modern and better kept apartment for the money. Doesn’t really offer good value.

Johannes is a great host and was super easy to get in contact with.  The apartment is very conveniently located by Martin Place and provided us with a good base in Sydney for a few days.  The space is a reasonable size for inner city Sydney, and the king bed was a huge plus.  I would definitely stay here again in future.

What a great one-bed room apartment right in the middle of the CBD!! Full amenities, clean and really stylish. thoroughly enjoyed my stay! Johannes is very responsible and responsive. Excellent stay, highly recommended.
The place was great and right in center city so walkable to many main areas!
Great one bedroom apartment. I cooked a couple of nights and kitchen facilities were fine. Check in worked fine. Location is great. Johannes let me know he was available if required, which he wasn't.

JOHANNES was great and quick to respond. Great 1 Bedroom apartment with pool, spa and gym! 
Great space in an awesome location.
This was a very well-equipped apartment with an awesome location.

Great, central location in the Sydney CBD. Very close to Martin Place railway station, and a wonderful IGA supermarket allowing for self-catering.  The apartment is a good size, and nice to have a small balcony with furniture when the weather is warmer. The bedroom is spacious with a large king bed and mirrored wardrobes. The kitchen is a good size and has everything to knock up a meal. If staying longer, having the cupboard laundry is a huge bonus. We will return when staying in Sydney again. Highly recommended. Johannes was good to communicate with, and arrival and departure was simple.

Johannes’ place is great!  Wonderful location within walking distance of at least three train stations and the harbor.  Delicious king sized bed and excellent kitchen amenities.  Johannes is very responsive and helpful.

This apartment was exactly as described in that it is central to everything in Sydney CBD. 
Pros - location, location, location. Easy to get anywhere in Sydney CBD. Handy super market just a few minutes walk in Pitt street. Great communication with Johannes.
Cons - Lots of construction work right outside the balcony. Cleaners hadn't done a great job prior to our visit [I have made Johannes aware of this] . Tumble dryer not working properly so hard to dry towels and tea towels. Johannes arranged additional towels for us.
So if you intend to spend your days out exploring Sydney and just need a central location with a great bed, this is the place.

Very nice, clean and spacious apartment in a great location. Check-in was a bit difficult because I never received the instructions (not sure if it was the Airbnb app or what) and Johannes was unfortunately out of reach. But after a few hours we finally managed to get it. There was no light in the bathroom when we arrived (not sure how the cleaner managed to clean without any light) so we had to change the light bulb ourselves.
Besides that the stay was very nice and the apartment is lovely.

Excellent location, with great communication from the host and a very easy self check in process. Bed was comfortable, and apartment was warm and nicely decorated. Shower pressure is excellent, but hot/cold taps can be a little tricky to balance for shower temperature. Very good value, highly recommend.
Great location, loved the self checkin and great response from host.

It's a very nice apartment. It's in the CBD, so it can be a bit noisy, especially as there's construction on the building over. The host is very timely with communication and actually went above & beyond to help me.
N
Central location - perfect. Spacious and clean. Entry info well detailed. Welcome manual very useful. Host is easy to communicate with. Perfect for a weekend getaway.
Great central location with plenty of amenities and a helpful host.
great place, great location, no issues.
You will not regret staying here beautiful & airy apartment  , convent , clean , peaceful, comfortable fully recommend this place to all . Johannes was wonderful  to work with as well very helpful
Had a great experience staying in this apartment.  I was in Sydney for work and stayed here for two weeks.    Full kitchen, washer and dryer, good bed, great location in CBD!
Super close to everything and elegant chic apartment.
Wonderful place. Great location Highly recommend

Great apartment, just in the middle of everything! Really close to the main attractions of the city
The kitchen is very good equipped and the bed is huge and comfortable! 
The communication with Johannes was perfect, really fast and nice
Highly recomendable!!

Nice place 
Good location

Fantastic location. Close to everything, beautiful walks all around. Great space as well - fantastic for a couple. Very comfortable living room and bed, lots of closet space, cute balcony, very functional kitchen. Would stay here again!
Great location, very spacious, loved the welcome tips.

Cet appartement est idéalement situé, à 5 mn à pieds du train et des bus, au cœur de la CBD. Parfaitement bien insonorisé, il offre un lit et un espace de vie confortables. L'établissement sécurisé est facile d'accès et siège autour de petits commerces utiles pour les besoins quotidiens. Vivement recommandé pour une escapade amoureuse à Sydney.

Location is excellent.  We walked everywhere with no problems.  Nice well stocked kitchen, close to restaurants.  Clever check in with the lock box which we found with no problem.  View in inward to large office buildings. Not the most private location but we were in the heart of Sydney.  We felt safe and comfortable.  Thanks for a great stay.
Clean place. Great, central location.
Clean and well presented

This is a great location for concerts at the City Concert Hall and visits to the NSW Art Gallery. There is a bit of construction noise at the moment due to the upgrade of nearby Martin Place Station, but it's OK if the windows and doors are closed.

Well where to start! This apartment is a real home away from home in the CBD area of Sydney and within easy reach of everything. 

The apartment has one bedroom, bathroom and a spacious kitchen/lounge/dining room. The kitchen has everything you could need including a dishwasher, a washing machine and a tumble dryer. We did use the oven once and it was a bit noisy but cooked really quickly. 

The bathroom is a good size but it’s a bit tricky to get the shower just the right temperature. Having said that it’s a good size and once you get it going it is great. 

The bed is comfy with plenty of storage in large sliding door wardrobes. 

The air con works really well and cools you off just when you need it. We turned it off at night as it was cool enough to sleep and it is a little noisy when it is running. There are plenty of little reminders to make sure you turn everything off before you go out which we found really helpful. 

Up on floor 14 (difficult to find if you don’t know where it is as it’s not written down anywhere) there is a pool and jacuzzi with seating and a BBQ. You will need your key fob to get up in the lift and to get through the pool door. There are ladies and gents changing rooms but we didn’t explore them. When we were there the pool looked dirty and unusable (we have informed the owners) but the jacuzzi was perfect after a long day in the city. 

The location of the apartment is 11/10 perfect. Come out of the front door and turn right. Go down the stairs by the Japanese restaurant and follow the alley to Pitt Street. This will lead you wherever you wish to go. It is an easy walk down to the Rocks District (15 mins) full of history. The Quays (15 mins) with all the ferry trips you could want and on to the Opera House (20 minutes) all times approx from the apartment at a slow/medium pace. 

There is a brill supermarket literally 3 minutes from the apartment. Turn left out of the apartment up to the main road, turn right and walk along to Martin Place and directly in front of you there are some stairs down ward passed a burger stall. Go down these and to the left you will find an escalator down to a great shop. Took us ages to find it so hope this helps!

We used the Hop On Hop Off Bus and it was fab!! It is only a two minute walk up to Elizabeth St to the bus stop so easily accessible. They also have some great special offers on if you want to visit lots of the other attractions. We also went on the Champagne afternoon boat tour (Quay 6) and did the tour of the opera house. We were lucky enough to see an Opera at the Opera House and loved every second. 

All in all we loved the place in Sydney and will definitely be passing the info on to friends and relatives. Although maybe we should have kept it a secret so we can go back again!! Lol. Thanks Tam and Johannes who always replied quickly to questions and to the lady at the foyer desk who helped us find the pool. All in all 11/10 from us!
Sehr sauberes und bequemes Apartement im Zentrum von Sydney.

name: Bright and Spacious apartment
summary: Spacious and tidy apartment located in a secure and quiet complex with resort facilities. Centrally located, only 15 min from the CBD, Airport and the famous Coogee Beach.
description: Spacious and tidy apartment located in a secure and quiet complex with resort facilities. Centrally located, only 15 min from the CBD, Airport and the famous Coogee Beach.

reviews.comments:
It was a nice apartment to stay in and it is worth the price. 
The only problem in the area is parking, as it is challenging to find a free spot- since we owned a car. There are also planes flying over the complexes, therefore there will be some noise, but not often- it wasn’t as noticeable for us. 
Otherwise it was a nice stay with all appliances and necessities provided- also Hafid was fast to respond to our messages. Recommend.
great

notes: All late check-ins, after 23h, have a 15€ fee. Comes into effect from 1 March 2018 in the city of Porto, a municipal tax.
