host.host_about: Hi we are  Miguel and João and a good friend of us Miguel also. We live in Porto and we have  some great ideas and spots for having a good time wile traveling to Portugal. We are starting a company of quality rental accommodations and services. The houses and apartments belong to friends and family. We are managing the places and, one or the other will be always available to assist and welcome you. We consider ourselves open minded persons and professional, always open to assist. We enjoy meeting people from all over the world and give them great tips to have a great time with original hints of the city, love travel, Design, sports (play tennis regularly), food, music and life. It will be our pleasure to help you to have a great time in Portugal.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Very nice apartment, very, very nice guys! The apartment is very stylish, yet comfortable. You have one of the best francesina places nearby and can get quickly to the city center. Would definitley recommend.
We had a lovely stay at the appartement of Miguel & Joao, definitely recommend it! :)

No words, AMAZING! We couldn’t ask for a better place to stay in Oporto! Location wonderful! Everything super clean and beautiful! Us as youngsters we always search for a fashionable place, this was THE ONE! We had 3 perfect days!

Мы остались в восторге, всё очень понравилось. При чекине очень гостеприимно всё подробно объяснили, оставили кофе и базовые продукты. Апартаменты как на фото, стильные и очень удобные, идеально для пары. Очень чисто. Всё рядом. Молниеносно отвечают. Молодцы ребята, обязательно бы вернулись именно сюда.

Perfect place to stay a couple of days in Porto. The flat is great, the neighborhood is calm and quiet, and the city center is not far away.
Highly recommended !

Super Weekend à Porto, l'appartement est très beau, très élégant et original. Vraiment rien à redire sur la propreté, nickel. Le lit très confortable et pas un bruit dans le quartier. L'accueil à notre arrivé était parfaite. 
Petit bémol, un peu loin à pied du centre, surtout le retour car ça grimpe étant enceinte j'ai eu un peu de mal sur la fin du séjour. Le metro est par contre vraiment proche.  Et la terrasse est pas encore à la hauteur du design de l'intérieur, surtout qu'elle est au rez de chaussé donc emmuré, elle mériterai d'être décorée avec soin pour en faire un endroit parfait et charmant ! 
Mais je tatillonne car nous avons adoré notre séjour ;-)

Um lugar, que sem dúvida, voltarei em breve.
Nota 10.
Abraço a todos!
El alojamiento es fantástico y bien ubicado. Miguel a sido un fantástico anfitrión, nos ha explicado con todo detalle que luegares visitar. Oporto nos ha enamorado, sin duda un lugar donde volver.

The apartment is awesome. Stylish, comfortable and modern. You get exactly what you see in the pictures. 
It is also great located. When you look at the map it might seems far from old city center but it's not! Porto is a small city and we reach every attraction on foot. If you don't like walking you have a metro station nearby. 

And about the host - Miguel is extremely friendly and kind man. He stayed in touch all the time we were in Porto and helped us with everything we need. 

We strongly recommend this place and this host. Thank you for wonderful experience.
I recommend the place to everyone. Apartment equipped with everything you need. Excellent communication with all major attractions using the metro. It was pleasure to stay in Miguel & Joao place.

Miguel and Joäo are really superhosts, they provide outstanding hospitality. The place is beautiful, stylish and sparkling clean, the location is superb, the communication with them was quick and smooth, they organized everything with the utmost care, they were totally flexible when the plane landed very late because the French air-controllers joined a national strike,  they provided excellent local tips, so it was a wonderful experience, we’d definitely be happy to return to their apartment for another holiday.
Es hat alles gepasst. Miguel ist ein toller Host. Er war immer erreichbar und hat sich sehr viel Mühe mit allem gegeben. Auch für unsere weitere Portugal Reise hatte er noch wertvoller Tipps gegeben

O apartamento é ótimo! Super bem decorado e bastante espaçoso. Além disso,  o Miguel foi super atencioso na nossa chegada e muito solicito. Nos deu varias dicas do Porto.
Amamos! Quando voltarmos, com certeza vamos nos hospedar no mesmo apartamento.

Merci à vous deux ! Tout était parfait, l'appartement est magnifique, bien localisé  et très fonctionnel.
Vos points forts : votre accueil et votre disponibilité !! Un grand merci !

Great experience right from check in. Spent 15 mins explaining Porto to us and giving us his highlights of the city. The apartment was very stylish and had everything we needed. It’s located close to a metro stop but we enjoyed the short walk into the centre of Porto much more! Fantastic host and apartment.
Clean apartment close to metro & walking distance to main attractions. Miguel was very friendly & gave us some useful tips about Porto.

What can I say that is not already in the photos, place looks as great as advertised as well as incredibly comfortable. My girlfriend and I thoroughly enjoyed camping out there and prob ended up staying in more than we intended because the studio was such a well developed space. Aesthically pleasing to the eye at every turn, it also has all the modern accoutrements necessary to make life easy and comfy. Location was also perfect. Walking distance to Rua Catarina and direct line to Cais de Rebeira and yet far enough away from the hustle and bustle to offer a getaway from it all. An all-around perfect spot, we would definitely stay there again when we come back.
We had a great experience! The place is just like the photo’s. Miguel gave us al lot of good information about the city and helped us out with some issues.

magnifique appartement, bien desservie 
hôte au petits soin

We really enjoyed our stay in this gorgeous, tidy and well equipped apartment. 
The bed was very comfortable and the area super quiet at night for a great sleep. 
We arrived very late in the evening, but check-in was no problem as we were met by a driver who had the keys to the flat. 
Miguel checked on us several times to ensure we had everything we needed. 
The apartment is about a 20 minute stroll to the main part of the city - we often used an Uber on the way back up!  But at just €2 a throw this was well worth the cost. 

There is a supermarket nearby and a wonderful Brazilian cocktail bar just around the corner. 

Highly recommend this lovely place for a stay in Porto!!!
Just an amazing ackommodation. Clean, stylish and well equipped! Miguel gave us a lot of local tips and was very helpful. We had a superb stay. Would really recommend this!

Miguel was really kind. When we arrived he gave us some tips and the last day we could stay as long as we want (because we were flying at 7). The styling of the place was great, the beds were good and there was no noice at all. It’s a really good place for a good price!

Miguel & João are great hosts. There appartment is really cosy, stylish and clean. Thanks to the advice Miguel gave us about Porto, we were able to see many beautiful things. We really enjoyed our stay.

My husband and I stayed at Miguel and João’s place for 5 nights. We truly enjoyed our time in Porto and the apartment was a perfect sanctuary to return to after a day of walking and exploring the area. The apartment is very nicely designed with great amenities and plenty of space. We were very happy about the small backyard where we spend our mornings eating breakfast and evening reading a book. Miguel was there to welcome us and gave us lots of great advices on local places to visit. Thank you so much Miguel - you are awesome! Very easy communication. Thank you for letting us stay.

Appartement très  confortable super bien situé  au sein d'un quartier calme mais avec des commerces à  proximité  idéal pour préparer les repas. Metro à 2 pas très pratique pour sillonner le centre de cette ville magnifique. Super déco  vintage, bref une semaine de vacances à Porto inoubliable...

Appartement conforme aux (Website hidden by Airbnb) plus l’accueil, la disponibilité de Miguel et João sont très appréciables.
L’appartement est très propre avec une décoration  recherchée.
Les transports en commun pour se rendre au centre historique sont proches (Metro bus) sinon cela nécessite une marche d’environ 15 / 20 minutes
apartamento con mucho estilo, bien comunicado y tranquilo, Joao es un gran anfitrión, atento y volcado en hacer agradable tú estancia.

Vraiment très bel espace de vie ouvert de type loft. 
L’appartement est décoré avec goût et tout est mis à disposition pour cuisiner sur place ( frigo, vaisselles, condiments...). Supérette très proche. 
L’espace était très propre et la communication avec João exemplaire. 
Je recommande sans hésiter. 
Attention cependant, le centre historique se situe à environ 10-15 minutes en contrebas de la ville. Comme la ville a un très fort relief, il me semble compliqué de faire des aller retours tous les jours jusqu’au Airbnb. (Ok si séjour court). 
Le quartier n’est pas forcément beau ou convivial mais on s’y sent en sécurité. 
N’hésitez pas une seconde !! 

Encore merci à eux !

Apartment was fabulous with everything you could need, exactly as described and pictured. We found the location great for exploring the local area and city centre - a nice 20 minute walk. Our host João was so helpful with tips on the best local attractions and places to eat and very quick at responding. We will definitely be back when we next find ourselves in beautiful Porto!
房东热情好客,给我提供了很多帮助｡房间整洁明亮,夜晚很安静｡

사진에 보는것과 같이 집이 아주 인테리어가 멋집니다.
아기와 함께 갔는데 필요한것들을 제공해주어 감사합니다.
동네도 조용하고 위치는 주요 관광지까지 걸어서 20분 정도 입니다. 내려갈땐 괜찮은데 올라올때는 주로 우버를 이용했네요.
Amazing apartment and location!
João was super nice, welcoming and helpful. Provided a lot of information. The apartment is at a great location. 10-15 minutes walk from the main attractions. Really enjoyed Porto. Hope to be back.
We had an awesome stay here! João was more than helpful and the apartment is very spacious and beautiful. Definitely recommend!

Thanks to our hosts. Our stay was perfect. Miguel met us at the apartment on arrival and gave us some tips of where to go and good restaurants. Very helpfull. Good location. We could walk to almost everywhere we were. We recommend this place highly.

name: Minutes to Sunset Beach- Clean and Spacious
summary: Clean, quiet and family friendly unit with a 2 minute walk or 30 second bike ride to one of the best beaches on Oahu. The apartment has 2 bedrooms each with their own full bathroom, a full kitchen, and living room area. There is free access to bikes, surfboards, snorkling and beach gear so you will be set to have the vacation of a lifetime. World class surf, bike path, hiking in the mountains, and beautiful sunsets over the ocean are among the many things this beautiful paradise has to offer.
space: A portable crib is available upon request for our smallest guests.
description: Clean, quiet and family friendly unit with a 2 minute walk or 30 second bike ride to one of the best beaches on Oahu. The apartment has 2 bedrooms each with their own full bathroom, a full kitchen, and living room area. There is free access to bikes, surfboards, snorkling and beach gear so you will be set to have the vacation of a lifetime. World class surf, bike path, hiking in the mountains, and beautiful sunsets over the ocean are among the many things this beautiful paradise has to offer. A portable crib is available upon request for our smallest guests. We have 4 beach cruiser bikes available for guests to use during their stay.  We are 1 block off the famous North Shore Bike Path which runs all the way to Waimea Bay.  Once you arrive you will not need to get back into the car to continue your beach adventures!
transit: We have 4 beach cruiser bikes available for guests to use during their stay.  We are 1 block off the famous North Shore Bike Path which runs all the way to Waimea Bay.  Once you arrive you will not need to get back into the car to continue your beach adventures!
house_rules: House Rules: -No smoking on property -Please leave shoes outside -Additional guests beyond those checked in are not permitted on the property -No parties or events -Quiet hours end at 7am and begin at 8pm -Guests must arrive in no more than 1 vehicle as there is no available street parking -Guests must drive very slowly on the street street of the property.  Keep under 10mph.

reviews.comments: The house was so affordable and spacious, it for my family of 4 with so much extra space. The kitchen was so clean. Kristin and Abdul responded to our messages right away. The washing and dryer machines were easy to use and super close and the neighborhood was nice and quiet. I loved every moment while staying in their home and would highly recommend it and would stay there again!

The place was indeed very spacious and there were beach supplies available for guest use. The neighborhood has a beautiful backyard beach which is very easy to get to. Would’ve loved to spend our entire stay here if only it were available :)
Amazing location, just steps to the beach. Spacious, clean, great value. Prompt responses from the hosts. Thank you Kristin & Abdul!
Everything you need on a short little trip to the north shore.

The space was clean private and very spacious! It is in a local
Neighborhood that is safe and fun. There is noice from the upstairs and back neighbors however it wasn't disturbing and stopped precisely at 9pm.
I loved that my friend and I had our own room and bathroom like having 2 separate apartments!
The
Blackout curtains made it easy to sleep in and the extra fan made the already cool home extra pleasant.
Abey was an exceptional host and responded immediately to our needs. The bikes made my trip! We road 3 miles to the grocery on the sweetest bike trail ever! Definitely a gem of a place
Adorei a estadia e o lugar , simplesmente muito melhor do que estava esperando. Recomendo a todos

We had an awesome stay at Abdul's. Everything in the house was tidy and clean, just as you could expect. Location is perfect. Nonetheless, what makes Abdul's place over the top is the 3 cruiser bikes (and locks) we were able to us. Awesome stay. Highly recommanded
Great location and super attentive hosts- bike and bus route access a huge plus for adventures and beach bumming. Will def return
Quick responses to any questions we had. Very clean, and owners were incredibly nice! North Shore was amazingly beautiful :)  Hope to be back soon
great spot close to everything on the north shore from beaches to shops.  peace and quiet in a small neighborhood accessible to private beaches and scenic views

Great location, plenty of space with two bedrooms and 2 baths. Steps away from the famous Ted’s Bakery on the North shore and very close to the beach. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely book again. Thank you!

Our stay was awesome. Great location walking distance to the beach. Everything really clean and taken care of. Hospitality could not have been better! We had snorkeling gear, surf boards and bikes available for us to use. Huge shoutout to Abdul, who drove to us with a bolt cutter to open a bike lock that we could not open with the code. We called him in the middle of the day and he was there in only 10 minutes, which saved our day! 
I wish we had stayed longer, we will definitely look into staying here again if we come back to the North Shore!

This place was exactly as described! Abdul and Kristin were great and responsive to answer any questions. There was gear for us to use, everything we could need in the kitchen, on site parking and a great location close to all beaches! The beach right near the house is rocky but just down the road, it opens up and has less rocks and better surf/bay to play in! Looking forward to getting back to the North Shore already!
Fantastic location close to the beach and great hosts! Always quick to answer any questions we had and helpful in suggesting local tips. Very happy.
Wonderful hosts! Great north shore location. Five minute walk to beautiful beach. Kitchen well-stocked including coffee! Close to town and Ted’s. Loved our time on the north shore. Thank you Abdul!
Exactly as advertised, thank you so much!
we had a great stay.  apartment was exactly as listed in a location convenient to popular beaches.

Abdul's place is perfect for your beach holiday. It was spacious, Abdul was so quick in responding to any questions we had. They had so much available for us to use. Walking distance to a fantastic beach. We didn't want to leave!
Great place with amazing location. Up on north shore away from the traffic and tourist areas. Beautiful beaches nearby and close to food.
Had a great stay.
Very young kids above room that are up by 6: (Website hidden by Airbnb) sound proofing . Rooms hot. Nice beach cove near property.

The place was accurate to its photos. Super easy to find and it included on-site parking. Abdul and Kristin sent an informative message prior to our trip which made the Check In process super simple, easy and quick. The best part was being welcomed by the cutest cat ever, named Angus Beef.  Abdul and Kristin included 4 beach cruiser bikes which were a HUGE plus! The bike trail is literally around the corner from the house. Its a 2 minute bike ride to the neighborhood beach opening and a 1 minute bike ride to Ted's Bakery. We used the bikes a couple of times and it was so nice cruising down the bike trail.  We just wish we had used the bikes more, since it was so much fun. The place is pretty big and spacious. It was nice that there were two separate bedrooms with its own bathroom. One bedroom was at the front of the apartment and the other in the back passed the kitchen. Beach chairs, Beach umbrellas, beach towels, snorkel equipment, surf boards, and boogie boards were included which were AMAZING! There was also a couple pairs of water shoes in the bin which came in handy since my boyfriend forgot his pair at home. Both bedrooms included a small fan which was necessary since the place does not include A/C, both rooms got pretty warm. Each bedroom provides you with 4 small hand towels and 2 Big Towels. Can't beat this location, only a 15 minute drive to Haleiwa town and in-between the drive you pass so many beautiful beaches and yummy food trucks. Hope to visit the North Shore again soon!

Located on the North Shore on a nice cul-de-sac within a 10 minute drive of all the north shore highlights. Great location! The beach is a 5 minute walk away, but there is a reef right there so you can't swim there. If you walk 5 minutes down the beach you get to sunset beach, which is very nice. Good for swimming and has a nice wave break. No air conditioning so please be aware of how humid and hot Hawaii can get. The front bedroom got some breeze but the back bedroom was very hot and stuffy. Seemed expensive for the price... but the location cannot be beat! And at the time of my booking was one of the only places with two bedrooms and two beds for the price.

Great place to stay. Very comfortable place to eat, sleep and get ready for the day. Close to the beach. Only about 15 minutes from downtown Haleiwa. Great hosts with tons of local knowledge and very kind.

We had a wonderful stay at Abdul's North Shore apartment! The whole family was super welcoming and accommodating. They were particularly kind to our 19-month-old daughter and shared their kids' toys with her! The apartment was large and comfortable for our party (4 adults plus one kid), and the location is incredible - so close to beautiful beaches. Abdul gave us great local tips for all kinds of activities and interests. Thanks so much, Abdul! We would definitely stay here again if we are back on Oahu.
Great location, great place with lots of extras to use. Great advice on places to go and see! Very close to the beach too!

Kristin & Abdul’s place was perfect! Just as described and in an excellent location to explore the north shore and key surf spots! 

The property is in a quiet street and walking distance to the infamous Teds Bakery (highly recommend the pancakes) and the beach. 

The Kristin and Abdul were quick to respond to any questions, and were kind enough to leave us fruit on occasion.

High recommenced and would love to go back for a further visit.

This place was amazing! Right next to the beach, Ted’s Bakery right around the corner, few minute bus ride to food land. The house was very clean and the little touches gave it a surfer beach vibe. Bed were very comfortable and it is very quiet. You were an amazing host and let us extend our stay twice! Spent Halloween in a awesome neighborhood and met some really nice people. Thank you so much to you and your beautiful family. I hope one day we can come and stay here again!

Great experience. Loved being near the beach and getting to see the sunsets.  Close to everything on the North Shore.  Abdul was very helpful telling us fun places to see. Enjoyed interactions with the family.
Great location - wonderful hosts and exactly as advertised. Would stay there again!

Abdul and Kristin were great hosts and their place was exactly as described. It was amazing. A minute from the beach, clean and comfortable with all the touches of a home (WiFi, wine opener, salt, pepper, surf boards, etc). Thanks for a great stay. We hope to be back soon :)

The place was great! There was plenty of room to spread out. The hosts were really quick to respond to questions and were quite friendly when we crossed paths. I would also highly suggest this area of Oahu if you want great beaches outside the frenzy of Waikiki.

This was a perfect place for our stay on the North Shore. Close to the beach and really loved having two nice bathrooms for our four person party at the right price! Cute kitchen and room furnishings, and I particularly loved the makeup wipes available, thank you! Clear and reasonable house policies, fun perks like the four bikes, and I appreciated the convenient water spicket outside to wash off sand from feet. Not to mention the adorable family hosting! Thanks for a lovely stay!

It was a pleasant stay at this house, it had more room than expected and lots of gear that we could use for a day at the beach. 
The sunset at the beach was amazing, and just a short walk to the beach, we enjoyed it all very much!
Abdul's place is clean, spacious, easy to find and a great price!!

すごく素敵な場所で過ごしやすかったです｡
また宿泊したいです｡
We had such a fantastic time here. Abdul was great to deal with and gave us some great local tips. Thanks again!
Great location! Very close to excellent beaches and North Shore fun!

This is a no frills unit in a local neighborhood, just a few minutes walk to beautiful Sunset Beach. Be sure to go on a bike ride on the nearby bike path. We love the North Shore, and this place was a great home base for our adventures.

We really enjoyed our stay at Abdul’s place. The location is fabulous with quick access to the beach and Ted’s Bakery. We enjoyed using the bikes too!  Abdul and Kristin were very helpful prior to our arrival answering questions and providing information about the North Shore.
A fantastic place to call home base while visiting and playing on the North Shore.  Abdul and Kristin were amazing hosts and their knowledge of the area was very helpful.
Epic location and great hosts
Fantastic location!  Very close to the beach!

Had a wonderful 3 night stay at A and K’s place. Unbeatable location with a ‘local’ vibe rather than touristy.  Clean and huge space for the three of us (couple with a baby). Friendly and helpful hosts who live upstairs, responded quickly to messages and accommodated an earlier check in time. Baby friendly place with high chair, bath and even baby bike seat/helmet. The bikes, surf boards and beach gear provided make this place great value. Hope to be back!

Abdul was quick to respond we any questions we had.
We used the surf boards, snorkel gear, body boards, and bikes at least once a day! This place has left us with some of the most unforgettable memories of our trip. Thank you so much to Abdul and his family. We highly recommend you stay here.

name: Cozy Double Room Flat in Taksim 2
summary: Our fully furnished and decorated apartments are located in the heart of modern İstanbul. Only foot steps away from Istiklal Street and Taksim Square. Also you can reach to all public transportations only in a minute.Place is close to British Embassy
space: It features all services and utilities to make you feel at home.     There are many cafés, bars and restaurants with international and Turkish cuisine within walking distance. Taksim Metro Station is just 600 metres away from the our Sutie.     Place is very close to British Embassy and around there are many  Apart Hotels and For history enthusiasts the historical Sultanahmet Square (also known as the Old City) is 4 km away. Many sights like Galata Tower, Dolmabahce Palace, etc are located in or around the area. The sea side is 10 min. walking distance. Istanbul's historical bazaars are located in Old City. Ataturk International Airport is within 20 km..
description: Our fully furnished and decorated apartments are located in the heart of modern İstanbul. Only foot steps away from Istiklal Street and Taksim Square. Also you can reach to all public transportations only in a minute.Place is close to British Embassy It features all services and utilities to make you feel at home.     There are many cafés, bars and restaurants with international and Turkish cuisine within walking distance. Taksim Metro Station is just 600 metres away from the our Sutie.     Place is very close to British Embassy and around there are many  Apart Hotels and For history enthusiasts the historical Sultanahmet Square (also known as the Old City) is 4 km away. Many sights like Galata Tower, Dolmabahce Palace, etc are located in or around the area. The sea side is 10 min. walking distance. Istanbul's historical bazaars are located in Old City. Ataturk International Airport is within 20 km.. Flat includes two rooms sitting room and bed room there are one sofas can be double be
transit: Near British Embassy there is a main road its name is Omer Hayyam Caddesi starting with this road after 50 meters on the left side our street it name is Harman Sokak and you can find apartment easily its second building in the street from the left side
access: Flat includes two rooms sitting room and bed room there are one sofas can be double bed and a refrigerator, kettle, heating and LCD TV with satellite channels and kitchen with all necessary utilities . We also have a housekeeping service (cleaning the room, changing sheets and towels).
interaction: We have a office in the suite and we always give reception service for our guests. Feel free to ask when you have a problem about flat.

host.host_about: Hi everyone im Volkan  im professional host on airbnb so you can book any apartment from me. i always give professional host service for my guests....

reviews.comments:
The apartment is perfectly located, it is really close to Taksim square. There are many shops and restaurants near the apartment and i think it is the place to stayed in Istanbul because not so much touristic. The apartment is new and clean,  and it look like perfectly to the picture. there is a small terasse really nice and there is really silent. just one little thing, the bathroom is very little.
I really recommand this place!

Отличное расположение, до улицы Истикляль 5 минут пешком, до двух станций метро - 10-15 минут, рядом есть автобусная остановка. В самой квартире можно жить двумя парами (на кухне раскладной диван). Душевая совмещена с туалетом, для кого-то это может стать проблемой, вариант скорее для неприхотливых. 

Хозяин, Волкан - очень приветливый, готовый помочь во всех вопросах, хорошо говорит по-английски. Может показать множество интересных мест в городе, куда туристы сами не доберутся  :) 

Итого: твёрдая четвёрка.

Rather good flat. Nothing special, but great for such a low price. Two good beds, all other things that you need. One little problem: water in the shower stream down too slow: so, 5-10 sm water remain in the floor for next hour) But its not a big deal. We were happy too see, that photos don't lie, that Taxim and metro/buses/funicular/shops/clubs/restaraunts are really near, that Volcan is very helpful guy, who did everything we ask.

So, it was fine. For that price - excellent.

Very good appartment, it has everything needed and it is really close to Istiklal. 
Volkan is a very welcoming and supportive host! He showed us around and did everything to make us feel comfortable.

I would highly recommend this apartment and a host. We had a late flight to Istanbul and for Volkan that wasn't a problem. He waited us and showed us some cool bars the same night. Apartment is very close to Istiklal (the street where everything is happening), but yet it is very quiet an clean (pictures don't lie). There is no need to use public transportation, you can reach the main historical buildings on foot. Also if you need anything ask Volkan, he knows everything about Istanbul and he is willing to tell you.

Great spot!
Great location! Everything is really close; Taksim square, Galata shopping, and the Old-City. Apartment is spacious, clean, and cozy. Located in a good neighborhood; we walked around at night with no fears. 
This was our first trip to Istanbul and Volkan really helped us have a positive experience. He was able to provide us with a lot of details about the city. I would highly recommend this location!

Hi Volkan, thank you for these wonderful moments spent in your appatement! The warm atmosphere and the sympathy you have shown we were right in the heart. 

Very sensitive to the many kindnesses you regaled us during this trip, we wanted to thank you. more: The apartment is good for 4persons, it is new and comfortable, it is well located, walking distance to Taksim Square and Istiklal Avenue ...... the neighborhood is old and very nice, with a fruit market on Saturday :) 
We returned from our vacation satisfied 
Stay as you are! 
Encore merci Volkan

Volkan was nice and easy to reach at all times. The house is like in the pictures, new and clean, it is an old building but he did a fine work renovating it. 
I didn't walk much on this neighbourhood since I didn't have a lot of days. It was noisy for me in the living room, sometimes we couldn't open the window all the way but I guess this is Istambul, like my country Spain, noisy. The room was quiet, so good for sleeping.
There are two things that I wasn't very comfortable with,  one being the bathroom, I didn't realized in the pictures that it was so small, the shower was very good but you have to take the toilet paper out every time you shower and there is no place really to leave your toiletries, and the second one was that we couldn't really cook because there was nothing to cook with, so it was not completely equipped, just basics. Not a big problem since there are a lot of restaurants to try out!
The stairs to the flat are very narrow and a bit steep so if you have trouble climbing stairs keep this in mind, other than that, you get use to it easily, Volkan helped us with our heavy luggage.
I must say that we are on our 40's and that is why I think this is a flat more for young people than for a mature couple. But it was all right for 3 nights and for the price.

Great host. Volkan is very helpful and speaks great English. The location is close to taksim. The apartment is good for 1-2 people. It's small and bathroom is very small. As long as it's 2 people max you should be good.
Volcan was a great host. Thanks for a lovely stay

Volkan thank you ...))) the best))) of the best)) (Website hidden by Airbnb) Все отлично ... Волкан спасибо огромное ... Теплый прием ... Были в Стамбуле впервые  ...очень положительные эмоции от встречи и на протяжении всего пребывания !!! Еще раз спасибо !!! Волкан все организовал на высшем уровне !!!! Будем рекомендовать все друзьям !!!!! Еще раз спасибо !!!!!!)))))))))

I booked this place for my niece, her husband and her one year old daughter. It was very clean and it met their expectations fully. The neighborhood is part of old Istanbul and family oriented with a lot of children playing in the street. There is great access to main street with public transports. Taksim square is only 10 minutes walk. Volcan is a great guy and he made my family feel very welcome. For sure we will work with Volcan again if we end up coming back to Istanbul.

Thanks Volcan
Nasser

L'appartement de Volkan est plutôt bien placé par rapport aux endroits à visiter dans Istambul mais malheureusement il se situe dans une petite rue excentrée peu accueillante pour 2 jeunes femmes désireuses de faire la fête et de rentrer tard le soir. Nous avons en effet été suivies en rentrant de boîte de nuit et nous avons dû nous cacher chez un commerçant voisin :-(
Toutefois je recommande ce logement à des hommes ou éventuellement des couples mais pas des femmes seules. Sinon Volkan est relativement serviable et pourra répondre à vos questions concernant les modalités pratiques de votre séjour.

Appartement sommaire mais fonctionnel, très bien situé dans une rue calme à proximité de commerces et surtout proche de la grande rue commercante de Taksin et de sa vie nocturne. Volkan nous a très bien accueillit, très arrangeant et pret à repondre à toutes vos questions. Nous avons été très contentes de notre séjour à Istanbul. Nous recommandons cet hôte.
Great apartment with a nice location. We enjoyed our stay here. Thanks Volkan !

It was wonderful holiday! Thanks!
Небольшая, но уютная квартира! есть все необходимое-шампунь, фен, полотенца. Рядом улица с барами, ресторанами, магазинами. Мы приезжали поздно ночью, Volkan нас ждал, помог объяснить таксисту как доехать, был очень приветлив несмотря на позднее время.
Всем рекомендуем!

Everything was great, Voltan is a perfect host, with lots of advices and always ready to help at almost 24/7! The place itself is pretty small, but the position near the entertainment center is awesome! Great for short-time staying!

The location is great, close to Taksim, there are small stores and food options close by. The place is very clean and Volkan was very helpful. The only drawback was the fact that we were 4 people and the sofa bed was not sleepable for even one person. The problem was not with space but with the comfort you need from a bed. Other than that, great place, great location, great host!

Volkan was a wonderful host. He waited until after 1am for us to arrive as our flight was late. Volkan sat down with us and gave us tips on where to visit in Istanbul. He also let us borrow a travel guide book and gave us a map of the city. The apartment was spotlessly clean and had everything that we needed. The apartment is in a great location- a short walk to Istikal street. I would recommend staying here. It's great value!
Really nice place, cozy and tidy. Volkan was really helpfull and very nice!

Volkan is a careful host,although i changed my mind and i moved.He wasnt enthusiastic but...For couples its ok..For lonely person not so good....its 15 min.to taksim square with a quick walk...all over are strange people after eight p.m..But Volkans ap.has everything u need...but if u want smtg u need to ask....He takes care a lot...when u have a problem write him he will help for sure...The accomodation is exactly the same as on the (Website hidden by Airbnb) its nice to see that the reality=photo,coz here in Turkey its rarely to see the same as u choose....In general im satisfied....

Thanks a lot for an awesome stay Volkan! Great apartment! Awesome shower! ! Great location! Everything was easy to get to and Volkan was an extremely helpful and an attentive host...Responded immediately to my messages and made me feel very welcome. All the best man!

Volkan was a great host. Very accommodating, genial, very easy to communicate with (both upon the time of the booking and during the duration of our stay), clearly loves the Istanbul culture and can give good suggestions on how to go about the trip.  

The flat was as advertised. Clean, amenities all working, wifi was good, sheets, towels and extras were provided. Volkan was also nice enough to take care of our laundry.  I travelled with my family (dad and sister) and found the flat to be very comfortable to fit us all. Bathroom may be a bit small but it's easy to get over that with the space we got anyway. 

The neighborhood is a bit raw and hilly (steep in some parts - so get a good cab if traveling with heavy luggages) but very very near the Istiklal Caddesi which is basically one of the major veins of Istanbul. So that's a plus. Very near the flat also are small restaurants serving good and inexpensive local food and minimarts for basic needs. 

Istanbul is a great city with nice people and amazing food. Volkan provided us a good flat to rest ourselves after a day of walking the city. Would recommend.

Volkan met my girlfriend and I at the apartment even after our last minute booking. He was extremely helpful in getting us settled in and teaching us how to turn on the apartment's radiators. The place itself was very clean, the bed was comfortable and the high pressure hot shower was a godsend. 

Thanks so much for the great stay, Volkan! We will definitely come back if we're ever in Istanbul.

The apartment is well located, nice and very confortable even when it's freezen outside. Volkan is a very good host because he gave to us some maps and an historical guide to discover the city and he is also permissive about late check out .

Everything was really nice. The apartment was very warm despite the city being covered in snow. Very close to lots of cool places. Volkan is very nice and available for any questions or problems. Overall a great experience :D
Amazing little apartment. Perfect location to get around. Volkan was super flexible which we appreciated. Stay here!

We had a great time at Istanbul! Volkan was very helpful and showed us the way around the apartment. The location is great. Quiet but near everything you want to see or do. The apartment looks like the pictures. We had a great weekend!

La experiencia en el apartamento de volean fue genial. Es un lugar muy céntrico muy cerca caminando de la Calle Istiklal y de Taksim. El lugar está ordenado. Volean es un excelente anfitrión y al comunicación con él es muy fácil y fluida desde el inicio. Gracias por tu colaboración y ayuda.
Nice and clean place, not far from anywhere we wanted to be. Volkan was great with getting in touch when we needed him. Overall a good experience in Istanbul.
Accommodation match the photos. The apartment is in the historic district. Near the main street of Istanbul (Istiklal). Good combination of price and quality. There is air conditioning.

Volkan was there to meet me at the building and was very welcome.  Before, during and after stay, he was always quickly available to answer any questions I threw at him.  The apartment was basic and located in a working class family neighborhood, but I always felt safe.  It has two rooms separated by a hallway and a bathroom.  It's a youth hostel version of an AirBnB, but everything you need is there.  Great deal!

Volkan is a great host. Our flight was delayed and we ended up reaching his place only at 1AM and Volkan was available to provide our taxi driver with directions as well as welcome us and show us around the apartment. The apartment itself is perfectly sized for 2. For a group of 4, it may be a little cramped but again it is not too bad. The proximity to Istiklal street makes it a perfect place to spend time in Istanbul. Given a chance, I would definitely stay in Volkan's place.

Great location. Five minutes to Istiklal Street by walking. Restorated old Ottoman appartment. Pretty comfortable matress. Shower is quite good. If you are a tourist couple or a lone ranger, this flat is for you. The guy ‘Yusuf’ was so friendly and helpful.

Отличная, уютная, стильная квартира в старом доме со свежим ремонтом. Звукоизоляция хорошая,  намного лучше, чем в недорогих гостиницах с картонными стенками. Квартал не туристический, здесь живут местные жители, и этим он хорош - низкими ценами и хорошей инфраструктурой. Буквально за углом совсем недорогое кафе (вкусная еда, цены как в столовых), пекарня с вкусняшками, два минимаркета - carrefour и sok.  по выходным через дорогу открывается овощной рынок, где овощи и фрукту можно купить раза в два-три дешевле, чем в в супермаркете (где и так и не очень дорого).

Volkan very nice person. I stay him apartments 2 week very cute and clean flat. Near Taksim istiklal metro station bus station.ıstanbul travel for very nice apartments. Thank you very much Volkan!!! I hope again visit your flat

Спасибо нашим хостам Волкану и Зине за тёплый приём и чудесную квартирку. Их небольшая уютная студия оснащена всем необходимым для длительного проживания ( мы даже расстроились, что у нас было так мало времени) и находится всего в 3х минутах от самой оживленной и колоритной улицы Стамбула - İstiklal!
Good location, main street reachable in a few minutes, everything needed in the flat.

Volkan is great, his apartment is much more beautiful than in the photos, it has style, it is warm and it is in an excellent neighborhood, I would recommend it to anyone who wants to visit the beautiful city of Istanbul. I'll be back very soon. regards

Very cozy and light apartment. Great location, 2 minutes away from Istiklal avenue - the most amazing place to visit in my opinion. 
Volkan is great host, very communicable and response quickly. Thank you so much. Hope to see you again at the same place!!! 
Alina and Aleksey

The host was very hospitable, interested and gave a very quick response to everything. home is comfortable, clean and convenient space. it is very close to omer hayyam bus station and short walking distance to  metro station. Thank you for comfortable stay...
Perfect for a short stay. Volkan's place was clean and close to Taksim square with many restaurants close by.

The location and the apartment itself are just perfect for exploring Istanbul! Everything you need is close by (bars, restaurants, shops etc) but the apartment is still in a quiet area with a local vibe. The apartment is cosy, clean, and has everything you need for preparing breakfast etc. The size is perfect for couples. We really enjoyed our stay there and enjoyed a very warm welcome from Volkan‘s brother. Thank you!

Квартира на третьем этаже (физически четвертый). Но если в Вас весу не 120 кг, как во мне, довольно крутая винтовая лестница не сильно испугает. Интерьер очень приятный, полностью соответствует фотографиям. Особенно понравился деревянный пол, неокрашенный, просто лакированный или пропитанный маслом - приятно ходить босиком. Так как мы были в гостях у Волкана 16 дней, очень выручила стиральная машина (правда все надписи на ней на турецком, но при наличии Wi-Fi - это не составило никаких проблем).  Звукоизоляция отличная.Двери входные надежные, стальные. С балкона можно наблюдать обычную жизнь местных. По воскресеньям овощной рынок с утра и до восьми вечера. Автобусная остановка в 5 минутах ходьбы. До Таксима - макс. 10 минут. Рекомендую - для двух человек  и цена и качество - самое то!
The appartement was clean and in a quiet area. We enjoyed our stay. Volkan and his brother are very nice people. You can get easily to the Taksim square or to the metro station. Very nice !

Its a nice condo good for 2 persons. The location was perfect as expected, Taskim square, Istiklal street, grocery story, Tram station, all are at walkable distance. It takes around 10 to 15 minutes to reach Tram station. Overall, its worth staying here.

Great little flat in a great location. You can walk to most major sites if you want to; and if not—multiple local transportation options are very close by. Plenty of local amenities available in the neighborhood, and on Sunday there is a street bazaar that begins on the cross street opposite the apartment with a wonderful selection of fresh produce, fruit, nuts and more. And Volkan is very quick to respond to any communication.

Отличное расположение квартиры, тихий район, несколько кафе где можно позавтракать. В 10 минутах ходьбы центральная улица Истикляль, 15 мин до Галатской башни. Удобное расположение к общественному транспорту - автобусы, фуникулер, метро. В квартире чистота и есть все для длительного проживания - холодильник, плита, посуда, посудомойка, фен, хорошая звукоизоляция. Отзывчивый и доброжелательный хозяин.

Excellent location very close to Istiklal Caddesi, the main shopping street, but in a quiet neighborhood. The apartment has all the necessities, new and clean! Volkan was quick and clear in the check in, great host!
Se puede llegar fácil a muchos lugares y hay muchos otros para comer cerca
Very good location in center
It was very nice and cozy place, close to main street (Istiklal) and Volkan's brother who welcomed us was very nice and helpful, I recommend this place.

Мне понравилось, район такой старинный, дома стоят на горе. Идти приходится или вверх или вниз. Лестница в доме шикарная, винтовая вокруг балки. Свет на ней включается от движения и надо очень быстро взбираться по ней, что бы успеть от одной лампы к другой. Я не успевал, а оказавшись на такой лестнице без света то ещё удовольствие. Сама квартира не большая, но мне самый раз, я жил один. Архитектура дома понравилась, он сам из кирпича с деревянными полами. Вид из окна лучше не смотреть. В пяти минутах пешеходная улица, куча баров, мини рынки. Расположение хорошее.
The apartment is in an old house, bright, clean and stylish. The only thing that was not, it's toiletries, they had to buy yourself. To the main street of Beyoglu 5-10 minute walk.

Спасибо огромное за гостеприимство! Наши ожидания оправдались, все очень чисто и стильно. Хозяин дружелюбный,отвечает мгновенно на все интересующие вопросы. Месторасположение очень удобное, недалеко от площади Таксим, рядом много супермаркетов. Будем рады вернуться.

Небольшая квартирка в старом кирпичном доме на 3-м (почти 4-ом) этаже. Как мы поняли, абсолютно аналогичные квартиры находятся этажами ниже и выше, с небольшой разницей. Только наша квартира была с небольшим открытым балкончиком. 

Прекрасное местоположение, до центральной улицы рукой подать. В воскресенье из окон туалета открывается прекрасный вид на рынок и жизнь турков :))) 

Квартирка показалась нам уже немного потрепанной, было бы замечательно чуть обновить ремонт(покрасить стены, починить смеситель на кухне) и получше убираться (часто натыкались на чужие волосы, пододеяльник был старый и в катышках). 
Но брат Волкана - Атилла извинился за не очень хорошую уборку, сказал, что обычно они сами тщательно чистят квартиру, но в этот раз не смогли, и убирался кто-то другой. И, пожалуй, за такую цену можно простить эти небольшие недостатки. 

Встретил нас Атилла, все объяснил, показал и был всегда на связи. По всем просьбам быстро откликался. За что ему большое спасибо!

name: Lovely house with all services around
summary: We have a nice house on high floors in a compound  with security and supermarkets , koufier , playgrounds and best thing you have the metro bus only one minute walk from the compound.
description: We have a nice house on high floors in a compound  with security and supermarkets , koufier , playgrounds and best thing you have the metro bus only one minute walk from the compound.
house_rules: - Come back home maximum at 12 am  - Extra meals will have extra charges  - Touring guide and trips can planned by the host for extra charge

name: Cozy Flat, São João da Madeira
summary: Um apartamento com quarto de cama de casal, wc’s privativos, sala e cozinha, equipado com tudo que precisa. Uma excelente opção para amantes de caminhadas, cultura e lazer. Se o seu motivo de visita for meramente profissional vai sentir-se em casa. Situa-se junto dos serviços e comércios necessários e a área é servida por transportes públicos.  Para além de São João da Madeira, poderá visitar Santa Maria da Feira e Estarreja em poucos minutos. Localiza-se a cerca de 45 km do Porto e Aveiro.
space: Possibilidade de cama extra para criança ou mais um hóspede.
description: Um apartamento com quarto de cama de casal, wc’s privativos, sala e cozinha, equipado com tudo que precisa. Uma excelente opção para amantes de caminhadas, cultura e lazer. Se o seu motivo de visita for meramente profissional vai sentir-se em casa. Situa-se junto dos serviços e comércios necessários e a área é servida por transportes públicos.  Para além de São João da Madeira, poderá visitar Santa Maria da Feira e Estarreja em poucos minutos. Localiza-se a cerca de 45 km do Porto e Aveiro. Possibilidade de cama extra para criança ou mais um hóspede.

address.street: São João da Madeira, Aveiro, Portugal

reviews.comments: Ubicación perfecta;anfitriona muy atenta; apartamento impecable.repetiremos sin duda
Alojamiento muy bien preparado y Telma ha sido una anfitriona estupenda, atenta y cercana.

L’appartement est très propre, bien agencé avec tout le confort. Telma est très disponible, à l’ecoute et réactive en cas de petit souci. 
Elle nous a également conseillé des visites. 
Merci pour tout.

Apartamento superou nossas expectativas. Excelente!!! Todos os ambientes amplos e confortáveis. A Telma é muito gentil e sempre nos atendeu com rapidez. Apesar de São João da Madeira não ser um destino turístico, a cidade é muito bem estruturada e com fácil acesso para o Porto (40 min), Aveiro, Guimarães, Santa Maria da Feira.

name: No. 1 harbour view new apartment in city centre
summary: Newly decorated apartment in the downtown area, fantastic harbour view, 3 minutes walk to the Causeway Bay subway station, surrounded by a variety of nice local restaurants and shopping malls.
space: The entire apartment is 580sq. ft with a spacious living room, open kitchen with all cooking equipment, both the room and the living room can enjoy fantastic view of the famous Victoria harbor, we have prepared coffee machine and tea set, cable TV and Netflix, Yoga mat, a rich collection of books for you to enjoy your holiday.
description: Newly decorated apartment in the downtown area, fantastic harbour view, 3 minutes walk to the Causeway Bay subway station, surrounded by a variety of nice local restaurants and shopping malls. The entire apartment is 580sq. ft with a spacious living room, open kitchen with all cooking equipment, both the room and the living room can enjoy fantastic view of the famous Victoria harbor, we have prepared coffee machine and tea set, cable TV and Netflix, Yoga mat, a rich collection of books for you to enjoy your holiday.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Great location and the host, Jiahui, is easily reachable on Airbnb app if you need anything!
性价比真的超高 看到的维港夜景也是非常棒的 房东人也是超好的 回复也是很快的 房间装修我非常中意 设施也很好 生活用品什么都有 可以看得出 房东是个非常精致的男人 一直在和朋友感叹 自己活的不如一个男人哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈下次来 还会继续入住 地点也是很棒的 离商场都非常近 可以说是非常完美了!

环境:楼层很高,景色好,超棒的观景体验,海景房,面朝大海春暖花开｡
交通:交通特别便利,离地铁站五分钟,离铜锣湾免税店走路五到十分钟,楼下就是桥底辣蟹和一兰拉面｡
卫生:很干净,和照片一致,四人入住刚刚好｡
服务:房东很热情,提前让我们办理了入住,随时提问都会热情回答,楼下保安叔叔人特好,热情｡
很棒的入住体验,下次接着入住!感谢房东!

name: Surry Hills Gem - Private Bathroom & Bedroom
summary: The room is private, with private bathroom. It is of medium size with two  windows over looking court yard garden. Surry Hills is listed as one of the best suburbs to stay in because of all its amenities. My husband and I are well travelled. We love to meet people and learn a different way of seeing the world, from perspectives different to our own. Looking forward to meeting diverse people from all countries and cultures. We’re LGBTIQ friendly.
space: Your room overlooks a lovely courtyard with potted garden.  A very bright sunny room, which is  cosy & comfortable- even though you are in the inner city it has been said by guests you could be in the country because you can hear the birds and sit inside or out side to view the peaceful garden.  In the house also lives our small Maltese dog who sleeps most of the day. Our house is our home, eclectically decorated, cosy and comfortable. If your preference is for the new, sleek, slick and shiny, we would love to host you but please note our tastes are a little more rustic. There are  places to sit outside of your room. You’re welcome to sit in the kitchen,sunroom or courtyard – these are shared spaces, with us.
description: The room is private, with private bathroom. It is of medium size with two  windows over looking court yard garden. Surry Hills is listed as one of the best suburbs to stay in because of all its amenities. My husband and I are well travelled. We love to meet people and learn a different way of seeing the world, from perspectives different to our own. Looking forward to meeting diverse people from all countries and cultures. We’re LGBTIQ friendly. Your room overlooks a lovely courtyard with potted garden.  A very bright sunny room, which is  cosy & comfortable- even though you are in the inner city it has been said by guests you could be in the country because you can hear the birds and sit inside or out side to view the peaceful garden.  In the house also lives our small Maltese dog who sleeps most of the day. Our house is our home, eclectically decorated, cosy and comfortable. If your preference is for the new, sleek, slick and shiny, we would love to host you but please note our taste
neighborhood_overview: Surry Hills - has been rated as one of the top places to visit in the world it  is a very unique and old suburb full of history. Many events that happen in Sydney are only a short distance away. As are the main Art Galleries, theartes, cinemas, CBD, & the Sydney Opera House. The area is know for its great cafes, bars and restaurants. We are a 7 minute walk from one of Sydney's biggest gay hubs - Oxford Street. The famous Sydney Mardi Gras is an annual event in the first weekend of March, bringing a welcoming and inclusive atmosphere to Surry Hills.
notes: The Room is for one person only-  There is no option for extra guest. No other guests / friends allowed in the house before consulting us.  Definitely No Drugs/No Smoking /No heavy or excess drinking of alcohol. Please do not leave food in your room. The climate in Sydney attracts insects please leave in fridge or kitchen cupboard, please eat in the kitchen, dinning room or garden. Please no washing clothes in bathroom (you can use the laundry for this, happy to provide laundry soap, etc.) Wifi - The house has unlimited down load - We use one of the Major Telecomunications companies in Australia - Some times the wifi is slower when using tablets/ ipads -( not sure why) -  Other parts of the house the wifi works well no problems with speed.
transit: Surry Hills is quite central, and well serviced by public transport. There is a 3 minute walk to busses to the CBD and a 7 minute walk to busses headed for the east (Bondi, Coogee and other famous beaches). We're a 7 minute (downhill) walk from Central station - Sydney's main railway station - for local and long distance trains and buses. Railway Square, just behind Central station is a hub for busses heading for the West - Newtown, etc. You can walk to many attractions on foot, Botanical Gardens, Opera House etc.
access: There is no access to a washing machine or dryer. There is a Laundromat 3 minute walk from our house. You are welcome to use the fridge or kitchen cupboards to store your snacks , takeaway food or drinks. Meals are not provided.  No cooking of your own food available. No facility available to heat up food or prepare food. No microwave in the house. Surry Hills is a hub of café culture, with lots of great restaurants nearby.
interaction: Let us know if you'd like some local knowledge of Surry Hills. This centrally located suburb is well serviced with public transport to some of Sydney's other distinctive neigbourhoods - we'd be happy to advise. There's always something to do in Sydney (hopefully free!) ask us for some ideas.  When you arrive we will greet you and give you your key, and show you around the house. We don't own a car so are unable to pick you up from the airport etc. Though my husband is retired, we are active people, so we are usually in and out of the house all day.
house_rules: - Full Verification required - See air bnb policy for verifications - such as ID -Facial photo as per airbnb policy  - one profile photo that shows your face. This is helpful so I know who to welcome into my home etc - Show a Robust Profile of your self as per air bnb policy - Hobbies etc  Please make sure the doors are locked before leaving and make sure our dog has not been let out. No smoking in the house on the property - or garden or out side the house Meals are not provided - Light - breakfast toast  & tea.  You have use of the kitchen, storage are for your food etc - No cooking or preparation of meals in the Kitchen. You can store your take-away food in the fridge or cupboard - You can eat your take-away food in the Kitchen, dinning area or garden- Please do not eat takeaway food in your bed room. Surry Hills is a hub of café culture, with lots of great restaurants nearby. Less than 5 minutes from our front door –  Please do not leave food in your room. The climate in Sydney att

host.host_about:
Hi there, my husband and I both love traveling, reading, cinema, cooking, gardening and the arts. Above all we enjoy interacting and meeting diverse people from all countries and cultures & seeing the world, from perspectives different to our own. We’re LGBTIQ friendly. We had one of our best holidays on our first Airbnb experience in 2009, since then when we travel we look forward to booking our accomodation on Air bnb. We are now hosts on Air bnb and have enjoyed the social interaction of our guests- this is the most rewarding part of hosting.
Our style of traveling is as close to being a local as possible, usually planing our own itinerary.

reviews.comments:
Frances and Bruno are two very lovely hosts! Their house is a gem in an amazing suburb and the room is clean, big and airy! They respect your privacy but are always up for a chat if you feel like it. I really enjoyed their company and hospitality. And they will do all they can to make your stay the best it can be! 
In Short: Their Airbnb is the place to go if you’re in Sydney!

Frances and Bruno were fabulous hosts. Extremely friendly, kind and accommodating and I definitely plan on staying here again. I enjoyed their lovely character home. The area is also great with some very good places to eat and drink nearby. I found it walkable to a lot of places including the CBD (but I do enjoy walking). However, Frances was very helpful with public transport information had I needed it.

Frances is an exceptional host, she takes great care of her guest, make sure everything is going well and enjoy conversation. She is always helpful if you needed anything. Her house is beautiful with a wonderful garden, very cosy, clean and close to the city (20 min walking distance to Hyde Park) in a  very nice neighborhood with restaurants, galleries and shops. It is a very good spirit house. 
I felt very comfortable and I am very thankful!a

Amazing people! Arrived here fresh off the plane from the U.K, didn’t know anyone or anything about Sydney .... Frances and Bruno went above and beyond helping out and treated me like family. Would recommend to anybody looking for a super friendly place to stay in!
It was truely wonderful to stay at Frances&Brunos. The house is really beautiful and they put a big effort in being the perfect hosts. Would recommend it anytime for a stay in Sydney.
Very nice and sweet people and very helpful. Great location and nice and quiet. Had a cute dog.
Iit wha the best place so far on my  average

There is nothing bad about the place. It is located within walkable distance to the central, with lot of restaurants and cafe nearby, quiet and safe neighbourhood. Also, Bruno and Francis are very helpful on everything like the transport, sightseeing, events in Sydney etc... Especially, I would like to thank for their help on the little excitement I made in the night and last day morning. Definitely, I will stay at their place again :)
It has been my best Airbnb experience ever! Frances and Bruno were so kind and mindful towards me and I really appreciated it to stay at their light fludded house during my time in Sydney!

Frances and Bruno were great host, they worried about all the details and they even prepare a welcome dinner for me. A wonderful detail! The house  is located some blocks from the central station, there are many restaurants and a supermarket near the house. It is easy to go to the most important places by bus. I enjoyed the experience a lot, thank you very much!
It was like my mom's house.

Frances and Bruno went out of their way to make my stay as comfortable as possible. I was made to feel part of the family, and extended my stay twice as it was such a great home to stay in. The home is lovely, in a great location and the service they provide is amazing value for money. I'd definitely recommend to anyone looking for somewhere to stay!
if this place is available -grab it. Francis is a very welcoming host, the location is great , the bed is very comfortable - it's all all you could want in a place to stay. Lovely experience.
X

This is a return visit staying with Frances and Bruno. They are absolutely wonderful hosts in every way. Super considerate and lovely, excellent location, very comfy bed in a lovely clean space and prompt and easy communication. I highly recommend them and will definitely stay here again if I get the opportunity.

It's an amazing place to stay. Frances and Bruno are the best hosts, very genuine people - they gave a lot of tips and made sure that I feel comfortable in all respects. A special thanks for breakfast - simple but delicious. Location is very convenient. I also liked the whole house and the garden - very authentic and clean. A little dog Stephie is adorable and was (unfortunately) almost invisible. Zero disruption.

name: Surfers Farm Shack
summary: This is a small studio on a lush working farm nestled in the country area of Oahu's North Shore.
description: This is a small studio on a lush working farm nestled in the country area of Oahu's North Shore.
house_rules: Please do not wander around the farm. I will gladly give you a tour if you're interested in the fruits and vegetables we grow.

reviews.comments: We loved our stay at Erik's surfer shack. We were the first Airbnb guests to stay there, and we definitely will return. Erik is a seasoned Airbnb host with multiple other places, and his experience shows in the great hospitality. The surfer shack is well decorated, and has everything you need to enjoy a night or a week on the North Shore. It's really conveniently located to Haleiwa, which we loved, and we enjoyed the close restaurants and beaches. There's a small kitchen area with a full size fridge, pans, and dishes, in case you want to cook in house. You can eat inside at the dining table, or outside on the picnic table on the patio that's fenced in for privacy. The queen-size bed is super comfortable - it definitely was better than "shack" might make you think! The outdoor bathroom and shower were charming. There are windows and screens all around the top part of the building, so we could hear the ocean and see the stars at night, without having bugs flying in all over the place. Erik was super friendly and a great host. We loved our stay, and would definitely recommend this place to others!
We enjoyed the privacy and being away from large crowds. There was a nice uncrowded beach nearby. We could hear the ocean at night while falling asleep!
A sweet little place to retreat

The surf shack on the North Shore was an idyllic getaway from the bustle of Waikiki. Our walk to the beach was quick and a trip to the family bakery was the perfect way to start each of our three mornings here. There were a few bugs lurking around, but nothing we didn’t expect! We’ll be longing for the outdoor shower the moment we get back to Seattle.

We had a great time at The Surf Shack! It was adorable and in a great location! The farm was beautiful and the shack had plenty of privacy. Sadly, Erik was out of town and we were not able to tour the farm. Hopefully when we come next we will be able to. The shower and toilet are outside and completely private. It was so refreshing to shower outside and enjoy the warm weather and birds chirping. I recommend staying here to anyone looking for a comfortable, cute, and relaxing place. 
Thanks Erik!

If you want to stay near the north shore this place is awesome. It’s in a great location, secluded but only around 10ish minutes from Haleiwa and not far from the beautiful beaches of the north shore. This place is perfect! We slept great, the bed was super comfortable and the indoor/outdoor shower was my favorite! Would definitely stay here again!

Erik’s place was a true gem - we absolutely loved it! Erik contacted us before arriving so he could be sure the Surfers Shack was clean in time for our arrival as the guests before us requested a late check out, and did a self check in with us over the phone. This Airbnb is in a great neighborhood - an easy walk to the local beach, and a quick drive to many others. Very quiet and convenient. If you’re looking to get away from the hustle and bustle of Honolulu, this is an excellent option. If we find ourselves on Oahu again, we’ll be staying here again! Mahalo, Erik!

This is a great spot for a retreat and an excellent location for exploring the north shore. The surfer farm shack is exactly that: simple with some cool touches, cozy, and on a farm. The neighborhood is nice and quiet and the property affords some nice views of the nearby mountain range. The house itself has a bed, small dining table, outdoor picnic table, refrigerator, basic cooking supplies and dishes, fan, outdoor shower that is well enclosed and private.

This is the perfect spot for people trying to stay somewhere quaint and local to the North Shore. Erik and his family were awesome. They were extremely accommodating, just ask. A perfect place for people who don’t need too much but just want to experience the culture of a humble agricultural style living. We traveled almost everyday, using it as our hub and when we went to Honolulu we couldn’t wait to return to the surfers shack. Minutes walk away from the beach, which is swimmable. Grocery store within a bicycle distance away. We would definitely stay here again if we come back to the Norh Shore. Plus, there’s actually a car rental place in town. Look them up.

A perfect little getaway for people looking to be outside of the hustle and bustle of town. Super cute island feel decor along with private outdoor shower added to the special touches. A block from a nice beach as well. We loved staying here and Erik was a great host! We will be back soon!
perfect beach shack
Loved staying here with my sister!! They made sure we got here safely and knew where to park and all!  Great Hawaiian vibes!

We stayed in Eriks place for 10 nights and i would recommend it to everyone! You get the real feeling of north shore and its very down to earth and away from busy streets. The shack was super  cosy and has everything you need!
This place was close to the beaches and some great hiking. It was peaceful and private. I would recommend staying here and would come back to stay again whenever I am in the area again.

Great place to unwind from the hectic modern world and to explore Oahu’s North Shore and beyond. Unique accommodation with a kitchen / outside bathroom on a Working Farm. No TV but good wifi which allows you to connect with the world.
Erik was a great host! He was easy to communicate with, helped us with tips and even took us out for surf & sup lessons! I highly recommend staying here!
Perfect and remote little shack with everything you need!
A good travel in surfers farm shak
The surf shack was a great place to stay and Erik was a super and friendly host. Recommended!

THIS PLACE IS SO PEACEFUL!    Minutes from Haleiwa and Waialua but separate enough for "country life" peace and quiet. The bungalow made you feel cozy and cared for without all the hustle and bustle of others being around. The outdoor shower is a dream! Such peace giving and such calmness.   We will be back! It was just so magical!

This space was exactly what we needed for our North Shore adventure. The shack was only a 5-10 minute walk from the beach and only 25 minute drive to our absolute favorite north shore town on the island, Haleiwa. We were also a super close drive to all the big wave beaches hosting the Vans Triple Crown.  You could hear the waves crashing at night and it was absolutely magical.  My favorite part of the shack was the simplicity of it and all the bright colors decorating the space.  They even had a tiny tabletop Christmas tree that really made it that much better.  Thank you so much to Erik and his family for hosting us.  We couldn’t have had a better time.

We had a very pleasant stay at Erik's place. The bungalow is very pretty and well decorated. We really enjoyed the outdoor bathroom. The North Shore is very beautiful and deserved to be discovered! We highly recommend this location to all travellers traveling to Oahu.

Our stay at the Surfers Farm Shack was really great. It‘s a calm and peaceful place with no noize except the shore and some roosters crowing in the morning  Highly recommended for guests who expect the relaxed part of Oahu‘s Northshore! Thanks for this nice experience!

Perfect calm place for two people. Close enough to Haleiwa but even more calm. Love the place and the views. 
Erik is an amazing host; super friendly and caring.
Very nice and cozy space. Very quiet on a farm and close to the beach. Would definitely stay again.
This place is cute. Erik provides a coffee pot, hot plate and blender. Perfect for the island mornings. At night you can hear the crickets and occasional waves. I would stay here again

We stayed 3 nights and we never met Erik. We arrived at the property a bit later than our expected ETA and when we arrived it was unclear what to do, just a sign on the property that said ‘Stop and call Erik for instructions’. Our phones don’t work in Hawaii and we didn’t have access to Internet. We had to drive to find wifi to contact Erik for him to give us instructions to check in. It could have been a lot less hassle, if instructions were clear before we arrived especially for those without a working phone or internet access. We did enjoy the location, away from tourists on the North Shore. Mahalo :)
The place was clean, quiet, and relaxing. Loved being a bit out of town, but walkable to a quiet and beautiful beach. We found great hikes nearby, and slept comfortably in the shack. Thanks Erik!

Great shack on the north shore for chill low key vibez. No TV which is nice just connected to wifi to check the surf report and check the news. Love the blender made smoothies every day for dope! Can't wait to head back aloha

name: WEST COAST
summary: Bel appartement tout confort bénéficiant d'une vue imprenable sur l'océan Atlantique au coeur d'un petit village de pêcheurs, vous pourrez profiter d'un  grand jardin avec piscine, barbecue, accés privatif à la plage.  A 15 minutes de PORTO, 10 minutes de l'aéroport, et 3 km du métro  à proximité d'un centre commercial Outlet.  Toutes  commodités dans le village ; commerces, restaurants, pharmacie, pressing. A disposition de nombreuses informations sur les cites à visiter pour un séjour réussi.

notes: Centre Outlet à 3km, avec accès au métro vers l'aéroport et Porto. A proximité longues promenades sur un chemin côtier .

access: Tout l'appartement est à  votre disposition .
interaction: Disponible pendant votre séjour ou joignable.

reviews.comments:
Logement totalement conforme aux photos de l’annonce.
Très propre, belle vue sur la mer avec un accès à la piscine et à la plage.
Un accueil super, les hôtes sont d’une grande gentillesse.
A recommander.
Very beautiful. Highly recommended, host was lovely and gave complementary drinks and was always ready to help. Pictures don’t do enough justice to how stunning the villa actually is

On a passé une superbe semaine avec ma famille dans l’appartement de Catherine, je vous le recommande c’est un très beau duplex avec une belle décoration qui se trouve face à la mer on peux s’y rendre à pied en 2min et dispose d’une grande piscine! On peux y trouver des bons restaurants à 5min à pied comme Restaurant Caravela, si vous aimez les fruits de mer c’est le top!! On a une super belle vue sur la mer depuis la terrasse du haut et aussi de la salle à mangée c’est magnifique On de voir les couchés de soleil le soir. Rien à dire sur l’accueil de Catherine qui a été très gentille avec nous et facile à joindre si on avais besoin d’aide ou questions. Merci encore !!
Un accueil remarquable. Une vue splendide sur la mer. Tout est réuni pour passer d excellentes vacances. Je recommande fortement
Le duplex de Catherine est très bien situé et parfaitement équipé. Rien ne manque et on se sent comme chez soi, grâce à la décoration raffinée et un accueil des plus chaleureux !

Appartement idéalement situé,bien équipé et très propre
Propriétaire très accueillante. 
Accès et vue sur la mer idéale,je recommande fortement.

Appartement très cocooning et très fonctionnel. La vue depuis l'appartement est juste magnifique. De plus l'accessibilité a la piscine , a la plage ainsi qu'à des petits commerces et restaurants est très agréable. Catherine sera au petits soins avec vous avec ses nombreux conseils de visites ...

super leuke vrouw die je geweldig ontvangt en een heerlijk appartement heeft.
Waar niks aan ontbreekt . zuiver ,mooi ingericht , prachtig uitzicht .dak terras (Website hidden by Airbnb) knus appartement.mooi zwembad .(er zijn geen ligbedden bij zwembad.)
