Beautiful, stylish apartment with the sea and a pool on your doorstep. Couldn’t get over how gorgeous the views were. Great location. In a lovely little village and very close to the city. We rented a car so getting into the city was quick and easy but the metro was near enough if you didn’t have a car.
Catherine went above and beyond for us as we arrived in quite late at night and she was there to greet us. She even left breakfast things so we had something to eat in the morning. There were lots of guides to sightseeing and information too.
Really fabulous place would definitely go back!
Très bien

Un appartement totalement conforme à la description de l'annonce.
Très bien localisé avec une vue imprenable sur l'océan et ses beautés inhérentes.
L'appartement est décoré avec beaucoup de goût. Il réussi le pari d'être confortable sans sacrifier sa praticité.
Nos hôtes étaient à la fois très avenant et réactifs.
Je recommande vivement cet appartement qui vous ravira sans soucis.

Bien Cordialement

Where can I start; this apartment is really something special. It is so stylish and so nicely designed you don't want to leave. The view from the dinning table is to die for and perfect for sunrises and sunsets. The swimming pool is great and the beach just a few feet away its what holidays are made for. If you walk by the beach there are two other beautiful beaches and lovely café by the cliff. 

Catherine is a very lovely host and answers very quickly. She was kind enough to help me buy a cake for my sister-in-laws birthday while we were staying. She is so kind and always responded to any questions I had regarding parking and check-in and check-out and also recommended local supermarkets, restaurants and things to do. 

We loved our stay and would definitely go back to this place again if I go to Porto again. Thank you for your help Catherine. All the best.

N’hésitez pas, Catherine est adorable, son lieu est super chouette, une vue imprenable sur la mer vous invite au chill. L’accès à la plage est génial, l’appartement est super facile à vivre. Tous les ingrédients sont réunis pour oublier son passé, son futur! Juste là maintenant!! Merci.

name: Modern 5 bed family home, only minutes to Manly
summary: Modern, light filled family home very close to public transport, local shops, cafes and Manly Beach.  Off street parking for 2 cars, fully fenced level backyard. Plenty of room for up to 6 people to enjoy the fabulous Northern Beaches of Sydney.
space: Enter the house on to the main level which consists of 4 bedrooms, family bathroom, eat in kitchen, living room, office / dining room and outdoor covered terrace. The living room has floor to ceiling windows on 3 sides and a vaulted ceiling with designer chandelier. 2 comfortable lounges that can seat 6 comfortably. Wall-mounted flat screen TV with Netflix access and unlimited free WiFi. The kitchen has induction cooktop, electric oven, fridge / freezer with ice maker, dish washer, double sink, toaster and kettle. The kitchen table seats 6. All 4 bedrooms have ceiling fans. There is plenty of storage space for clothes in the wardrobes and drawers. The family bathroom has a rain head shower, bath, storage and underfloor heating. Quality towels, shampoo and conditioner are provided. The outdoor covered terrace also has a table that seats 6. There is also a gas BBQ. Downstairs there is a large rumpus room with sofa and TV area, double bed, bathroom with shower, vanity and toilet, laundry
description: Modern, light filled family home very close to public transport, local shops, cafes and Manly Beach.  Off street parking for 2 cars, fully fenced level backyard. Plenty of room for up to 6 people to enjoy the fabulous Northern Beaches of Sydney. Enter the house on to the main level which consists of 4 bedrooms, family bathroom, eat in kitchen, living room, office / dining room and outdoor covered terrace. The living room has floor to ceiling windows on 3 sides and a vaulted ceiling with designer chandelier. 2 comfortable lounges that can seat 6 comfortably. Wall-mounted flat screen TV with Netflix access and unlimited free WiFi. The kitchen has induction cooktop, electric oven, fridge / freezer with ice maker, dish washer, double sink, toaster and kettle. The kitchen table seats 6. All 4 bedrooms have ceiling fans. There is plenty of storage space for clothes in the wardrobes and drawers. The family bathroom has a rain head shower, bath, storage and underfloor heating. Quality towels,
neighborhood_overview: Seaforth is a village suburb close to Manly and the inner harbour beaches. Manly is only a 10 min drive or short bus ride away. Seaforth village is 5 mins walk and has many cafes, restaurants and local shops. Within 200m of the property you will find a 'Friendly Grocer' convenience store, a great coffee shop and gym.
notes: A tailored welcome basket for breakfast is provided when you arrive as well as a few basics to get you started.
transit: The property has off-street parking for up to 2 cars. Driving to the City takes 30 to 40 minutes. Main bus stops to Manly and the City are only a couple of minutes walk from the property. The ferry from Manly to the City is a trip that has to be experienced.
access: Guests have access to the full house, driveway and garden.
interaction: We won't be here to meet you but we have Jill who will manage our listing on our behalf.  Jill is a Superhost and a local to the area.  She will meet you at the house when you arrive and be on hand should you require anything.

host.host_about: Hi I’m Sue! We’re a family of 5 who love to travel hoping that through Airbnb we can share our beautiful home with others and travel more. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions about our home or where we live.

The location is close to airport(15 mins in car) and 20 min bus to Central Station, so not too bad, value for money. we noticed some bugs and notified Felix to take care of it in future. Also notified of noise making fans (there is no A/C). The bus stop to Central station is just outside apt, so convenient. The Woolworths is also close by, that was helpful to us as well. Not too fancy a place, but good value for money (except for the bugs and dust) for a night or two.
Pretty good house walking distant  to everything
The unit is very comfortable and it seems it has just been renovated. The location is good and also there's a car space to park. The shower is very good and the beds are comfortable.
Great location to get to the city and airport

Great value for money, at a convenient location between the airport and the city. The apartments is clean and recently renovated, it is still missing some homely touches but has everything you need and it was perfect for us to spend the night at before our long haul flight. Small shopping centre with Woolworth and Aldi nearby, and a nice park for kids too which was handy.
Felix’s place was great and family friendly!
Awesome
Great location nearby shopping centre. Clean with basic amenities.
clean, cheap, good house
Cozy accommodation;)Simple!
Outstanding location. So close to the airport and close to the city!  It was exactly what we needed for the night. Felix was great to deal with and had great and easy check in instructions.
Felix's place was cozy and located close to city. Will return again!
性价比很高的住宿,周边道路都可以免费停车,设备齐全,主人很善于沟通,位置比较好找｡没有看到蟑螂｡适合自驾旅行｡
Excellent place to stay to visit Sydney and feel local.
Great host and very helpful. Accomodation very clean and complete. Good place and affordable place to visit
Great place and well recommended.
Great value for money and the location was within walking distance of everything you need
one time place. except few hot water problems
Good location, hard building to identify and once there difficult to locate front door.
This is a well located place with a host who responds quickly and is very helpful. It is clean and spacious with pretty much everything you'd need. Very good value.

Despite some cleanliness issues (dirty stove, bathroom floor needing a clean) myself and the rest of my group had a peaceful stay. There was no noise from the neighbouring apartments and we heard no aircraft noise from our arrival (around 7pm) to our departure the next day (8.30am). We stayed on a Saturday night.

Felix was very prompt in his communication before and during our stay which was appreciated. He sent a text message to check that we were able to check in okay. Felix has detailed instructions including photos on how to find his apartment. I followed them step by step and it was not too difficult to find. When I reported that there were only 2 towels (we were a group of 4) he came over immediately after work to deliver more towels, hanging the bag on the outside door handle so as not to disturb our stay.

I was amused that the bottom 2 thirds of the second bedroom window actually looks INTO someone's garage. 

The kitchen would benefit from more cutlery - there were no teaspoons to make tea/coffee nor enough cutlery for everyone (4 of us) to eat at the same time.

I couldn't find street parking but since I have a smallish car (Astra sedan) I was able to use his garage which is not suitable for medium or large cars (FYI) as it is much narrower than a normal garage. My suggestion is to reverse in as one wall is pretty much just a thin layer of flexible tin and you can squeeze out of your car that way.

Felix is very quick to respond to questions!

Unit is close to local shops, walkable distance!
Very close to public transport!

Loved the mini courtyard in the front!

Gooood

So close to shopping centre / cheap eats and bus route. Clean; secure and would stay again. Thanks for the hospitality.
Not very clean. not the best position. But cheap.

We spent two nights with everything needed in the property. Place is clean no bad smell. We are fine with individual beds, sufficient cookware with salt and pepper seasoning. Wifi worked consistently but no fast at all. Needed to sweep the toilet floor after shower as shower water leaking out on the floor it's slippery. Close to supermarket. Nice neighborhood for help.
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Convenient location where nearby to the grocery store. Suitable for those that prefer to have light cook during the stay.

name: Blue House Apartment 2 • Parking
summary: WHAT YOU MUST KNOW: • Car Parking next to the apartment only for 9€/night (50% cheaper public parks!) • FAST net (100MB) and TV w/ Free NETFLIX • Located in the HEART of Porto next to Clerigos tower! • Great accessibility (metro, bus, tram) • Air conditioning (heat mode) • Luxuriously decorated • High quality isolation! • Hosts ALWAYS available for support ( (Hidden by Airbnb) , iMessage) • Equipped with Self Check-in • Large sofa bed • Included: linens, coffee, hair dryer and more...
space: This apartment is the result of an architect renovation of a historical building. It seeks an harmonious blend of the Porto tradition (such as the wooden floor and window frames) with contemporary architecture. - Luxuriously finished and decorated, this apartment is the right choice for those who value a distinctive experience; - Fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with all the essential amenities; - Amenities include bathroom essentials (shampoo, shower gel, toilet paper, towels, hair dryer, etc.); kitchen essentials (spices, extra virgin olive oil, coffee, tea, complimentary bottle of water, etc.); and others (iron & table, cleaning material, baby crib and high chair upon request, etc.); - Comfortable Pull-out couch that can accommodate 2 extra people; - Amazing view over Cordoaria Garden. Lots of light. - Fast 100MB WiFi and TV with free access to Netflix; - Amazing design and readily available support.
description: WHAT YOU MUST KNOW: • Car Parking next to the apartment only for 9€/night (50% cheaper public parks!) • FAST net (100MB) and TV w/ Free NETFLIX • Located in the HEART of Porto next to Clerigos tower! • Great accessibility (metro, bus, tram) • Air conditioning (heat mode) • Luxuriously decorated • High quality isolation! • Hosts ALWAYS available for support ( (Hidden by Airbnb) , iMessage) • Equipped with Self Check-in • Large sofa bed • Included: linens, coffee, hair dryer and more... This apartment is the result of an architect renovation of a historical building. It seeks an harmonious blend of the Porto tradition (such as the wooden floor and window frames) with contemporary architecture. - Luxuriously finished and decorated, this apartment is the right choice for those who value a distinctive experience; - Fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with all the essential amenities; - Amenities include bathroom essentials (shampoo, shower gel, toilet paper, towels, hair dryer, etc.); kitch
neighborhood_overview: You are in the HEART of Porto city! What's near the apartment: - Restaurants - You're 5 minutes walk away from the very best restaurants in Porto city! And if you're feeling lazy, there are restaurants just next to the building door with amazing local food! - Stores - There are some amazing stores right next to the apartment! - Groceries and bakery - just 5 minutes from the apartment - Bank & ATM - only 5 minutes away - Pharmacy - 5 minutes away - Clerigos Tower - 2 minutes away from the apartment :)
notes: - The best way to get around is by public transportation. Leave the stress of traffic home and enjoy the city by foot! - Beware that there is no elevator in the building. The apartment is on the first floor but it is 2 flights of stairs - The apartment has a water boiler, if you are taking a shower for longer than 20 minutes, the hot water might start cooling down.
transit: - Taxi: There is a taxi stop just in front of the square :) there are multiple cars available almost 24/7; - Bus: There is a bus stop right in front of the entrance and several others surrounding the garden; - Metro: The nearest metro station is "São Bento" 500 meters away; - Tram: There is a Tram stop just next to the building, the station is called "Carmo"; - Parking: One paid parking slot in a garage nearby available for just 9€/night. There are some parking slots surrounding the garden that cost about 14€ a day. There are parking garages available near the apartment; - Boats: By the river you will find a lot of boats that travel up and down all day.  Let us know if you want to take a trip!
access: - Guests have private access to the entire apartment. - There is free and unlimited 100MB internet connection as well as free access to a Netflix account. - The kitchen is fully equipped: necessary cooking ware; initial cooking kit including salt, pepper, extra-virgin olive oil, sugar; tableware including wine glasses, etc. - Other essential amenities: hair dryer, Iron & table, hangers, cleaning material, writing material, etc. - If there is anything important missing let us know and we'll provide it ASAP.
interaction: - We let our guests decide on the level of interaction they wish. - We are always available to help with local suggestions and are happy to meet up with our guests - We are readily available in the most used messaging systems: (Hidden by Airbnb) and iMessage, but also through call, Airbnb chat, email, etc.
house_rules: - Please refrain from making noise between 10PM and 9AM - Please do not smoke. It is strictly forbidden - All guests must check out before 11AM unless agreed otherwise - The apartment was carefully decorated with high end materials, please take good care of it!

host.host_about:
Hi I'm Carolina! I'm a young entrepreneur who loves to travel and to welcome travellers. 
You can trust me to make you enjoy your trip to the fullest and fall in love with the city!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: el piso impecable, la anfitriona amable y muy atenta y detallista. todo perfecto, recomedable 100%. repetiremos

Beautiful, modern, recently renovated apartment that is very centrally located in Porto while not in a noisy neighborhood. When we arrived, we found that there has been a miscommunication with the cleaning company had not come as the last person’s towels/bedding were still there. Even so, it was still prettier than most Airbnbs I’ve stayed in! Carolina was extremely responsive and proactive about getting the cleaning staff there ASAP to resolve the issue. They came while we went out to eat and when we came back the place was immaculate. I write this not to focus on the initial lack of clean sheets but Carolina’s kindness and responsiveness to resolve the issue. We loved the apartment, the bed is very comfortable, it has a great view of the little square next door, and it was well heated during our cold and rainy stay. Carolina is an incredible host, we would love to come back again someday!

El mejor alojamiento de nuestro viaje a Portugal! El piso es bello, la decoración es impecable, la comodidad es inmejorable. La cama era súper cómoda, nos dieron una cuna para el bebé y una silla. También podíamos regular la calefacción del piso, lo que era un plus pues en otros alojamientos de la ciudad estaba fija y con la lluvia hacía bastante frío. La ubicación es fabulosa, frente a un precioso parque, a dos cuadras de la librería Lello y de muchas otras atracciones. Disfrutamos muchísimo nuestra estadía en el piso de Carolina. En particular, ella y Luìs fueron  unos anfitriones inmejorables.  Pendientes de cada detalle, amables y nos dieron recomendaciones sobre dónde ir. Es por personas así que la experiencia de Airbnb es única. Nuestra próxima vez en Porto, será en su departamento sin duda. Totalmente recomendable para pasar unos días maravillosos en una ciudad increíble!
The place was fantastic, and I really love the design. It should be mentioned that their automatic check-in system makes us more comfortable.

Perfect location. Calm and you can reach every place fast. The flat is wonderful. Everything you need is there :) And you will sleep perfect in that cosy bed. AC is also at the flat, so cold nights are no problem. Thanks to Carolina for her help! 5 Stars :)

Emplacement 5/5. 
Le parking est vraiment pas négligeable lorsque vous êtes véhiculé. Donc un service au top. 
L hôte est réactive disponible respectueux et non envahissant. 
Je recommande Porto et le logement.
Amazing flat and perfect location! I really recommend!

+ Nice decoration : Cool scandinavian-style decoration
+ Perfect location  : We can do many things by feet
+ Responsive host : The host replied very fast to my questions.
+ The free coffee :) 
+ Netflix

- Too much outdoor noise: The windows need to be sealed. Mostly every night, party people woke me up.
Great location by a park and restaurants, new apartment, very clean, close indoor parking, and Carolina and Luis communicated extensively. All good.

The apartment is really great, newly equipped, neat and centrally located. All famous spots are reachable just by walking. Although centrally located noise of the city is not hearable. Very important is the provision of a safe parking place close to the apartment.
Carolina was very responsive. Quick check-in and easy car parking (parking cost included).
Highly recommended.

This place is epic! Highly recommend and will stay again! Porto is by far one of the best cities in Portugal! The Airbnb is close to everything and the parking garage is basically under the unit and is extremely convenient.

This is a newly refurbished, very modern apartment in a historical building. The location is wonderful, in a charming neighborhood close to  Porto University, Lello Bookstore, shops, restaurants and night life. Even though there’s a lot of life, the apartment is quite silent and calm. Communication with The host is easy and effective. I had a very nice stay!

Great location 
Walking distance to everything 
Super clean and comfy 
Really efficient check in 
Plus parking :)

Carolina's place is centrally located in Porto and underground parking is a HUGE PLUS! Not having wifi but access to Netflix did help with a rainy night in Porto. 
You can walk to all the major sites in Porto, good restaurants nearby. I would definitely stay here again!

The apartment is in a perfect location in Porto!  Very clean and communication was excellent. Close to many good restaurants. Our favorite was D despenda, at Rue Conde de Vizela, only a short walk from the apartment.   Absolutely fantastic food and service is amazing!  
There is free parking, but would recommend taking a taxi or public transportation to the apartment due to traffic and the difficulty in parking close to the apartment to unload luggage (you need to get into the apartment to get a parking pass) and then finding the correct parking garage is extremely challenging 
..... and we have lived in Europe for 4 years.
All in all a very nice place - very clean & modern, very conveniently located and communication was excellent!   I definitely would stay here again, but not drive and park.

Comfortable and relatively quiet apartment in a convenient location. Check-in was very easy, although be advised that the parking is a bit challenging to find (and use) even with Carolina's very helpful instructions. Unfortunately some spots in the bedroom and bathroom were not as clean as we would expect.

The apartment was fully renovated and perfect. In addition to a very easy check-in, the Location provided quick access to all the major sites Porto has to offer. With a nice touch of provided coffee and water bottles, the very clean environment provided a perfect "home base" to see the city and recover from jetlag.

Excelente opción para conocer casco histórico , cercano a restaurantes , parque y librería lello .
Mobiliario de muy buen gusto y todos el equipamiento de primera , además muy seguro y fácil de acceder para hacer check in .
Sin lugar a dudas recomendadisimo !!

If you want to be in the most gorgeous spot in Porto, book here! Fabulous location, LOVE the interior and a super comfy bed! We spent three nights and just loved every bit of it. We cooked here too and the internet was really fast. Added bonus was the free car park! Highly highly recommended!!

Es un departamento excelente! Muy amplio, cómodo, de primera!!! La ubicación es excelente, la comodidad del parking y ha sido muy fácil arreglar todo con Carolina. Check in y check out super. Gracias! Muy recomendable.

Ha sido una estancia de 10. Desde la reserva hasta la salida. Ante cualquier cosa que surgió durante la estancia, están disponibles a todas horas y responden muy rápido. La ubicación es inmejorable. Apartamento muy bien decorado, limpio y nuevo. Zona tranquila que para nosotros era muy importante ya que viajamos con un bebe. Nos dieron un montón de facilidades: cuna, trona y hasta bañerita para nuestro peque. Tanto para parejas como para familias es un alojamiento de lujo. Gracias Carolina por tu hospitalidad.
Carolina’s home was perfect for anyone. Very clean and extremely central. Carolina was very quick to respond and helped us with all our needs, would definitely recommend!!
Wonderful location, great quick responses. A fantastic host. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Thank you!

Comfortable, spotlessly clean and stylish apartment!  This was our first time using Airbnb and it couldn't have been a better experience.  Our every need was catered for and the location was perfect - within easy walking distance to most of Porto's main attractions - lovely cafes for breakfast around the corner and numerous bars and restaurants on your doorstep.   Loved Porto and this apartment gave us the perfect base - could have stayed for weeks!
Tudo impecável como sempre

Recommended! Clean (looked newly renovated) and comfortable, central location within walking distance from all sights/good cafes and restaurants. Free parking in a garage next to the building. The apartment worked well for 4 persons (2 adults, 2 teenagers), with the kids sleeping in a comfortable sofa bed. Carolina recommended a free walking tour that we took, it was great, just sorry we didn't have time to do the second tour :) 

Would definitely go back!
Un lugar perfecto para tu estancia en Oporto. Buena localización, buena atención y servicios, tanto dentro de casa como por las inmediaciones. Plaza de garaje incluida por si lleváis coche.
100% satisfied

Appartement exceptionnel, moderne, très propre, idéalement situé dans Porto sans aucune nuisance sonore. Literie incroyable ! 
A recommander 100 fois.
Un appartement fonctionnel et bien situé.

Un appartement exceptionnel, nickel, spacieux, confortable, super bien placé et très calme malgré la proximité des lieux touristiques. Il est géré avec sérieux et rigueur. La place du parking souterrain incluse est nécessaire et très pratique, on peut y garer la voiture à quelques mètres de l'appartement. Carolina a été adorable. Nous y retournerons !

Appartement neuf, propre et bien équipé (la climatisation est intéressante en été !), très bien localisé proche de tous les points d'intérêt et de la vie de Porto mais préservé du bruit.
Carolina est très attentionnée pour nous recevoir sans être oppressante.
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Porto grâce notamment à cet appartement.
En complément, ligne direct de bus pour venir de l'aéroport à l'appartement ; très pratique.
Je recommande.
Appartement très bien situé dans le centre historique de Porto. Belle deco design et super équipement. Caroline est très présente même si on l’a pas rencontrée. Je recommande vivement ce logement.

Nous avons séjourné une nuit dans cet appartement avec nos deux enfants qui ont dormi dans le canapé-lit, l’appartement était impeccable, suffisant bien équipé pour un court séjour, emplacement idéal pour visiter Porto, parking très pratique. Literie très confortable.

Great apartment in a great location! The apartment is brand new, well isolated and the facilities are high standard and very well installed. Everything feels very solid/luxurious and is spotless clean. 

Communication with Carolina was perfect as well, as she reply's very quick and clearly. I noticed some people 'complaining' about the space in the parking garage that you can use. In my opinion, this is a perfectly normal parking garage according to European standards and not very hard to manoeuver in at all. Explanation from Carolina of where the parking garage is was very clear as well and the parking garage is quite easy to reach. The traffic situation around the apartment and the garage is not that hectic at all but just like the most other city centers.
great apartment! very clean and well located!! parking is a great plus!

Apartamento bem localizado, bem próximo à Igreja do Carmo e à Torre dos Clérigos, na parte alta da cidade, com várias opções de bares, restaurantes, além de muitos pontos turísticos ao redor.

O local é bem aconchegante, com uma decoração clean e moderna. Mesmo sendo um local de bastante movimento, o isolamento acústico é muito bom, e permite uma noite de sono tranquila.

A comunicação com Carolina foi excelente, sendo ela muito gentil em responder algumas dúvidas que surgiram.  

Fui embora já querendo voltar!
modern and clean. very close to many nice restaurants and bars. very quiet in the evening, you will have a great night sleep

This is such a fantastic, stylish, little apartment right in the centre of Porto.
It is spotlessly clean with everything you need inside.
It’s easy to get to and within walking distance of most of what you need to see in Porto.
The apartment had more than enough room for us and our toddler and it was so nice to come back to after a long day exploring the city.
The WiFi and Netflix were an added bonus...especially with a toddler.
Loved every minute!
Clean, well organized, quiet, great location. Easy to do self check-in and out.

Cet endroit est formidable! Bien vivant, surtout les fins de semaine, sinon, assez tranquille. Sécuritaire même pour personne seule. Assez grand pour 2 amis (es) ou un couple avec enfants, et juste bien pour un couple.

Lit Queen hyper confortable :)

This place is great, neet, well situated, walking distance of lots of interesting attractions. We were sorry we had to leave!! We did not see our host but she was always available by message.

If I can, will be back!

Lovely modern apartment. About 1km walk from St Beneto station.
Excellent bed with X length. Conveniently close to most attraction.
Carolina is a caring and helpfull host
Ik raad deze airbnb zeker aan! Super locatie, uitstekende gastvrijheid en Carolina is perfect bereikbaar. Het appartement was brandschoon, en gezellig ingericht. We hebben er enorm van genoten!
Great location. Easy to follow landmarks ensure that no matter where you were in the city, it is easy to navigate back.
Very comfortable bed!  Perfect location.

name: Hamam in the Apartment,2 minutes to Taksim Square3
summary: The Apartment is located in the  Best Location of Istanbul; Taksim.You will be only 200 meters away from the Taksim Square(Center of Istanbul) and Subway Station. Only two minutes away to Istiklal Street which is the heart of the nightlife and the main street of Istanbul;There are many shops,restaurants and bars furthermore many of them are open for 24 hours The apartment is 2 rooms and 80 m2,It is not a studio or hotel room It is a normal apartment;All rooms are seperated and connect with hall.
space: There is two rooms in the apartment;A living room (35 m2), a bedroom (25 m2), full equiped kitchen,balcony,a corridor and special designed bathroom; it is renovated for the guest like a mini Turkish Bath Style. First The Wifi is very strong and there is router for the apartment,there is heaiting system as a normal (Website hidden by Airbnb) Machine and there is 2 AC in the apartment.  Livng Room: A unit corner sofa,a sofa bunk,a table for dining,a TV with INT Cahnnels,an AC,Chairs,Accessories on wall.  Bedroom: A King Bed,a wardrobe,a table,mirrors,an AC,Lights,Iron,Hair Dryer,Towels,Sheets and Linens.  Kitchen: Electric Cooker,Oven,Toast,Heater,Fridge,Pots,Glasses,Plates and other essentials for cooking...  Bathroom: Specially decorated for the guest;it is like a mini Turkish Bath,if you dont have time to visit a hamam you can have in the apartment! Shampoo,Soaps,Papers and a Hamam pack will be provided My place is located in very good area; After 2 minutes walking You can go to Taksi
description: The Apartment is located in the  Best Location of Istanbul; Taksim.You will be only 200 meters away from the Taksim Square(Center of Istanbul) and Subway Station. Only two minutes away to Istiklal Street which is the heart of the nightlife and the main street of Istanbul;There are many shops,restaurants and bars furthermore many of them are open for 24 hours The apartment is 2 rooms and 80 m2,It is not a studio or hotel room It is a normal apartment;All rooms are seperated and connect with hall. There is two rooms in the apartment;A living room (35 m2), a bedroom (25 m2), full equiped kitchen,balcony,a corridor and special designed bathroom; it is renovated for the guest like a mini Turkish Bath Style. First The Wifi is very strong and there is router for the apartment,there is heaiting system as a normal (Website hidden by Airbnb) Machine and there is 2 AC in the apartment.  Livng Room: A unit corner sofa,a sofa bunk,a table for dining,a TV with INT Cahnnels,an AC,Chairs,Accessories o
neighborhood_overview: You will see all colors of Istanbul while you walk in the area and after that you will feel like a local of Istanbul..
notes: The place is located in valuable area near the hotels and this choice can be a budget staying in Istanbul. The apartment is suitable for 6 people sleeping,there is extra beds and crib for the babies. I everytime work my best about the check in/out time for the guest.Any guest request from me for late check out or early check in who will get positive reply by me if the apartment is available... I can either arrange a transfer to you from the airport to my apartment and you dont need to worry for the transportation or tell the details how you come to apartment by public transportation You can be sure that from beginning to ending of your accommoditions with easy check in/out system and 24 hours care by host...
transit: 3 minutes to Subway 5 minutes to Bus Stop 10 minutes to Tram
access: The Building has an easy check in system which provides to guest 24 hours available check in.There is code for the building door and also there is keybox for the apartment. After you check in the apartment; The apartment will be yours and you can stay in there as your home and if you invite I can be a guest of you:)
interaction: I everytime a message or a calling away from you,I will always reply you whenever need anything...

host.host_about:
-Hi Everyone!
-I am Ismail,I live in Istanbul.
-I was graduated from Istanbul University of Tourism Management
-I want to be a piece of Tourism Sector
-I am open minded 
-I have a relation with my guest as a friend
-I will be honored to host you...

reviews.comments:
Host: Ismail is a very nice person very friendly , helpful host and it was my pleasure to have a new friend like him in Istanbul , he was very caring and made sure we arrived properly . Honestly one of the best host i met in Airbnb .

First of all he was easily reachable through the Airbnb messenger and even via (Hidden by Airbnb) as well whenever i asked him about anything his so gentle with great answers , he was very good to us and gave us instructions how to reach his stay.
We had luggage problem upon arrival but ismail was so kind and he came to the havabus station in Taksim to  help us additional to that  he also gave us so many suggestion about the place to visit where to eat.
In next day ismail did a great job when he made transfer reservation for my mother and sister from Sabhiha airport to his house and he also paid the driver as it was late time to wake up and pay the driver by myself so thanks for being a great host .

Accomodation: 
 The location of apartment is very nice very confortable and well located in the 3rd floor no elevator but easy for climbing , the apartment itself feel like home  , 3min  walk to taksim Metro station  close to lots of great restaurants and cafés  1 min to Istiklal road.it has good wifi and all the necessities including towels and slippers , washing machine ,kitchen utensils etc..
The room was spacious and the living room well organized and decorated just as shown in the photos , the sofa can be sofa bed  and ismail bring a new extra bed for us.it was very clean .
We really enjoyed out stay there and we will stay in his house again if we will visit  Istanbul again .i'd definitely recommended to
Anyone .
Thx a lot ismail for making our stay amazing.

The apartment is superbe well located, 2 minutes from the Taksim square where you could easily take all kinds of public transportation. The area around apartment is also interesting with lot of coffees and shops. Apartment is good and clean, Ismail is very welcoming and he responds quickly to any questions from the guest, he also prepared a small gift on my arrival, thank you very much Ismail and hope to see you again. ;)

We stayed there for 5 days, from the start at the airport till the delights at the apartment Ismail was on top of things, helping us with the transportation, providing tips and maps for Istanbul. He was always there whenever we call or text him. The place was super clean, the checkin and checkout were accurate and he was so helpful on the checkout. For sure will stay there whenever we are in Istanbul again.

we stayed one week in this apartment. The house was clean, fully equipped, and spacious (literally). Ismail was very friendly and helpful every time we needed him. we were able to reach him whenever we wanted to (very responsive). the location is superb, near to the most important points that you might need ( metro, taxi station, grocery shops ...), the place is cozy, and felt like home, one would love to spend time in it. also the internet speed was great.
our trip was really great, and this apartment made it better, because every time we were outside, we were looking forward to go back and lay down on the sofa and enjoy the rest of the day inside.

Ismail kept waiting for us to arrive (we arrived late) and left us a welcome gift also (i loved the coffee much). he arranged for our pick up from the airport and also the day we left.

everything was nearly perfect, we highly recommend the apartment, as we would come back soon.

thank you Ismail.

Ismail's place was great. It looks exactly like the photos, was spacious, kept clean, had a comfortable bed and nice furnishings. I think all homes in Istanbul can get disturbed in the night by the loud Call to Prayer, this woke me up just one night here, it was not as loud as it is at hotels in the area. Ismail himself is a fantastic host and made sure I was happy at all times, even going out of his way to lend me his own HDMI cable so I could use my PlayStation!
Quite appartment in a super location near to Taksim square. Ismail response is fast and professional.

The apartment is big and is well connected to supermarkets public transport and everything you need. It's well equipped and Ismail always answering pretty fast to any question you have. We had a nice stay.

Ismail is very kind and responsible host, he was always on touch and  asked me if i have any questions. The apartment is very clear, it has 2 big rooms, kitchen, 2 balconyes. Metro station Taxim is about 100 m from apartments, very easy go go that. Night time apartments is very silently. I recommend this apartments for all tourists and want to come back myself. Thank you very much, Ismail !
Schöne, große Wohnung. Lage sehr gut. Ismail ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Ist sehr zum Empfehlen.

The apartment is very central it is a few minutes from Taksim square. The Metro is in the near and some supermarkets. The flat is clean and with lovely details. What you see in the pictures is what you get when you arrive. It was easy to feel good in the Apartment because there was everything you needed. Ismail is a great host. He is very helpful and made sure that we was happy all the time. He was there if we needed something and he always contacted us to see how we are doing. 
I was absolutely happy with everything and i can only recommend his Flat. 
Thank you Ismail for everything!
the apartment is perfectly located, clean and with all amenities. Ismail has been very attentive to us and has always been available to help us. I definitely recommend!
Central. Clean. Good location. Good space. No AC in main bedroom.
Her şey istediğimiz gibiydi.

Very nice place in a good location. Ismail is very nice and always replies promptly via (Hidden by Airbnb) .
We stayed with our 1 yr. old daughter and it was no problem.

nice apartment with great location, it is very convenient to go anywhere in Istanbul
We were at a 5 min walking distance from Istiklal Street and Metro.
The flat is exactly like in the photos well equipped, clean and pleasant. Highly recommend this place.

Pros: good connections to everywhere from Taqsim, communication and check in was very smooth and easy, close to shopping stores, restaurants and cafes, the apartment is big enough and can accommodate 5 people.

Cons: the mattress of the double bed is very uncomfortable and bumpy. so we used the bunked beds and it was better. when we were there (September) it was noisy if you opened the windows, since there are constructions in the street.

We enjoyed our stay there and can recommend it.
Our staying was very pleasant, the apartment was the same as shown in the pictures , very clean and everything else were as stated,  Ismail was very helpful and responds immediately

Ismail’s place was lovely. Close to the city center and walking distance from all great neighbourhoods in Istanbul.

Check in was super easy, and Ismail was very helpful whenever we had any questions.

Tidiness of the place can be improved, but this is a very minor hiccup in what was a wonderful stay.

Very cozy apartment,7 mis walks from Taksim Square, metro, food,shopping, airport bus everything. My family had a great stay here.Apartment just look like photos, have enough space to share.
The apartment is on the third floor and no elevator, and supermarket a bit for away. It just like a lot of Istanbul old building does.

I recommend Ismail's apartment to everyone visiting Istanbul! Numerous sightseeing places, historic buildings, restaurants, shops, are located within a few minuets by foot as the apartment is located right in the centre of the city. The apartment it self is exceptionally clean, spacious and had all of the necessary amenities. Finally, in our case, the ability to self check in and self check out was exceptionally convenient.
Apto em excelente localização, bem perto do metro, mercado, cafés, restaurantes, o Ismail foi um excelente anfitrião, sempre que precisamos de seu apoio o mesmo foi muito rápido e acertivo.
Superb location, seven eleven next door, taksim a stone's throw away. Cozy living room. Bedroom and bathroom just fine. Ismail is very caring and extremely likeable host!

In general the apartment worth its value.
Ismail responded very quick to any requests.
Internet was very poor during our stay, Ismail tried to solve the issue, but unfortunately without success. Hope he will fix the issue.
In the rest we enjoyed the stay.
Thank you!
Very good location, especially good landlord, a pleasant trip.

Parfaitement conforme à l’annonce, très bonne localisation (à 5 minutes à pied de la place Taksim/İstiklal Caddesi), commerce et transport en commun à proximité. Notre séjour c’est très bien passé grâce à Ismail. Je recommande fortement.

Il vero punto di forza di questo appartamento è la posizione, a 200 metri da Piazza Taksim e dalla Metro. Situato in uno stabile decoroso è al terzo piano senza ascensore, ma le scale non sono ripide e strette come spesso succede a Istanbul. L'appartamento è spazioso, pulito e abbastanza luminoso. Il check-in e check-out sono stati facili e velocissimi, completamente self-service con chiavi in safe box. Ismail è stato molto gentile e velocissimo nelle comunicazioni. Assolutamente consigliato!!!
the flat is very close to Taksim Square and public transport. food available all around, small cafes, restaurants, and of course a lot of Turkish classics kebabs and sweets.
It was a beautiful experience and Ismail was very helpful

I would recommend this place without reservation to anyone new to Istanbul as a place in the thick of the action. Istanbul is a city teeming with life and Taksim is at the centre of it all. If you haven't experienced Istanbul before, this is where you need to be. There are convenient transport links to all the touristic sites. This place is very close to the square, but a short downhill walk away from it, which tends to keep the immediate area quieter. Even so, there is a very useful convenience store and food outlet right next door. I slept well in this place but, like all of Taksim, you will fare better if you fit in with the rhythms of this lively city (which I did as a night owl). I would recommend it to almost everyone. By aware that you need to climb a few (~50) stairs. I read the other reviews and generally agree with them, although I personally experienced no internet problems. I never met Ismail, but he kept in regular contact to see that I was managing ok. I left very satisfied. Thanks Ismail.

We had an awesome stay in Ismail’s apt. It is very centrally located, which was a stone’s throw away from Taksim Square. The supermarket is just next door and you can get food easily from 24hr shops at Taksim. Ismail was also quick to response and helped us to store our luggages safely when we were in Cappadocia for a couple of days. Ismail’s apt is definitely a place to stay at when you are in Istanbul!

Good value for money and great location near Taksim. Ismail was very good at replying to all of our messages quickly. However, the place had quite an unpleasant smell on arrival (humid like) which stayed throughout our stay. The apartment street was also on construction (would have been useful to know in advance) which made mobility with bags very difficult.
Great place in a central location. Check-in was fast and easy. Ismail was attentive and was quick to respond.  The apartment is modern and is large.
The house was clean and well-decorated. Ismail was very responsive and attentive. I really enjoyed my stay!

3rd time for me at Ismail's place. That sais it all, I guess. You get: Perfectly located and quiet flat, with living room, kitchen and bathroom with shower. Besides one or two cleanliness issues, absolutely recommendable for a few days stay. Ismail is a great host. Check-in is super simple.
L’appartamento è perfetto. L host preciso e veloce
Buena zona. Cercana al metro. Solo es complicado subir la calle con valijas y no tener ascensor en el edificio.

name: Porto-City Park
summary: Very comfortable apartment in PRIME AREA of town, near to the Beach Foz, Serralves Museum, and Casa da Musica! Comfortably accommodates six people in three bedrooms and has two rooms,one of which has two double sofa.
space: Large, spacious and comfortable.  Lots of sunshine, East and West. Great views! Pet friendly.
description: Very comfortable apartment in PRIME AREA of town, near to the Beach Foz, Serralves Museum, and Casa da Musica! Comfortably accommodates six people in three bedrooms and has two rooms,one of which has two double sofa.  Large, spacious and comfortable.  Lots of sunshine, East and West. Great views! Pet friendly.  Apartment well located with access to public transport.  Area with pharmacy, cafes, bakeries, restaurants, supermarkets, banks, hairdressers, clothing brand, tailor shops, laundry... Very safe area! City Park, Serralves Museum, Beach, Casa da Música and Castelo do Queijo. Bus at the door , 15minutes of downtown.
neighborhood_overview: Apartment well located with access to public transport.  Area with pharmacy, cafes, bakeries, restaurants, supermarkets, banks, hairdressers, clothing brand, tailor shops, laundry... Very safe area! City Park, Serralves Museum, Beach, Casa da Música and Castelo do Queijo.
transit: Bus at the door , 15minutes of downtown.

host.host_about: Gosto do FCP

address.government_area: Aldoar, Foz do Douro e Nevogilde

reviews.comments:
Very welcoming person, and a very nice appartment. 3 real bedrooms, we were here for Primavera Sound so close to the parc.

No problem
Tudo bem com a casa

La casa está muy bien, las habitaciones muy grandes y limpias, salón, comedor, cocina y los baños. Todas las estancias muy luminosas. La cocina muy completa, como la casa en general (sábanas, mantas, toallas...). El anfitrión responde inmediatamente a todas las cuestiones. Es muy fácil de localizar así como aparcar cerca. Muy recomendable.
Very nice Appartement, everything needed was there and Mr. Teodemiro was very kind. Good time in Porto

Appartement grand et lumineux situé à mi chemin de la plage et du centre ville.
Quartier agréable avec tous les commerces à proximité.
Accueil sympathique et chaleureux.

Trop satisfait avec le logement. 
Le propriétaire nous à bien reçu. logement bien situé et confortable.
Un grand merci pour la réception.
A casa era muito acolhedora e o Sr. Teodomiro foi muito prestável. A zona também é de fácil acesso e estacionamento. Recomendado.

O apartamento é espaçoso e muito bem localizado a 15 minutos da praia. O Sr. Teodomiro esteve sempre disponível para esclarecer dúvidas e gostamos muito de o ter como anfitrião. Voltaremos com certeza.

Sitio espacioso y bastante cómodo con todas las necesidades básicas, pero si vas en invierno la calefacción es defectuosa porque salta el automático, tampoco tiene ascensor, en cuanto a la ubicación está lejos del centro pero muy bien comunicado con el transporte público

Es una viviendo cómoda, con todo lo necesario para descansar, asearse y cocinar. Tiene tres habitaciones y dos baños. La calefacción nos calentaba la habitación en poco tiempo. La cocina esta muy bien equipada, pudimos hacernos desayunos con tostadora y microondas. Además Teodemiro y su mujer fueron muy amables, nos esperaron hasta las 22,30H sin ningún problema. Está a 17' del centro en coche, nosotros cogíams un uber o taxi (sale a 7-8€) entre 4 personas estaba muy bien. Justo al lado de la casa hay varios sitios donde comer y desayunar y una farmacia. Lo aconsejo sin duda.
Nice flat, we had a lovely stay.

Overall our stay was good.
The issues that we faced were high cleaning fee and it was only once for all our stay of 3 months. Bathroom is 1.5 not 2.
No locks on bathroom or bedroom doors. Lighting switches are old and needs to force to turn on light.
Electricity breaker tripping issue.

Nosotros ni siquiera pasamos la primera noche allí. Cancelamos despues de dos horas de llegar allí, al ver que solo había dos radiadores de aceite viejísimos y un calefactor para calentar una casa heladora, muy vieja y enorme. Al conectar los radiadores saltaba La Luz continuamente. (La hija del anfitrion ya nos dijo donde tendríamos que encender de nuevo si esto pasaba, cosa que en principio era ocasional) pero nada más lejos de la realidad. La Luz saltaba continuamente. A las dos horas llego el anfitrión a "solucionar" el problema trayendo un radiador más y con un técnico de electricidad para dar más potencia y subsanar el problema que ellos ya sabían que tenía la casa. Incluso nos llegaron a sugerir que utilizásemos la chimenea, cosa que no se especifica en el anuncio, para lo que habían dejado 4 palos para 5 (Website hidden by Airbnb) casa no está acondicionada para el invierno y la tarea de ducharse 5 personas con un calentador eléctrico si salta La Luz cada 5 minutos es imposible. Cancelamos la reserva y le solicitamos un reembolso al anfitrión en persona, y se marchó dejándonos con la palabra en la boca. Lo hicimos formalmente a través de la plataforma airbnb y se negó también. Nada recomendable. Nos hemos tenido que ir a un hotel ocasionándonos gastos no previstos, solo por estar calientes y podernos duchar. Una vergüenza.
Nice apartment, but quite chilly at night

Una casa amplia y muy acogedora. En una zona muy tranquila y próxima a la playa. Para nostros que íbamos al Nos Primavera la ubicación excelente con una parada del bus a escasos metros que nos dejaba directamente en el festival.

name: Bright and well located apartment
summary: Big double living room with a balcony that provides amazing light during the day. You'll have access to the master bedroom and the whole apartment with the exception of the spare room, which is my roommates. There is also a beautiful pup that you are welcome to love while you are here. Located in an amazing area, 15 minutes from the center of downtown. Right on Sherbrooke so plenty of shops and cafes around.

name: Apartment right next to Mongkok MTR@city centre
summary: The apartment is located in the very centre of Hong Kong.  The apartment building is right next to Mongkok metro station (as the pictures shown, literally less than 10 seconds of walking) Transportation is extremely convenient, only 12 mins to the CBD (Central), 10 mins to Admiralty, 38 mins to the Airport. The studio (160sqf) is well equipped with everything you need, a king-size bed, linens and towels, a kitchen, a bathroom, air conditioning, amenities, etc.
space: The apartment is very clean and well maintained, I only rent it out when I'm on vacations. Check-in & out are flexible, could be anytime that convenient you the most.
description: The apartment is located in the very centre of Hong Kong.  The apartment building is right next to Mongkok metro station (as the pictures shown, literally less than 10 seconds of walking) Transportation is extremely convenient, only 12 mins to the CBD (Central), 10 mins to Admiralty, 38 mins to the Airport. The studio (160sqf) is well equipped with everything you need, a king-size bed, linens and towels, a kitchen, a bathroom, air conditioning, amenities, etc. The apartment is very clean and well maintained, I only rent it out when I'm on vacations. Check-in & out are flexible, could be anytime that convenient you the most. I'm happy to help with anything:) Mong Kok is the most local and busiest spot of Hong Kong, most shops and restaurants are open until midnight. You can experience the best local food here. The transportations are extremely convenient and close to everywhere, perfect for tourists for your tight schedule. My apartment is literally 10 SECONDS away from the metro statio
neighborhood_overview: Mong Kok is the most local and busiest spot of Hong Kong, most shops and restaurants are open until midnight. You can experience the best local food here. The transportations are extremely convenient and close to everywhere, perfect for tourists for your tight schedule.
transit: My apartment is literally 10 SECONDS away from the metro station.  The exit is right next to the apartment building.  10 minutes away from the CBD by metro.  Overall it is a very convenient spot where you can easily access anywhere you like.
interaction: I'm happy to help with anything:)

reviews.comments: This studio is fit for 2 people. But i think it can live one more person.  Hahaha~This is a sweet lovely studio. It gave me feel like i am still at home. It’s very close to the subway and the mall. There are many places to eat and shopping nearby. By the way Mavis is a very good landlord. Received her little present when i was check in. When i check out i gave her a little surprise:)
good

Location is good, right around Mongkok Metro Station C2. There is security in the building, so it’s quite safe even if you want to hang out late.

The apartment is small but cozy. It’s decorated with love. Recommended for solo female travellers. :)

Mavis is easy to contact and provided detailed info, so no problem for me to get in and stay in the apartment. :)
位置好,房间干净,设施齐全｡
nice trip. It’s so kind of Mavis to tell me everything about the house in detail before we check in.
great!tidy! Near the station!
非常非常好的房子 很干净很整洁 位置很好找就在旺角地铁口旁边 房东姐姐很贴心给我们发送了照片方便我们找到位置 还分享了零食与饮料 房子很干净也很漂亮 性价比很高 这次旅行非常愉快 谢谢Mavis
很棒~位置很好就在地铁口边上,朗豪坊对面｡逛街吃东西都很方便~房间也很棒的~
房東Mavis人很nice,房間好溫馨,乾淨,企理｡一入門就聞到香薰味,瞬間想撲入床度訓覺 ,有賓至如歸既feel,而且房東會考慮到你既出行需求,自行選擇入住時間｡整體黎講,十分滿意｡

寻找了很久在airbnb上,一次偶然机会跳出来~地理位置超棒,斜对面就是朗豪坊,出地铁口1min到家~小姐姐会很贴心的提供门头照片还有留了小礼物给我们,很细心哒~
墙推哟~

Thank you Mavis for being such generous host , friendly and kind .. the check in and out time is flexible ,also mavis she allow me to check out late without any charges or penalty.. the most highlight part throughout my stayed was the location which is the mtr station just right outside . Overall everything is good .
It was a great trip and a nice and clean place to stay. Thumps up!! Mavis is a very helpfull host an provided us with lots of infos for hk.

name: Porto Views and Wines III by Porto City Hosts
summary: This perfectly renovated apartment in an old part of town has a perfect location for anything you want to do. From walking down to the river, or making a bicycle tour, doing a river cruise, a wine tasting or just watching the marvellous river scene and the Ribeira. Free wifi, air-conditioned and a balcony with river view. Towels and bed linen are provided for your stay. A truly amazing experience, you will remember forever!
space: Within a fully renewed apartment building, this is a 3rd floor apartment. With great sun exposure, this studio is a cozy space, with all you can expect: air conditioned, a balcony were you can smoke, a fully functional kitchenette, a very comfortable bed, a flat TV with cable international channels and a small workspace. The kitchen is equipped with everything necessary, from a coffee machine, water kettle, microwave, toaster, oven and stove top, all utensils necessary for a home cooked meal can be found like pots and pans, cutlery and crockery. In this apartment, you can enjoy the beautiful balcony. This fantastic location allows a quick access on foot to all the wine experience, the Douro, the main touristic spots in Porto, like the iconic Palácio da Bolsa, Lello Bookshop, the Clérigos Tower and the Ribeira.

neighborhood_overview: In the Porto wine spot, Gaia wine cellars, you will feel like a real Porto citizen, feeling the Douro river, and the secular art of producing Porto wine. Very pleasant neighborhood were all the Porto wineries are, with shops, a variety of typical restaurants and river terrace were you can profit the Portuguese sun while flavoring a Porto wine or a meal, embraced by the Douro hillside.
notes: Please note that the tourist tax is payable on the accommodation. From 1 April to 30 September - 2 euros per person per night; 1 October to 31 March - 1 euro per person per night (up to 7 nights). Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment, only on the balcony; Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors when leaving the apartment; Respect the hours of silence, avoiding noise after 10 pm; Put garbage in the public container daily to avoid unpleasant odors in the apartment; If you notice any abnormality in the apartment, let us know immediately. Enjoy tremendously our city, Porto! The environment and we thank you!
transit: We provide a transport service from the airport to the apartment. Since the apartment is in the historic downtown, this is the best choice.  There is always the metro: From Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport: Subway, line E, to Estadio do Dragao 26 min (15 stops) In Trindade, Subway, line D, to Santo Ovidio 6 min (4 stops) Get out at General Torres and walk about 11 min, 850m to R. Cândido dos Reis 31 Vila Nova de Gaia
access: Guests have access to all the amenities of the apartment.
interaction: One of our welcomers will meet you at the apartment's address at the arrival hour. We will receive you for the check-in and share with you tips, in the first person, by a real Porto citizen, on where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun. The Porto City Hosts team is always available to assist and help you to have a lovely stay.  As by law, your passport or ID card details will be requested during check-in.
house_rules: We would like to inform our guests that we can provide: - Breakfast in the apartment for an additional cost of  8€ - Transfer from/ to the Airport by 25€ (up to 4 people) or 45€ (up to 8 people) - City Tours  - Douro Valley Tours  Property Rules: -Every guest is required to provide a valid credit card number, expiration date and cvc number at the time the reservation is requested. The credit card will be used to guarantee payment for any incidentals or charges not previewed in the reservation -You can drop your luggage at our downtown office, next to Aliados metro station from 9am to 6pm, subject to prior information. -Towels and sheets are included for your stay. The change of towels and sheets is free for bookings of more than 8 per day. -Extra cleaning is available upon prior request, at the rate of cleaning fee. -Toilet amenities will be provided for the first 3 days of the stay. -Extra towels are available on request for an extra fee of 3€ per set of towels per person. -Please als

host.host_about:
Porto City Hosts is a professional tourism management team.
All our collaborators are committed Porto citizens who receive their guests with professional quality and local charm. We make guests feel well accompanied during their stay and we help them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences.
We are also passionate about travel and new places! We like to know new cultures, landscapes, palates and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, to share new sensations with our suggestions, lived in the first person.
There are walks by the sea, or boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river, walks through the old streets of Oporto, also UNESCO site, listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, influence for Harry Potter, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat francesinha and tripas or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the Port wine.

reviews.comments:
Ok
Bom
Bien

Francisco que nos atendió muy amable y hablaba muy bien el español, nos explico todo sobre  Oporto. El alojamiento muy bien situado, muy nuevo y muy limpio. La única pega que puedo ponerle, es que tiene dos servicios de cubiertos platos y tazas, etc,  demasiado escaso si quieres prepararte algo, o cocinar. Pero si repetiría.

Tyago fue la persona que me recibió, es majisimo, habla muy bien español y me recomendó lugares donde comprar, comer y salir. 
La ubicación es genial y está todo insonorizado, si vuelvo a Oporto no dudaría en volver a este apartamento.

De locatie van de BNB is perfect. We hadden prachtig uitzicht en waren binnen tien minuten in het centrum. Verder was het onwijs schoon en zag het er ook leuk/mooi uit. Het appartement is onlangs gerenoveerd en dat is ook goed te zien (zo mooi is het). Ideaal is een eigen keukentje.  Perfect voor twee personen.
Sehr zu empfehlen. Nette und immer hilfsbereite Betreuung. Gerne kommen wir wieder.

I had a great stay at the appartment. Great Location and Everything I needed.
Muito obrigado!
Clean,bright,fabulous location.

Ce studio est fait pour 2 personnes seulement,si vous invitez des amis à boire un verre

 cuillère, Dommage !!!!

We spent a nice time at Porto and were very happy to live in this apartment on the other side of Douro. This side was very nice, a lot of bars and restaurants, and a very spectaculare view of Porto City. Easily to walk over the bridge to Porto City. Tiago from City Hosts was very friendly, thank you!
Good position, overall we were happy but no balcony

Apartamento igual às fotos, pequeno mas acolhedor e moderno, a localização é sem dúvida uma das melhores características, anfitrião bastante simpático e disponibilizam vários utensílios domésticos que dão imenso jeito! A experiência foi muito boa numa cidade fantástica!

Top Unterkunft !!! Sehr sehr sauber und ruhig. Hervorragende Kommunikation. Zimmer früher bezogen Dank Anfrage an den Gastgeber. Tolle Tipps erhalten. Zentrum von Porto entspannt zu Fuß erreichbar. Im ganzen eine echte Empfehlung !!!
Excellent location, beautiful flat, will definitely be back !

reviews.comments:
We stayed in this apartment 2 nights. Location in wanchai is central. Communication with Cherry is perfect. Check in and way descriptions are great. 
With 1400Hk per night we were found the value for money clearly on the low side. Bathroom and toilet area is very small and very simplistic. Photos show a more spacious and brighter apartment.
地点很合适,去哪里都方便,步行到会展只需15分钟左右,地铁站(湾仔)只需5到7分钟,楼下左手边是惠康,右手边是万宁,非常方便,室内环境干净,舒服,性价比很高,晚上不会有杂音!总体来说是很好的体验!

Advantage:Good location; clean apartment;
Disadvantage:No slipper; No laundry detergent ;Only 1 key to customer, it is a little bit inconvenience.
Good location with good communicate responses
地点出行方便,厨房厨具比较不齐全,其他都很好!
和图片描述一致,很容易就找到,房间也很干净｡但房东不会主动联系客人,到了出发那天沟通才收到房子的具体地址,这点不太好｡另外房子没有转换插头,也没有主动讲,要我们问才说要我们提前准备好~希望这一点可以写在房间设施描述里

We had a great stay. We were a group of 1 adult and two toddlers. It was great because it is hard to find apartments that are great value for money when you’re after two separate bedrooms for your kids, and this place worked perfectly. Yosi was the one in contact with us and he was pleasant, respectful and courteous to deal with. He was prompt to help address any issues or questions we had before and also during our stay. I would recommend this place if you’re after a cosy apartment that is close by essential amenities.
Location is very convenient, quiet area, walking 5 minutes to many food area, walking 15 minutes to shopping area... house is clean, but shower is too small and  water pressure too low

Nice Apartment. Clean and comfortable. By the standards of Hong Kong, even spacious. But in fact, it is smaller than it looks on the photo. Will be ok for 3 people. The location is cool, but you can't call it quiet. There is a noisy crossroad next to the mansion. You won’t be able to sleep with the window open. But even with a closed window it is quite noisy in the bedrooms. The house itself is quiet. The apartment has a kitchen with everything you need. There is a TV with one english language channel. The location is very good - there are many restaurants and cafes nearby. I definitely recommend the restaurant La Piola. At the basement floor there is a good Wellcome supermarket and many shops and coffee shops around. I want to say many thanks to the host - she quickly answered all questions, and the chek-in went quickly and smoothly. Two unpleasant moments are the small ants in the kitchen (I advise you to keep all food in the frige) and a very hard bed. In general, I had a pleasant experience of staying at Cherry’s place.
The location of the apartment is really perfect. The owner makes it very easy for arrival and organization. Beds could be tight for a 1,90cm tall guy
交通便利 附近有很多超市 忘記帶的東西下樓就能買到  周圍有很多西餐廳是我很喜歡的感覺  到各大商圈都很方便 出門旅遊特別是出境住在民宿 當地居民的房子裡 是我每個旅程的必備條件 我喜歡融入當地的氣氛  聖誕快樂
Very very good location! Close to basically everything. Cosy place and very central. Communication with Cherry was perfect
除了卫生间小一点外,其它地方都算不错.

The overall place was nice, the neighbourhood is quiet especially at night. The location is close to everything and even have a grocery store right beside the building. The host was also nice and literally a one call away if you have any worries regarding your stay.
公寓位置非常便利,距湾仔地铁站步行5分钟,叮叮车站也就在楼下,去铜锣湾或中环上环每一个地方都十分容易｡楼下有惠康超市,我们每晚返家时都会买一些水果零食回去｡公寓全部房间利用上的话可以住6､7个人,但是个人感觉还是不超过4人会比较舒适｡建议单纯来香港购物的话住港岛这边会比对岸九龙舒心太多了,人少服务好,品牌也很齐全,在港岛住了三天转住尖沙咀对比太强烈了｡
房子干净,设施齐全,位置很好,离湾仔站很近｡
我是帮助我母亲订的房间我本人并没有亲自入住,但我母亲说房间各方面都挺不错的｡感谢房东的帮助!

name: Cosy Private Room in Center
summary: Hey friends ! My place is a 3+1 dublex in the center of Üsküdar. I have a large living room and we eat our food there. There is a balcony on kitchen, and we have a terrace on the second floor. The room for guests has a huge and comfy bed, a wardrobe and quite much privacy. Our guests can use all the common areas -balcony, kitchen, living room-  My place has the best location 2 min to Ferry to Historical Peninsula and European content , 2 min to the subway station and main bus station in center
space: We have a really friendly and cosy atmosphere in the house with our 2 cats :) Apartment is big and we all can have our privacy at the same time. Also we have a nice terrace to hang out and a balcony for smokers. Least but not last,  a welcome glass of Turkish wine to our guesses !
description: Hey friends ! My place is a 3+1 dublex in the center of Üsküdar. I have a large living room and we eat our food there. There is a balcony on kitchen, and we have a terrace on the second floor. The room for guests has a huge and comfy bed, a wardrobe and quite much privacy. Our guests can use all the common areas -balcony, kitchen, living room-  My place has the best location 2 min to Ferry to Historical Peninsula and European content , 2 min to the subway station and main bus station in center We have a really friendly and cosy atmosphere in the house with our 2 cats :) Apartment is big and we all can have our privacy at the same time. Also we have a nice terrace to hang out and a balcony for smokers. Least but not last,  a welcome glass of Turkish wine to our guesses ! I am an urban planner and a citizen here in İStanbul for almost 10 years. I know the city, I can help you to plan your trip, prepare you a map and if you want and if I have time, I would like to be your company at some
neighborhood_overview: Üsküdar is one of the sub-centers of İstanbul, the most traditional one. Here we live so close -2 min walks- to the some important sights like Mihrimah Sultan Camii, Yeni Valide Camii, Şemsi Paşa Camii. Also if you want to see the daily life in İstanbul, you can walk to 'çarşı' to shop and to have your needs in 2 min.
transit: My apartment is litearlly 2 min to ferry and Marmaray-Subway.  By ferry you can go: Historical Peninsula in 15 min Beşiktaş in 7 min Fener-Balat in 30 min By Marmaray and subway you can go: Kadıköy in 10 min. Sirkeci-Eminönü-Historical Peninsula in 4 min. How to get my place from Airports: From Atatürk Airport you take the subway to Yenikapı. From Yenikapı Station, you take the Marmaray to Üsküdar and walk 2 min to the apt. It takes max 45 min.  From Sabiha Gökçen Airport, you take Havaş bus to Kadıköy. From Kadıköy you can take the bus or dolmuş to Üsküdar. Or take a taxi for max 20 TRY. It takes 60-90 min due to the traffic.
interaction: I am an urban planner and a citizen here in İStanbul for almost 10 years. I know the city, I can help you to plan your trip, prepare you a map and if you want and if I have time, I would like to be your company at some point.
house_rules: - Guests can use kitchen and cook but we kindly ask them to do dishes, we dont have the machine. -  - We also wait guests clean bathroom after they use it. -  - We live with 2 cats. So we dont let cats enter the guestroom but if you’re allergic or dont like to stay with them, please consider your booking again. - 23.00-9.00

host.host_about:
Hi there ! I’m a 25 years old urban planner from Istanbul. I live here for 10 years with my 2 cats.
I love to chase events and to write them about my blog. My biggest passion is to listen live music. 
I live 3 minutes to seaside, so I take walks through Bosphorus. To meet new people from all around the world and would love to show you city and take you to my favourite spots if I have time. People say I’m friendly, at least I can say we have a nice and friendly atmosphere at home :) 

I'm also a often-traveller. When I stay in someone's apartment I always try to help and communicate well, so I appriciate if my guests dont be shy and spend time with me. Respect is the key.

reviews.comments:
Thanks for her hospitality. Center located and clean house.
Evin konumu merkezi.  Her şey temizdi. Esra hnm bizi çok sıcak karşıladı, çevrede görülmesi gereken yerler için öneriler verdi. Kendisine konukseverliği için çok teşekkür ederiz.

We were enjoyed to stay in Esra house. The apartment looks nice with a friendly atmosphere inside. The room is clean, cozy, has a big window with a gorgeous view on the city. Esra is very friendly and helpful. He suggested us to see really cool neighborhood near the house. Thanks for staying, we'll come back during our next visit of Istanbul ;)

Me and my Vietnamese girlfriend stayed in Esra's apartment for 2 days. Esra is a kind, friendly and helpful girl. She prepared breakfast us and provided maps and brochures of Istanbul. Also she gave some tips about Istanbul us. The location was great. Marmaray, ferries, bus stations, restaurants and cafes are within walking distance, only 2-5 minutes. Highly recommended!
Amazing, very nice and helpful housekeeper, very comfortable location, clear room

Our time at Esra's house was great! She is an absolutely helpful, lovely, kind and friendly person. She has great tips for the city and will go above and beyond to make you feel at home. The room is spacious, clean and perfect for one or two people. I felt so comfortable and at home at her place. The balcony has such a beautiful view as well.  I recommend Esra's house 100%! I would love to stay here again my next time in Istanbul. Thanks again and again Esra!
Esra was a great host. will recommend and come again. Thanks alot

It was my first experience with Airbnb and it couldn't have been any better! Esra is such a friendly and caring host and the flat is amazing. She even cooked for us, showed us the best spots  and we got to know her lovely friends. The district is really nice because it's not as touristic and you get in touch with many locals. We always felt very safe. I would always recommend her place! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Мне очень понравилось жить у Эсры! расположение отличное, в 2 минутах ходьбы от станции метро и Мармарай,парома,автобусов.Рядом есть все необходимое:Мигрос,магазины кафе,чайные,набережная и т.д
В квартире есть кошки,очень милая комната с удобной кроватью и горой подушек))
Эсра очень отзывчивая и открытая к общению девушка,всегда готовая помочь!рекомендую одиноким девушкам или парам))

Esra has a perfectly centered house, it’s literally 3 mins walk to public translate, the area has everything you need; food places, shopping malls, seaside. 

Host Esra and her cats were so warm, helpful, generous; she were so polite and sweet at the same time.

Room was big enough and clean, bed was comfy. I could use anything i wanted. 
We quickly became friends; she gave me advices for city, we shared food on a sunday morning. Esra’s place was so home-like; i recommend this lovely place

Amazing location, just 3 minutes walk to public transportation. The apartment is clean, comfortable bed. Esra made me feel like i was in my home. 
I will definitely return back to “my home” in  Turkey.
Nice room in a nice house. Esra has been very kind.
Good value of Money and the location is good. For summer season things can improve to have a net on the window to block mosquitoes.

Wow, what unbelievable hospitality! From the moment we booked the room with Esra she was incredibly warm spirited, accomodating and helpful. Esra clearly takes pride in showing her guests exceptional and authentic hospitality and takes real enjoyment from helping her guests get settled in her city. It was more like visiting a friend or relative than a stranger - Esra took us out for coffee, helped us run various errands, recommended restaurants and activities, invited us to meet her friends and much more, all the while making us feel incredibly at home. Thanks so much Esra!

My stay at Esra's was amazing! she's very kind and helpful and the location is really easy to find and it's near the sea and restaurants, you can move by boat or metro. The balcony is a great space to relax and enjoy the view! definitely recommend it :-)

Very good hospitality and nice location. There are many shops where you can get everything you want. Metro station is just 3minutes walk. You can also get ferry to cross the sea near the apartment. Highly recommend
Good location and a comfortable place.

It was my best experience about using Airbnb! Esra and her roommate are the most amazing Turkish girls whose I have ever met :) They were really very friendly  and helped me to make my holidays in Istanbul much better :) By the way the home design was really very nice and cosy. I can for sure recommend this place for everybody :)

Very friendly and kind hearted host. They do things to make you feel at home. And also not boring with unneccessary rules and with disturbing pressure. And they ask you to share things with you which is also so kind. Also they care your personal needs too, once you share with them.
Location is also great. A big market is just next to home and ferries are very close.

name: White Appealing furniture and large room with
summary: Bright, clean and spacious bedroom.
description: Bright, clean and spacious bedroom.

host.host_about:
I am a female residing in Sydney who enjoys traveling, music, culture and language, art, dancing, festivals, food & wine.

I have lived in my neighbourhood for many years and have enjoyed living in Ryde.  The new regional shopping centre offers cinemas, cafes, restaurants, boutiques, food stores, etc., at walking distance.

I am offering a room for those staying in Sydney requiring a clean, pleasant room in a family orientated home style living.  It is a large room with timber floor boards, lots of light and comfortable living area with free WiFi, functional kitchen and bathroom.

The Art Deco character home is conveniently located on bus route and walking distance to the ferry service to Circular Quay or Darling Harbour.  The Ryde Aquatic Centre is about 200 metres away and the regional shopping centre is a short 12 minute walk.

A minimum of one month to long term stay - we will require you to discuss this further.

I hope to be hearing from you soon..

Fica próximo ao clube de regatas do Fluminense e Palácio da Guanabara, além de hospitais e lojas. O local é próximo da Rua das Laranjeiras onde se encontram pontos de ônibus, taxi e comércio do bairro, e a estação de metrô mais próxima (Largo do Machado) está a apenas 3 quadras de distância, uma caminhada de 10 minutos.

host.host_location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
host.host_about:
Sou carioca e profissional de Tecnologia, amante de estudos, viagens e música.

Gosto de receber amigos e tratar bem as pessoas que vem à minha casa, como boa filha de português.

Quero que meus hóspedes se sintam em casa e desfrutem de sua estadia, qualquer que seja o motivo: lazer, negócios, etc.

Sou perfeccionista então sempre aceito críticas e sugestões para melhorar a sua estadia, às quais atenderei com prazer e sempre muita gentileza.

reviews.comments: O imovel é grande: dois quartos, uma sala grande, cozinha e varanda.  Só que parece que Ana so aceita 2 hospedes. Pensei em vir c meus pais e talvez nao seja aprovada. A cozinha é bem completa , com fogao, microondas, geladeira e uma mesinha pequena. O quarto é lindo, os banheiros idem. Amei os detalhes: incenso, quadros....E a energia  é linda. Fiquei 8 dias e me senti bem desde o primeiro.

This is a very small, private space perfect for one or two people in a secluded, residential area. It is a bit far from public transport as the bus stop is a bit of an uphill walk, but very much doable nonetheless! Xiaowen is great at communication and is fast with responses to any messages or inquiries. I loved that I had my own entrance and bathroom as well as a lot of closet space and great, modern aesthetics. My only things to specify are that guests should bring their own bath towels, and when I first booked this space it was listed as a private unit but it is actually on the side of the house and connected to the main house within the room by a locked door — I could easily hear noise from the kitchen during the morning and day, and the family also occasionally will play a piano that is located very close to the door. Other than that everything was very clean and check-in/out was very easy and convenient!
Xiaowen was very prompt with her responses and was very friendly! Would recommend!

Xiaowen's accommodation offers a clean, modern bedroom & adjoining private bathroom. The room size is on the small side, however, there is excellent storage and the quality of the amenity is very good. The bed is really comfy; the complimentary bath products are of good quality; the privacy of the room is excellent and access is easy; and the neighbourhood is very quiet for relaxing, undisturbed sleeping at night. We used this accommodation as a base when visiting family & friends (so we were out most of the day & into the evening) and it served us very well in that context. Good value for money.
