host.host_about: Hi! I'm a 37yr old student working on a Master's in Criminology. I fall asleep on murder mysteries and also a big movie goer. I enjoy a good coffee in the morning and weight lifting is one of my passions. I'm open and honest, always down to get to know someone and have interesting conversations. I'm also a proud guardian of a beautiful boxer-mix pup and a couple kitties. They fill my days with lots of sunshine and I'm sure they will charm you as well!

reviews.comments: Excelente estancia junto con Noemi y sus adorables pets (Dexter, Xena and Finn). Ambiente muy familiar, te hace sentir como en casa!. Noemi, siempre dispuesta a ayudar, te da sugerencias de los lugares mas populares o concurridos en Montreal. Excelente ubicación, a solo unos pasos del metro (5 min), y con muchisimas tiendas alrededor de donde esta ubicado.  Recomiendo este lugar, la compañia y el ambiente!. Asi que no duden en hospedarse aquí :)
great host. the house is close to the subway station.

name: Spacious Flat w/Terrace | Trindade
summary: Live a local's life in the heart of Porto. You’ll find a fresh and bright flat near Trindade and which Free Wifi and a Terrace to provide you a great atmosphere. It’s located near public transports, so you could walk everywhere. It is the best option for couples, individual adventurers and businesses travelers who want to enjoy everything Porto has to offer. I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!
space: You will stay in a fresh and spacious flat with the best location in the city and with modern decoration. You have 1 bed and big sofa-bed to have a great night of sleep, an awesome kitchen to challenge you to cook the best delicacies of the city and a modern living room to have marvellous moments. Also, you have wifi to share all the content and to be attentive to the news of your country. You have a terrace which allow you to delight yourself with the beautiful city of Porto while you drink a glass of wine. Do you have a lot of luggage? Do not worry, you do not need to climb up the stairs, you have a lift to help you. Also, if you arrive earlier you have lockers in Trindade station to keep it.  You are one step away of the metro of Trindade and very close to Aliados and Bolhão. You also have a supermarket just 5 minutes from the apartment for you to grab some food.  The nightlife of Porto is just around the corner for the ones who want to have long nights of diversion.  Grab the oppor
description: Live a local's life in the heart of Porto. You’ll find a fresh and bright flat near Trindade and which Free Wifi and a Terrace to provide you a great atmosphere. It’s located near public transports, so you could walk everywhere. It is the best option for couples, individual adventurers and businesses travelers who want to enjoy everything Porto has to offer. I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever! You will stay in a fresh and spacious flat with the best location in the city and with modern decoration. You have 1 bed and big sofa-bed to have a great night of sleep, an awesome kitchen to challenge you to cook the best delicacies of the city and a modern living room to have marvellous moments. Also, you have wifi to share all the content and to be attentive to the news of your country. You have a terrace which allow you to delight yourself with the beautiful city of Porto while you drink a glass of wine. Do you
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is full of life during the day and it is located near the nightlife of Porto. When you leave the building if you turn to the right, after crossing the garden you will find a super market Pingo Doce. If you go down the street you will see that you are at the Aliados Avenue really quick. To the left you will find yourself in less than 10min at Santa Catarina street.
notes: A late night check-in fee of 15€ will be charged if the check-in happens after midnight. Also, a late check-out fee will be charged if the check-out happens after 11am without any authorization.
transit: You have Trindade Metro Station 2 minutes from the apartment as well as some buses on the same place. If you arrive with a car, the parking spaces in the street are not free and the maximum they take is 2h, you have to put a coin for every 2h. You only pay for the parking between 9 and 19h after that during the night is free as such Saturdays after 13h and Sundays. You will also find a parking lot across the street with the same value as the parking spaces on the street.
access: You have everything at your disposable at the apartment. Everything is there for you to use including kitchen, bathroom and your rooms. As the apartment is located in a building the only thing you have to share is the lift.
interaction: I’ll always be available and will give you the best tips to explore the city and to find hidden gems. I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

host.host_about:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Apartamento excelente, todo reformado, ótima localização, no centro do Porto, dá para conhecer todo o centro a pé, além de estar a poucos metros da estação de metrô Trindade, com ligação para todas as linhas do Porto. Acredito que fomos os primeiros a utilizar o espaço, e sentimos falta de alguns itens, mas assim que solicitamos ao Renato, fomos rapidamente atendidos pelo seu amigo Felipe, que foi super atencioso durante o nosso check-in e nossa estadia.

The flat is spacious, light, and well decorated and thought out. Our host went through the map and provided us with tips on where to go and how to get around. He was polite and very friendly. The flat has great connections; about a 3 minute walk away from Trinidade metro station which is well connected to everywhere in Porto. 10 minute walk to the city centre, and another 10 to the river front. Would definitely come back!

La ubicación del apartamento es muy buena, cerca del centro caminando y fácil aparcar el coche. 
Las fotos son veraces y reflejan perfectamente cómo es el apartamento, limpio y cómodo. Muy bien decorado. 
La única pega es que esta falto de servicios como, menaje de cocina, no había toallas de ducha solo de manos, la nevera olia bastante mal, no hay manteles ni trapos de cocina. 
Tampoco tenia ni gel, ni los básicos de aceite y sal que suele haber en estos apartamentos. 
La comunicación previa a la estancia con Renato fue perfecta en todo momento. Pero necesitamos contactar con él o con la persona que nos atendió a la llegada durante la estancia y fue imposible.
Zeer mooi appartement en goede ligging. Geweldig
Ottimo appartamento, molto vicino alla metro.
Great location and good communication
Nice apartment within walking distance of the beautiful historic centre of Porto. Stylishly decorated and well equipped.
Great location. Really nice apartment. Joana was super helpful with excellent tips for spots to see.

Nous avons passé une très bonne semaine dans l'appartement de Renato à Porto.
Contrairement à ce que peuvent laisser penser les photos, le balcon est suffisamment grand pour y manger ou déjeuner.
L'emplacement est parfait, proche du métro et de petits restaurants que nous connaissions des années précédentes. Environ 20-30 minutes à pied du centre, inutile de prendre le métro et cela permet de découvrir les ruelles de Porto.
ATENÇÃO ao que estiver anunciado!!!

name: Cosy & Sunny Perfect Location
summary: This place exists to give you a relaxing and charming sanctuary in one of Montreal's most sought after neighborhoods.   Few blocks from Plateau, St. Laurent, Place Des Arts, Old Montreal…  Festival areas, museums, major restaurant streets,boutique shopping and Metro station is 5 min away! McGill university is one block away.
space: It's a cute apartment with a bedroom, a kitchen and a bathroom in McGill Neighborhood. The apartment has a balcony . The couch pulls out into a simple/double bed. Linens, towels, pillows, etc. are provided. Feel free to use any ingredients in the cupboards. Despite being small, the kitchen has everything you need for cooking, and if not, we would be happy to provide more. Super close to organic groceries, restaurants, Super market, Starbucks, etc.
description: This place exists to give you a relaxing and charming sanctuary in one of Montreal's most sought after neighborhoods.   Few blocks from Plateau, St. Laurent, Place Des Arts, Old Montreal…  Festival areas, museums, major restaurant streets,boutique shopping and Metro station is 5 min away! McGill university is one block away. It's a cute apartment with a bedroom, a kitchen and a bathroom in McGill Neighborhood. The apartment has a balcony . The couch pulls out into a simple/double bed. Linens, towels, pillows, etc. are provided. Feel free to use any ingredients in the cupboards. Despite being small, the kitchen has everything you need for cooking, and if not, we would be happy to provide more. Super close to organic groceries, restaurants, Super market, Starbucks, etc. Guests have access to the entire apartment. We are always happy to supply recommendations and give ideas of what to do in the neighbourhood. Please feel free to contact us if have any questions~! Lower Plateau/Mcgill Ghet
neighborhood_overview: Lower Plateau/Mcgill Ghetto/Downtown. This is a cute private apartment in Amazing location! Only a few blocks from Plateau, St. Laurent, Mcgill, Place Des Arts, you are within walking distance of some of Montreal's greatest clubs, coffee shops, bars, boutique shopping, festivals… This is a GREAT area for a student! Metro Place Des Arts is 5 minutes away! A perfect spot for people visiting McGill, as it is one block away. Well situated to visit museums, major restaurant streets, and festival areas.
access: Guests have access to the entire apartment.
interaction: We are always happy to supply recommendations and give ideas of what to do in the neighbourhood. Please feel free to contact us if have any questions~!
house_rules: 1. If you notice anything that presents a danger that could result in damage to the location or to any individuals, let us know immediately. Genuinely, your safety is our primary concern. 2. There will be NO extra charges upon your arrival.  3. Please leave the place as you found it. Or better yet, treat it as if you were staying at a dear old aunt's home. An aunt with exceptional taste that is.  4.  Feel free to say hello to my fellow co-owners, but please remember they are unconnected with my Airbnb or Airbnb generally. 5. That being said, accidents do happen, so please, if there ever is a problem just let us know. Most of the time it's not a big deal and, at the very least, we'll be able to start figuring out any logistics before the arrival of the next guests. And that's always a huge help for us. 6. Be considerate of the neighbors - parties or excessive noise are not allowed. 7. Also, obviously, no smoking under any circumstances. And for the record, leaning your head out the wind

host.host_about:
Hi! we are Steph and Camilla, we love to travel and discover other cultures: Thailand, Spain, Sweden... We study in graphic design and we are based in Montreal.
We hope to make your stay as comfortable and welcoming as possible :)

reviews.comments:
Très bon logement idéalement situé au centre ville, près de tout. l'appartement est super, propre.
Je recommande vivement!

The apartment is walking distance from almost everywhere in Mo freak, even in winter we had no problem walking to places like Old Montreal, Mont Royal, and Saint Laurent. I would recommend during the winter months parking in the garage around the corner, it’s about $20 a night. The apartment was neat and clean, and contained basic kitchen and bathroom supplies that made our stay easy. We comfortably fit 3 people in the apartment! Our hosts were great at communication with us, and provided a ton of tips on what to do in Montreal! I would stay here again!

Steph & Camilla's place was super cute and close to main streets. Super close to groceries, transit, SAQ, and Starbucks. Great spot! Would definitely recommend if you're staying in MTL for a couple days.

Came to Montreal for easter weekend and enjoyed staying at this place so much! Since it’s located close to university, area is full of places to chill at. Walking distance from downtown, old town and all other showplaces. Apartment had all basic kitchen and bathroom implements as well as change bedding and a lot of extra towels. Hosts were in touch all the stay time and really flexible and loyal about check in and check out time. Would definitely come back again!
Steph and Camilla offer amazing communication and a great, clean, comfortable place to stay
Amazing stay! Very kind hosts.

Excellente location, quartier calme et à deux pas du centre. Station de métro à quelques minutes et commerces à proximité. L’appartement est lumineux, chaleureux et très bien équipé. Les hôtes sont très réactifs et répondent aux moindres attentes, nous reviendrons !
Great communication and very accommodating. The location is very ideal. My boyfriend and I had a great time.

This place in a great location! Close to transit and in walking distance to downtown and Mont Royal. It was the perfect size apartment. Everything was clean and ready for us. I would want to stay here again next time.

Zentru (Hidden by Airbnb) ahe Lage, nette Einrichtung und sehr sauber. Lediglich baulich etwas sanierungsbedürftig. Problemlose und freundliche Kommunikation mit Steph und Camilla. Parkplätze und Parkhäuser sind in der näheren Umgebung leicht zu finden.

Steph & Camilla's place was a true gem. It had a really convenient location for travelers like myself who want to be close to the bustling city center yet have quiet and peaceful nights. The stylish studio apartment had all the amenities you could ever need, and Steph very generously lent me the laundry card for the washing machines which are located in the basement. It was a very pleasant stay and I would recommend this place to solo travelers/couples!

We have just spent two nights in Steph & Camilla's apartment in Montreal. It is conveniently placed, and close to everything.  We had arrived by train, earlier than the check in time, however, S&C were most accommodating, and the apartment was ready for us when got there, which we really appreciated, as dragging bags around is no fun.   The space was great.  Cosy and comfortable with basic supplies, plus a coffee machine!!  We found some olive oil and balsamic vinegar, which we mixed together in a little bowl in which to dip some crunchy bread, and had with olives and a glass of wine on the sunny balcony..... pure joy, having been on the road for some weeks.....Thank you both for a great stay........we would definitely recommend this place.

Steph & Camilla’s place has a perfect location close to transit, Mont Royal, Old Montreal. A grocery is at 2 minutes by foot so very convenient. 
The place was as expected clean and comfortable with all the basic kitchen stuff plus a coffee maker ;) 
Steph and Camilla were a perfect host. Very good communication, very accommodating with the time for the check in, and always keeping in touch with me before and during my stay to check if I had questions and if everything was okay. 
If I have to come back to Montreal I will definitely come back again here.
Si vous voulez connaitre tout le centre de Montréal restez chez Steph & Camilla. Un trés bon emplacement. MERCI!!!!

Great location to explore the city. Less than five minutes walk from metro. Building is a touch rough around the edges, but the interior of the apartment is nicer. No AC - this is standard in Montreal, but summer nights can be uncomfortable. Overall a good stay.

Beautiful home- exactly how it looks on the pictures, great location- close to downtown, and Steph & Camilla responded to me very quickly and had the best intentions while I was staying in their lovely home.
Great hosts that I would not hesitate to stay with again!  Their place is in a great location, just a couple blocks from the Metro station, which came in very handy.
Fantastic location and amazing apartment, very clean & everything you need is a short walk away!
We had a great time staying at Steph & Camilla's place, and it was exactly what we wanted for our vacation!

Terrific little place for a person traveling for work. Hosts communicate on time and professionally. The interior is well kept. Wifi is strong. If (like me) you like to cook your own meals while you travel, you will find all the amenities you need. Also, terrific restaurants nearby, and a bicycle sharing station is literally next to the building.
Great location.  Clean.  Has a balcony!
We had easy access to the city as a whole and enjoyed our stay. Steph & Camilla’s place was great for a weekend stay in Montreal.
Great location with some street parking not too far off. Building and apartment are older, but very clean. A good value!
Had a great time! Good location. Apartment was as described.

Uns hat es bei Steph und Camilla sehr gefallen, auch wenn wir sie leider nicht persönlich kennenlernen konnten. Es war alles sehr sauber. Equipment fuer das Kochen war alles vorhanden. Wifi war hervorragend. 
Am Anfang der Straße befinden sich rental bikes, Bushaltestelle 2min ums Eck, direkt neben Supermarkt. Metro ist auch zu Fuß super zu erreichen. (4-5min)

Der Aufzug ist etwas in die Jahre gekommen, das hat aber nichts mit der coolen Wohnung zu tun. :)
Würden sofort wieder kommen wollen.
A&T

Steph & Camilla's place is in a great, walkable area of Montreal. The apartment is clean and cozy. The communication was great - Steph always replied to my messages and questions right away...and even assisted me in finding a free parking space just outside of the apartment building when I arrived. I would definitely recommend this place if you're wanting to stay in Montreal for a few nights!
Clean and well located to discover Montreal. very convenient to walk to anywhere and close to the subway as well. Steph was always available when looking for places or suggestions.

Steph & Camilla’s place was quaint and accommodating for what we were looking for. The price was right and the location was perfect. We were able to walk almost everywhere we wanted to go. The hosts were very good about contacting us to make sure we were able to check in smoothly. The only drawback was that we visited during a heat wave and the place, like many in Montreal, did not have air conditioning. The building itself was also older and in need of a little maintenance. Overall we enjoyed our stay! Merci!

Well lit, very clean, adorable apartment. It is simply the PERFECT location. Walkable to Mont-Royal (for hiking, park-sitting/picnics, tam-tams on sundays),  the "city-like" feel of st. catherine and st laurent (lots of cool places to see, shopping, and nightlife!). I love walking and even walked to old-port (ferris wheel, ziplining, ropes course,  and lots of shopping and sightseeing) from the room! I felt very safe in the room! The balcony was a lovely aspect of the apartment.
Close to central Montreal, great for walking places, particularly up Mont Royal. Apartment was as described.
Great location.

Our stay at Steph and Camilla’s was perfect.The space is cute and quiet. Although it’s located in a big apartment building, we never heard any of our neighbors. My friend slept on the sofa bed and found it very comfortable! We had great weather during our trip so we walked everywhere- mile end, Old Montreal, plateau mont Royal were all easily accessible by foot. Alex was also in touch with us to check in and responded immediately to our questions. I would recommend staying at Steph and Camilla’s to anyone visiting Montreal.

Steph and Alex were incredibly accommodating. They greeted me and offered to help me with my luggage down the stairs upon check out (due to a small issue with the elevator) Also, I was traveling alone and felt very safe in this area and in this apartment. 

The location is walkable to most popular spots and the rest of the sites are easily bike-able. 

I really enjoyed my visit and this place was perfect for my quick trip. I would be happy to stay here again.
Really adorable place in a great location. We had a great time!

Nice place, very homey. Good location, and right near McGill.  Parking is tricky in this busy neighborhood.  Apartment was as described. Quite nice but slightly worn at the heels.  It was rather warm when we were there and we did use the fan they provided. But all-in-all we were happy with the accommodations.
Great location, communicative and helpful hosts :)
Looking for a comfortable place in the heart of this city, this is your place. The apartment has all the amenities I needed to enjoy a long weekend in Montreal.
Steph & Camilla's apartment was clean, comfortable and perfectly located. The hosts were very communicative and helpful too. Highly recommended for anyone visiting Montreal!

We had a great time in Montreal. The apartment of Steph and Camilla is well equipped and was clean. The location in the centre of the city was ideal for exploring the city. Rental bikes were right in front of the house and a supermarket around the corner. Only the house is a bit old. The search for a parking space was a bit difficult, because all free spaces were occupied, but a multi-storey car park was close to the apartment, as Steph and Camilla told us. 

Steph and Camilla were very helpful and it was easy to communicate with them.

A cute and stylish place for the money, and in a great location. There were a few infrastructure problems during my stay, but Steph & Camilla were very nice and responsive about it. The bathroom and the building itself could use some upgrades. Overall a good value and nice stay. Thanks!
Good budget option with a few nice extras. Communication was fast and easy and the hosts allowed us to drop our bags off early.
Great little place in an amazing location. Has quite an old school charm to the building. Easy check in and great comms. Would stay there again!

We had a great stay at Steph & Camilla's Airbnb! The communication was super easy, early check in was possible, the location is great and the apartment offers everything that you need for a great time in Montreal! Definitely would come back!
It was a nice apartment, a bit smaller than pictured and the overall building was a bit sketchy and problematic. The hosts answered all questions quickly.

We had such a great stay! The apartment was just as expected. Friendly neighbors too which is always a plus. Amazing location. We drove from NYC and the parking was easily accessible, not expensive (about $17 for 24 hours) and right around the corner — thank you so much to the hosts for sending a drawn out map of how to find the garage!!! AMAZING location of the apartment too. Definitely go to Pullman’s right around the corner if you stay here!!!

Honestly, if you haven’t booked this place already, do it now!!! Wow! We were blown away by the hospitality and cleanliness of their place. They were accommodating with our check in and out times to work with our flights. The apartment was easily accessible AND spotless. I mean seriously spotless. Not a single hair and speck on the floor. No dust. It was the cleanest air bnb I’ve ever stayed in. The location was perfect. Montreal is a super friendly and walkable city. I was communicated with within minutes every time I messaged. The bed is comfortable and living room welcoming. The balcony was a great touch to enjoy coffee in the morning. It’s also super simple to get up to. It’s the 8th floor and there is an elevator for your bags! Walking distance of a mile or so to pretty much everything you have to see. I’m already planning my trip back in the spring! Thank you again!!!!!!
Everything about the apartment was wonderful. We had a great stay!
Good values place in a great neighbourhood! Steph and Camilla were very helpful when I had a slight issue.

Good, economic choice in the neighbourhood. Quiet location and very responsive and helpful hosts. As can be expected in the area, the apartment is dated, however it as well as the furnishings were very clean and well maintained.

I am very pleased with the apartment. Very quiet and easy to find .. Great location in the center of Montreal near Mont Royal, spacious apartment with complete amenities and great communication as well. Highly recommended !Thank you Steph and Camilla !
Bien situé.  Conforme à la description.
Place is in a great location! Central to so many things. The hosts were lovely. Would only warn others that the space is a bit more dated than the photos online make it seem.
Great place to stay, short walking distance to both the metro and shopping locations nearby. Steph & Camilla were great to deal with. Would recommend staying here

Great value , clean nice apartment , exactly as I expected . Checked in late and Steph and Camilla were able to handle that with a lock box no problem . They left chocolates at check in which was a nice touch . Exactly what I expected, would definitely stay again .
Great apartment! Steph & Camilla were wonderful hosts - accommodating and quick to respond. The apartment is in a great location. Highly recommend!

The apartment is in a great location!  It is only a 15 minute walk to everything we wanted to visit. Very thankful that we got to check in early. Steph and Camilla were also very quick to respond and very lovely.

I would recommend staying here 100%. Steph & Camilla are very quick to reply and are very gracious hosts. The place was warm and cozy, very lovely to step into after the freezing weather of Montreal in the winter time.
We had an excellent stay at Steph & Camilla's place! The location was perfect, they were great at communicating, and the apartment had many thoughtful touches!
Easy check in and out. Great location. Easy communication with hosts. Just a pictured.
Great place in the heart of Montreal!
Tout était parfait merci encore ! à bientôt
The location was convenient and the communication was fast. The apartment was clean but since it's an old building, expect the water flow in the bathroom to be slow.
Great location and stay!!
We had a great time, the location was very convenient!

name: A Casa das 3 Marias
summary: The house of 3 Marias is located in a typical and historical area of Porto with amazing views of the 4 bridges and Douro River . It's very well located 8 minutes walk from 24 Agosto metro station and 10-15 minutes from Sta Catarina Street, mercado do bolhão, Ribeira and cais de Gaia, livraria Lello, the Port wine caves and São Bento train station.  It's completely equipped  and carefully decorated. If necessary bicycles are available. Wi fi and international TV channels are also provided.
space: It's a open space, cozy and pleasant house with all the amenities and all facilities to accommodate 3 a 4 persons. It has a cooker, microwave, fridge, coffee machine, hand blender, hair dryer, etc.
description: The house of 3 Marias is located in a typical and historical area of Porto with amazing views of the 4 bridges and Douro River . It's very well located 8 minutes walk from 24 Agosto metro station and 10-15 minutes from Sta Catarina Street, mercado do bolhão, Ribeira and cais de Gaia, livraria Lello, the Port wine caves and São Bento train station.  It's completely equipped  and carefully decorated. If necessary bicycles are available. Wi fi and international TV channels are also provided. It's a open space, cozy and pleasant house with all the amenities and all facilities to accommodate 3 a 4 persons. It has a cooker, microwave, fridge, coffee machine, hand blender, hair dryer, etc. A casa das 3 Marias situa se perto do bairro histórico das Fontaínhas, um autêntico miradouro do Porto : Rio Douro e os barcos rabelos, serra do Pilar e Vila Nova de Gaia, praia fluvial do Areinho, avenida Gustavo Eiffel e 4 das 6 pontes que ligam o Porto a Gaia. É neste local do coração do bairrismo portue
neighborhood_overview: A casa das 3 Marias situa se perto do bairro histórico das Fontaínhas, um autêntico miradouro do Porto : Rio Douro e os barcos rabelos, serra do Pilar e Vila Nova de Gaia, praia fluvial do Areinho, avenida Gustavo Eiffel e 4 das 6 pontes que ligam o Porto a Gaia. É neste local do coração do bairrismo portuense que parte a marcha de São João, a maior festa da cidade do Porto, na noite de 23 de Junho.

host.host_about: Somos enfermeiros e partilhamos o gosto pelas viagens e pelo ar livre. Acreditamos que o contacto com os hóspedes torna a experiência única, tentando ir ao encontro das suas expectativas e objectivos. Ambos naturais dos arredores do Porto pretendemos que fiquem encantados com a nossa cidade tal como nós.

reviews.comments: We enjoyed our time in Porto. Helia and José are really kind and helpful. José even picked us up at the metro station. The airbnb is near the city center. So it was easy and fast to get to the famous buildings in Porto. Thank you Helia and José.
Absolutely lovely
Helia y José han sido encantadores, repetiría sin pensarlo!

We were at casa Helia and Jose only one day but it was very happy day! Flat very clean, tidy, cozy! The hosts are very cute! They told us about the main attractions and helped them find them on the map, because we were in Porto for the first time! 
Everything turned out better than expected! Thank you so much! We think we'll come back) But more than one day)

Hélia is a very good host and her flat is really cosy and at a good location!
Probably one of the best place to sleep for visited Porto!
Hélia and José are very hospitable, apartment is good, you can checkout at any time.

This a tiny house in a protected area in Porto so it’s like being in a time capsule when walking through the neighborhood. We arrived late and Jose patiently waited for us, giving us tips and a little bit of fun facts about Porto which made our stay more interesting. What we liked best  are the personal touches. Helia and Jose left us a few presents (some local biscuits, Oreo, apples) which we had for breakfast the next day. If you arrived late at night, the least thing you want to do is get up early and look for breakfast.  Totally recommended if you don’t mind walking in cobbled streets with luggages! Oh and did I say there’s a view of the river and the bridges just outside the house?!

The host was amazing, she was very kind and made a perfect check-in explaining me everithing about the apartment and the city. her suggestions were great, from sightseeing to places to eat. the apartement is perfectly located, in 10 minutes walking you can reach the very city center. the neighborhood is really quiet and the area makes you fell really safe.

Apartamento muy pequeño, bonita decoración, tiene un problema importante:

Esta ubicado en un barrio peligroso, por la noche no es agradable porque te encuentras gente en estado de embriaguez y bajo los efectos de otras drogas, resultando muy desagradable esta situación y muy poco seguro.

Jose en un anfitrión inmejorable, nos vino a buscar a la estación y nos hizo varias recomendaciones sobre restaurantes, sitios que visitar que fueron de gran utilidad.

Jose is an incredible host, him and his wife gave us all what we need to feel like a real local. He spent almost 20 30 minutes to gave us best advices of the city, not just turistic things. He did also an extra for us, because he printed our train ticket.  We will always rember this kindness, just a word:great!
Muito agradável a estadia, José ajudou muito em todo o período!
Exelente local para visitar o Porto

name: Cosy room with stunning views
summary: Hey there, I’ve got a spare room in my small but cosy apartment in the heart of Glebe. It’s got amazing views overlooking Wentworth Park, and it’s close to the city, abundance of cafes, restaurants and pubs along Glebe point road.
space: Your room is fully furnished. It has a built in wardrobe, ceiling fans, and magnificent views looking over Wentworth Park and Anzac Bridge! The building itself looks old, but our apartment is newly renovated with a stylish kitchen, shared bathroom, washing machine and dryer, and private balcony. We have street parking if you drive, and motorcycle parking is free on-site under covered.
description: Hey there, I’ve got a spare room in my small but cosy apartment in the heart of Glebe. It’s got amazing views overlooking Wentworth Park, and it’s close to the city, abundance of cafes, restaurants and pubs along Glebe point road. Your room is fully furnished. It has a built in wardrobe, ceiling fans, and magnificent views looking over Wentworth Park and Anzac Bridge! The building itself looks old, but our apartment is newly renovated with a stylish kitchen, shared bathroom, washing machine and dryer, and private balcony. We have street parking if you drive, and motorcycle parking is free on-site under covered. Feel free to use the kitchen to cook, and laundry to do any washing. I'm super friendly, and happy to socialise as much or as little during your stay.

This apartment has so much potential but as it is now just didn’t work for us. We visited during a time where the weather was 90F degrees and the “air conditioning” isn’t air conditioning at all. It is a standing unit where you must keep the sliding door open 8-10 inches all day/night if you want to use it, thus defeating the purpose and letting all the hot air in. It made the loft unbearable. So much so that we had to sleep downstairs on the couch and air mattress. The bathroom was nice and it has a full kitchen and washer. Those are the nice things I can say. Check in was easy and he accommodated us early which we appreciated. David (who we were in contact with) did try to help us but there were just too many problems. The WiFi worked 20% of the time we were present - he blamed it on us using too much bandwidth - we were simply trying to connect an iPhone to the internet and to text - not stream movies or download anything. The beds were uncomfortable but the place would be a good value if the WiFi worked and if it had actual air conditioning as advertised and how the pictures lead you to believe. Because we had to keep the door open (security risk) so many bugs, spiders, etc. came in too. Also the smoke detectors are covered in aluminum foil which is a safety risk. I would not recommend this Airbnb to anyone at its present state but it could be great for the cost and for bigger groups as it sleeps 5-6 somewhat comfortably. Our stay, however, was not pleasant at all and we could not wait to leave.

I had stayed at this place for three weeks for work. This is a great place to stay short term. David and Jason are very responsive and make checking in and checking out easy. However, I would not recommend staying here long term during the summer. There is not a fully installed aircon- it is a portable fan/aircon which doesn't really cool the place too well, especially on the warmer days. Jason did purchase and install two fans for me during my stay though, which I greatly appreciated.
Also, the shower head does not really work and sprays out minimal water. Otherwise this is a good  place to stay at during the winter or cooler days for a weekend. The place is nicely decorated and comfortable and is in a great location.
all as described

Great place in a perfect location. Exactly as described. Spacious and cute decor. Would recommend staying here. Just two things that were not perfect: The wifi was too slow to use and the aircon unit is a big mobile unit but requires the window to be open which on a hot day does not quite work. Other than that a beautiful apartment to explore Sydney.
My experience was not entirely pleasant, booked the room but did not stay due to uncleanliness upon arrival.

When we originally saw this place listed, we instantly thought it looked, new, clean and very stylish and we were quite excited to spend our 5 days in Sydney here with our baby. Unfortunately this excitement dwindled on a daily basis. Our initial check in was great and David was most accommodating of us needing to check in earlier than 3pm, which was great. When we arrived, the place was very warm, we saw the air con wasn't actually a proper air con unit, but a mobile one sticking out of the patio doors side window. It appeared quite old as well and did not pump much cool air  further than 2 or 3 metres, so it's understandable why it was warm. There are two fans to help, one downstairs and one in the main bedroom upstairs. I think it should be made clear in regards to this in the listing., Plus you have to empty the water container (3-5litres) every day yourself. Then we looked around the place and to be honest it's a lot more tired than it looks in the photos. There are cracks and patches on all walls and two holes in the ceiling, which leaked when it rained on the last stay. The kitchen units are also looking tired and some do not shut properly. The shower doesn't work properly, it runs more like a tap due to the shower heads holes all being worn away. I reported this on day 2 of our stay and David offered to replace it but I said we would get by. On reflection I wish I'd insisted on replacing the shower head, because I have since read other reviews and saw that someone in January reported the shower not working as well, so nothing has obviously been done to correct it and may not after my report either. There were hand prints all over the patio doors and on day 3 we had been making our bed and found an empty condom wrapper under the bed. so not great on the cleaning front either. This was also reported and David offered to have the place re cleaned, but with us only having 2 days of our stay left I saw very little point. We pay for cleaning, so you expect that side of things to be done properly. We didn't notice until we left as our suitcases had been placed under the stairs, but when we took them out to leave they were covered in dust. I hope these issues are fixed for the next guests.
