My motto is "Be good to yourself and others".
Aloha!

Favorite Movie:  Count of Monte Cristo
Favorite Music:  Hip Hop and Classical
Favorite Hobbies:  Surfing and Art / Graphic Design

When I travel, I try to leave the earth better than I found it.

reviews.comments: Location, Location, Location!!! 햔귝씩 챵뮨 ㄴㄴ랴셔 먀니 씨꾸럽슙니댜, 췸실 챵뮨은 옶는 거시나 먀찬갸지
Thank you!

My wife and I had a short vacation in Waikiki.  I brought my 2 kids (age, 5 and 2).  Jean-Paul had provided beach toys for them and chairs/umbrella for us.  We love how close it is to the beach and the close distance to walk to the malls and restaurants.  We'll be back for sure.  thanks a bunch.

My boyfriend and I went to Honolulu for a quick weekend getaway from Alaska (home).  Jean-Paul was very informative and communicated very quickly with any questions.   The space was perfect for the two of us as we could make ourselves at home, cook our own meals while also having space to put our luggage and other personal items around without tripping on anything.  The ONE aspect about this place that is worth mentioning is that it is loud.  I think this has a bit to do with being on a street so near to the action of Waikiki.  Plus it was Spam Jam weekend and probably more crowds.  However, if you are a light sleeper, prepare with earplugs.

The place was very cleaned, and it is very close to the beach, only two blocks away.  
Very cozy, and worked ok for four people, also it has everything you need! 
There’s some noises too but If you turn on the air conditioner it won’t bother you.
My friends and I had a great time there, he gave us a pineapple and that was very  sweet of him:)

A great place to stay! Checking in was quick and easy. Alii apartment is literally in the heart of Waikiki. Such an easy and convenient walk. Glad there was parking bc parking around Waikiki is insane. 
Place was fine! Had everything we needed. We didn’t spend much time during the day at the apartment. But the place is cute and comfortable. WiFi worked but sometimes kicked us off but no biggie- watched Netflix, bed and sofa bed was comfortable, ac was amazing, there wasn’t too much noise at night. We were able to get sleep. I had no complaints besides seeing a couple of coackroaches here and there but wasn’t bothered by it. Just killed it. Lol. 
I’d definitely recommend this place and I would definitely stay here again!
Thank you and thanks to Silvia for checking us in and a quick tour!!
A+
This is the place to stay if you ever come to Waikiki....... Location is everything
Best Value keeps this on my list for business trips in Town.

this place is fantastic - close to everything you need in waikiki, great amenities like parking, laundry, comfortable bed, good AC, netflix and roku tv etc. were great. had to restart the router a few times but otherwise great! Mahalo!!!
Lovely location and it was nearby everything! I would definitely stay here again.
My go to spot in town
Jean-paul is nice, let us check in early. The self check in is easy. Very close to the beach and shopping.
I love staying here!  Always a home away from home when I stay in town.

Nice apartment in a great location. Steps away from the beach and many other entertainment options. I definitely recommend this place for a good time in Waikiki. Jean-Paul is very accommodating as well. Thanks again!
Super close to the beach and such a cute place.
I just love to stay in Waikiki. Beats driving back to North Shore when I have work in Town.
great location & proximity to beach and main shopping streets. very clean unit. ground floor access is so convenient
I love staying in this location, close to everything I need
Love this spot.  Perfect little getaway and super close to the beach. Can walk pretty much anywhere I need.
it was a great location, close to everything. The beach was really close and close to shopping and close to the bus line.  Laundry was quick and inexpensive and private. Great place to stay.

We were received very warmly, personally. Immediately we were shown everything and we got valuable tips for our stay.
The apartment was great and is furnished with great attention to detail, bright and friendly. The kitchen is small but nice and we could cook well.
2 minutes down the street and you are on Waikiki Beach, right by the Duke Paoa Kahanamoku Statue. Also in the Alli Building is a small tourist office, where you can book various. We did a Helicopterflight, which was the absolute madness and we can only recommend.
For us it was a great advantage to have a parking space right outside the front door. We were very thankful about that.
We enjoyed our stay very much. On foot you can quickly reach the beach and various shopping possibilities. By car, the sightseeing are very good and easy to reach.
Great location, walking distance to the beach. Comes with parking, although very narrow(my rental car was damaged while parked)
The location is very good.

We (2 adults and a toddler) stayed for 1 week at the beginning of December. We used it as a base to drive out and explore the whole of Oahu. We had a great stay. I would definitely try and stay again if we ever came back. Also we left a 'pack and play' crib there,  if anyone with kids is thinking of staying after us :-)

+ Great Location, close to beach
+ Great value
+ Very responsive host
+ Free Parking! (is very narrow)
+ Lots of stuff available to use, beach chairs, umbrella, snorkels etc..

- Ground floor apartment
- Slatted glass window in the bedroom lets in all road noise (it is a mostly quiet road)
- Loud air conditioner (+ drowns out road noise)
This place is located very close to everything, but it's on a busy street so beware of noise.
Location is great and convenient. only one block away from Waikiki beach.  The host is very nice and easy to communicate.

Great place on a main block. literally steos away from iconic waikiki beach. can be a bit noisy in the morning but that was a great alarm for me. got me uo ang going and tye host is amazing any problems he responds instantly.  Cool place,  great place to eat on the same block. cheap rentals on the same block across the street for cars and motorcycles or up the block for surfboards and such.

This spot is in a great location for the beach, food, grocery shopping, the zoo, night life. There is lots of road noise but at night most of it gets drowned out by the ac unit. One of the host dropped off extra beach toys and a wagon for our son to play with and the wagon was a great touch to haul all of our beach stuff. They even had a pack n play for our youngest one to sleep in.

name: Petite-Patrie, the place to be!
summary: ROPEPA, le quartier le plus cool de Montréal ! Appartement un peu BoBo, avec vue sur notre magnifique jardin. Transports très accessibles, plusieurs excellents restaurants et bars à proximité. Bébé bienvenu : possibilité de bassinette, transat, chaise-haute... We speak English and Spanish too !
space: Cozy and quiet 3 1/2, next to everything. You might not even want to get out of the neignborhood !
description: ROPEPA, le quartier le plus cool de Montréal ! Appartement un peu BoBo, avec vue sur notre magnifique jardin. Transports très accessibles, plusieurs excellents restaurants et bars à proximité. Bébé bienvenu : possibilité de bassinette, transat, chaise-haute... We speak English and Spanish too ! Cozy and quiet 3 1/2, next to everything. You might not even want to get out of the neignborhood ! Appartement entier, avec entrée autonome. Nous vivons au premier étage et serons heureux de vous accueillir. Le quartier Petite-Patrie / MileEx ayant énormément à offrir, vous pouvez sortir à pied ! Le métro est à 10 minutes de marche, et l'autobus passe très régulièrement à quelques mètres de la maison. Plusieurs stations Bixis à proximité.
neighborhood_overview: Le quartier Petite-Patrie / MileEx ayant énormément à offrir, vous pouvez sortir à pied !
transit: Le métro est à 10 minutes de marche, et l'autobus passe très régulièrement à quelques mètres de la maison. Plusieurs stations Bixis à proximité.
access: Appartement entier, avec entrée autonome. Nous vivons au premier étage et serons heureux de vous accueillir.
house_rules: Utiliser l'escalier de secours arrière en cas d'urgence uniquement. Merci.

host.host_about: We are a couple of teachers (Anthropology and Art History) from Montreal with 2 young children.

reviews.comments: Sympathique appartement ensoleillé à proximité d’excellentes adresses.

Basic but spotless and comfortable apartment in an up-and-coming neighbourhood, with plenty of free street parking. Julie made our late check-in easy, messaged to make sure we got in OK, responded quickly to my one question, and was generally kind and pleasant. Airbnb at its best! (Too bad we didn't get to meet in person.)

Cet appartement est très confortable et donne sur un espace très agréable derrière avec balcon. Julie a été très sympathique, très compréhensive et nous a aidé pendant notre séjour. On la remercie également pour l’apéro. Je recommande vivement cet endroit

The apartment looks exactly like the pictures: simple, clean and bright with everything one would need. Julie and her lovely family are wonderful hosts. They are so warm, accommodating and easygoing they make you feel as if you are staying with family. There are plenty of neighbourhood shops, restaurants and grocery stores in the area and the bus and metro are easily accessible.

Julie was an amazing host. I stayed almost 3 weeks in her apartment (2nd floor), and would definitely return next time I am in Montreal and needing a place to stay. You could tell the place had been thoroughly cleaned before we arrived (my husband, my baby and I). The place had everything we asked for for the baby, and had all necessary amenities. She even go us a small appliance when we asked for it, and shared her kids toys with us for the baby to play with! She made sure we had enough soap and toilet paper. She was very welcoming, friendly and kind. I had a really great experience. Merci Julie et à la prochaine !

Julie's hospitality and natural charm are unrivaled, the space was everything you could ask for as well as being ridiculously clean and more spacious than the pictures show! Julie also offered many helpful tips on where to go and what to see as well as answering any questions we bad in a prompt and timely manner. I'd highly recommend this spot, you will not regret it! Thanks for an amazing time again, we hope to see you soon :)
Very nice apartment about 15 minute Uber from old Montreal. Great local cafes by foot. Julie was a wonderful host!
L'appartement est bien situé, supermarché à côté. L'appart est très propre. Il est parfait pour une couple. Merci à Julie pour les boissons de bienvenue.

Superbe accueil de Julie! J'ai réservé l'appartement pour mes parents qui étaient en visite. Le quartier est génial (j'y habite!), le bus est à 1 min et le métro a 12 min à pieds.  Plein de commerces, restos, petits cafés, microbrasserie à quelques minutes + le Grand parc du père Marquette qui est très  agréable .
L'appartement est lumineux et très pratique, avec accès à 2 beaux balcons pour profiter du soleil.
Communication impeccable et hôtes tres réactifs. Je recommande!

Trés bonne place, avec accueil chaleureux et spontané que seuls les québecois savent pratiquer.
Excellent rapport qualité prix. Quartier et proximité des transports tres agreable!

1ère expérience AirBnB, sommes ravis de l'accueil de la propriétaire, la qualité du logement, sa situation dans la ville, avec à proximité bus et métro (et la ville se vit à pied essentiellement !).
Nous y retournerons !
Julie was an exceptional host, the apartment is great. Additional touches such the coffee were very much appreciated. Communication could not have been easier.
Julie and Thomas have a really amazing place with great natural light, a lot of comfortable features that made it feel like home.  It's in a great, safe location, to explore Montreal.

name: Large attic room, ensuite bathroom Forest Lodge
summary: A large bright private spacious attic room with private en-suite bathroom. Desk and Wifi. Rooftop views in a renovated  three storey Victorian terrace. Coffee and tea facilities in room. As travellers ourselves we welcome the opportunity to share our home with others.  Please note that there are 4 flights of stairs to the  third floor attic.
space: The house is close to the centre of Sydney and has easy nearby transport.  This listing is for a large double room and private en-suite bathroom on the third floor of a 1880's terrace house. The bed is queen  sized .  A short walk to the popular Tramsheds with great food places. Glebe Point Road, famous for restaurants, cafes and bars is close by. You can walk through the local park down to the Fishmarkets and Sydney harbour. Sydney University and UTS are close by as is Royal Prince Alfred Hospital. Victoria Park Olympic pool is a short walk away.  Light rail and buses are close by.
description: A large bright private spacious attic room with private en-suite bathroom. Desk and Wifi. Rooftop views in a renovated  three storey Victorian terrace. Coffee and tea facilities in room. As travellers ourselves we welcome the opportunity to share our home with others.  Please note that there are 4 flights of stairs to the  third floor attic. The house is close to the centre of Sydney and has easy nearby transport.  This listing is for a large double room and private en-suite bathroom on the third floor of a 1880's terrace house. The bed is queen  sized .  A short walk to the popular Tramsheds with great food places. Glebe Point Road, famous for restaurants, cafes and bars is close by. You can walk through the local park down to the Fishmarkets and Sydney harbour. Sydney University and UTS are close by as is Royal Prince Alfred Hospital. Victoria Park Olympic pool is a short walk away.  Light rail and buses are close by. Guests  will have access to the living room, kitchen, laundry and
neighborhood_overview: Forest Lodge is in Glebe, originally church land it was largely developed as a residential  area at the end of the 19th century. Glebe is famous for its "Iron Lace" Victorian balconies and streetscapes.
notes: Larry  works from home.
transit: Forest Lodge is 4 km from the city center. Many  bus routes and  and a light rail service to the city are within walking distance of the house. Another bus route takes you to Coogee beach via  funky Newtown.
access: Guests  will have access to the living room, kitchen, laundry and gardens.
interaction: You will be hosted by Casey and Larry. We will greet you on arrival and  make sure you are oriented to the house and have keys to your room and the front door.
house_rules: - Can arrive before 3pm if arranged beforehand

host.host_about:
I love Sydney and Larry and I welcome guests to our house in Forest Lodge four kilometres from the centre of Sydney. 
We  both have a background in professional education and enjoy music, reading, swimming and entertaining. When we're travelling we appreciate a safe,  peaceful, clean place to come back to after being a tourist all day. It makes a big difference if our host is welcoming and helpful.

reviews.comments: Gracious home and hosts. Spacious, private and very comfortable attic room - would definitely recommend to others. Casey and Larry were welcoming and easy to communicate with. Location was close to parklands, harbour and great cafes. Thanks very much Casey.

Wonderful place.felt at home after 10 min.We did not want to leave.
Great location to explore Sydney
Casey and Larry made us feel very welcome and at home. The attic room is large and spacious with a great ensuite. A lovely area of Sydney to stay, not too far from the CBD and attractions.
The room was pleasant, spacious, well appointed comfortable and private. Casey & Larry were welcoming and I enjoyed chatting.
All good. Beautiful house. Close to the wonderful Globe Point Rd. Comfortable, charming, friendly, perfect.
A delightful hide-away. The attic room is large and nicely furnished, with a good bathroom close by. Helpful and charming hosts and a quiet neighbourhood.
Casey was a lovely host!   The room is comfortable and very convenient to Sydney University and surrounds.   I had a problem-free stay :)
Casey's place is a spacious attic room with convenient ensuite. The room is beautifully furnished with lots of extras.
Great location & communication. I booked the space for my business partner. He had a super comfortable stay and would highly recommend this stylish little gem with amazing hosts, Casey & Larry.
Casey is an excellent host. The room is large and very comfortable. We highly recommend Casey’s Airbnb.
Casey and Larry are wonderful hosts and made our stay very comfortable. The beautiful and artistic house is in a great location and the room is well appointed. I’d certainly stay here again!
Casey is a warm and friendly host making sure we had everything we needed. The room is spacious and warm with lots of welcoming extras and homely touches. We will definitely be back. Thanks Casey.

Wonderful stay, thank you Casey and Larry! Was peaceful, comfortable, private…a beautiful home to experience. Very much enjoyed the conversations with both of you about Sydney and life in general _/\_
Clean,  comfortable amd convenient!  Casey's place fits the bill - as well as being a lovely host :)
5* experience. Totaly recommended.
Amazing apartment, very close to USyd! We loved staying there and don't even want to leave, Casey and Larry are just lovely!
The host are very kind and both the room and the bathroom are very clean.

A tranquil and calming space, up high with beautiful natural light.

A great space with our own private bathroom and amenities. Perfect while while in Sydney for work.

Casey and Larry were warm and welcoming. I would definitely stay here again.

Casey and Larry immediately made me feel at home. They are warm, generous and kind.  The room is private, spacious and clean and well located.  Whether you have either a busy or relaxing trip planned you are able to enjoy it at your own pace. Time spent with Casey and Larry is also a delight.

It’s really a nice place! Good location near Sydney university. Casey and Larry are so nice .The house is  beautiful Quiet and very clean. Thanks for great hospitality. Highly commended ~ hope we can come again ^^
This was the second time my friend Dain stayed here and he absolutely loved it! Great location; great space; great hosts!!

La casa está increíble, llena de detalles y arte. Me encantan las casas antiguas y esta estaba hermosa. El vecindario es de lo mejor, es muy relajado y seguro. Tienes parada de autobús muy cercana y puedes llegar caminando a tiendas y restaurantes, el barrio vale mucho la pena recorrerlo.
Casey y Larry fueron excelentes anfitriones.
El cuarto en muy amplio y cuentas con un baño al lado que solo es para esa habitación. En la habitación podías prepararte café o té, está muy iluminada y es bastante amplia.
Hay que subir muchas escaleras y te lo avisan con antelación, para nosotros estuvo muy bien.
Lindos detalles en la habitación y el baño, realmente teníamos todo lo necesario.
Pudimos lavar algo de ropa y eso fue muy bueno para nosotros.
Es un hermoso hogar  que Casey y Larry compartieron con nosotros.

Thanks to Casey and Larry ,we had a great time in Sydney.they are the greatest hosts.Lovely room and comfortable place leave us a good memory,Casey ’s informations are useful,we tried 4 restaurants that Casey wrote in the information book,all of them are delicious and have a great atmosphere,thank you so much!

I had a fantastic stay with Larry and Casey.
Comfortable, clean and airy light-filled space. Great location and lovely hosts.
Would highly recommend and hope to be back.
We had a great stay at Caseys and Larrys place. Thank you for everything :-)  Casey and Larry were very welcoming and supporting hosts. a great place to stay.
Très bonne prestation et très beau cadre à Forest Lodge.
Great host and lovely stay! Great location, informative book that introduced the neighbourhood very well. Easy to get into the city by Uber. Thank you so much Casey and Larry! Recommended.
Great location. Lovely hosts. Great accommodation in a lovely character home.

Both Casey and Larry are sooooo warm and sweet! The location here is very convenient. Their house is very particular. 
We had a very nice day in Sydney.

A wonderful large room and spotless bathroom.   And QUIET!  Casey and Larry are superb hosts. Happy to chat,  gave me some great tips on what to do whilst respecting my privacy.   Good location.  Highly recommended.
This is a fantastic get away close to the heart of Sydney thankyou for a memorable time!

I highly recommend Casey and Larry’s place!
Great and welcoming hosts nice and helpful, quite unique location beautiful and spotless house, definitely go for it!!

The best host ever !!! 
Larry et Casey sont des gens géniaux, d’une grande hospitalité et de bons conseils ! Nous n’hésiterons pas à retourner dans leur belle maison dès notre retour à Sydney !
nice accommodation and nice couple. I already think it is my another sweet home there. hope to go there again.
The hosts are very good  .The transportation is convenient.The room is so gorgeous and neat.Highly recommended!

name: ★★ SIGNATURE STUDIO ★★ Tsim Sha Tsui
summary: This cozy studio is around 280 sqft, fully furnished, newly renovated in March 2018 and decorated in western high standing hotel room. It's located in the center of Tsim Sha Tsui, less than 2min by walk from the TST MTR station. It's by far the best location for travelers!! Do not hesitate to send me message if you have any questions before booking. ★★★ Don't forget to add the listing in your Wishlist ★★★
space: The apartment is equipped with everything you'll need: spacious bathroom, 37" plasma TV with many local channels, free WiFi 1000 Mbps (Fiber Optic), large office table, comfortable sofa, big fridge etc. It is ideal for an individual or a couple. It's designed same as high class hotel room.
description: This cozy studio is around 280 sqft, fully furnished, newly renovated in March 2018 and decorated in western high standing hotel room. It's located in the center of Tsim Sha Tsui, less than 2min by walk from the TST MTR station. It's by far the best location for travelers!! Do not hesitate to send me message if you have any questions before booking. ★★★ Don't forget to add the listing in your Wishlist ★★★ The apartment is equipped with everything you'll need: spacious bathroom, 37" plasma TV with many local channels, free WiFi 1000 Mbps (Fiber Optic), large office table, comfortable sofa, big fridge etc. It is ideal for an individual or a couple. It's designed same as high class hotel room. In the studio, you'll find:  a double size bed  a 37" plasma TV with dozen of channels free WiFi (super fast fiber optic network 1000 Mbps)  1 air conditioner  1 big sofa  1 big fridge 1 big office table and chair 1 spacious wardrobe 1 large bathroom 1 dehumidifier against humidity The apartment is
neighborhood_overview: The place is located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui - biggest shopping and dining area in Hong Kong. Around 2 minutes walk to the TST MTR/Subway station, 10 minutes away from Central, Causeway Bay etc... The neighborhood is full of restaurants, cafes and pubs and has terrific transportation: buses, mini buses, taxis, trams and ferries! Have many shopping malls in the area: K11, the One mall, iSquare, Harbour city etc... Probably the best place of Hong Kong for shopping and eating. Please check the Guidebook to see the best places to visit in Tsim Sha Tsui area.
notes: Official check in time is 2 pm, check out time is 10 am. If you need to check-in late or check-out early, please inform me ahead of time. If needed, I will give you different options for luggage storage near my building. In the apartment, you will find clean towels, universal adapter, hair dryer, kettle, plates, cups, cutlery. For toiletries, I provide shampoo, shower gel, toilet paper. However, travelers are require to bring along their own toothbrush and tooth paste.
transit: Tsim Sha Tsui is the hub for transportation in Hong Kong. The place is near the MTR/Subway, all public Bus, and taxi are in the area 24h/24. It takes less than 1 hour from the airport to reach the building by public transportation. Will send you full details on how to get to the apartment after you make reservation.
access: In the studio, you'll find:  a double size bed  a 37" plasma TV with dozen of channels free WiFi (super fast fiber optic network 1000 Mbps)  1 air conditioner  1 big sofa  1 big fridge 1 big office table and chair 1 spacious wardrobe 1 large bathroom 1 dehumidifier against humidity
interaction: The apartment is private, you will be alone in the apartment. I might be out of Hong Kong, due to travel business. You will be in interaction with one of my friend who will manage everything while you will be in Hong Kong. We mainly communicate through messaging app (most common ones), so we are reachable 24/7 if any problems or questions. I will be happy to give you some recommendations too, for most famous tourists places to visit, or all the best restaurants in TST area.
house_rules: . Earliest Check in time is 2 pm and latest Check out time is 10 am, not negotiable due to cleaning schedule. If needed, I will let you know all luggage storage options near my building. . Remember that you are staying in someone’s home, not hotel, so please take care of the apartment as it was your own apartment. . Be respectful of the place and quiet as I let my own apartment to travelers when I’m away, and I don’t want to have any trouble with neighborhood. . If smoking, please open windows. . If goods are damaged during your stay and need to be replaced, you will be responsible and need to repay as follow: 3000 HKD for TV, wardrobe, 2000 HKD for sofa, bed, office table. . We request travelers to have smartphone with local/roaming sim card with internet data and stay reachable through messaging app at any time in case of emergency. You can buy cheap local sim card in every 7-11 for 30 HKD only.  . If someone ask who you are, tell him you are a friend and you are staying in my apartm

host.host_about:
Hi,
Welcome to my wonderful place in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong. Hope you will enjoy my lovely studio.

reviews.comments: Studio très bien situé. Instructions très claires pour le check in et check out, ce qui est très agréable car on peut arriver a l'heure qu'on souhaite. Bonne insonorisation, nuit calme. Deux points négatifs : propreté et confort de la literie (lit très dur). Nous avons passé un bon séjour ! Thanks Dani !
房子非常漂亮,里面电视齐全｡离尖沙咀尖东地铁站公交站都很近｡旅游购物朋友们的好地方,不用拖大包小包的回住处了｡(◕‿◕✿)
地理位置很好,离购物区､地铁站､维多利亚港都很近｡楼下就有7-11和SASA之类,生活很方便｡房间也干净｡

Dani's place is at the heart of nightlife of HK, yet quiet and safe. The apt is recently renovated and very clean. Can host 1 person or a couple and is the perfect choice if you travel for tourism or business. Dani is a very kind and responsive host. Definitely suggested!

Thanks to Dani for hosting me and my wife for three days. Lovely place and quite huge room in HK. Near to everything ie. MTR, supermarket, 7E, circle K just in front of the hotel. The bed is quite hard maybe Dani will consider a new one hehe. The room exactly like in the pics given. Would recommended to others. But overall, we had a good stay here :)

We had a great stay. The flat is in a great location in TST. Extremely walkable for the MTR, restaurants, shopping. The check in instructions made the flat very easy to find and check in, so make sure you read them. Although the building exterior and elevator lobby is older, the apartment is renovated, clean and modern. Good AC, new washroom/shower, etc. during our stay, there was sometimes a strong smell of cigarette smoke in the hallway and elevator leading to the apartment, so smoke sensitive people should be aware.  But this is Hong Kong, there are lots of smokers and the host can't help this (probably someone else on the floor). The smoke didn't affect our stay, especially since we were outmost of the day, and can open windows, exhaust fan. Great value, great stay!

位置非常好,離尖沙咀只要幾分鐘步行｡雖然大樓外觀一開始看到覺得有些陰暗狹小,但房間本身是非常乾淨明亮的請放心~~ 以空間來說也足夠兩個人使用 :)
該有的設備一應俱全,唯一小小美中不足的大概是熱水持續的時間不是很長,洗澡要稍微加快速度｡房東回覆相當即時,這趟旅行一切都很美好｡
Perfect location, walking distance to shopping mall or restaurants or the park. Little bit hard to find but Dani is very helpful!

I had a wonderful stay at Dani’s studio in Tsim Sha Tsui. The studio is located in a very central location of Hong Kong that is within walking distance of many attractions and restaurants, including 24-hour markets and restaurants right next door.  Check-in and check-out was easy and convenient to my schedule, and Dani was always quick to respond to any questions. The studio is comfortable and very clean. Highly recommended!

Dani's studio is very modern and clean, with lots of drawers and cupboards, and space under the bed for suitcase storage. Hot water works well, so is the air conditioning. Very close to public transport, lots of restaurants on the same street, also a convenience store right next door, and a supermarket across the road. Despite so many shops around, some are 24hours, we were not disturbed by any noise, with the windows closed and air conditioner on. We had a pleasant stay, thank you Dani for sharing your lovely studio :)

Overall, our stay was good. The room is very nice and the room looks just like the photos. Nicely updated!  The entrance and hallways to the unit are a bit dirty, so just keep that in mind. The unit itself is clean! It is in a great location, easy to find and close to a major train stop. Lots of convenience stores and shops around as well. Overall, a good find in a good location!

Dani response was vey fast and very helpful! Place was exactly the same as the images, clean and well kept. Area is near TST station, around 2 to 3 mintues walk. Near to k11 mall which has luggage storage which was very convenient. Room looks new, check in without a fuss. Only problem is that the bed was a tad too hard other than that room was spacious and stylish. Highly recommend!
房间很好,五脏俱全,但是我找了好久room B,完全不是因为难找哦｡世界上最遥远的距离就是,房间就在我面前,我却不知道｡坐电梯到达楼层并拿到钥匙之后,大家打开masterbox 右边那个门才能看到自己的房间｡这个大门里面有三个独立房间,都有独立卫生间,但是都在同一个大门内部｡切记哦!^ ^

Very value for money. Near Tsim Sha Tsui mtr and has a lot of bars, small eateries and convenience stores just below. However the nearest mtr station exit does not have stairs so if you are going over with luggage, it’s better to take other exits. The streets are abit hard to navigate and the pavements are narrow and uneven for luggage. The building is run down and looks like out of maintenance for a long time, from the dust and garbage pile up. The room and door are modern, clean and secure. There’s three units that share the same main door. The wall is rather thin so we keep hearing noises, especially in the morning when they lock the door. Overall it’s a value for money and everything is decent enough. If you don’t mind the exterior being run down and not a light sleeper, it’s a good choice of accommodation!

Dani's place is really a steal considering how central it is and approximately 3 minutes walk to Tsim Tsa Tsui MTR. There are really good dessert places, SASA and 24 hrs Macdonalds just right outside the building which makes it bustling and not too secluded so you know it's safe even when you come back to your apartment later in the night. The apartment is small but sufficient for 2 pax and its clean and exactly as pictured. One suggestion is to include a small table mirror for future guests as it can be rather tricky to get ready without any mirror other than the one in the toilet. Small issue but other than that, it was such a pleasant stay. Thank you Dani for the fast replies and for the seamless checking in and out process :) Will definitely recommend!

We had a great stay in Dani's place.
Perfect location, clean and lovely room, kindly information from Dani, and good value for HK! Highly recommend! :)
Is a clean place. I more focus on cleanliness so i very satisfied for this one.I will choose Dani house if visit to HK again.
Dani是一个非常热心且仔细的房东｡他的公寓在市中心,室内设施齐全,装饰简约舒适,地理位置很好,交通､购物以及散步观景都十分便捷｡此外,Dani会给你的旅行提供很多有用的建议,对你的问题提供及时的反馈｡如果去香港的话,入住Dani的公寓是很好的选择｡
We enjoyed our stay at Dani’s apartment. Very close to everything. Short walk to the train station. Great location. Dani was very quick with responding to any of our questions.
房间非常棒,和图片一样,值得推荐,下次来还是住这家,
best location~

Amazing location in Kowloon, clean and cozy (don't be fool by the entrance). Dani is quick to respond. Wa had a good time here. The only thing missing is a bit more dishes and a change of mattress, because even by china's standards, this one is quite firm!
Most of all, Location is fantastic. Room condition is also good. In here, You can enjoy the trip in Hongkong

房子很赞,房东也很nice!
交通非常便利,200米左右就是尖沙咀站｡附近有很多可以逛的地方,比如海港城､中港城;也有很多吃的地方,总之非常繁华和方便｡
在尖沙咀这块能住到这样的房子真的性价比很高了｡
就是屋里只有一双拖鞋,如果有两双就更好啦~

Stayed a night here in June and it was great! The location is on a bustling street, close to the high-end shopping district, Kowloon Park, malls, and many, many food stalls. The inside of the room is comfortable and relaxing. I was there during the beginning of the World Cup and could hear just a bit of cheering during the night, and some sound bleed through from upstairs, but nothing too noticeable or distracting. 
Dani was quick to respond, and quite helpful. Highly recommend for a single traveler or two, especially given its location!!

It is a nice place where you can get to any centeral place easily with subway. It is very convenient for choosing a famous restaurant or shopping mall. Dani replied  message very quickly and everything was well prepared in his house.

Excellent location, minutes away from the MTR and major shopping centres and restaurants. 
The studio itself is clean. Bed is quite firm. 
The building itself can be deceiving since it’s old and garbage is strewing on stairwells. However, the unit itself is renovated. Dani is very communicated throughout the check-in and check-out process. He even let us in half hour early because it rained heavily. We appreciated that. 
If you’re looking for value stay and out most of your day while in HKG, then this is the place to stay.

Don’t let the entrance to the building fool you! Dani’s place is located in the heart of Hong Kong with everything you may need. AC works great, communication and check in was easy. Location couldn’t be better.
pretty good place to live for short trip. Close to public transportation and restaurant.
Dani's place was clean and simplistic. The location was a prime location in Hong Kong and very close to the station. Check in was very easy.

Excellent spot!  Location is prime, restaurants everywhere, close to subway station, taxi's just a wave away ... flat is clean and pleasant, the entrance could be scary but it's really quite safe, so no worries!  messages are quickly answered, in detail!   I'd come back and stay here again!
地段位置非常好,几乎是在中心区域,步行就可以去很多繁华的地点｡非常安全,三层门禁,房间整齐干净｡我们在那里度过的很愉快❤
离地铁站近,吃住行较方便,地方安静,适合旅游居住
很干净,地理位置也很好
装修的很有格调,非常喜欢,地段非常好,旁边有k11,很多网红店,尖沙咀地铁站就在旁边,就是隔音会有一些些不好,总体是非常值得住的
性价比极高的房子,非常干净整洁,离尖沙咀a2地铁口步行两三分钟,如果找不到玫瑰大厦可以直接找尖沙咀A2地铁口的麦当劳,看到麦当劳就找到啦｡
地理位置非常不错,楼下有好多小食店,离尖沙咀站十分近,十分适合喜欢买买买的小伙伴｡

I stayed at Dani’s for a few days with another friend. The location is really central and the place is nice and clean. It feels like a standard hotel room and is a good size for HK. The only downside is that the building is old and the entrance is not very obvious. However, the flat is very secure with two doors and a gate and inside it is nice and modern. Dani was very helpful and fast at replying whenever we had problems. Would definitely recommend!

It’s a small but comfy studio. Located at the heart of Hong Kong. Just a few minutes away from metro station so it’s super easy to get around. We enjoyed the downtown walk and restaurants near here. Good for short trip.
地理位置很好,但房子的隔音效果有待提高｡
非常便捷的一次入住 地理位置很好 去哪裡都很方便 來香港遊玩推薦這個住宿
房源位置很好,三分钟地铁站五分钟海港城｡房间也很干净,装修的很好｡
Nice place

Dani's place is SUPERB! :) However the building is old but the location is perfect in the middle of TST area where you can experience the night life in Hongkong. The room is well furnished (as shown in the photos, what you see is what you get). I recommend you to stay at Dani's place as she is responding quickly in your messages whenever you need her. Thanks Dani! Enjoyed my Hongkong layover because of your place. :D

Good location. I enjoyed the curry fish ball and other skewer stand downstairs, as well as the grocery store across the street, and the nearby Circle Ks and 7-Elevens. Several good restaurants are nearby as well. Jordan and Temple Street market is close by as well and walkable if you don’t mind walking for 15-20 minutes to get there, though the walk is extremely easy and there’s a lot of things to look at through the walk.

Outside going to the entrance seems a bit old and dirty, but pretty typical of Hong Kong. Inside has a fairly modern appearance and the bathroom is spacious enough. Clean overall.

Dani was super responsive and nice about everything. Overall a good host.

The place itself is nice and a great value. There were two adapter outlets so I didn't have to buy my own - that was nice. As an American, the bathroom set up was unusual, but that is all, just unusual. Very small but I was traveling alone and spending most of my time outside. It was perfect for what I needed. I came to visit the convention center, which was only two train stops away. The train station is very close by, so location was great. The host was unresponsive to my messages as I inquired about a package I was expecting - so I never received it. Other than an unresponsive host and the building/elevators being dirty leading up to the place, no real complaints. Quite a pleasant stay. Will note sleeping on a Friday night, was a little loud outside from all the commotion, but hey, that's city life.
房间很干净,距离尖沙咀很近,走路就可到达,十分方便
地理位置与交通相当满意,就系大厦相对来说比较陈旧,但是价钱摆在那里,反正房间干净卫生就好,楼下的商铺应有尽有,非常便利
房子的地理位置很好,屋子整洁,房东人也很好
位置很好,房间干净,交通方便,房东回复迅速,很棒
位置很好,去哪里都很方便,和图片上的一样,空余的位子放两个大行李箱没有问题,蛮方便的

Location is great. Has enough space if you have luggage. Dani is always quick to respond to any questions. The complex itself is quiet dirty but once you are in the room you can enjoy the accommodation, specially the air conditioning. Would recommend to anyone that wants a clean quiet space in a great location.
房东一定要用英文回复,不适合英文程度不好或网络不方便的人,如果有时候没网络翻译软件会帮不上忙,入住时间太迟,退房时间上午10点前必须离开,太苛刻房东没有人情味

The station is near the house and in the best position.
The house was in the busy street, so it was a little noisy.
I wish there was a mirror in the living room.
I stayed two nights with my friend, but there were only two towels, so I dried them and rewrote them.
The house is clean and well watered.
The air conditioner worked well and was cool.

Dani's near the MTR and there are lots of shops right out of the building, eg: sasa, curry fish ball, convenient shop, dessert shop opened till late night, you can still get supper even 11pm+. Although the building was old but the room keep in clean condition and still in newly renovated condition as per pictured. I'm glad that Dani response was prompt, he provided all necessary information and tips which really make big convenient for us. We follow tips from him how to get bus from airport the the place (really easy to locate the building), although checkout time might be bit early however there are several places to store luggage. Overall ~ it's value for Money !

The place that was advertised itself was good, clean and had no issues. Although out of the host's control, there is only one lift and we encountered issues due to a large deliveryof boxes and also somebody holding the lift whilst they renovate another flat.
위치도 좋구 깨끗해요

Great place to stay. The building is a bit old and messy, but the room itself is very clean and comfortable. Also a good value of money to stay here. The only drawback is strict check in and check out time due to cleaning schedule.
숙소의 문제라기 보단 침사추이 지역에 홍콩 특유의 냄새가 심해서 머리가 아프고 불편했습니다. 숙소의 인테리어와 위치는 좋았어요
Couldn't have asked for a better accommodation. Spacious, clean room, great location, and nothing wrong with it.

We enjoyed our stay very much! The room is clean and nice. Even though the building itself is a little bit old, and elevator is really small. but good news is the location is really great! Walk distance to some of the best food restaurants including Jenny cookies. And lots of snacks right there downstairs! 
Even though there’s a rooftop bar next to the building but it’s pretty quiet and in the evening it’s surprisingly quiet that I had very good sleep! 
Plus, we forgot to bring our voltage converter but we found two in the room. Help a lot!!!!
All in all, it’s great price based on location and the room

The actual apartment is nice but the building it is housed in is quite unpleasant. I expressed that to the host and he became angry. A simple word of encouragement would have prompted me to stay. However, his reaction and being a solo female traveler, I opted to leave and find other lodging. OAN - The location is great for getting around and there are plenty of food options.

Excellent and clean apartment and is exactly like the pictures portray. It's located right next to Tsim sha tsui station so it's really convenient to get to central for a lot of the tourist attractions.
K11のすぐ近くにあり､ﾁﾑｻｰﾁｭﾝ駅からも5分以内という好立地です｡ﾏﾝｼｮﾝに入ってすぐはちょっと大丈夫かな､と思うほどﾛｰｶﾙな雰囲気ですが､お部屋はとても清潔でした｡繁華街にあるのに､外の音が気にならなかったのにびっくりしました｡

좋은 후기만 있어 그런지 저는 좀 실망했어요.
많은 후기처럼 위치는 좋았고 숙소도 청결했습니다. 이건 정말 인정합니다.

그러나 방음은 진짜 최악이었어요  창밖 경적 소리는 매우 시끄러웠으며 옆방의 소리가 다 들렸습니다. 또 홍콩숙소가 대부분 그런지는 모르겠지만 히터시스템 없어서 방안이 추웠어요. 여름은 몰라도 겨울은 추천하지 않습니다. 
추워서 히터가 있냐고 물어봤는데 호스트는 하루 뒤에 응답이 왔다.....그것도 나의 질문에 대답하기 위한 메시지가 아니었다.(3박4일 투숙)다음날 체크아웃 시간을 물어보는 메시지었다. 내가 보기엔 체크아웃 시간 물어보려고 그제서야 메시지에 답한것 같았다. 
기분이 좋지 않았다.

만약 이 숙소를 다시 예약할거냐고 묻는다면 아니다.  침대도 너무 딱딱해서 이럴거면 호텔을 예약할걸 후회했다. 이비스셩완과 같은 저렴이 호텔과 가격차이가 크지 않다. 그러나 방 넓이를 중요시한다면 이 방 크기는 홍콩 기준 작지는 않았다. 

정리하면 이 숙소는 위치,청결도가 좋고

방음,호스트응답,침대 푹신함,난방이 좋지 않았다.
地點方便,但大樓建築物本身老舊骯髒,出入的人看起來也都有點可怕,房間ok但稍嫌不乾淨,衛生紙沒補滿､沙發下有塑膠袋､熱水維持不久
房子就在市中心,到处都是地铁公交,还有购物的商场,交通方便,房间虽然有点小,会听到隔壁邻居移动的声音,但是总体来说性价比挺高的
Very cool place at a great price, great communication with the host, too. 10/10 recommended.
房子虽小,五脏俱全……卫生干净,需要英文交流,但现在翻译软件五花八门……感觉还行

Dani was always there online providing instant response. When we arrived earlier, we had little trouble to find place for our luggage to be stored at the place where Dani suggested. But she immediately provided other options for us. Very instant and helpful. Me and my gf benefit from the location of the place the most. Our planned hot sites and MTR are just around Tsim Sha Sui. Tho the Prat Ave. could be a bit noisy during night, we still have a comfortable stay with all of the equipment and feasibilities in the place. Overall, I’d recommend couple to stay for urban adventures here :)
地段非常好,周圍都是小吃
离尖沙咀地铁站比较近,楼下很多吃的位置很方便,Dani回复很及时,关于民宿的事项都交代得很清楚
great location,it near MRT, comfortable and clean
性价比超高的民宿,体验感极佳,而且位置也超好的

- 실내는 사진과 동일합니다.
- 하지만 건물 외부와 숙소 문 앞까지가 아주 지저분한 모습 입니다.
  (그래서 저의 동행인은 BnB에 들어오고 나갈 때 조금 우울해 했습니다)
- 위치는 침사추이 한 가운데입니다.  아주 좋습니다.
-  바로 옆 건물 1층에 카레 어묵을 판매하는 상점이 있습니다. (TV에도 나온 가게_mr.백종원)
- 그 가게에서 홍콩/ 중국 요리 냄새가 강하게 올라옵니다. 저는 후각이 생각보다 예민하지 않아서
   이내 곧 괜찮았지만, 후각이 예민하신 분이라면 좀 힘드실 수 있습니다.
- 홍콩의 기후 특성 상 에어컨을 틀지 않으면 내부가 습합니다. 에어컨을 틀고, 춥더라도 옷을
  따뜻하게 입고 자는 것을 추천합니다. (별도의 난방기구 없음)
- 금액이 호텔에 비해서 그렇게 저렴하지 않습니다.
 
* 요약: 가격대비 좋은 편. 위치가 아주 좋다. 하지만 자금 여유가 조금 더 있다면 호텔을 추천한다. (외관이 지저분한 것에 개의치 않다면 이 곳도 괜찮음)
* summary:  nice~ soso BnB, location is best, but.. if you have more money, reserve hotel (Website hidden by Airbnb) (if messy outside of BnB is "no matter" to you,  this is good choice)
还好
Spacious apartment in Hong Kong. Clean & tidy, accessible location with eatery conveniently located below the apartment (only down side - bed was too hard)
房東很熱情,溝通很方便,房子的周邊非常方便,交通和美食就在樓下,應有盡有
온수가 안나옴..
The room was very clean and confortable.The location is very good
差!!与房主沟通不明白,信息嫉妒延迟!差!
比较干净,生活用品不齐全,没有梳子
Room is perfect.
Good for value

name: Room Free Breakfast close to Hagia Sophia401
summary: İstanbul’un en eski tarihi Sultanahmet semtinde yer alan Otantik Guest House Hotel’in genelinde ve odalarında ücretsiz Wi-Fi erişimi ve uydu TV mevcuttur. Resepsiyonu günün 24 saati açıktır. Tüm odalarda klima ve düz ekran TV,uydu Mevcut 0lup, Odalar özel banyoludur.  Odalarda terlik ve saç kurutma makinesi bulunmaktadır.  Ayasofya, Sultan Ahmet Camii ve Kapalı Çarşı gibi ilgi çekici birçok yere yürüme mesafesindedir. En yakın havaalanı olan İstanbul Atatürk Havaalanı 12 km mesafededir.
space: Fatih, anıtlar, mimari ve tarih ile ilgilenen gezginler için harika bir seçenek. Çiftler özellikle burayı tercih ediyor - iki kişilik bir seyahat için bu tesise 9,3 puan verdiler.
description: İstanbul’un en eski tarihi Sultanahmet semtinde yer alan Otantik Guest House Hotel’in genelinde ve odalarında ücretsiz Wi-Fi erişimi ve uydu TV mevcuttur. Resepsiyonu günün 24 saati açıktır. Tüm odalarda klima ve düz ekran TV,uydu Mevcut 0lup, Odalar özel banyoludur.  Odalarda terlik ve saç kurutma makinesi bulunmaktadır.  Ayasofya, Sultan Ahmet Camii ve Kapalı Çarşı gibi ilgi çekici birçok yere yürüme mesafesindedir. En yakın havaalanı olan İstanbul Atatürk Havaalanı 12 km mesafededir. Fatih, anıtlar, mimari ve tarih ile ilgilenen gezginler için harika bir seçenek. Çiftler özellikle burayı tercih ediyor - iki kişilik bir seyahat için bu tesise 9,3 puan verdiler.

host.host_about:
I was born in 1988 and I've started working in Tourism in Sultanahmet - Old City ,

I like to be friendly with my guests and i like to help them about anything that i can do , and i want them to make use of every opportunities of my place.

name: HUGE MAMBO ITALIANO (Loft)
summary: I just opened this cathedralic Loft for guests and waiting for bookings. Located in Mile End - Plateau  Mount Royal:  - night life with bars just at the corner of the street 2 minutes from home. - 5 minutes walking distance from Parc Avenue and Little Italy and its restaurants, bars and coffee shops. - very easy to commute, 5 -10 min drive downtown. depending on traffic. - bus drops you of near the building. - metro (underground) 5 - 6 minutes walking distance.
description: I just opened this cathedralic Loft for guests and waiting for bookings. Located in Mile End - Plateau  Mount Royal:  - night life with bars just at the corner of the street 2 minutes from home. - 5 minutes walking distance from Parc Avenue and Little Italy and its restaurants, bars and coffee shops. - very easy to commute, 5 -10 min drive downtown. depending on traffic. - bus drops you of near the building. - metro (underground) 5 - 6 minutes walking distance.

reviews.comments:
Mario’s loft was the perfect home-away from home for my first time in Montreal. It was well-kept, clean, and inviting with beautiful windows and thoughtful finishing touches throughout the space. Mario and his wife thought of everything and were always speedy to respond during my stay.

A few highlights: great neighborhood with everything you could need in walking distance, quiet neighbors, speedy wifi, jacuzzi tub with rainfall shower, stylish and modern, plush linens, fully equipped kitchen 

Would definitely come back again!
The place was beautiful the neighbours were nice. Host came and gave us a quick visit. Only minor issues; the toilet chain keeps falling. Overall great experience.
Loft incroyable et très grand, c’était super ! rien à dire
Great loft, lots of room and close to where I needed to be. Some good bar/resto's in the neighbourhood within walking distance. Only negative was the TV is antenna so not many options.
(Website hidden by Airbnb) Le logement est superbe. C'est spacieux et très bien équipé, tout est propre et Mario est un hôte sympathique et compréhensif.

Mario’s place is amazing. Very nicely decorated, not too much. Everything is super clean, which is the most important thing for me, but the place is fully equipped for everything that you need. They don’t have a laundry room but I did not need that. Super great location, close to the metro (even though I drove there), close good restaurants and bars. 

I had an amazing experience and would recommend Mario’s place.

I had the pleasure of staying here for 12 nights in a row. The loft is incredible and beautifully styled. You're literally 1 minute away from everything you need so the location could not be better. The loft is very spacious and looks even better in person! I would highly recommend you book this place for your stay. The communication with Mario was awesome and he was fantastic host. I look forward to staying here again in the future! Thanks Mario!
Le logement est très bien situé et c'est aussi un beau logement.
Not sure
very stylish place. lots of space. comfortable bed. kitchen is a bit understocked for cooking, but with plenty of restaurants and bars around that might not be an issue.
Great place

As native Montrealers, we appreciated that the loft had touches that were “very Montreal”; the outside of the building is more industrial, so it’s a fun surprise to walk into the impeccable loft that’s been beautifully re-designed. The space was previously a dance studio and we liked that they left the old mambo logo on the door and windows. 

The space is airy and vast. It feels great to be in, has big windows and lots of light. Parking was a breeze, kitchen was well equipped, bathroom modern and clean, and upstairs bedroom in the loft was cozy. You’re walking distance to some of Montreal’s best (St Viateur Bagels, Cafe Olympico, and tons of decent local bars). We came as a family and loved it. I think it works well for both families and people looking to go out and party. Mario was very helpful and getting the keys was easy too.

Wow, what a spot. This is an immaculate studio apartment in the mile end area within walking distance to all its streets right out the door. I enjoyed the high-tech TV that allowed me to screen cast my phone (it also has chromecast, but no actual television programming). Bed was wonderfully comfortable. I was only there for one night, and Tony arranged for someone to meet me to deliver the keys, who was hospitable. 

Parking is in a gravel parking lot, and when parked in front of the kindergarten I felt like it was a safer spot. In the morning there are many people who use the lot, so you're not the only one. 

Kitchen is stocked with only the essentials, which is all I needed. My only wish is that their jet-bathtub in the bathroom was fully functional. Otherwise this is an excellent and very comfortable location.
Great stay, place was clean and tidy. Close to shops, restaurants and bars. Host was easy to communicate with. Would definitely book again!

Mario has a great place.  It's well done, and in a great part of town for restaurants & going out.  The only negative is noise at night due to location on busy road, but otherwise all great.  & Mario is very communicative!

The location and the facility were absolutely amazing!  Practically located, parking right next door, quiet for a very busy part of town, I can say nothing wrong about the place.  And the host was impeccable!
Place is OK. Feels Public. Not personal. Good location. Could be better furnished and decked out for this price.
First trip to Montreal, amazing place to stay close to everything and a very fun neighbourhood. A place you wont forget

Mario’s loft is beautiful in person, great location, large, bright and airy. The loft was extremely clean and everything I needed as far as amenities was available. Would definitely stay again for my next visit to Montreal.

I absolutely fell in love again with Montreal, with an old friend, and with Mario's place. I was so sad to leave! NO complaints really--beautiful wooden floors and floor to ceiling windows--great location in Mile End. It's a good 20 minute walk to old montreal, but I have been there done that, and if you want to go it's a 10 dollar cab ride. Mario's place was perfect! The bed was super comfy, the shower and tub were huge, the lighting in the place was gorgeous. Big kitchen, huge living room and TV area. OH! and I loved the floor length mirror off of the living room, which is fun to use for whatever self reflective purposes you find helpful. :)
Would be nice if there was more than just a huge comforter for the bed, it was hot and we just needed a sheet.
Amazing apartment with plenty of space for a group of people. Everything was clean and in order. In addition, the location is really close to about everything you would need.

L'appartement est spacieux, propre, et la localisation est parfaite!
Nous avons réservé à la dernière minute et je suis satisfaite de l'endroit. 
Il manque quelques instruments dans la cuisine (1 seul couteau à beurre) et le lavabo de la cuisine était bloqué.  Mario est disponible et facile à joindre, et il a tenté de réparer le lavabo, mais malheureusement il n'a pas pu le réparer avant notre départ. 
Il accepté que nous partions à 14h et ce sans frais, et ceci est très apprécié.
Globalement un bon choix!

Wow, where to start,? The place, the neighborhood, the care, the space, the tastes, the quick response, the coffee shops around, the smile when I wake up and go to sleep in this apartment - I definitely will come back, I definitely give 5 starts, and 5 stars more !!!! Wow!
Sink don’t work outside of that their pretty easy to get along with !
Good overall, but kitchen sink was broken.
huge space, good location, great stay

I see there was another review about the kitchen sink being broken. Wish I had seen that before I booked... I was advised when I arrived that the sink wasn’t working. There is a bucket under the sink which leaked all of the floor on my first day. The host told me there was nothing he could do about this and asked me to clean it myself.  I then tried to use the dishwasher to clean my dishes. It leaked a pool of water all over the floor. When I messaged the host for help, they brought me a mop and were angry that I used the dishwasher, stating that I was ruining someone’s boutique below their place. I cleaned the mess myself and had to do dishes in the bathtub for the rest of my weekend. The fridge also doesn’t close all the way so I had to briefly transfer things to the freezer to keep them cold and the TV was locked on someone else’s chrome cast for the entire stay. Definitely a non functional Airbnb until they repair the above issues and the host was rude/unhelpful with all of the things that weren’t working.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Mario’s loft is breathtaking, I felt like a celebrity. It is gigantic with great furniture, lighting, an aesthetics. I’ve never stayed anywhere nicer. The place was twice as big as I expected, and we spent about an hour after we got in talking about how lucky we were to have booked this place. The windows and ceiling are gigantic. The place is fairly centrally located close to all of the hip restaurants and bars in the Mile End area which is one of the coolest areas of Montreal. Mario was super accommodating and helpful. I arrived late in night and he was able to make arrangements for the keys.

The building has an amazing rooftop swimming pool and other common facilities. host.host_about:
Hello!
We are Porto365. Since 2009 our small company manages several properties strategically located in the center of Porto. Our commitment is to provide quality, confort and attendance to our guests so that they feel like home while among us. 
Our apartments are the best choice for your stay.
Located in the city centre and close to all the city's major attractions, nearby an enormous variaty of restaurants, traditional shops and bars, our apartments dispose of all the amenities and confort for a pleasent stay. 
Our staff is totally dedicated to the well-being of the clients and always available to advise and help in what is necessary. 
We look forward for your visit. See you soon!   

The Porto365 team.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: El piso ha superado nuestras expectativas. Precioso, decorado con mucho gusto, muy limpio, muy bien equipado con todo lo que se necesita. Además de eso, habéis sido muy amables con toda la explicación de la ciudad, recomendaciones de lugares que visitar y sitios donde degustar la gastronomía de Portugal. Increíble. Una atención inmejorable. Nuestro vuelo se retrasó, y no hubo ningún problema tras notificarlo por email/SMS. Y, además de todo esto, nos regalaron una botella de vino a nuestra llegada. Simplemente perfecto.

name: Casa da Picaria 4 | Studio Deluxe
summary: Studio for 2 persons in the city centre
space: Stay in the heart of Porto Set in a 18th century building, renovated in 2017, the Casa da Picaria is located at 100 m from Praça D. Filipa de Lencastre and a 10-minute walk from Trindade Metro Station. The emblematic São Bento railway station, Clérigos Tower and Bookshop – Livraria Lello are within a 10-minute walk each, while Ribeira is a 20-minute walk. Each of the apartments maintains the spirit and the architecture of the original building, coupled with a contemporary décor. The apartments are equipped with a small kitchenette, private bathroom, flat-screen TV and air conditioning. Internet access via WiFi is free throughout the building. Luggage storage is also provided, free of charge. Rua de Santa Catarina and Rua dos Clérigos are one of Porto's main shopping streets, are 10-minute walk away. Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is around a 40-minute metro ride away. União de Freguesias do Centro is a great choice for travellers interested in architecture, wine and city w

reviews.comments:
Susana y Alexandre fueron unos anfitriones muy atentos. Nos esperaron a la hora prevista y nos dieron buenas recomendaciones para visitar Oporto. Muy comunicativos y rápidos en las respuestas.
El apartamento es precioso y fiel a las fotografías que se muestran. El barrio en el que está es muy chulo y céntrico y tiene una buena variedad de tiendas y restaurantes.  
Lo recomiendo 100%.

The hosts were very attentive and warm. Luggage storage on site was very handy!! The place was gorgeous and in a great location - many great (and trendy) bars, cafes and restaurants around. Close to transport and walkable distance to many landmarks! Highly recommend walking over the bridge for sunset.
Inmejorable

name: Cozy 1BR in heart of Hong Kong
summary: Cozy 1 bedroom apartment located in popular neighbour hood Sai Ying Pun. Walking distance to MTR, coffee shops, restaurants, supermarket and markets. Close to Central, far enough from chaos, Sai Ying Pun is a great place to be. The neighbourhood has a nice mixture of old school charm as well as a variety of great restaurants and cafes.  The apartment itself has everything you need for a home away from home.

The apartment is nice and very close to the MTR station. Amelia is very responsive and helpful. We enjoyed our stay in the apartment.
非常棒的住宿体验,交通方便就在地铁口,住宿设施也很齐全!
Lovely house, good location, nice host! very comfortable and convenient

Originally from Holland, I have been living in Barcelona for over 10 years now.
Looking forward to welcome you in Barcelona and to help you on your way to explore this sunny city at the sea side.

name: Newly renovated Paddington Terrace
summary: Our newly renovated 2 bedroom terrace is perfectly located in the heart of Paddington and offers everything you need for the perfect getaway!!  You are walking distance into Surry Hills or the city and only a short drive to Bondi.  Bathed in natural light, the opening plan living and dining seamlessly connects with the brand new kitchen that has everything you need to whip up a storm.  The gardens are yet to be finished but everything internally is perfect, you won’t be disappointed!!
space: Make sure self at home and relax in our newly updated property. We have Foxtel, Netflix and an Apple TV so feel free to use them as you wish.  The brand new kitchen has an induction cooktop and multi function oven. Also feel free to use what you need from the kitchen.  There are electric skylights in the kitchen and bathroom so you can control how much light and ventilation you desire all from a touch pad!! Finally, both rooms have new Koala mattresses which will ensure an amazing nights sleep after your busy day exploring Sydney.

neighborhood_overview: Paddington is the perfect location for anyone’s stay in Sydney. You can wander the heritage streets and take in the character and charm of the area.  You are literally mins walk from Sydney’s famous Oxford St and Five Ways where you can shop until your heart's content or relax at a cafe. You can walk into the city or head down to the beach which is just a short drive away.
notes: The garbage truck comes pretty early on Monday mornings so it might be a little loud for a minute.
transit: Being just mins from Oxford Street, getting a bus is really easy.  Uber’s are everywhere and it won’t cost much to get into the city or the surrounding suburbs.
access: You will access to the entire property. Please note that the landscaping along the side and back of the property is still a work in progress.
interaction: I will be away and will always be available using the Airbnb messaging service.
house_rules: - No noise after 10pm - No parties

host.host_about: Australian accountant living in Sydney

name: LARGE ARTSY Room w/ Loft Bed 4 DOOGLERS!
summary: Large room primarily rented monthly with a 20% to 25% discount depending on the time of year. I has windows on both sides for great sunlight with a King Size Loft bed, plush fresh white linens & towels. A very soft comfortable sofa & big desk & 27” iMAC for guest emails, FaceTime & work, Wireless Wifi, fridge, tv with cable, a keurig coffee maker, iron & ironing board & hair dryer.   (G interns, DOOGLERS, Greyglers) Stay here during their 3 month internships. Folding Twin bed available also.
space: Large private room in my Artist Apartment. You do have to walk through my main living area to access the fully private room. It’s spacious and full of sunlight with a loft bed. This room is spacious for New York like a mini studio.  It’s  by Chelsea Market across from the big G - (Hidden by Airbnb) search  engine building  The room has 27” IMAC, a fridge, wireless wifi Internet, fridge, tv with cable, DVDs, coffee maker, microwave, white fresh linens & bath towels.  Again, IN THE HEART OF CHELSEA downtown by the High line and Chelsea Market for great eating and shopping. LOCATION: I rent two furnished rooms in my apartment. I live in the main area of the apartment. We all share the bathroom. There are also two animals in the apartment my dog a jack russell AL and Tuxie the cat - both of whom stay in the main living area with me.  I do not allow smoking of any kind in the apartment. SUBWAYS THE A  C train lines are right downstairs  The number 1 subway is literally one small block away.
