Again, IN THE HEART OF CHELSEA d
neighborhood_overview: GREAT Central Location. On 15th street between 8th and 9th ave right by the Chelsea Market just across from the big G search engine & the Apple store a half a block away.  I love Budakann and all the restaurants in the neighborhood too. It's also fun to see the designer shops off 14th and 10th ave like Jeffery's and more. Love the sushi in Chelsea Market too!
notes: Chelsea is a great area of town central to everything by foot.  This listing has a dog and cat residing here who are not allowed in your room except for short visits. You can paint in the room and Olan has an easel for you along with art supplies and canvas should you wish to express yourself.
transit: The A and CC 8th ave subway line is a half block away and the 1 line is a block away on 7 th ave.
access: Guests enjoy their own large private room with wireless wifi, tv and cable, fridge  & a microwave. They have fresh white fresh linens and towels in their room when they arrive. Also a gift basket for every guest and a stocked fridge with water, orange juice and other snacks. Guests share the bathroom. Artist Olan works' lives in the main living area of the apartment with his dog Big Al and Tuxie the cat.
interaction: Hi! My name is Olan.  FUN FACT: If you haven't figured it out. DOOGLERS are people who work at the big G who have and love dogs!  I live here in the main living area of my apartment located in beautiful Chelsea right across from offices of that famous G search engine with my dog Al and cat Tuxie (who are not allowed in your room by the way). So the great thing is I am here on the premises should you need something & your private room is clean and quiet and great for lounging and relaxing. Your private fridge is filled with snacks for you and we enjoy making breakfast to welcome you on your first morning when you come stay. And since I am here I am always happy to give you directions or information on local happenings.
house_rules: We love having guests. So there are a few simple rules so you enjoy your stay with us. HOUSE RULES  late night behavior and house guests 1.) OVER- NIGHT Guests are NOT PERMITTED unless organized prior to your stay through Airbnb's added guest policy. 2.)  DAY TIME visting Guests are allowed between the hours of 11 am and 10 pm. 3.) YOU ARE ENTIRELY RESPONISLBE OR YOUR DAY time VISITOR  4.) Illegal substances are NOT allowed.  If you are  caught with any you will be asked to leave immediately, forfeit your money paid and the police will be call immediately. 5.)  Violence in any form, alcohol induced or not, is NOT permitted on in this apartment. ANYONE found to act in any agressive manner, including threats of violence will be asked to leave immediately. 7.) YOU ARE RESPONISBLE for you own behavior when consuming Alchoholic beverages on the premises. YOU MUST BE OF U.S. LEGAL DRINKING AGE. THAT IS 21!!! 6.)  We ask that you leave the room the way you found it.  A. Short term stays of le

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I am an artist and actor living in New York with my dog Al & cat Tuxie. The two bedrooms in our apartment are exclusively used for guest rentals while we use the main living area for ourselves for work and sleep. Big Al & Tuxie are only allowed short visits with guests in the rented rooms which are private, relaxing and like home away from home with an artist vibe.

Since websites are not allowed on AIRBNB feel free to do a web search about Olan Art/Actor & check out my acting work on IMDB to find out more about me my art and photography.

reviews.comments: my girlfriend and I had an a amazing stay at Olan's place, we spent 1 month there out of a 3 month stay in NY, and by far we had the best time there out of our whole trip. Olan is a great guy (and a great cook!) and will make you feel very comfortable and welcome during your stay! its a very cool room with a lot of cool art and a great vibe. will being going back there for sure next time!!! ... if available ;)
The reservation was canceled 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Where to begin? Olan is an amazing host!! He is very kind and did not treat me as a tenant but as a friend. He is definitely one of a kind. The room is very nice, clean, bright, and decorated with art, some of it created by Olan himself. The whole aparent is very comfortable and clean. 
The neighborhood is great. Walking distance to Chelsea market, high line and the subway.
When I go back to NY I would live to stay at Olan's again, if the room is available of course!

Olan was the most generous host. I was so spoilt. He made breakfast in the mornings and was always offering delicious dinners. The room was great. Very artsy space with a comfy bed and lots of nooks and crannys to hang about. The location is right in the centre of all the action! It's an opportunity not to be missed!

Great host & always cooked for me... I love it & it was totally unexpected. 
Truly a great host & a unique space. 
The neighborhood is awesome - I've always loved Chelsea; and Olan is able to give directions anywhere when needed. 
So cool - I highly recommend.

It was a great pleasure to stay at Olan's apartment. The room is really spacious and full of amazing artwork. The location of the apartment is incredible, right in the heart of Chelsea near the Chelsea Market and 14th St A,C, E subway stop. Olan was very welcoming when I first arrive and throughout my whole stay. He would often cook me meals and was very easy going about my crazy work schedule. A+++

I found this to be a great place to stay, for three reasons:
1. The room is large, with a desk, fridge, tv, and plent of space to sprawl out. It is also decorated with lots of cool art. Further it is surprisingly quiet for a Manhattan apartment. 
2. Olan and his dog were great. Olan showed me around the area, offered food, and made it a nice place to be. 
3. Chelsea is a great place to stay in Manhattan which made walking home a lot shorter after heading out at night. further this apartment is close to a station covering the A, C, E & L lines so it is easy to get north/south Manhattan and across to Brooklyn very easily.

Fantastic location within reach of all the great things Chelsea has to offer. We enjoyed the stay with Olan and his two pets. The quirky room is filled with lots of artwork and is well equipped. Olan loves to cook and we got spoilt with cooked breakfasts. He is very accommodating, good company and has got a good sense of humor. 

Hopefully we will return one day!

Olan was really hospitable and caring! Often cooked breakfast for me and helped me with my living in New York. The room is pretty too, a great sense of art. I had a cat with me and Olan was always helpful. I enjoyed my stay :)

I had a great time at Chelsea with Olan. Friendly talks, a funky bedroom with art everywhere, the most protein rich breakfasts I had in a long time. No wonder he is getting that good reviews! Recommended.

What a FABULOUS host.  Olan met me when I first arrived and showed me everything in the apartment and made me feel very welcome.  The next morning he was kind enough to make me a delicious breakfast.

I would have no hesitation in recommending this room to you, the room is just like it looks in the photos.  The artwork is quirky & fantastic and really makes it a great place to stay.  The desk was a bonus for me as I had some work to do when I was not "doing" New York.

The location was perfect.  Right by the E line at 14th St/8th Av and easy walking distance to Union Square as well as all the great bars & restaurants of Chelsea, Meatpacking DIstrict & West Village.  Make sure you take a walk along the Highline as well.

It's totally different to a stay in a hotel but so much better and more interesting. Lovely host who gaves you great suggestions. The flat is very funny, a bit small for 3 people but I'm sure it will be perfect for 2.

An artist's paradise! Olan is himself an artist with southern hospitality, delicious breakfasts and snacks (the room was stocked full of snacks, fruit, and water), and a SUPER comfortable bed. I ended having to work quite a bit from the room while there and Olan (and his animals) offered me the right mix of privacy and conversation breaks. Plus, the location is perfect with Chelsea Market, The High Line park, hip restaurants, and convenient subway access. Highly recommend!

Indeed a very WHITE SUNNY ARTISTS room. But also clean, nice and located perfectly nearly next to the Chelsey Market in the center of Meatpacking District. Olan is a great host, superfriendly. He seemed to really enjoy showing us around and meeting new guests.
We felt very welcome. If we ever visit NYC again, we hope we can stay here again.

I stayed at Olan's place for 10 days and it was an amazing experience! The room is beautiful and looks just like the photos. Olan is a great host; he cooked breakfast for me, with different menu each day! He is accommodating and gives great tips about the city. Al the dog and Tuxie the cat like to visit the room and I love them. However if you don't like pets in the room you can always keep them out. The apartment is well-located for exploring the city. This is my first experience with airbnb and I couldn't be happier! Thank you, Olan. Looking forward to visit again in the future. Anastasia
Location is great, Olan is a nice host, but the appartment is not very clean.

I couldn't have had a better stay in NY than I did with Olan. The room is perfect, and exactly as described. Olan is an excellent host, and welcomed me into his home. He even cooked breakfast every day.

It's a great location, too, very close to subway stops that can take you to all parts of the city, and Chelsea is a lovely location itself, with so much to see and do.

If I'm ever in New York again, I'll be sure to stay with Olan.

Every minute at Olan's apartment is a gift! 
You get much more than you see in the picture.
Perfect location to travel anywhere. Meat Packing district is very hip and artistic area, tons of good restaurants and interesting fashion boutique.

If you want to be inspired and get tons of good energy, this is the place to be. Olan is such a wonderful host, he is very intelligent and interesting person. While I was there, he made me a breakfast (very nice presentation and yummy!) and a fridge full of juices, water and yogurts. Also you have a microwave to yourself.

The bed is very cozy and clean. This place really makes me feel home. I am also an animal lover. Tuxy (cat) and Al (dog) will be your best friends, they are wonderful to be around :)

We had a wonderful experience staying with Olan.  His place was exactly as pictured/described, and was clean and bright with easy access to the subway.  The shower was hot, and the bed was super comfortable.  Olan was a great host.  He was generous, helpful, and made us breakfast.  This was our first experience with Airbnb and it was a great one.  Thanks, Olan!

Olan is a great host - I mean, he makes you breakfast in bed!
The room is great, you have more than enough space, snacks, TV, a desk and the bed is super comfortable!
Just bear in mind that there is no elevator (luckily the housemate helped me with my suitcase - so it wasn't really a biggie for me) and it definitely is an artsy apartment, so if you are expecting a sleek, modern and smooth surfaced apartment, this is probably not the place for you. Finally, the area is amazing, heart of meatpacking with the Chelsea market on your doorstep. 
I'd recommend it any day.

I felt truly lucky to have found such a great space in one of the best parts of NYC and to stay with someone who is as gracious, kind and fun to spend time around as Olan. The location couldn't be better (1/2 block to  Chelsea Market and major subway lines), the room is quiet and like a private little studio all to yourself, and Olan is the best! I highly recommend his place and look forward to visiting NYC again.

Hi everyone! Ive been at Olan place for 30 days. The white room was quite big and comfy. It has fridge, microwave, TV and coffe maker, all you may need for a pleasant and privacy stay. Although I had to share the bathroom, always was free for me!. I have to thank Olan for the nice breakfast that some days he prepared for me as well as fresh chicken soup in those cold days. It was very kind of him. Also Herald helped me a lot with the suitcase and laundry. Thanks!. However, without doubt the best of this private room is the location. 15th street, just a couple of minutes  walking to chelsea market and subways. A very nice and cool area to enjoy your stay in Manhattan. Very close of everything and well communicated. I highly recommend it!

It was the best Christmas experience! We spent a week at Olan's place! Olan fixed delicious breakfast for us everyday, I really appreciate for his kindness! The room was cozy and comfy, has everything such as snacks and fresh towels! I felt like home there! The Chelsea neiborhood is very nice, it has all the things I need. The location is great, I went to a lot of art galleries and restaurants by walking. I hope I could stay longer here, with Olan and his two cute pets! I recommend this place to all the people who are looking for an artistic and private space to stay in Manhattan!

Wow! Even after all of the rave reviews, I was blown away by Olan's caring, generous hosting. He could not have been kinder, more generous or more considerate.  He made us breakfasts, provided snacks and even quality DVDs for when it got just too cold outside!

The room is just like the picture, the bed comfy, with luxurious sheets.   There is a lovely sense of light in the room and the sunshine comes in.  By Manhattan standards the room is large. 

The location is fabulous, with a subway station about a block away, the Chelsea markets less than a block away and the Highline about the same. 

Olan has effectively converted the lounge room into another bedroom (which he has). This means there isn't a lounge room, only bedrooms and a computer nook connected by hallways.  There is also the reality of a small space with dog + cat. Ie, the cat's food bowl is on the bench and there is a pee mat for Al the dog, in the kitchen (old dogs need concessions). If you can manage with those realities, I highly recommend. 

The apartment was clean and delightfully arty,  our room squeaky clean, and Olan as a host was simply knock your socks off, 5 star.

Olan is a superhero of Airbnb for his hospitality, wonderful personality and beautiful apartment suite. The sunny art room was a great place for me to rest, think and work for a month. I loved the small mini-kitchen area where Olan stocked water, snacks and delicious chocolate for me, as well as the desk where I found myself amazingly productive and inspired. 

Olan cooked breakfast for me, which I loved, and we bonded over Game of Thrones weekly since Olan has HBO. Al the dog and Tuxie the cat were lovely creatures and it was great to have pets for a month! The location is convenient to the subway, Chelsea Market, restaurants and two organic juice bars, which made me very happy. 

I feel that not only did I find a place to stay, I also made a friend. Thank you, Olan!

I had a great stay in Olan's Art Room.  Olan is a generous and interesting host, very kind, and makes great breakfasts!  The room is very comfortable, and I was greeted with fresh fruit, chocolates, and a small fridge stuffed with complementary snacks, juices and water.  There is a coffee maker, cereal, and other amenities, all most considerately supplied.  The bed is very comfortable, and I made steady use of the writing desk.  Internet service was updated while I was there, and was fast and convenient.  Olan is very sensitive to allowing one privacy, but also warm and open to conversation.  

In all, I was very comfortable and relaxed in this room, and very much enjoyed my time there.  The location is fantastic for the Village and the west side.

Olan is a fantastic host! His home is a perfect sanctuary for us young students that find ourselves traveling to the city on internships. He is caring, thoughtful, and always concerned with the wellbeing of his guests, but also leaves you as much space as you desire. I would definitely come back!

Staying with Olan was such an incredibly way to experience NYC. I spent 28 days with him in July 2014 and wish it was longer. He is not only one of the nicest people I have ever met, but his apartment is also very bohemian and cool.  I would recommend to anyone going to NYC to stay with Olan in Chelsea!

I do not know where to start, actually. I arrived in New York City as a stranger in hope to find a place to get to know the city and to relax - and that is exactly what Olan has provided me with. Not only is the apartment cozy, welcoming and granted with an unique atmosphere, it is also the home of a wonderful host and his two companions Tuxie and Al ( a cat and a dog ). 
That being said, Olan made me feel like I was at home from the very right beginning. The spacious art room is equipped with everything you need - and even more. Even though the location is in the middle of everything, it is completely quiet and you will eventually sleep like a baby. 
Also, Olan was extremely helpful. He gave me great advice, which helped to find a solution for any question/issue I had on my way.
It was extremely easy to get along with Olan and somehow the feeling of being a stranger in such a big city as New York suddenly fell flat after I entered Olan's warmhearted hospitality.
I was really sad when it was time for me to leave - even though it was just a week, I made a new friend, who will probably last for a long time.
I highly recommend Olan's place - whether you want company or time for yourself - this is the place to be ! No doubt about that !

Olan is a wonderful host. He made us feel right at home and was extremely accommodating. His apartment is filled with art, fun, colorful, and very tidy. The bed is comfy and the towels are soft. His location is superb. We walked to everything. And he served us an amazing breakfast each morning. I enjoyed every minute. I will be back!

Olan was most welcoming and I immediately felt comfortable staying in his apartment. He was generous with his time and gave great advice on activities in NYC. 
The position of the apartment was fantastic; close to the subway, Chelsea market and lots of galleries, restaurants and things to do. I highly recommend staying with Olan for a genuine NY experience- much more fun than an impersonal hotel.

Olan was very welcoming and really made us feel right at home from the minute we stepped into his apartment. He is a very warm and giving person that will help you make sure your stay is problem free. Every morning he would get up and make us breakfast which was a great way to start the day. The apartment is very cozy and has the perfect location, situated just one block away from Chelsea Market and Meatpacking. We will definitely stay with Olan the next time we are back in NYC and we can strongly recommend his place to anybody who considers staying in NYC.

Nous avons passé une semaine merveilleuse à New York. L'appartement et l'accueil d'Olan y ont grandement contribué. Nous avons découvert non seulement un quartier joli et animé, mais également une personne attachante soucieuse de notre bien-être et de notre tranquillité. Ses petits déjeuners sont incroyables ! La chambre est un petit appartement à elle toute seule, avec son canapé, son lit en mezzanine, son frigo et son garde-manger bien garni ! Plusieurs stations de métro très proches nous emmenaient dans la plupart des quartiers, dont Brooklyn. Nous recommandons vivement ce logement et son propriétaire !

Olan was a great host! He is very welcoming and caring. His place is very clean, cosy and the art makes it really unique. His pets are just adorable too and if you don't like them it's ok cause they won't be entering your space anyways unless upon your permission
Location of the apartment is perfect. Walking distance to very nice restaurants, shopping and high line.

Olan is a wonderfully happy host. He set me at ease with speedy email responses. He shared loads of info on his neighborhood and as soon as I got in we walked the handsome Big Al, jack russell terrier, which gave me the lay of the land. Olan cooked me the most colorful, amazing breakfasts! I stayed alone the first few days and it's valuable to know that I felt very safe. The studio is very bohemian artsy with enough room for two adults. My boyfriend Frank arrived midway through the week and loved the cat Tuxie, Big Al and Olan. With the way the studio is set up Frank and I felt like we had enough privacy, felt lucky we had enough snacks and water yet wanted to leave the door open to share our experiences with Olan. We will definitely stay with Olan again and recommend his studio to others!

Olan was a fantastic host and the art room was the perfect set up for my time in the city! He was very welcoming and warm and cannot imagine a better host and location.  I had a great experience in the city and left with a new friendship on top of it!

We left Olans house 2 hours ago and already miss him! New York can be a crazy place and it was such a comfort knowing we had someone who had our back. We felt right at home in our cozy yet spacious room. We loved the puppy Al and sometimes the kitty too. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone and would stay here again myself .

I had a great time staying with Olan, he's a caring, sweet and cheerful host. He would make me breakfast to cheer me up and always offer to clean the towels and sheets. He has an eye for art, and I loved the photos he took! It's worth mentioning his dog and cat, Al and Tuxie. I miss them all!

I had a great time staying with Olan! He has the kindest heart and goes out of his way to make sure that your stay is comfortable. He and Al (very loving dog) make a great team. The room is beautiful, very comfortable, and has everything you could possibly need during your stay—including chocolate! Olan's art is fantastic and lines the walls of the apartment. The apartment is located in a great area and right next to the Subway. I loved walking to and along the Hudson River and through Greenwich Village to Washington Square Park. Lots of great places to eat and very comfortable area.

Olan is a lovely person and a great host. My experience in New York wouldn't have been the same without him and without Tuxie and Mr.Al. Every morning, no matter the time, he fixed delicious breakfasts. I am vegetarian, and Olan found yummy ways to make my morning meal different and tasty. The room is cozy and sunny, a nice space to relax, and move your legs if you need to. Clean sheets and towels are provided every week. 
No matter the rush of the city, no matter the weather, at Olan's apt. you will feel at home, and never alone. Also you will be right in the middle of Chelsea and Meatpacking district, which are safe and amazing areas where to walk, do shopping, having brunch and experience the real vibe of the city!
Olan是一位貼心又友好的房東, 特別在適當的時間準備早餐和宵夜給房客, 此外在生活所需的盥洗用品皆一應俱全, 床墊和環境也相當適合旅途疲憊後的休息和放鬆｡下次有機會來紐約, 希望能夠再次來到Olan的家｡

First of all, Olan is such an attentive and generous host and we loved staying with him for our time in New York! He is a super host for a very good reason. He was very kind to us with Check In and Check Out times, which was hugely helpful and greatly appreciated. Our every need was catered for with breakfast in the mornings and a mini fridge with snacks and drinks. He was always full of good information for the area and tips and tricks for the city. Getting around was a breeze  - his place is in an amazing location, you're walking distance to all the best spots in the downtown area. It's also incredibly close to the Subway line, which has express and local trains running every 5-10 minutes. We are so glad to have stayed with him and will definitely be coming back again! You can really tell the love and attention he puts into each guest coming to stay and we highly recommend him to anyone

Since I couldn't find reviews written in Japanese, I'll be writing!
日本語のﾚﾋﾞｭｰがあまり見当たらなかったので書こうと思います｡
今回年末から年始にかけて8日間程滞在したのですが､とても良い部屋でした!部屋は彼の書いたｱｰﾄで溢れていてとてもおしゃれで､ﾎｽﾄのｵﾗﾝも優しく､彼は犬と猫を1匹ずつ飼っているのですが2匹とも可愛いかったです｡ただｱﾚﾙｷﾞｰの方は気を付けて下さいね｡
場所もﾐｯﾄﾞﾀｳﾝにもﾌﾞﾙｯｸﾘﾝにも繋がる便利なところにあるのでとても移動しやすかったです｡すぐ近くにPharmacy という24時間営業のｺﾝﾋﾞﾆみたいなところもありました｡それと毎朝出てくる朝ご飯も美味しかったです｡
ｵﾗﾝはｺﾐｭﾆｹｰｼｮﾝも取りやすいしゆっくりと話すので英語に自信がなくてもきっと大丈夫だと思います｡
実はこのｱﾊﾟｰﾄは2部屋あって､こちらは大きい方の部屋ですが､特に広さを求めないならもう一つの部屋が少し安いのでそちらも良いかもしれません｡他にも困った事があったりちょっとしたことでも彼は助けてくれるので､とても良い部屋だと思います!

Great hospitality, proper courtesy, and comfortable mood! I love it!

I stayed at Olan's apartment for much of February and March, and I totally recommend the apartment and experience. Olan is friendly, accommodating and warm, and a true friend and great host. He provides hand picked welcome packs to guests, and even made me breakfast on several occasions! He has a friendly dog and a cute cat, and the apartment is in a great location in West Village/ Greenwich Village (close to cafes, bars, great shopping etc). The room itself is clean, large and private, with a desk and couch that enable you to work from home when you need to :) Olan is also a great host because he lives  that WV/ GV lifestyle, with his roles and active life in theatre, film and TV, as well as his work in fashion and photography. So particularly for people new to New York, he is happy to share his experiences and provide a window into those cultures. Olan is a great host and friend and I would enthusiastically recommend his home to anyone. I would also be happy to stay there again in the future!

Without a doubt my finest AirBnb experience to date. Olan was a great host - he was polite, welcoming, fun to talk to, and made delicious surprise breakfasts. He went out of his way to make sure I was comfortable. The location is also superb - it's less than one block to the subway station and less than one block to Chelsea Market. I will be staying with Olan the next time I visit New York.

I had a lovely time at this apartment. Olan is a fantastic and welcoming host. He was helpful and polite and always provided a great breakfast. The neighbourhood is a great mix of cool, hip places to eat and drink and the location is just right.

Olan's accom very conveniently located - for anything really. So much to see and do around Chelsea, Greenwich and the Meatpacking District, with easy access to the subway and buses.
Olan was very welcoming and helpful all of the time. A very interesting host who was kept busy himself with his art projects. Healthy breakfast served each morning was delicious. 
I had a great time as Olan was always up for an interesting chat. I would stay with Olan again and 
definitely recommend him and his for a very iconic stay in the Big Apple.

We just came back from our phantastic holiday in New York and a very lovely stay at Olan's place. 

Olan was an awesome, fun and friendly host. We really had the best time there and always felt very easy and welcome. He just did everything to make us happy and comfort us. Especially the breakfast was beyond any expectations (pancakes, quiche, eggs, fresh juices, coffee or yogurth with fruits).

The room ist just perfect in size and the bed was so comfy. You can hang your clothes, eat/study/write at the desk, watch tv/videos or relax on the couch.  Olan prepared lots of fresh fruits, drinks and  we could also make our own tea or coffee. 

The location in West Village/Greenwich Village is absolutely perfect. You have so many good and also famous/hip restaurants, brand shops, Chelsea market, the Whitney Museum, subway, bike rentals and the Hudson river within a few minutes walk. 

We also got along very well with the little dog and cat. They were fun and friendly and made us even more feel like home. 

Olan is a great, fun and very interesting guy. Working on Little films, doing fashionshoots, acting and his paintings are really nice. You can always have a great, fun and interesting talk with him. We are still laughing about some of the stories. And he really can tell you interesting things about the City or where to go. 

This was such a great AirBnB experience and we fully recommend Olan an his lovely, artistic place. 

Thank you soo much. We would love to stay there again.

I don't know where to start...... My stay in NYC with Olan has been the most incredible experience. The apartment is super cool, artsy, yet homely. Olan looked after me as if I was family and surprised me every morning with the most amazing breakfasts. He was always available to help and advise with any questions I had about the city. The location is just perfect, close to very cool shops, restaurants, Chelsea Market and the subway. Olan is a very talented artist and actor and I was lucky enough to have been involved in his work whilst I was there. His dog and cat are gorgeous and they truly adore him. He was flexible with check in and check out times as my flight was delayed. The only problem with check out was that I was devastated to be leaving. In summary it was just perfect. I can't thank Olan enough.

Olan's room is seriously amazing, and you will NOT find a listing this high-quality for the price, especially considering the location. Super close to the A/C/E, 1/2/3, and L subway lines, and a short walk from the High Line and Chelsea Market. The room itself has great decorations, a comfy sofa AND loft bed, plus ample space. Lots of snacks and amenities provided too! The high-powered AC was a big plus for me (seeing as I visited during a late-summer heat wave). Also Olan himself is really nice and provides useful tips (and his cat and dog are very friendly). Highly recommended overall, I had a great experience.
Room, location, and host were exactly as described and exceedingly pleasant!

Super nice and accommodating guy with adorable pets. Follow his simple and reasonable rules, and he goes out of his way to make your stay super easy. He'd get 6 stars for Amenities if that was an option.

Olan is an exceptionally welcoming host who greets you warmly and goes above and beyond to ensure your stay is enjoyable. The room is clean, tidy and has a small fridge, couch and loft bed with television.  Olan provides a wide variety of complementary snacks and drinks including a Kurieg coffee machine and fruit bowl. Olan is mindful of any dietary restrictions you may have. There is a window with view of the city street and while I stayed there was no noise assuring a restful night.  Olan has decorated the home with furnishings, rugs and amnesties that give it a homely feel and his artwork certainly livens up the space. It is important to note that access to the room requires passing through Olan's living area space that he shares with his cat and small dog, separated by a hanging sheet. This includes when visiting the restroom and is not a problem as Olan respects your privacy and space. Just be careful not to trample his friendly pets during the night.  Pets will not enter your room so long as you keep your door closed. The listing does state that the  bathroom and kitchen are shared. In the bathroom is a variety of liquid soaps, shampoos and other products that can be used. 

The room features soft and comfortable bedding with many pillows and plentiful thick towels. There's a hanging space for your clothing near the window and several touch activated lamps in the room to create the desired ambience. 

The location is superb with a gourmet local market nearby and a subway entry that is less than 10 minutes to times square and Broadway. The apartment is one flight of stairs up with two security doors for entry to the complex. I felt that my valuables were perfectly safe being stored while I was out during the day.

Olan makes a superb breakfast in the morning and is happy to have a chat if you so wish. I highly recommend this property as a place to stay whether it's your first time in Manhattan or returning. I certainly will be looking to stay here again if I'm fortunate to visit from Australia again in the near future. A fantastic AirBnB location.

Olan's place became our New York home for a week. The location was perfect at such a lovely corner of Meatpacker and Chelsea, just tucked away from the bustle, but no more than 3 minutes walk from Chelsea market. Just across the street is the stairs down to the subway, which was so simple to use and became valuable as we explored the rest of Manhattan. Next to the apartment building is also a great coffee shop! Because its location you had the pick of the best restaurants/bars this area has to offer.

Olan went above and beyond as host. He gave us great tips of what to see and when to visit certain locations to avoid the crowds. He also makes excellent breakfasts! We did not want for anything during our stay, our fridge was stocked up, there was great snacks, fresh towels, bathrobes and even use of fresh toiletries. We felt very well taken cared of. 

The loft itself is so very comfortable with lots of space and looks onto the street. It's bright and airy and big enough for two people to relax in without being on top of each other. We made friends with Big Al (cute dog!) and Tuxie (aloof but affectionate cat) and they weren't an issue at all. 

I am so glad that we were able to book and stay with Olan and recommend this room and him as host if you ever decide to stay in this part of Manhattan.

I had a really happy and relaxed time at Olan's. He, Big Al and Tuxie became like room buddies and it was like staying with a friend, who I could chat to and completely be myself with. It sure helps to love animals to stay here! I also loved hearing about the range of Olan's fascinating creative projects, it felt I was in the middle of the scene!
I loved my cosy room with its hideaway snug loft bed, and all the details like touch lighting, a generously stocked fridge, masses of fruit, coffee machine and plentiful linens. Olan brings a fabulous breakfast in every morning, with healthy juice, fruit and yoghurt plus a cooked component with tomatoes and avocados. You won't go hungry staying here! 
All in all I'd recommend Olan's to those with an open mind and creative spirit. He is an extremely generous host.

I stayed at Olans and had a wonderful experience. I felt like I could be at ease in his home in fact it felt like I was visiting a old (not literally)Familiar friend .The location was perfect for my needs it was a great time.
Olan is such a great host! The area was perfect, the room was perfect, the amenities provided perfect. Definitely a place where I wanna stay again the next time I visit NYC.

Olan is an actor and had a gig on the day I arrived, but he communicated that via emails and his friend Betty met me at the door with the keys.  The location is wonderful.  It's only 1/2 a block away from the Chelsea Market with Metro stops near by.  Olan is an amazing host and person.  He made me breakfast one morning (which was delicious) and stocked the fridge in my room to the brim with snacks and drinks.  A plate of fresh fruits and a Keurig machine (with pods) were also in my room.  The bed was very comfortable and clean towels were alway available.  Olan is also an artist and the rooms are stocked with his amazing work.  A very nice stay.

Olan is adorable and I had the BEST time staying with him at his apartment.  I actually chose Olan's place because there was a dog and cat living there.  This always adds something special for me and of course I totally fell in love with Big Al and Tuxie the cat.  
The apartment itself is perfectly situated.  You are minutes away from everything, and the interior is a wonderful hot potch of paintings and textiles.  I loved my room - it had everything I needed, and when I arrived Olan had filled my fridge with veggie snacks, and had really taken time to think about what I would like.  Most days he brought me beautiful breakfast on a tray and was always around to give advice or a helping hand.  In fact he even went out on New Year's Day and got me provisions for my self induced hangover.  Just the kindest loveliest man.  I adored staying here, but if you're an animal lover and love art and artists this is the only place in Manhattan you should ever stay.

Olan's apartment is in a quiet neighborhood but it is also a great location to go anywhere. You can walk to subway stations and chelsea market in a few minutes. The room is private and clean. Olan is very friendly and his animal friends are very cute.

I stayed in Olan's place for 4 months and I really enjoyed my time there. Olan prepared food in my fridge before my arrival and the room also had a coffee machine. The room is quiet, clean, private and artistic. I really like his paintings on the wall. The apartment is in a great location: Chelsea market is in a minute walking distance; there are multiple subways and many restaurants in the neighborhood. Olan is really friendly and warm-hearted. His dog AL and cat Tuxie are adorable and friendly. I would like to stay in Olan's place next time when I visit NYC and I would recommend Olan's place to anyone who hopes to have a great experience in NYC!

LOVED IT!!!
We stayed in the larger of the two rooms available at Olan's place and I cannot express how in love I fell with the room. It is everything I would ever want in my own NYC apartment if I ever decided to move there. It really made me feel like I was getting the full NY experience rather than staying in a hotel.  The bed was extremely comfortable. I love pillows and this room had so many fluffy pillows. Our mini fridge was fully stocked with waters and other beverages. He was also kind enough to set out numerous snacks for us to enjoy during our stay. In our room were also robes, slippers, mouthwash, lotions. There was no detail that Olan didn't think of. I would definitely stay again.

I loved how friendly and welcoming Olan was. He was always available for any questions that we had. But if I'm being honest Big Al (dog) and Tuxie (cat) stole were the icing on the cake! They are the cutest little pair and I loved how they greeted us every morning before we left for the day and every night when we came back. They are so friendly and it made our stay with Olan that much better.

My stay with Olan was amazing - if I could give 6 stars, I would. He anticipated every need, included me in his life when I wanted to, and respected privacy otherwise. In addition, I had the privilege to get a glimpse of a pre-gentrification New York, which is a rare treat these days. I've stayed in NYC a couple of times, and this stay was my favorite.

I loved my stay at Olan's place. The location is perfect and Olan is a very caring, kind and helpful host. Our plane was delayed and Olan very kindly stayed up to welcome us. He cooked my friend and I lovely welcome breakfast and provided a wonderful range of snacks and a fridge full of bottled water. Olan's apartment is full of creativity and artistic flare. His pets are lovely and fun to have around. I very much enjoyed hanging out with Olan and enjoyed our chats. Olan also went out of his way to post a pair of jeans to my home address. I'd ordered them from a local shop and they didn't arrive before I left Olan's. Now I'm home miss Olan calling out 'welcome home' when I came back from a long day sightseeing.

If you want to stay in a cosy bohemian artist's apartment with a cat and a dog, you'll love this place. I had a great time here.  Olan is very friendly, excentric, super easy going, even though he sleeps in the common area you can come and go as you please without disturbing him. The room is big for one person, you sleep on a mezzanine, which is really nice, you have your comfy space away from the streets.....I loved watching movies and drawing up there. The neighborhood is amazing, it's safe to walk here anytime of the night. All in all I can only recommend this place, it's funky and I felt right at home living among three sweet boys :) thanks for the great stay guys.

* I get eczema from cat and dog hair so I just didn't let them in the room, it was not an issue. They are also not allowed in the bathroom. But if you don't like animals, this might not be the best place for you ~

What a perfect stay! Of course the location/room/apartment are absolutely incredible (see all the other reviews!) but Olan himself is what made our stay so special. We always felt completely at home and very well looked after - when I arrived with a bad cough Olan plied me with vitamins, homemade chicken soup, and other treats (and it worked - I got better in a few days!). Could not recommend his place highly enough. We had an amazing trip, Olan and the pets are wonderful company, and we’re looking forward to going back one day!

I had a really great time with Olan! The room was very cozy, comfortable and quite big for one person. I had everything I needed, a fridge with beverages, fresh fruit and even the possibility to make coffee or tea. Olan himself was a perfect host, always up to chat but I also had my privacy whenever I wanted to. 
I loved living around the dogs and the cat, they‘re fun and friendly, just good company.
Next time I would definitely stay with Olan again!

This is a great place to stay if you're coming to Chelsea or anywhere on Manhattan.  Great location, cozy room, and the snacks can really save the day if you don't feel like buying lunch at Manhattan prices.

An amazing place as the photos suggest. We enjoyed our stay immensely. From the warm welcome we received from Olan, very nice host. He was available and very friendly any time we had any questions, the communication had been perfect. He was extremely kind  and a very attentive host who goes the extra mile to ensure you enjoy your stay. He let us stay as long as we wanted on the day of our checking out. Very comfortable bed and very quiet. We would definitely book again if we ever go back to NewYork - which I hope we do as it is lovely!

Ok guys, we literally cannot rave about this place, and Olan, enough. We’ll start with the loft - the space is super cute, trendy, and spotless. The location is AMAZING! So close to everything, all the trendy neighbourhoods, Greenwich, Chelsea and Soho to name a few, are walking distance away including all the fantastic places to eat around the place - too many for us to get through! The subway is at the corner and only one or two stops away from the big attractions. And now, Olan. Ah we love this guy. He made us feel so at home. So friendly and always went out of his way no matter what. Stayed up for us to welcome us when we arrived in 3 hours late, prepared us a home cooked breakfast the morning after we arrived (which was deliscious by the way), got up at 4am to see us off (who does that!?) and always had insider tips, tricks and recommendations for anything and everything if we ever needed some guidance. Honestly, we couldn’t ever thank him enough. We had the best time here. If you’re looking for a spot in NYC, this is it. You won’t regret it :)

Olan is a very friendly and accommodating host. He made sure that the place meet my needs and pleasantly greeted me as I arrived and left throughout my stay. He made some helpful suggestions about things to do, places to eat, and even how to get to the airport.  He has some friendly pets which were very delightful. Overall, my time in NYC was greatly enhanced due to being at Olan's place.
Olan was very kind and welcoming. He was so accommodating and made sure I had everything I needed and more.

Living with Olan was a unique experience that I really enjoyed. Olan is an
artist and film-maker who has lived in the area for many years. He's also really
friendly and a genuinely great host who cares about making sure you're
comfortable and properly taken care of. The location can't be beaten if you're
working at (Hidden by Airbnb) (it's a 30 second walk to the 8th ave entrance). There are
many amenities in the apartment, including a fridge and AC. The bed is really
comfortable, and Olan has a bunch of good pillows. The AC unit is quite good
and managed to keep the room cool even on the hottest summer days. The room
itself is really pretty and full of interesting art that makes it charming. Olan
also has two wonderful pets, Mr. Al (a Jack Russell / Corgi) and Tuxie (a cat).
Both are quite friendly and easy to get along with. The bathroom is also very
clean, and there's a shower and many soaps/shampoos to use. Olan lives in the
apartment, so you're staying at an actual home that has been properly taken care
of and has all of the amenities you would expect. This made living here feel
more like being Olan's roommate, which was a great part of the experience.

Overall I really enjoyed my stay with Olan and strongly recommend his apartment
to anyone staying in New York.
Olan is amazing!

Im not sure which was better, Olan (Mr Al and Tuxe) or the location!! 

The location is just perfect-right by Chelsea market, lots of places to shop/eat, subway station on the street - perfect location!!

Now Olan... an incredibly kind hearted, thoughtful host. When I wasn't well he got ready to go out and get me ginger and lemon. He had my fridge stocked with things he knew I would like and made me the best guacamole I've ever had! He knows when to engage and when to let you have your space - and is truly wanting his guests to have the best best possible time during their stay.

I very much hope to see him in London or New York again soon :)

Nam

Olan is a very kind, educated, sensitive and caring person. From the first moment he gets the needs of his guests and make them feel at home. The location is amazing (50 mt from subway) and - if like to walk - in 15/30 minutes you can reach time square or Soho. I would choose again his place and - considering the overall experience - I would say that the price is very fair. And, last but not least, his pets give a touch of extra coziness to the place. Thank you, Olan for everything

host.host_about: Sou carioca, de bem com a vida e adoro viajar. Hoje em dia dou preferência em me hospedar em residências também, já tive oportunidade em Paris e Londres e Estados Unidos e foi com base nisso que decidi anunciar os meus apartamentos, pela localização privilegiada e por serem muito agradáveis e aconchegantes, além de muito bem cuidado. É isso.

reviews.comments:
O apartamento não é tão bom quanto parece, o prédio onde fica localizado é péssimo, não recomendo para famílias, pois o ambiente é de prostituição.
Fica em cima de uma casa noturna de stripper, Café Sensoo Bar.

Apesar de ficar perto da praia, o ambiente não é legal, muitas prostitutas ao redor, os restaurantes que ficam perto são pontos de encontro.

No elevador e corredores, só encontramos pessoas esquisitas, ambiente não familiar.

Nas proximidades muitos moradores de rua...

reviews.comments: Great place very cheap!

Cosy place. Host is really nice!
Only downside is that the shower and toilets are not separated but it is pretty common in Hong Kong . Highly recommended
香港旺角繁华之地,周围就是有着吵闹很友善的香港老夫妇｡真的很好｡

FALSE ADVERTISING: All the host's listings are advertised as "entire apartment" or "entire loft", however this is not true. The listings are micro-sized rooms inside an existing apartment that has been converted into a hostel like setup, except the host also lives inside the apartment. There is no expectation of privacy. Whenever you come and go, you will interact with one of the hosts. If you leave the apartment before 9am, you will need to PHYSICALLY CLIMB over a sleeping host as their bed is placed directly in the hallway, blocking entries and exits (fire hazard?). This is also true if you come back to the apartment after 1am. Additionally, the host will enter your room EVERYDAY while you are gone and re-arrange your items. There is no do-not-disturb notice that you can place on your door. The most egregious breech of privacy was one day I slept in, and both hosts knocked on my door, physically entered the room, switched on the light and visually examined the room for no reason whatsoever. The host(s) do not speak any English. I do not recommend this listing unless you are fully aware of what you are getting into. For what it's worth, it was a unique cultural experience.

The positives to the apartment is the central Mong Kok location, but ~$40 a night seems to be a more reasonable price than $57+

房间比我想象中要好很多,除去一张床还有柜子,而且差不多可以放三个行李箱,热水器水很快,浴室有窗户还有排气扇,里面的镜子灯光很好,化妆时也有地方放化妆品｡房间还有个电视呢,房间空调很凉,还有衣架,我昨晚的衣服就洗了吹空调今天早上就干了｡里面有两三个插座,房东有配一个转换头,如果需要多的话,自己多备一个就好了｡房东爷爷还有奶奶特别和蔼,早上我要走了还特别叮嘱我一定要把东西带齐,问我吃了没有,外面下雨我又没有伞?还跟我说去波鞋街的路怎么走,超级好,绝对好评,以后去香港还去住这家!
Very nice and cosy room. Nice host. Recommand strongly
非常好
The place is okay for a quick stay. It’s a short walk from Mong Kok MTR Station. Pretty convenient. Kinda small but everything you need is there.
不錯,地理位置好就在旺角地鐵站出來走几分鐘路就到了｡阿公阿婆都很熱情,下次來還會考慮選擇這裡的｡謝謝
虽然找路的过程很艰辛,但是两个老板很亲切,每次都很开心的和我们打招呼,房子就和图片上一样,需要走楼梯上二楼,一个小床一个双人床,有空调但是不能调温度,热水回来自己开,很方便｡住了两晚,老板都有帮忙做清洁,房间很干净!一次不错的体验~
房东是两个很和蔼的老人,非常善谈｡房间打扫很干净舒服｡就是被子可能有些薄,不过我们在香港这几天也不冷所以关系不大｡房子要比想象中的大一点,还行｡总体来说还是很不错的｡
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This cottage home has 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, spacious living room, dining room, study, full kitchen, large patio, gas BBQ, washer/dryer and boasts stunning ocean views.

reviews.comments:
Português: O apartamento é perfeito! Lindo, novo, limpo, bem decorado, funcional (super bem equipado) e bem no centro do Porto. O anfitrião é uma pessoa maravilhosa, educado e gentil, esteve sempre em contato para qualquer emergência e nos deu várias dicas. Esperamos voltar novamente ao Porto e com certeza ficaremos nesse apartamento!

English: The apartment is perfect! Beautiful, new, clean, well decorated, functional (very well equipped) and right in the center of Porto. The host is a wonderful person, polite and kind, was always in touch for any emergency and gave us several tips. We hope to return to Porto again and we will definitely stay in this apartment!

It‘s a very beautiful apartment directly in the Center of Porto.
Everything was very Perfect! 
Daniel was very friendly, very polished, very nice.
Perfect Place to Stay some days in Porto.
Hope to See u again!

Really close to all the main attractions of the city, this apartment is perfect for a couple visiting Porto. Clean and fully equipped. The host were answering quickly and really kind. 
Strongly recommended!
Porto ist wunderschön und eine Resie wert. Das Appartement war sauber, zentrale Lage und ruhig gelegen, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in naher Umgebung, Kommunikation mit dem Gastgeber problemlos.

Un apartamento preciosos y muy comodo. muy bien ubicado. No nos ha faltado nada! El dueño un encanto de persona. 

Um lindo apartamento e muito confortável. Muito bem localizado. Nós não perdemos nada! o dono de um charme de pessoa.

Excellent rapport/qualité/prix !!!!!
Appartement très mignon et très bien situé. L'accueil est également à souligner, il y a avait des petits pains tout frais et tout ce qu'il faut pour le petit déjeuner. Je recommande vivement cette location.

O Daniel foi, desde o primeiro contacto, um host sempre em contacto connosco e que prestou toda a ajuda necessária em relação á estadia do meu amigo de Barcelona que veio passar uns dias ao Porto. 
 Ele adorou o espaço! Cómodo, tranquilo, limpo e bem localizado. 
 Nada a apontar de negativo.
Très bon emplacement et calme

Really fresh looking and smelling apartment. It was clean, everything you need is there plus a bit extra such as tea, soap etc. Daniel responses very fast to messages and is willing to help you out. The apartment is in the centre, is easy to reach and with good weather you can do everything by foot. In case of rain there is the metro close by and also a fantastic beergarden around the corner. So a perfect place!
We had a very nice stay in rua Formosa, we recommend the flat!

Adorei a minha estadia neste apartamento.
A zona é super boa, perto da tua de santa catarina. Visitei tudo a pé pois a localização era próxima de zonas históricas.
O apartamento é maravilhoso, super moderno e cozy. Adorei pequenos toques como o haver azeite para utilizar, bem como as toalhas e lençois.
O Daniel foi super prestável connosco, ajudou-nos imenso e esteve sempre preocupado. Foi também flexível no check-in e check-out, o que agradeço imenso.
Recomendo! Se for de novo ao porto ficarei neste apartamento. Fiquei rendida!

El apartamento es ideal y cuenta con todo lo necesario para la estancia. Además el anfitrión tiene el detalle de dejar agua, leche, café, pan fresco,... perfecto si entras tarde o en domingo.
Está bien localizado y cerca de las estaciones de metro de Aliados (Línea D: Universidad, Hospital San Joao,...) y Bolhao (resto de líneas).
El trato con el anfitrión es muy fácil y responde muy rápidamente a cualquier cuestión.
Repetiría 100%

Me and my boyfriend really enjoyed staying at the flat. It was exactly what we expected, small but beautiful and clean. Location is absolutely super, right in the middle, with a lot of great food places nearby. Only improvement suggestion is to provide extra sets of towels for those who stay for longer.

Formosa's 60.5 Its a lovely cozy flat to stay. We felt at home with the fully equipped room.  Right in the middle of Porto. Its ideal for couples or friends who enjoy walk around and get know the places. 
Obrigada Daniel! We really enjoyed our stay.
Nice and clean apartment, very close to the center. The communication with the host was perfect!

Daniel's apartment is very comfortable, tidy, clean and well thought in all its details. He made me found some water and bread at my arrival, I found it very nice! Managing check in and check out has been very simple, the communication with him has been very easy and immediate. He cares a lot about his guests and gives a lot of good tips! The apartment is located is the city centre, very close to shops, restaurants, main attractions, easily reachable by feet. One of the metro stops is very close (5 minutes).

When I come back to Porto, I will certainly book it again! Very recommended!
Très bon studio,clair propreté impeccable situé au cœur de la ville facile pour visiter et bon accueil du propriétaire il faut y aller
We had a great stay in Porto - this location was perfect for walking around and being close to restaurants/food. Very clean, Daniel answers quickly, and it’s a beautiful space!
Je recommande ce logement aussi bien pour la qualité, sa propreté, ses équipements et sa localisation au centre de Porto proche des transports en commun.

Nous rentrons tout juste d'une semaine passée à Porto.
L appartement est conforme aux photo, très  propre et idealement situé proche commerce et transport en commun. 
Avec des températures depassant largement les 35° nous avons apprécié la climatisation dans le logement pour mieux dormir et nous rafraîchir après nos longues journées de visites.
Situé en haut du quartier Ribeira, à 300 metres de la grande rue commerçante Sta Catarina, nous avons travaillé nos mollets en nous perdant dans les rues escarpées de Porto.
Les portugais sont très accueillants et parlent bien l anglais. 
Le soir il fait bon se balader sur le cais de ribeiro ou juste en face à vila nova de gaia.
Nous avons apprécié notre sejour.

This place is awesome! Very clean and cosy, just like a home. The Wifi and air-conditioning is good. The host, Daniel, has prepared some yogurt and milk for us inside the fridge. Conveniently located! Highly recommend! :)

L’appartement proposé par Daniel est bien adapté pour deux personnes. En plus d’être propre et très cosy, il est situé à deux pas du centre. Le self check-in et check-out est vraiment un plus. Daniel est de surcroît très réactif et sympathique, merci à lui!
Great place in a great location! all amenities were given and the place was squeaky clean :) thank you for your hospitality
Appartement bien placé, propre parfait pour passer une semaine
Very nice place to stay a few days in Portugal.
Space is really nice and clean. Centrally located. Wish we could stay there longer. Space is on 4th floor so would recommend not bringing too much cuz there is no elevator.

Appartement parfait et très propre.
Il a été très simple de récupérer les clés avec le système de serrure connectée.
L’appartement est parfaitement placé.
Je recommande!
Perfect location for exploring the city
Good location to centre and shopping. Would stay again. Daniel was always very responsive to our needs.  Not good for people who can’t do stairs

Appartement idéalement situé dans Porto ,sur une rue calme, très agréable à vivre, bien équipé, décoré avec goût et très propre .Des petites attentions de l'hôte:produits douche etc... , vaisselle, bouteille d'eau .... On a envie de revenir .

Excellent séjour tout était parfait !
L'appartement est extrêmement propre et très bien situé.
Le système de clé connectée fonctionne à merveille et il est très bien géré à distance.
Daniel est un hôte très attentif et arrangeant.
A savoir que tous les échanges se font sur (Hidden by Airbnb) et que cela fonctionne néanmoins très bien.
The Studio was clean and nice. Check in was super easy and over all we would definitely come back :)
El apartamento es genial, muy limpio y cómodo. Está muy bien ubicado :)
Très mignon appartement. Parfait pour 2. Très bien localisé. On a juste pas réussi à mettre le chauffage, ça manquait un peu. Merci!!!

Maravilhoso apartamento! Tudo é muito bem cuidado e limpo. A localização perfeita, muito próximo da rua de Santa Catarina. O anfitrião Daniel é muito atencioso e se preocupa em trocar os lençóis sempre. Viemos morar no Porto e ficamos nesta casa enquanto procurávamos nossa casa definitiva e foi perfeito.
Todo perfecto!
O Apartamento de Daniel é bem central, fizemos os pontos turísticos a pé. Tem lavanderia perto, supermercados. Excelente.

neighborhood_overview: This "Bairro" is one of the most emblematic of the city! You can easily walk around and you'll find a great variety of fashionable restaurants, cafes, shops, and the traditional commerce as groceries, fashion stores etc... Bolhão , the old market, is just 2min walk away and the old cafe"Pérola do Bolhão" is just own the street and the perfect place for your breakfast! If you feel like shopping Santa Catarina pedestrian  street is the place to go!
notes: 2nd floor (no elevator)
transit: - by foot: you can easily walk everywhere you need as most touritic points are walking distance! - by metro: You can arrive by metro from the airport or the main station of Campanhã, as "Bolhão" metro station is  just 2min walk away!
access: All the apartment is yours to enjoy. No other guests at the same time. Welcome Home!
interaction: BEFORE checkin: we are always available and will be in touch with you before your arrival to help you to organize your arrival and stay!  CHECKIN: We will persoanlly meet you to show you the place, give you the keys and the best tips on the city! Feel free to ask us for the best spots and activities! We'll be glad to help! DURING YOUR STAY: we value our guests privacy so we will be always available by airbnb chat and mobile. We will come just in case you request us.
house_rules: GENERAL RULES - Treat everything well and with care as it was your own.  - Smoking is just allowed outside.  - Please respect the neighbors: No loud noise allowed before 10h00 am or after 10h00 pm   EXTRA BEDS & BABIES - If you are 2 people and require 2 beds made, this must be requested before your check-in, otherwise we will assume you are a couple and will make only the double bed. -  Babies are free till the age of 2 (max 1) when using existing beds. Baby cob is available upon request and availability confirmation on booking CHECKIN :  -You must provide a check in time at least 24h hours before you arrival.   We will meet you at the apartment to make you the check in at arranged time . If you are more than 30min late let us know at least 1h before your arranged hour. . If you get later than 30min without any previous notice, we will not be able to wait for you at the apartment and will be waiting for your phone call- (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) to arrange another check in time

Hemos tenido una experiencia muy positiva. El apartamento muy cómodo y limpio. La ubicación es muy buena, esta muy cerca del centro. Han sido muy atentos y amables con nosotros

I had a great stay at this place! The location is perfect - main attractions are within walking distance, there are a lot of places to eat or have a cup of coffee nearby. The supermarket is 3 mins away. 
All given information is accurate, the apartment is very cosy, light and comfortable. 
Will definitely come back again!:)
Nice place well located. Exactly as described. It has all the essentials for a short stay.
Moderno apartamento luminoso y reformado con el encanto del centro histórico de oporto. Situación inmejorable. Nos lo pasamos en grande. Muy recomendable

Sara is a great host , the apartments is really nice and spacious exactly as the pictures depict. The road is a bit noisy but we didn’t mind that. Great location away from lots of tourists such a great city will definitely be back.
Very charming place and very warming welcome

Sara's place was perfect for exploring the beautiful city of Porto. Very central, sparkling clean and fully equiped, with amongst other things, one of the most comfortable beds I have had the pleasure of sleeping in during my airbnb adventures! Highly recommended!

This is a very modern apartment close to the retail zone of Porto. Our feelings about the apartment are mixed.  There apartment is very compact but it has the most comfortable bed and pillows that we have had in airbnb.  We were greeted by Thomas who gave really good suggestions and  tips and took the time to write them clearly on the map. The not so good - our apartment  faced the road which is a busy bus route. It was too noisy with the balcony doors open and there are no other windows for air flow. The lock on the door is very tricky - sometimes it opens first time, other times it took 5 minutes to get it open.  It is a good 15 minute walk to the more interesting Rebeira area. It is close to the Bulhao market but this is closed for 2 years for redevelopment. Next time I'd stay in the Rebeira area but it is probably more expensive.

Great location. Marcel showed us in and gave us some very useful recommendations for the local area. Cleaner was still in the flat when we checked in (at 3pm) so we had to leave for a bit and come back. Well stocked kitchen also equipped with olive oil, salt and coffee. A great stay so thank you!
Fotos veraces. A 10 min de todo. Muy amables y flexibles. Consejos para recorrer la ciudad muy buenos.
L appartamento è molto confortevole e ben arredato, e si trova in una posizione centrale .
Nice apartment with shared garden area. Good facilities within flat and within walking distance of popular neighbourhoods and restaurants. Would happily visit again :)
Great stay in Porto, made all the better for the hospitality received at Sara's place

The location is very central, but away enough that it isn’t too loud. The street below can be a little noisy during the day with cars, but was not an issue at night. We were able to walk to and from multiple locations and sites! Close to wonderful food, the bridge which has an amazing view, wine tours, and the train station. The apartment was clean and decorated nicely. Bed was comfy and the shower was great. Communication was very quick! Provided a map with places to go when we arrived and helped carry our luggage up the stairs to the room! We enjoyed our stay!

Our stay in Porto at Sara's was everything we could have asked for. The place was perfect with a small kitchen area, comfy bed, and great balcony. The location is perfect for walking to basically anywhere in the city but is quiet. Sara was so helpful in answering every question I had and helping us get from the airport with such ease after a long 24hrs of travel. Being understanding of our late check in time was so wonderful and made everything so much less stressful. Cannot say enough wonderful things about our stay in this beautiful city! I can only hope to return one day and spend even more time exploring from this fabulous location!
Close to all amenities. A little noisy at night with the doors open, would have been nice to have air conditioning as the fan was also noisy.

Sara’s flat is lovely, tastefully decorated and conveniently located (with a parking at the corner).
From this flat, it’s really easy to reach all the points of interest in Porto by walking. 
We were welcomed by Sara’s friend, Gonçalo. He was very kind and helpful! He even brought us two natas the next day ;-)
We had a wonderful stay in Porto and strongly recommend to stay at Sara’s.
Appartement très agréable et bien équipé proche du centre de Porto et des bonnes adresses pour les gourmands! Lit très confortable pour un séjour reposant.

It's a nice apartment at walking distance from many spots you want to visit when in Porto. However, the apartment is rented out by a company which has 50 apartments in the city so we kind of missed the real Airbnb experience. For example, when we asked if it was possible to receive clean towels after a few days, we were told it was not included in the price. Even though that might be the case, we didn't feel it was very good service (we stayed there for 6 days), and besides this there were also no facilities to do it ourselves. The apartment looks great but to be honest it did not meet our expectations (you notice this in the quality, it's really made for short-stay rental).
We had a very lovely stay in Porto. The apartment was clean and in a great area. :)

This apartment is in a great location, walking distance to everything.
It is clean, modern and beautifully presented.
The bed was great we slept so well.
I can highly recommend this place to anyone.

Communication before our arrival was great. Sara organised a transfer for us from the airport as we were arriving late and also organised the late check-in. The apartment overall was great and was in a really good location, close to lots of shops but quiet enough for us to get a good nights sleep. There were a few things that weren't perfect like the door to the apartment. The lock was a bit dodgy, so it took about 5-10 minutes each time to unlock the door and eventually get into the apartment, which was quite annoying. The shower wasn't the best either and felt like it might break. Overall though we were happy with our stay and for the price it was really good value for me. We would stay here again. Many thanks!
We loved our stay in this space! Affordably priced, beautiful style, convenient location. We would stay here again. Highly recommend.

It has everything you need and was a close walk to some of the main places to see like Cafe Majestic (delicious breakfast) and the market. It was a great starting point and Junior, who welcomed us was very kind and went out of his way to help us with any troubles.
This place has all the basics for a nice stay. It was in a good location to walking to all the touristy Porto things and a short walk to the metro for things further away.

Really nice place! There are quite a few stairs up to the apartment. The room and small balcony are lovely. Good location if you are okay walking. The bathroom was small, but clean, and the shower was decent once we figured out how to use it. The bed was very large and comfortable.

Place is very good located with lovely big windows  and also very clean. Only shower is not in its best condition (but still manageable) and one of the bath towels was stained - I asked for a new one but no answer and then we receive only late apology. Besides that we had a wonderful stay in Porto and I believe that next time these problems will not occur again. Would recommend :)

Highly recommended the appartement is great !
The location is very convenient, the appartement was well equipped and decorated. 
Sara and her friend were so nice and respond very quickly to me. 
The aera is very nice and it was quiet at night. 
Easy to reach everywhere because of the metro nearby and by foot because it’s very central.
We really enjoyed  staying for the week-end in this cosy and well located appartment. Well furnished and renovated, very central.
We had a great stay

The flat is clean, stylish and comfortable, in a great location. The communication with the host was very smooth and we got some nice suggestions of things to do in the area. 

Would definitely recommend!

name: Beautiful Suite at Rio Stay Residénce
summary: - Spacious Suit with  king size bed, work station, digital safe, mini fridge that you can use to storage your drinks, TV, WI-FI and hairdryer. - Perfect for people coming to events at Rio Centro (10 min on foot or 5 by car), Parque Olímpico, Fairs or concerts at Cidade do Rock. - Tennis Court, Pool, Fitness Center, Jacuzzi and Spa. - Free Parking (subject to vacancy)
space: The place was carefully designed to receive couples or business travelers. Near Map Band Mall, Centro Olímpico de Tênis, Velódromo Olímpico do Rio, Rio Olympic Arena, Av. Embaixador Abelardo Bueno, GSK, Riocentro, Jeunesse Arena.
description: - Spacious Suit with  king size bed, work station, digital safe, mini fridge that you can use to storage your drinks, TV, WI-FI and hairdryer. - Perfect for people coming to events at Rio Centro (10 min on foot or 5 by car), Parque Olímpico, Fairs or concerts at Cidade do Rock. - Tennis Court, Pool, Fitness Center, Jacuzzi and Spa. - Free Parking (subject to vacancy) The place was carefully designed to receive couples or business travelers. Near Map Band Mall, Centro Olímpico de Tênis, Velódromo Olímpico do Rio, Rio Olympic Arena, Av. Embaixador Abelardo Bueno, GSK, Riocentro, Jeunesse Arena. We are always available through the airbnb app and email.
neighborhood_overview: No bairro, se localiza o maior centro de convenções da América Latina, o Riocentro. Além disso, a região é de grande importância devido a realização dos Jogos Olímpicos de 2016 no Rio de Janeiro, uma vez que, nela, foram construídos o Parque Olímpico Cidade do Rock (palco também do Rock in Rio) e a Vila Olímpica, onde ficaram alojados os atletas. O bairro também apresenta um dos mais baixos índices de violência do município, apesar do recente crescimento no número de novos condomínios e residências. No bairro, se encontra um dos acessos ao parque estadual da Pedra Branca, onde é possível se encontrar cachoeiras, dentre elas a famosa Véu da Noiva, trilhas pela floresta, além de animais típicos da fauna atlântica.
notes: Café-da-Manhã não incluso. Estacionamento gratuito. Serviço de Arrumação Diária Incluso. Face à proximidade do Rio Centro, eventuais ruídos externos relacionados a alguns eventos poderão causar incômodo ao hóspede.
transit: Estação de Ônibus mais próximas ao Apart fica no Shopping Map Band Ônibus - 348	Riocentro - Candelária (BRS 5 - via Curicica / Linha Amarela) Ônibus - 368	Riocentro - Candelária (BRS 5 - via Serra) Ônibus - 810	Pontal - Taquara Ônibus - 881	Curicica - Jardim Oceânico (via Projac / Av. Lúcio Costa) Ônibus - 954	Taquara - Recreio (via Benvindo de Novaes)
access: Os hóspedes terão acesso a estacionamento (vaga sujeita a disponibilidade), piscina, sauna, spa, jacuzzi, quadra de tênis, fitness, coffee shop e restaurante (consumos a parte).
interaction: We are always available through the airbnb app and email.
house_rules: PREZADO HÓSPEDE, TEMOS O PRAZER EM RECEBÊ-LO E DESEJAMOS UMA FELIZ ESTADIA! 1. Voltagem do local: 127 Volts; 2. Wi-Fi: RS604        Senha: riostay18; 3. Horário Check-in: a partir das 15h / Horário Check-out: até as 12h (As diárias vencem às 12h do dia seguinte a ser contatada); 4. O check-out deverá ser realizado até as 12h00min. Após este horário, será cobrada taxa adicional de R$20,00 por hora; 5. É EXPRESSAMENTE PROIBIDO FUMAR nas JANELAS e nas dependências internas do Apart. Em caso de ocorrência, o hóspede concorda em pagar uma multa, no valor de 100% sobre valor do total das diárias. Em caso de reincidência, o hóspede será convidado a se retirar do Hotel. 6. Caso sejam encontrados roupas e/ou objetos deixados ou esquecidos ndentro da suíte, estes ficarão guardados à disposição de seus proprietários, pelo prazo de TRINTA DIAS (30). Decorrido este prazo, a estes serão dadas a destinação que melhor convier. 7. Chuveiro – aquecimento central: torneira ESQUERDA quente, DIREITA fria.

host.host_location: Niterói, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Meu nome é Alexander, gosto de conhecer pessoas, praias e lugares. Nas horas vagas jogo futebol com os amigos e adoro assistir filmes em casa. Sou casado, temos um casal de filhos maravilhosos e uma linda cadela shih-tzu chamada Maggie.

reviews.comments: O espaço é muito bom, perfeito para que está a trabalho e quer um lugar confortável  (chuveiro sensacional) e com estrutura para home office. Para que vem para participar de eventos no Rio Centro então nem se fala pq é colado no centro de eventos.
Na foto parece ser maior que a realidade. E fica um pouco distante da praia. O resto ok.
Recomendo muito, excelente suite!
espaço excelente!

A localização é bem fácil, fui e usei tds dias o BRT, pois fui fazer um curso, e de fato é bem próximo, lugar tranquilo, conseguia andar sozinha sem medo, o atendimento desde a portaria, recepção, camareira, enfim, tdas pessoas extremamente gentis e prestativas, o ambiente super aconchegante, na verdade eu nem queria vir embora! Rs E o anfitrião eu não tenho palavras para agradecer, sempre solicito, sem duvidas eu recomendo e irei voltar! Foi minha primeira experiência no site e fiquei muito satisfeita e encantada!!!
Excelente opção na região!  Recomendo
Excelente lugar
Excelente acomodação e hospitalidade. Recomendo.
Bom atendimento e hospedagem. Ótima localização para quem vai no Rio Centro, recomendo!!
Ótimo espaço!!!! Não tenho do que reclamar!

Tomem cuidado e tirem print do lugar que alugaram, porque quando chega a pessoa e mandada para outra suíte inferior.
Não que o lugar seja ruim, só não sejam enganados.
ótimo local e excelente localização
Como sempre, hospedagem e comunicação com o Alexander espectacular! Até a próxima!
lugar confortavel
Vale muito a pena!!! Adorei!!

Nossa estadia no apartamento do Alexander foi boa, gostamos muito do apto. e dos serviços oferecidos na residência(piscina, sauna, jacuzzi,...). Achei o apto bonito, limpo e confortável! Também a comunicação com o Alexander foi boa, ele atendia nossas dúvidas em tempo real. Eu só peço para tomar cuidado com a cabeceira painel da cama, pois  ela tem uma abertura por onde facilmente cabe um documento de identidade ou até mesmo objetos não tão pequenos como um brinco, e depois de cair dentro do painel você não tem como resgatá-lo...

A hospedagem foi incrível, ótima localização. O Alexander teve agilidade em nós atender. Mesmo antes de nos hospedar, perguntei se havia ferro de passar e ele prontamente comprou um e colocou a nossa disposição! Com certeza numa próxima estadia retornaremos!
Excelente espaço, perfeito para um casal, limpeza impecável, perto das praias da Barra e Recreio, Riocentro.. Difícil encontrar um defeito no local..
Definitivamente un lugar perfecto para mi, es tranquilo, muy atentos a nuestras necesidades, un clima delicioso y la limpieza fue lo mejor. La habitación tenía todo lo que requeríamos.
Grato pelo espaço que ofereceu. Facilitou muito minha estada no Rio. Um forte abraço e sucesso Alexander
Excelente espaço. Exatamente como nas fotos.
Muito bom
Espaço aconchegante e tudo igualzinho a descrição. Agradecemos bastante a compreensão com entrada e saídas que tivemos que alterar.
Muy bonito, recomendable. Lejos del centro, pero lugar súper tranquilo.
Espaço aconchegante, limpo e bem ventilado! Condomínio bem familiar.

name: Big sunny room! Perfect location!
summary: We are offering huge just renovated apartment in 15 mins walking till the center of Barcelona, and 10 minutes walking till the beach and famous Villa Olimpica beach. Here you can stay close to all important sightseeings and at the same time you will have rest because this area is very peacefull and local streets are not full of tourists.
space: We rent private room in 4 rooms apartment. The place is just renovated, all furniture is totally new. We provide towels, bed linen, breakfast and natural coffee. The area is perfect for summer vacations. If you like the beach here you need just walk 10 minutes till one of the best Barcelona beaches. You can walk 15-20 minutes till downtown to enjoy famous Sagrada Familia or to have dinner in Born, or spent the whole day at the best Barcelona beach. We take care about ours guests, so you can feel totally like at home here. Daily common area cleaning, 24 hrs support for any kind of question, access to full equipped kitchen if you prefer to cook.

name: IS 302!! 1 bedroom, condo with amazing ocean views
summary: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! You can not help to fall in love with the southern part of Kihei. Park your rental car and walk to EVERYTHING. The convenient amenities of this condo are very inviting with beach gear and laundry in the condo. You can see plenty of pure entertainment just sitting on the balcony watching tourist taking surf-lessons, walking/jogging to and from the beach, taking out their kayaks or Stand up boards. You can see young and old playing in the park across.

We enjoyed our stay at Tricia’s place.
The location is really great -close to everything - restaurants and beaches in walking distance.

It was super clean,  beach chairs were great. Super amenities- washer and dryer in unit. Great kitchen, if you like to cook you need to get all essential e.g. salt & pepper... 
I felt price was good for what we got.
Nice place, best location!
Nobody should stay there !!!

name: Downtown Historic Apartments T1 + Terrace
summary: Imagine a premium experience in the heart of the city, in Porto Downtown. Feel the beauty of the city centre as you are just a minute walk from Café Majestic, Lello Bookshop, Aliados Avenue, Clérigos Tower, restaurants, shops, culture and entertainment. Enyoy the elegance and exquisiteness of this fully rehabilitated apartment located in a historical building. The building was just renovated and the apartment is brand new. You will be delighted with this wonderful charming apartment. Live and  feel the city. Make your dreams come true while walking around and enjoying the downtown as best as you can . You are in great location and so it's up to you to discover the city on foot.

A hob, a fridge, a microwave, and all the essential kitchen utensils are available. A comfortable space designed to make you feel at home.
