house_rules: Guest will have their private bedroom, which will be made up nicely with clean bedding and clean towels, access to wifi, internet, of course usage of the kitchen, living room. There is also paid shared laundry available in the building. Apart from the registered guest, can not invite other friends to apartment without the permission of load. No smoking Note: 1. The key must be returned before 11:00 on the day of check-out. If you need to delay check out, please consult with the landlord at least one day earlier. 2. Kitchen utensils (refrigerator tools, stoves, etc.) can be used freely, but you should to clean them by yourself after usage. Foods and other ingredients would not be provided. 3. No smoking in the house. 4. Please make sure the carpet is clean. If there are any stain or damage of the carpet after checking out, you will be charged $100 for cleaning carpet stains and or if damages. 5. Please make sure you lock the door and ensure the safety of the house (there’s only one key.

host.host_about: we enjoy opening our apartment to travellers and guests from near and far. When we are not planning our next trip, we can be found enjoying the local food of Sydney or catching a movie at the theatre across the street from our place. We can give lots of ideas of where to go to get the best for a good price.

The apartment was very spacious. The room was as per the picture. It had all the facilities and Purple was a delightful person. She even kept a packet of chocolates as a welcome gift, which was thoughtful :) 
I had a comfortable stay, but would like to suggest to change the description to room in an apartment(considering it was not an entire apartment to myself). 
Thanks for hosting me.

PS :Please don't ask visite before confirmed reservation
description: Blue Hill Guest House offers you the possibility to organize your bithday party, your confraternization, etc. in this charming house with sensational view to Enseada de Botafogo, Pão de Açúcar and the Corcovado. You will meet in our accommodations the impressing nature in this little piece of Mata Atlântica. Swimming-pool, garden living-room and barbecue area. Available for you the area all in up, isolated and allowing put a great sound and enjoy without perturbing neighborhood. A very pretty living-room, garden and barbecue area with swimming-pool in a magnificient and ecologic atmosphere. The price is for until 150 persons.  Important : Due to be in a high wall and with a lot of ladders to climb, this area is not recomended for old people. But we have other place in under level more adequate for people of a certain age, just ask. Best price for comfort, good localization and a lot of nature. PS :Please don't ask visite before confirmed reservation The entry and the exit hours of the
neighborhood_overview: Botafogo is the perfect place to enjoy Rio. The peace at home and the distraction near of you. Nearby Pão de Açucar, one of the favourite place of all the city, you will enjoy an amazing environment and you are perfectly localizated to join all the desired places : Leme, Copacabana, Pão de Açucar, Botafogo, Lapa and Ipanema not very far... Localized in front of the bay, you are in the best place for amazing holidays : bars (pubs), canteens, shops, metro at 5min! Don´t miss also the Arpoador or Copacabana beach, the predilection place of local and international surfers.
notes: Intern Settlement : 1. The maximum number of tenants is the number indicated when you do the reservation. It will not be allowed entry of other person, except previous agreement by message on Airbnb site. 2. Switch off the climatisation, the television, and the lights when you leave the apartment. A tax can be exiged in case of excessive utilisation. 3. Switch off the gas when you don´t cook. 4. Don´t make double of the keys. 5. If during the stay, a problem (an infiltration, a problem of gas, problem of Internet, etc.) happens, the tenant will have to permit the access to the apartment. 6. When you leave, it is exiged to let the place in the same conditions than when you arrived. 7. The prudence is fixed to R$1000,00. It will be debited from your account only if I do a complaint to Airbnb in maximum 48h after the check-out. In the contrary case, you will not be debited of the prudence amount.
transit: About transportes, no problem! The apartment is localized at few minutes walking of the metropolitan station Flamengo. From the apartament you can go in simple and fast way in all the touristic places of the city, and a lot more. In this way, you can´t lose nothing, if you are in Rio de Janeiro for Christmas, the Reveillon, the Carnaval, etc. (visit of Pão de Açucar, Corcovado, beaches, Lapa stairs, mythic Maracana Stadium, etc.). The taxi from the airport to the apartment will cost more or less 100 R$. You have also the possibility to use the Bus Premium 2018 for approximately R$15,00 by people.
access: The entry and the exit hours of the local have to be determined by advance.
interaction: My name is Daniel, I am French and I live Rio since World Cup 2014, after spending all my life in Paris. I will do all what I can for you having an unforgettable stay and wishing to come back soon. I answer to all your questions very quickly, generally less than 1 hour, day and night.  When you do the reservation, I will send you my phone number and my personal email. Also the way to combinate your arrival hour. I speak Portuguese, English, French and Spanish.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Flat in Moda near the sea for one or two persons.
summary: My  flat is 40m2 very near the sea with nice kitchen and bathroom. There is AC. Suitable for 1 or 2 persons. It is in a central and one of the most beautiful place in Istanbul. There are may places around to have fun. You can enjoy the nice weather by having a picnic in seashore. There are 1 single bed, 1 sofabed for 2 people, 1 sofa, bookshelf, wardrobe, coffee tables, study desk, portable table.   Everything you need in kitchen to cook and eat including electric stove, kettle and grill.

name: DB RIBEIRA - Grey Apartment
summary: DB Ribeira Apartment is located on the historical center of Oporto, in the heart of a UNESCO World Heritage Center. All major tourist attractions are within walking distance and the tube is only a 2 minutes walk away (S. Bento).
space: The studio is equipped with everything you need for a perfect stay, You can cook your own meals at the existing kitchenette, which has a stovetop, a microwave, a refrigerator, coffee machine and a kettle.  The private bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer. Towels, toilet paper and soap are offered. Electric heating available. All major tourist attractions are within walking distance and the tube is only a 2 minutes walk away.

We are a young married couple living outside Porto.

Daniela was born and raised in Leça da Palmeira and has a bachelor in tourism. 

Tiago was raised in Germany, he's fluent in German, Portuguese and English.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: In such a great location in the historic area of Porto. Daniela was so kind to check us in at a later time then expected, and we were pleasantly surprised with how lovely the space was! We'd love to stay here again if we have a chance to come back to Porto.

Le logement est très bien et parfaitement situé pour découvrir la ville de Porto.
Daniel nous a très bien accueilli et conseillé.
This place is right in the heart of Porto walking distance from everything. I cant wait to come back.

name: Split level loft apartment in Darlinghurst
summary: Welcome to my stylish and modern two bedroom loft style apartment located in trendy and central Darlinghurst. The apartment is in the middle of everything you want and need. Plenty of bars, cafes, theatres, shopping opportunities and public transport are right in front of your door. It is for everyone that appreciates design, comfortable living and convenience while traveling. I, your host, live in the building and will be there to answer your questions and give you recommendations!
space: Building: Modern high-rise building with 24 hour concierge  Elevator in the building Gym access included Pool access included Modern, beautiful space with an amazing art collection Amenities: Professionally cleaned Hotel-quality high thread-count bed linen and towels 24/7 check-in Fully-equipped kitchen Balcony with great view Living room: TV  Open living space Large, stone dining table Kitchen: Fully-equipped Oven Stove Fridge Dishwahser Microwave  Bedroom: Room 1: King size bed with ensuite bathroom Room 2: Queen size bed  Bathrooms: Ensuite with shower and bathtub  Modern bathroom with shower Guest toilet in laundry

Plenty of bars, cafes, theatres, shopping opportunities and public transport are right in front of your door. It is for everyone that appreciates design, comfortable living and convenience while traveling. I, your host, live in the building and will be there to answer your questions and give you recommendations! neighborhood_overview: We live in an amazing neighbourhood that is quite unique in Sydney.   We have amazing cafés, bars, restaurants, theatres and markets right at our doorstep.  Here is a list: Great bars: - Blackbottle (right next door!) - Johnny Fishbone (just behind us) - Chester White (a 10 min walk) Great restaurants - Bistro Rex - Apollo - Cho Cho San - Monopole Great cafes - Sticky Fingers  - Parma  - Uliveto - Darlinghurst 169 Markets The Kings Cross Food Market is on every Saturday!
transit: Train: Kings Cross Station is a 2 minute walk.  From the airport you can catch a train to Central, then change to platform 25/26 to catch the train to Kings Cross. Buses The 333, 380 or 381 from Oxford St takes you straight to Bondi Beach! Parking stations Wilsons carpark in Kings Cross The Holiday Inn car park
access: You will have access to the full apartment, balcony and building facilities like the gym and the pool
interaction: Please call me or message me on + (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) or via Airbnb for anything you need:)
house_rules: - This is my home, please treat it as if it were yours, as well! - Please do no touch any of the artwork:) Any damage will be charged to you. - Have fun and enjoy your stay!!

host.host_about:
A lawyer who loves to travel. 

I live in Darlinghurst with my lovely husband, Tristan, a cafe manager and photographer and our little Cavoodle, Felix.

We love our city and our neighbourhood and want to show it off.

reviews.comments: The apartment was not clean and had dog urine on all the carpets. It took 24 hours for 1 of the rugs to get replaced and the new one seemed masked with odor spray. The owner told me the place was clean after the first day but the urine smell was still in the apartment which kept us locked in our rooms while we weren’t out and about in the city. It was very unpleasant even after getting the cleaning fee and one nights stay refunded to us. It was a total break down in communication between the management company and the own, but that shouldn’t be at my expense after I had just taken a 14 hour flight from California.

Naveen's place is located in a great central area of Sydney - close to shops, bars and restaurants (can thoroughly recommend the Spring salad from Tropicana at the bottom of the building!) as well as the station (King's Cross) and the Hop On Hop Off bus route.
As a host Naveen was very responsive and made some great suggestions for places to head to around and about Sydney.
Great apartment & great location! Would stay here again!
The location is alright.. host is friendly and helpful.. but the cleanness is so well..
Naveen's place is in an amazing location, and was great value for money. She was communicative and very helpful.
Naveen is an excellent host, very friendly and thoughtful :) we were welcomed with a bottle of wine and face masks, which I thought was a wonderful touch. Definitely recommend!!

A lovely large apartment. Perfectly clean and really comfy beds. It's great to have the bedrooms on one floor and then the large living area below - feels like a house! Naveen left a welcome basket of fruit and veggies from the market which was a lovely touch. I have to admit I fell in love with Darlinghurst as Victoria Street outside has lots of great cafes and restaurants and it's an easy walk into the city or lots of trains and buses. There is a stunning view of the harbour bridge and opera house from the gym and pool. Having a concierge is good too, a sense of luxury and security. I had an issue with the washing machine but Naveen was very quick and easy to respond and sort everything out for me. Would happily stay here again and recommend it to others.
Very stylish, awesome location, great host

Naveen’s place is absolutley amazing for style location and price.

Naveen has a great eye for quirky things, the artwork and decorè is fabulous..

The gym and pool are on the same level right next to the apartment and are a real bonus.

This place is truely a rare gem..

Thankyou Naveen!
Appartement sympathique, emplacement super on retrouve tout ce dont on a besoin au pied de l'immeuble.
Great space and fantastic location
Naveen was a great host and myself and my friends had a great stay at the loft.

Naveen’s apartment is in a great location near shops and transport and she was very available to answer any queries we had. I would definitely recommend this apartment and hope that we get to stay here again.

The place is very classy and conveniently located, near enough to walk to the CBD during good weather and very near the Kings Cross station to access all parts of Sydney. Just ensure that your arrival is clear so that the unit will be ready when you arrive. The concierge service is top notch and makes a big difference. Tons of restaurants around covering all cuisine, price levels, etc. Would recommend the place to friends. Naveen is very responsive and will make your stay as pleasant as possible.
Beautiful apartment, great location (close to train station). It is very stylish, spacious, good value for money, and has all the amenities one would need when staying away from home.

Naveen is a great host with great local knowledge and communication. Check is and out was super easy and the concierge is great and adds a professional touch

The property is in an ideal location close to so many awesome places to eat and drink. The property itself is lovely the photos give you a good insight into what you will experience - great size and great to spend time in

Very stylish apartment in an excellent location close to all amenities.
Our host was helpful and flexible with check in and check out times which was great.

Amazing place was spacious and great value. Close to shops and transport. 

Only one thing negative; the traffic could be heard from the bedrooms even with ear plugs on.

This little gem was so so delightful, better then what I was expecting, Naveen was so lovely to suggest places to go out and eat and have a few drinks. 
The two bedrooms was accommodating for both me and my co-worker. 
Had a lovely time in Sydney I recommend staying here to everyone, the location is so good near the station and local restaurants and bars.

This apartment is great! Convenient location, beautifully decorated and very comfortable. We stayed with a young baby and felt we had everything we needed. 
We would happily stay here again :)
Great spot to explore the city. Lovely stylish apartment in a great area. Would highly recommend.
Awesome place! And the staff at the building were super friendly. Loved it
Great apartment with all you need, great close nearby amenities easy access to public transport and Uber/taxi pick up/drop off points.

A bright and spacious loft apartment. The decoration, styling was stunning. The bedrooms are awesome for the views and the comfort. The location is so user friendly, close to everything from great cafes for the morning brunch. To an array of restaurants for dinner. And easy access to the city. Best for people arriving via public transport. Puppy friendly, which meant our cavoodle was safe and comfortable too.
Good communication

Naveen’s place was amazing and we truly enjoyed her place! We were rarely in the apartment as we were out sightseeing, but definitely a great spot to relax and enjoy the views! Will return again soon!

Naveen’s apartment is amazing - very stylish & well located. We loved being able to unwind in Naveen’s apartment whilst still so close to wonderful restaurants & shopping, as well as being so close to the city! Naveen is a wonderful host and very responsive - thank you again for sharing your beautiful apartment with us :-)

We attempted to stay here on business trip to Sydney. The apartment was not at all what we expected, there were blood stains on the sheets, hair left in the sink, grim on the shower floor and the toilets were dirty. Naveen was very unprofessional in her response to this and we ended up leaving because we felt very uncomfortable.

The apartment is comfortable and roomy. The location is amazing, just a short walk to Kings Cross station and very close to the city. Plenty of lovely cafes and restaurants very close by. Communication with host Naveen is excellent. Concierge service was excellent also.

Naveen's apartment in Darlinghurst is an absolute delight. So close to everything and incredible value. We felt at home there. We had a great stay with everything fun in Sydney at our doorstep. Five thumbs up.

Hotel like concierge services, great Dalinghurst location. 
Pictures of accomodation are accurate.
Could be a little cleaner, however nothing bad. Would recommend & would stay here again.
Fabulous place in a great neighborhood.
Amazing place. We really enjoyed our stay. I'll most definitely stay at Naveen's place again!

Great location!  Close to transit, restaurants, pubs, shops, everything you need.  The apartment is spacious and beautifully decorated creating a very comfortable atmosphere.  Host responded to our needs very quickly.  The concierge staff at the front door were all very friendly and welcoming.
Great place, great host, great stay

Very nice and Creative arquitecture industrial design apartment 
High end range and oven , stainless steel kitchen counter . Two floor design with hard wood and steel staircase. I loved it.
Naveen is so helpful, friendly and attentive. 
 The place needs deep cleaning, not the everyday clean that’s ok

Clean, well appointed, very handy to food and transport. Gym on same floor as apartment is well equipped with a great view. Did not use pool just outside but a valuable additional facility. Naveen left coffee pods and tea bags etc and plenty of utensils for cooking. Caution to older people, it is a split level apartment so be prepared for steep stairs between bedroom floor and living area floor. The bed spaces are also sunken. Very comfortable big beds and plenty of power points. Concierge at ground floor entrance handles admission, very attentive service.

Naveen's place was absolutely beautiful! Perfect location in vibey Darlinghurst and close to Kings Cross Station and buses. Loads of restaurants nearby.

Check in was super easy with the building concierge who also kindly kept our suitcases after check out when our flight was delayed.

High end toiletries provided. Washing machine and dryer available. Gym on the same floor. Excellent communication. 

Only notable thing is that there is bottle collection early in the morning which didn't really bother us but if you're a light sleeper or wanting somewhere quiet then maybe stay outside the city.

For the city slickers, this apartment is definitely an excellent spot!

Location, Location, Location - with a great set of Concierge staff who are friendly and very helpful on a 24/7 basis - as is your host Naveen - who's very prompt in getting back to you if needed - and very important to us our Companion Dog was welcomed into a very pet-friendly building - Thanks Naveen
Stylish and roomy apartment with amazing restaurants on your doorstep.
房子蛮时尚的,但是我一个人住的确有点过大了｡整体还是喜欢的
great communication, amazing location and pool area
Great stylish accommodation. Great location. The host was responsive to questions prior to our arrival. I have no hesitation to return to this suite again in the future.
Naveen is a wonderful host, her apartment is very stylish and comfortable. Secure apartment for anyone wanting to stay close to the city, with just a short stroll to many cafes and places to eat!

Naveen’s place was perfect for my family and I. Since I have children, I always prefer places with minimal carpets especially in the bedrooms and this is just what we need. Prior to our arrival, Naveen already informed me about the AC breaking down and she tried her best to offer solutions to make us feel as comfortable as we can.  We stayed the first night without AC in the middle of summer but it was ok since there’s a cool breeze at night. However, it does get loud especially with the window open but it is expected as with any convenient locations.  Naveen was super nice replied us promptly with any of our concerns. We enjoyed our stay there.

Great location and very easy to check in and out, concierge were great.
The place is ideally located in Darlinghurst with shops and restaurants right outside, Coles and Woolworths are within a couple minute walk.
It was great to have a place with a fully equipped kitchen and plentiful space, with the two levels and set up you don’t feel cramped and can comfortably hang out in the apartment without being on top of each other. Most other hotels in Sydney don’t have that luxury.
Thanks for having us!
Great apartment-highly recommended.
Location is amazing although a busy noisy street all night but hey your in the center of it all and it’s expected.

Naveen’s place was wonderful! The location is perfect to get to anywhere cheaply, especially by public transit. The air conditioning was not working when we arrived, however, Naveen had great communication and made sure we were comfortable during our stay. My only complaint would be that there was renovations going on within the building (which is out of Naveen’s control), but we were unaware before we arrived and they were noisy and at one point were painting our door and elevators when we were trying to exit the apartment. Overall our stay was absolutely amazing and I would stay again!

Great location and at the heart of the city. Tap was broken when I got there but host was responsive and assured us it'll be fixed. There was miscommunication between us, the host, neighbours and reception regarding things stuck on the wall and late checkout but it got resolved in the end. There were a few roaches walking around that I suspect were from recent renovations to the apartment
Very stylish and spacious apartment in a perfect central location

name: Apartamento de dois quartos em Copacabana
summary: Olá! Me chamo Renata, sou do Rio de Janeiro e ofereço a você uma oportunidade única de se hospedar em um aconchegante apartamento no coração de Copacabana.   O Flat possui dois quartos, cozinha americana, dois banheiros com blindex e ducha quente/fria (elétrico), sala de jantar, sala de estar, varanda piscina em andar alto.  O condomínio oferece piscina para crianças e adultos, playground infantil, salão de festas, recepção 24h, equipe de seguranças, e câmeras de segurança. Venha se hospedar!!
space: O apartamento possui dois quartos, uma suite com uma cama de casal padrão, e outro quarto com duas camas de solteiro; Dois banheiros com blindex, chuveiros elétricos e maquina de lavar; Cozinha equipada com microondas, fogão, geladeira, utensílios de cozinha; ar condicionado nos dois quartos e ventiladores de teto; wifi e TV a cabo na televisão do quarto e da sala.

Os hóspedes podem acessar a piscina, sauna e playground infantil no condomínio.  O hóspede tem direito a estacionar 1 ( um) carro na
neighborhood_overview: O Flat está em um ponto central em Copacabana. Há apenas oito minutos, a pé, da praia ( Posto 3) e a 5 minutos do metro da Rua Siqueira Campos.  Ao entorno, há muitos restaurantes, bares e um comércio variado.
notes: Está incluído também o serviço de camareira 2 vezes por semana com troca de roupa de cama (1 vez por semana) e de  banho ( 2 vezes por semana).  Em pacote mensal, está incluído o serviço de camareira apenas uma vez por semana
transit: Pela região a locomoção pode ser feita a pé, pois há muitas opções nas redondezas, ou pode ser feita por metrô, ônibus e táxi/uber
access: Os hóspedes podem acessar a piscina, sauna e playground infantil no condomínio.  O hóspede tem direito a estacionar 1 ( um) carro na garagem. Os dados do carro ( modelo e placa) devem ser informados anteriormente.   Além de três andares de lojas que oferecem produtos e serviços, com salões de beleza, institutos de depilação, cursos de idiomas, academia, Detran, agencias de viagem, curso de música e muitas outras opções.
house_rules: - Horário de silêncio a partir de 22h - Não são permitidos animais de estimação - Em caso de perdas de chaves será cobrada uma multa proporcional - As toalhas devem ser estendidas no varal de roupas na varanda, para serem reutilizadas até a próxima troca - Objetos danificados serão cobrados do hóspede - Apague as luzes, desligue o ar condicionado e fogão ao sair de casa  - Não jogue restos de alimentos nos ralos das pias  - Para estadias mensais, a conta de energia será cobrada a parte de acordo com o consumo

name: Water view getaway loft
summary: Experience Old Montreal and all its charm in this designer penthouse condo. It feature beautiful cathedral ceilings, original exposed stones and a fantastic Adress: 281 St. Paul est. Unit 401
description: Experience Old Montreal and all its charm in this designer penthouse condo. It feature beautiful cathedral ceilings, original exposed stones and a fantastic Adress: 281 St. Paul est. Unit 401
house_rules: - NO SHOES - NO PARTIES - NO LOUD MUSIC AFTER 11H PM - TREATING THE PLACE WELL

host.host_about:
I am a young hardworking man loving life and their experiences. I love to travel and got the chance to visit a lot of countries enjoyed them all and looking forward to visit more! I have a deep love for decorations, designer material and architectures.

I love hosting guests and I do it professionally
In this regard, this is a serious engagement for me. I will offer a very good accommodation and I want them to have a worry free experience from the start to the end.

With my knowledge from working for the Ritz Carlton for many years, you will not be disappointed and rest be assured, you will be stepping into a clean, comfortable, and safe environment in a central location.

reviews.comments: A welcome surprise when we walked into the apartment. It felt better than the photos. Located in a very historic and walkable area. Lots of buzz & shops. Milo was an incredible host and made sure we were happy at every turn. We had to switch apartments due to a plumbing accident. Milo walked us through every step to upgrade us to another place which we equally loved. Great hospitality.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Milo had great communication, his place was very nice. The only problem was as we arrived the guest ahead of us broke the shower. He gave us a very small partial refund, but we were forced to shower in a public area. The shower had no water pressure and mold everywhere. Although this might not have been his fault, we thought the issue should have been resolved during our stay since we complied with everything he needed and gave him all the information on the shower in a prompt fashion.

The shower in the unit prior to be entering the unit. The host (Milo) notified me prior to my arrival of this and stated that it would be fixed by the next day. He instructed me to bathe myself with hot water. The next day he brought 2 buckets to bathe with and messaged me to state that the plumber has ordered the part and it should be arriving within the next few days and the shower should be fixed by the weekend (I had booked a 2week stay and for one week I would be without a shower). I was not ok with this arrangement and requested a different possible resolution. He then directed me to go to the roof, access the swimming pool take a shower there and then come back to the unit. I informed the host that this was not ok to which he replied "well there is working bath and hot water so what's the issue".  I politely requested to be relocated if he had another unit or simply a refund of my money so I could find another unit. Milo did not agree that this was a good idea and took it up on himself to threaten me that his ad never stated that he had a shower and that if I left the unit I would be cancelling my stay and there wouldn't be a refund. Long story short after many hours of attempting to politely reason with Milo I finally contacted Airbnb support and requested their assistance. They also agreed that this was not a good condition for anyone to remain in (no shower and bathing with buckets) and assisted in obtaining my full refund. The host was NOT a nice person nor was he polite or understanding or even cared about the request or the well being of the guest or the condition which he was leaving me in by asking me to bathe with buckets. He did not care about having misinformed his guest and only wanted the money from the booking. I've booked with many individuals using Airbnb however never experienced anything of this caliber. Good luck to you all who book with him
Go place to stay

Book this apartment!!!!
We loved this beautiful home for many reasons-location-it is steps away from the basilica, great restaurants and all the old town action. Downtown Montreal is very close, so it is easy to walk everywhere. The house was very clean, the bed was roomy and comfortable, the shower and large soaking tub were great and Milo is the best host ever!!!  He even sent me an encouraging email when he found out about my illness. Above and beyond!!! Thanks, Milo, for the coffee assortment and the tea. We had an awesome time, stay here!!!

reviews.comments: Sam habite une vielle demeure très bien placée près de la Douro dans un quartier historique de porto et à deux pas du centre ville touristique. La prestation est juste parfaite sachant le prix très bon marché. Logement tout confort. Hôte génial et disponible pour nous faire découvrir porto, donner des adresses et pour aller et venir à toute heure chez lui.

My friend and I had a nice experience at Sam's house. The house has an history of his own and Sam will be more than happy to tell you.  It's located near the bridge do Infante, very close to the center. You will be able to get everywhere very easily, both by walking than metro (the closest stop is "Campo 24 de Agosto). Ribeira is around 10-15 minutes walking. Sam is a very welcoming person and we really enjoyed his stories and suggestions about the city. You will really feel like at home!
Très bon accueil, l'appartement était placé à 10 min du centre ce qui était pratique. Merci encore, bonne continuation
You will find really comfortable place with an amazing owner who is willing to help you with everything and to do special things for you! :)
Nous avons passé un excellent séjour, Porto est une ville qui ne nous laisse pas indifférent. À refaire ! Notre hôte était disponible, sympa et nous n'avons manqué de rien !
Un alojamiento muy recomendable.
Esta cerca de la Ribeira 10 minutos y del terminal Oceano Atlântico 6 min.
Great host! Thank you sam!
Très bon hôte, super accueillant, très serviable. Nous sommes restés 2 nuits chez Sam, logés dans une chambre privée dans sa maison. Ce séjour s'est bien passé.
he was very friendly and could give us some local tips . I would stay there again.
good room and big
Wizyta w Porto byla bardzo milym doswiadczeniem, a Sam bardzo przyjaznym i pomocnym gospodarzem. Mieszkanie położone w bardzo dobrej i spokojnej lokalizacji, 15min od centrum spacerkiem.
Hospitalidad y buena ubicación del lugar
Muy bueno
Wonderful place to and close to all tourist attractions.
Très bien situe et hôte très présent. Bon rapport qualité/prix
It was great accommodation right in the city center.

Simply - incredible!
We fell in love with Porto. 
Cristina was so welcoming and kind! She gave us tons of useful tips and recommendations! Never before have I ever felt this welcomed in another country. We also met Cristina's mother and husband. What an amazing family! 
The house is big and has a history. Our room was spacious and the bathroom was on the same floor. There were other guests staying at the house but we barely saw them.
Location is good. The city is build on a hill so there's lots of walking up and down the hill but the house is located somewhere in the middle so it's very convenient.
I wanted to stay there forever! In fact all three of us felt the same!
Thank you for your kindness and gifts! I'd never forget what an amazing time I had staying in Porto.
Great location, and very friendly host!
Ev sahipleri çok iyi niyetli Lee fakat  bina düzenlemesi ve işletmecilik konusunda daha epey bir tecrübe kazanmaları gerekecek.

Pour cette réservation, d'abord nous avons été accueilli de façon très chaleureuse par Christina, et aussi très bien conseillé et même accompagné pour notre premier repas !!!! Très bon  Rapport qualité prix . La maison est bien situé  et ce dans un quartier calme, qui mieux est !!! Nous recommandons , sans problème !!! Roland.
Very friendly and communicative host. Even showed us around a bit. Definitely recommend staying here!
good

Cesar fue un excelente anfitrión, el lugar está bien ubicado cerca del centro.
Recomendable 100%

Staying here was really nice. The location was very good, better than expected and the rooms and the bathroom were very clean.
The kitchen made it possible to cook and eat. 
The contact to the hosts was very good and they gave tips if needed. 
I fully recommend this airbnb.

Cristina y César son unos excelentes anfitriones, amables y con un increíble don para la charla y orientación.
Su casa es muy amplia y práctica para moverse, está ubicada en una zona que permite el acceso caminando a la ciudad. Tiene una vista preciosa.
el único detalle es que en invierno la casa es un poco fría.
Ótima Localização
Отдыхали семьей, всем очень понравилось. Удобное место, всё что нужно рядом. с удовольствием вернулись бы еще сюда.

name: Spacious and Amazing Location!
summary: Huge one bedroom with a very comfortable queen size bed, wood floors, high ceilings, gorgeous arches and window as well as plenty of closet space!  There is a separate queen size, comfortable, and new blow up bed for the other room that is huge too!
space: This is a very big one bedroom especially for the location.  It has beautiful arch ways, high ceilings, and wood floors. There is a courtyard that is accessible where our wifi does reach too!

There is a separate queen size, comfortable, and new blow up bed for the other room that is huge too! This is a very big one bedroom especially for the location.  It has beautiful arch ways, high ceilings, and wood floors. There is a courtyard that is accessible where our wifi does reach too! This is for the whole apartment I will be available if you have any questions about how to get around or anything in general about the city! reviews.comments: Nice neighborhood. Very conveniently located. Even though I never met ashley in person, she was very helpful and accommodating on check-in time.

Ashley was a great host and was able to accommodate our late arrival and late departure. She was friendly and very responsive. I did not spend much time in the apartment but it was very spacious and the neighborhood was nice.

El tiempo que pasamos en el departamento de Ashley fue fantastico! Si bien no pudimos conocerla, coordinamos la entrega de llave y todo estuvo listo a nuestra llegada. El departamento esta muy bien ubicado, cerca de las estaciones de subte y fácilmente se llega caminando al centro y a otros destinos. Fuimos 3 huespedes y nos sentimos muy cómodos en el espacio, el dpto esta equipado con todo lo necesario para una estadía confortable. Lo super recomendamos!! Gracias Ashley por abrirnos tu casa :)

I did not meet Ashley personally, but check in and check out process were incredibly simple and accommodating. Apt is located in very accesible area, close to the subway. Ashley was also very fast in responding to any inquiry we had. Did not spend much time in the apartment, but overall we had a good experience. Thank you Ashley

name: 2379 - AB Vila Olimpica - Icaria Apartment - Bright and modern apartment with amazing pool in Vila Olímpica
summary: This modern, one bedroom apartment is perfect for solo travellers or a couple. Situated in the newly developed Vila Olímpica neighborhood, it is just a short walk from Bogatell metro stop, Ciutadella Park and the beach. The area is ideal for those looking to stay near the Mediterranean shore and the area has a unique, laid back atmosphere. The pristinely decorated apartment boasts a fantastic location and offers all necessary nearby amenities. This bright apartment features a communal pool and outside space for lounging in the warm Spanish sun. With a fully equipped kitchen, complete with washing machine and dishwasher, this apartment has everything you need for a comfortable stay. The apartment has speedy Internet connection and a TV. As for climate control, the property is equipped with  air-conditioning and central heating. Importantly, it comes with an underground parking space for anyone with a car.  The maximum capacity of the apartment is for 3 people as a handy sofa bed is also

name: 2541 - AB GRACIA SPACIOUS - Apartment for 4 with private terrace in Gràcia
summary: This renovated apartment is situated in the heart of the trendy Gràcia neighbourhood and sleeps up to 4 people. With many bars, restaurants, shops and cafés in the surrounding area, you’ll have plenty to do. The apartment is also just a short walk from the grand Passeig de Gràcia and Gaudí’s Casa Milà.Two light and spacious bedrooms are equipped with modern furnishings and plenty of storage. A large open-plan living and dining area is perfect for enjoying evening home-cooked meals or watching the television. Enjoy a drink with family or friends al fresco on your own private terrace.The modern kitchen benefits from plenty of natural light coming from French doors that lead out onto the terrace and a conservatory-like space offers a further seating area. A washing machine makes this apartment perfect for mid-length and long stays and the kitchen contains all the necessary amenities including an oven, microwave, pots and pans. name: 2378 - AB Casa Farreras A - Amazing 1-bedroom Apartment with a Private Terrace
summary: This is a beautiful, one bedroom apartment situated in the city centre of Barcelona, only around 5 minutes´ walk from Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Here you´ll be in the Eixample neighbourhood, surrounded by some of the best cafés and restaurants in Barcelona. There are plenty of public transport options from this area, too. You´ll find the apartment in a fully renovated, modernist building designed by architect Antoni Millàs i Figuerola. You´ll see many aspects on the façade and interior of the building typical of Catalan modernist design, including animals on the columns and flowers seemingly morphing into more animals around the windows, as well as many other impressive architectural features.The apartment has a large private terrace, complete with dining area, so you can enjoy your meals ´al fresco´.
